headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri muAmerica, VaNdenda, Vobata Pamwe neMasangano Akawanda muKusimudzira Vechidiki neNharaunda kuZimbabwe
text: Muchirongwa chedu chatinotarisa zviri kuitwa nevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika, svondo rino tine hurukuro naVaInnocent Ndenda vari mudunhu reTexas muAmerica asi vachibva kuHwedza mudunhu reMashonaland East. VaNdenda, avo vakaenda kuAmerica muna 2016, vanoti kunyange hazvo vachishanda samaneja pane imwe kambani kwakare kuTexas, vakaramba vachienderera mberi nemabasa avo avaiita vachiri kumusha, ekubatsira vanoshaya pamwe nekusimudzira nharaunda yavanobva. Pari zvino vanoti vari kushanda nemasangano matatu anoti reMubatirapamwe Trust, iro rinobatsira vanenge vachishandisa zvinodhaka, reMakoni North District Association, rakanangana nenyaya dzebudiriro, pamwe nereGlobal Exchange Program, iro rinobatanidza vanhu vanobva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana. VaNdenda vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuona vana veZimbabwe vachiisa misoro pamwe vosiyana nehumbimbindoga, vachiti chose chinezwi rekuti kubatana chinobudirira. Vanoti ivowo vane shuviro yekuti vange vachizorangarirwawo mune remangwana semunhu akabatsira mukushanda nevamwe kubatanidza vanhu kuti vavandudze magariro avo. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNamibia, VaHage Geingob, Vanovhura ZITF Vachikurudzira Kudyidzana kweZimbabwe neNamibia
text: Mutungamiri weNamibia, VaHage Geingob, vanoti kudyidzana pakati peNamibia neZimbabwe munyaya dzemabhizimisi kwakaderera vachiti kudyidzana uku kunofanirwa kukwira. Vachivhura ZITF yegore rino zviri pamutemo, VaGeingob vati mugore rapfuura Namibia yakatenga kubva kuZimbabwe zvinhu zvemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemana emadhora. Vati kudyidzana pakati peNamibia neZimbabwe uye pakati penyika dzemuAfrica kunofanirwa kukwira vachiti kuita izvi kunobatsirawo kusimudzira hupfumi henyika idzi. VaGeingob vati Namibia ichiri yakatarisana nedambudziko munyaya yekugovewa kweivhu vakati nyika yavo inogona kudzidza zvakawanda kubva mukugadziriswa kwakaitwa nyaya iyi muZimbabwe vachiti kugadzirisa nyaya iyi kunobatsira kurwisa hurombo hune veruzhinji. Vati hurmende yavo yakatanga chirongwa chavakati "Harambe" senzira yekurwisa hurombo uye kusimudzira hupenyu hweveruzhinji munyika mavo. VaGeingob vati vemakambani vanofanirwa kuita zvemabhizimisi vasina kungonangana nekuwana mari chete, asi kubatsirawo kurwisa hurombo. Vasati vatura mashoko avo, VaGeingob vamboshanyira nzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana muZITF pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachiona zviri kuratidzwa pachirongwa ichi. Nyika gumi neina chete ndidzo dzange dziine makambani adzo achiratidza zvigadzirwa paZITF yegore rino. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inonyorerana Chibvumirano neKambani yeKunze Kuti Ishambadze Marasha
text: Hurumende yanyorerana chibvumirano neimwe kambani yekunze kwenyika kuitira kuti ibatsirwe mukutengesa marasha kunyika dzakaita seIndia neJapan. Vachitaura pakunyoreranwa kwechibvumirano ichi ne Victoria Consulting, gurukota rinoona nezvezvicherwa, VaWinston Chitando, vati donzvo rehurumende nderekuti nyika iwanirwe kwekutengesera marasha kuIndia uye kuitira kuti iwane mari yekushandisa mukuchera marasha aya. VaChitando vati Zimbabwe inofungidzirwa kuti ine marasha anosvika mabhiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu ematani asi pagore kuri kucherwa matani ari pakati pemamiriyoni maviri nemamiriyoni matatu. VaChitando vatiwo India ndiyo inotenga marasha akawanda pagore zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika. Vachitaura pamusangano mumweyo, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutora mukana wekudyidzana wakanaka uripo pakati payo neIndia. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva kuti kambani yeVictoria Consulting yakamboshanda nenyika dzipi, uye kuti vakuru vayo ndivanani. Asi vaimbove mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvezvicherwa muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaGift Chimanikire, vati havaoni kuti zvakanaka kuti Zimbabwe itsvage misika yekutengesera marasha kunze kwenyika, ipo pari zvino kusiri kucherwa marasha anokwana munyika. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vatiwo havaoni zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe itsvake kambani yekunze inonotsvakira Zimbabwe misika yemarasha. VaMuchichwa vatiwo zviri nani kuti kushandiswe hukama hwagara huripo nedzimwe nyika. Dandemudande rebazi rezvezvicherwa rinoti Zimbabwe ine marasha akanaka, uye ine nzvimbo makumi maviri nepfumbamwe dzine marasha. Makambani maviri chete munyika, Hwange Colliery neMakomo Resources, ndiwo ari kunyanyochera marasha. No media source currently available

headline: VaMasaraure Vanoti Havasi Kuzorega Kurwira Mihoro Yakakwana yeVarairidzi
text: Mutungamiriri wesangano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, avo vakapambwa nevanhu vatanhatu pakati pehusiku, vanoti vakarohwa zvakaipisisa, uye vakatorerwa mbatya dzavainge vakapfeka. VaMasaraure vanoti vakakuvadzwa mumusoro, kumusana, maoko nemakumbo, vachiti vamwe vevanhu vakavapamba ndevamwe vechikwata chakambovapamba muna Ndira gore rino, vachiti izvi hazvisi kuzovadzorerwa sure mukurwira kodzero dzevarairiridzi. VaMasaraure vanoti hurumende yave kutora vanorwira kodzero dzevashandi sevavengi vachiti hapana anoda kupidigura hurumende asi kuti vanhu vanoda kuti vakwanise kuriritira mhuri dzavo. VaMasaraure vaudza Studio7 kuti vaudzwa navana chiremba kuti vambozorora kuenda kubasa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende panyaya yekupambwa kwava Masaraure sezvo vanga vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Rimwe Sangano reVarimi Rotsigira Hurongwa hweKubhadhara Vachena Vakatorerwa Minda
text: Rimwe sangano revarimi reZimbabwe Farmers Union (ZFU), rinoti rinotambira nemufaro hurongwa hwehurumende hwekuti varimi vatema vari mumapurazi akatorerwa vachena vabhadhare mitero ichashandiswa mukuripa vachena ava budiriro dzavakanga vaita pamapurazi avo. Mukuru weZFU, VaPaul Zakariya vanoti kubhadhara zvivakwa nebudiriro zvakasiya zvaitwa nevachena ava kunopa varimi vechitema ava chiremera chekuti vakabhadhara zvavari kushandisa, kwete kuti vakaita zvekubvuta. “Handiona sekuti chingave chinhu chingaremera vanhu kuti vave ne ownership yakadzika pamusoro peminda yavanenge vachishandisa. Idanho rinokwanisa kuti ritipe chiremera munharaunda yatinogara uyewo nepasi rose kuti vakanga varipo paminda iyoyo vakabhadharwa,” VaZakariya vanodaro. VaZakariya vanoti kubhadhara kwavari kuita mari idzi kuburikidza nemitero iri kubhadhariswa varimi vakagariswa patsva ava hakusi kuti vari kutenga ivhu ravari kurima kwete. “Varimiri vanenge vachibhadhara zvivakwa nebudiriro dzakaitwa nevachena ava, kwete kuti tiri kutenga ivhu redu, kwete.” Mukutanga kwemwedzi uno gurukota rezveupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vakazivisa kuti hurumende yakanga yave kutanga kuita ongororo mumapurazi kuti ione kukosha kwakaita budiriro dzakasiiwa nevachena vakatorerwa mapurazi ava. Vakati izvi ndizvo zvinozovapa ruzivo rwekuti murimi oga oga obhadhara marii, uye murimi wechichena akabviswa papurazi apa anozopiwawo marii. Kutanga muna 2000, vachena vanodarika zviuru zvina vanonzi vakabviswa zvine chisimba pamapurazi avo achipiwa kune vatema, asi minda mizhinji yakararira nekuda kwekushaiwa zvikwanisiro kwevarimi vatsva ava. No media source currently available

headline: Doctor Manyika veBuild Zimbabwe Vokurudzira Kuti Vanhu Vasakanganwa Kwavakabva
text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Doctor Noah Manyika vanogara kuCharlotte, kuNorth Carolina muAmerica vari kuita zvakawanda kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe, vangave kumusha kana kunze kwenyika, kuti vavake nyika yechipikirwa. Doctor Manyika vanoshanda nesangano reBuild Zimbabwe, iro vakavamba vaine chinangwa chekuti vabatsire vana nezvipfeko, mabhuku pamwe nevirongwa zvinorodza pfungwa. Asi vanoti vakazorivhurirawo kune vamwe vana veZimbabwe kuti vaite mubata pamwe semajuru mukuumba nyika. "Build Zimbabwe chirongwa chandaiita makore gumi nemashanu adarika nechinangwa chekuti Zimbabwe ibudirire kana munhu wese akawana chaanoita mukuvaka nyika. Asi ndakazoti, kwete, kwete, regai ndidaidzed vamwe vana veZimbabwe tivake tiri pamwechete," vanodaro Doctor Manyika. Vanoti sangano ravo iri rine zvirongwa zvakawanda zvariri kuita mumatunhu akasiyanasiyana enyika, zvinosanganisira kuvaka dzimba dzine mitengo yepasi mumaguta ari munyika senzira yekubatsira vanhu vakawanda kuti vawane pekugara pakakodzera. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inokurudzirwa Kutsigira, Kusimbaradza Mari Itsva
text: Bhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, razivisa kuti richadhinda mari itsva ichange ichishandiswa mumabhanga serimwe rematanho ariri kutora mukugadzirisa nyaya yekushomeka kwemari munyika, pamwe nekugadzirisa zvinhu mumabhanga nemisika yemari munyika. Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanodzidzisa zvemabhizimusi paDevry University ku Ohio, vanoti vanhu vanoda mari yavanoshandisa, naizvozvo danho ratorwa neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe idanho rakanaka kana hurumende ikatevedzera mitemo nemirairo yezvehupfumi hwenyika inotevedzwa nenyika dzepasi pose, kwete zvokuzoramba ichidhinda mari pavanenge vazvifunga. Muzvinafundo Masocha vati hurumende inofanirwa kuratidza vanhu kuti inovimbika kwete kudhinda mari nguva dzese zvinozokonzera kuti mari yacho ishaye huremerera. "Vanhu vanoda kuona mari yavo mumavoko kwete kuudzwa kuti iri mukati mefoni yavanoshandisa, saka kana hurumende ikaunza mari iyi vanhu vangafara nekuti zvema RTGS hazvisi zvinovafadza. Asi hurumende inosungirwavo kuchengetedza chiremera chemari iyi nekurega zvekuzodhindadhinda mari sezvayaimboita makore apfuura," Professor Masocha vaudza Studio 7. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reProudly263 Global Robatsira Vana veZimbabwe Vari Kunze Kutanga Mabhizimusi
text: Sangano reProudly263 Global, iro rakaumbwa nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa mushure mekunge zvaona kuoma kwakaita kutanga mabhizimusi kana usiri chizvarwa chenyika iyi, riri kubatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika pamwe nezviri munyika nemikana yekutanga mabhizimusi azvo zvega. Vakavamba sangano iri uye vari ivo CEO veProudly263 Global, VaStanley Makwara, vanoti vakaonawo kubatana kwezvimwe zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa, uye kutsigirana kwazvinoita mune zvemabhizimusi, izvo zvakaita kuti vati kana vana veZimbabwe vanozvigonawo. VaMakwara vanoti chinangwa chesangano ravo, iro rave nenhengo dzinodarika zviuru zvitatu, ndechekusimudzira mabhizimusi nemagariro evanhu kuburikidza nekubatana vachizivana. Vanotiwo seProudly263 Global, vakaumbawo bhanga rinonzi Hello Sahwira Mhlobo (HSM Bank), rinove remubatanidzwa wezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa, mushure mekuona kunetsa kwazvinoita kuti munhu ange achikwanisa kukwereteswa mari nemabhanga emo yekuti atange bhizimusi. VaMakwara vanoti bhanga ravo rinokurudzira kuchengetedza mari uye rinowanisa nhengo dzaro zvikwereti zvine mutengo wakaderera kudarika kumamwe mabhanga. Vanoti remangwana resangano ravo rakajeka zvekuti vanoona vana veZimbabwe vari kunze vachikwanisa kuvaka upfumi hweZimbabwe ivo vari kunyika dzavagere. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe neGermany Dzoronga Kuumba Komisheni Inoona nezveKusimbaradza Hukama
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakasangana neChipiri negurukota rekuGermany rinoona nezvekudyidzana munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nebudiriro, VaGerd Muller, vakabvumirana kuumba komisheni ichaone nezvekusimbaradza hukama nekudyidzana pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure memusangano wavo, VaChinamasa vakati vafara kushanyirwa naVaMuller. Vakati vatura nyaya dzakawanda dzinosanganisira kudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi, chikwereti cheZimbabwe kuGermany, zvirango zvehupfumi pamwe nekuti Zimbabwe itange zvekare kuwana rutsigiro rwemari nehunyanzvi kubva kuGermany. Vakatiwo vakazeya zvimwe zvingaitwe neZimbabwe kuti ikwanise kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kune dzimwe nyika nemasangano epasi rose pamwe nekuti igadziridze hukama hwayo nenyika dzepasi rose. VaChinaamasa vakati vakabvumiranawo kushanda pamwe chete panyaya yekudzidzisa vanhu zvidzidzo zvemabasa emaoko kana kuti vocational training nechinangwa chekuti vanhu vakwanise kuzvishandira pamwe nekupinza vamwe mabasa. Zimbabwe yakatarirwa zvirango zvehupfumi nenyika dzekumavirira dzakaita seAmerica, Australia nenyika dzekuEurope nekuda kwehutongi hwehudzvanyiriri, kutyora kodzeo dzevanhu pamwe nekuita sarudzo dzisina kujeka. VaMuller vakati vakafara kuuya kuZimbabwe mushure mekunge Zimbabwe yagadza mutungamiriri mutsva zvichitevera sarudzo dzemwedzi wapfuura idzo dzakazosimbiswawo nedare repamusororo munyika. Vakati zvakakosha kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaite zvakavimbisa kuita zvekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu kusanganisira mapato anopikisa pamwe nekuremekedza nekutevedza mitongo yematare edzimhosva. VaMuller vakati Germany nedunhu rese reEurope vanoda runyaro muZimbabwe ndosaka vachida kuti VaMnangagwa vaite zvavakavimbisa. Vakatiwo Germany inoda kuona hupenyu nehupfumi hwevanhu vekumaruwa huchisimudzirwa ndosaka iri kuda kushanda neZimbabwe mukusimudzira ruzivo rwevanhu pamabasa emaoko. Vakatiwo Joint Commission yavachaumba neZimbabwe ichazeya zvese zvingaitwe uye kuti Germany ingabatsirei sei vanhu vemuZimbabwe kuti vabudirire. Zvichakadai, nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti kunyange hazvo makurukota aVaMnangagwa ari kuramba achiita basa rawo, ari kuita izvi zviri kunze kwemutemo sezvo mutemo uchiti zvigaro zvavo zvinopera panogadzwa mutungamiri wenyika mushure mesarudzopapera. Izvi zviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika pasi paSection 108 (1) (c). VaMnangagwa vakagadzwa kuve mutungamiriri wenyika nesvondo uye havasati vadoma dare remakurukota avo. No media source currently available

headline: Dunhu reGauteng Roronga Kudzika Mitemo Inosarura Vabvakure
text: Mukuru wedunhu reGauteng muJohannesburg, VaDavid Makhura, vakazivisa neChipiri kuti nekufamba kwenguva, dunhu ravo richadzika mutemo unorambidza vekune dzimwe nyika kutanga mabhizimisi mudunhu ravo, sezvo izvi zviri kutadzisa zvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa, kuti zviwanewo chekubata. VaMakhura vakataura mashoko aya mudare ravo redunhu, apo vakange vachipindura mibvunzo yaibva kune dzimwe nhengo dzedare ravo. Vanoona nezvekodzero dzavanhu vanoti mashoko akataurwa naVaMakhura anokonzeresa kuti pave neruvengo pakati pevanobva kunze kwenyika nezvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa. Mumwe muzvinabhizimusi muSouth Africa neZimbabwe, VaBrighton Sangore, vanoti mashoko akadai anobata zvizvarwa zvisiri zvemuSouth Africa, agara achitaurwa kwenguva yakareba muSouth Africa. Sachigaro weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti mashoko akadai haafanirwe kunge achibva pamuromo pemunhu anonyarikana saVaMakhura. VaMavhinga vanoti mashoko aVaMakhura anotyora kodzero dzevanhu uye handicho chaive chido chevaimbove mutungamiri weSouth Africa, mushakabvu Nelson Mandela. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, VaGabriel Shumba, vanotiwo mashoko aVaMakhura anotyora mitemo yenyika, iyo isina rusarura pakuvambwa kwemabhizinesi. VaShumba vanoti kana vekunze vachivhura mabhizimusi muSouth Africa, vanenge vachibatsira kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika iyi. VaShumba vanoti VaMakhura vanofanirwa kukumbira ruregerero kuzvizvarwa zvose zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa. VaShumba vanoti sangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum riri kuita hurukuro nemamwe masangano akasiyanasiyana, senzira yekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa. Mashoko aVaMakhura anouya mushure mokunge zvitoro zvezvizvarwa zvekunze kweSouth Africa zvapazwa nekupiswa, ukuwo vatyairi vemagonyeti vachimbunyikidzwa kodzero dzavo, vamwe vachimanikidzwa kusiya basa nesangano rinozviti All Truck Drivers Foundation. Sangano reHuman Rights Watch rinoti vanhu mazana maviri vafa mumhirizhonga yemuSouth Africa kubva muna Kurume gore rapera, vazhinji vavo vari vatyairi vanobva kune dzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaDzvokora Vokurudzira Vana veZimbabwe Vari Kunze Kuti Vabatsire Mukugadzirisa Zvinhu Kumusha
text: Mumwe wevari kushanda mukugadzirisa ramangwana rinotarisirwa ndaVaTawanda Dzvokora, avo vanozviti Chief Svosve. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvakawanda zvinoramba zviine shuviro yekuti zvinhu kumusha zvichanaka nerimwe zuva. Asi pahuwandu hwazvo, zvimwe ndizvo zviri kubatawo nepazvinogona napo mukuedza kuti hutongi hwejechetere huri kutarisirwa nevakawanda huitike nekukasika. Mumwe wevari kushanda mukugadzirisa ramangwana rinotarisirwa iri ndaVaTawanda Dzvokora, avo vanozviti Chief Svosve. Vanoti hapana chinombonakidza pakugara kunze kwenyika. “Ini ndiri munhu wekumusha, saka ndinoramba ndichitarisira kuti zvinhu zvichanaka chete, asi kwete nekuti vanhu vari kumusha chete ndivo vanofanirwa kushanda asi kuti kana nesuwo tiri mu diaspora,” vanodaro VaDzvokora. VaDzvokora, avo vaimbove murairidzi vakambodzidzisawo munyika yeBotswana vasati vasunga twavo nemhuri yavo vakananga kuUnited States of America kudunhu reNorth Dakota uko kwavakasvikopinda munyaya dzemhando dzemoto vachisiya zvekubata choko. “Ndagara mu diaspora kwe 15 years, 10 ndiri kuBotswana then five ndiri muno umu, asi pfungwa dzinenge dzingori kumusha nekuti muno tiri musango. Saka kare vakuru vaiti kunonzi kutetereka.” VaDzvokora, avo vane makore makumi mana nemashanu ekuberekwa, ndivo zvakare mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubato rinopikisa hurumende reZimbabwe First iro rinotungamirwa naVaMaxwell Zeb Shumba. Ndivo zvakare munyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mumubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weNational Electoral Reform Agenda, kana kuti NERA, vachimirira bato ravo reZim First, uyo uri kurwira kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena. Vanoti vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vanofanirwa kuitawo pavo mukuwedzera kuti zvinhu zvikasike. Kumusha vanoti vari kubatsirawo nekutumira mbatya, chikafu nezvimwe zvakadaro kuburikidza nechechi yavo yeZimbabwe Methodist Church. “Gore rega rega tinotumira munhu kumusha anonogovera zvinhu zvatinenge taunganidza pamwe nekutenga,” VaDzvokora vanodaro. Vanoti vari kutenga dzimba kumusha senzira yekuunganidza nayo hupfumi uye pari zvino vari kuvaka imba yekuti vari parwendo vanogona kurara kana kuti lodge kuChinhoyi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzira Kushandiswa Magwenya eZuva
text: Zvinhu zvinonzi zviri kuramba zvichioma munyika, zvikuru sei nekushaikwa kwemagetsi pamusoro pemamwe matambudziko agara akatarisanawo nenyika. Kambani yemagetsi yeZimbabwe Electricity Suppy Authority, ZESA, yakatozivisa vagari kuti vachange vachishaiwa magetsi munguva dzayakatara, dzingangosvika maawa manomwe pazuva, asi vazhinji vari kutaura neStudio 7 vanoti magetsi munzvimbo dzavanogara ari kudzimwa kwenguva dzinotodarika maawa makumi maviri pazuva. Vamwe vanototi vave nemazuva matatu vasina magetsi. Mukuedza kurerutsa dambudziko iri, gurukota rehurumende VaSamuel Undenge neChitatu vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vachinyanya kushandisa moto wezuva, kana kuti solar energy seimwe nzira yekuwana nayo magetsi sezvo emvura ave kunetsa. Asi vamwe vanoti kurudziro yehurumende iyi haina zvainoreva sezvo pasina hurongwa hwekuti vanhu vangawana sei magetsi ezuva aya kana hurumende isina kuvapa zvekushandisa zvacho. Mvura mudhamu reKariba, uko kunogaiwa magetsi, inonzi yadzikira zvakanyanya izvo zvoita kuti itadze kutenderedza magwenya anozogaya magetsi. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu vanoti dambudziko rose iri riri kubva pakuti hurumende iri kukundina kuona matambudziko achiri kure. VaMaguwu vanoti dai hurumende yakachenjera ingadai yakaita kuti matunhu ose azvibikire oga magetsi awo, sezvo aine madhamu asina zvaari kuita. “Muchitaura Masvingo kunana Lake Mutirikwi, Manicaland kunana Osborne Dam, saka hurumende yedu ihurumende isingatarisi mangwana,” vanodaro VaMaguwu. Vanotiwo nyika inokwanisa kubata moto wezuva ichishandisa kuita magetsi, sezviri kuitwa nenyika dzakawanda dzisina magetsi anogayiwa nemvura. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemoto wezuva, vachishanda nekambani ye Exempla Solar Systems iri kuBulawayo, VaTendai Mukucha vanoti izano rakanaka riri kukurudzirwa nehurumende rekuti vanhu vatange kushandisa zvakanyanya moto wezuva. Asi VaMukucha vanoti dambudziko riri pakuti vanhu vese vanokwanisa here kuzowana zvikwanisiro zvinodiwa kuti munhu awane magetsi e solar. Vanoti vanofara nedanho ratorwa nehurumende sezvo zvichireva kuti kana yakurudzira kushandiswa kwemoto wezuva, naivovo zvinovasimudzira. “Asi takatarisa kuhurumende, tinenge takatarisawo matanho anotibatsira sevano provider equipment,” vanodaro VaMukucha. No media source currently available

headline: Dare kuBulawayo Rokurudzirwa Kurasa Nyaya yeMutori weNhau Vachuchusi Vachinzi Vakundikana Basa
text:
Magweta ari kumirira mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira ega Jeffrey Moyo azivisa dare ramejastiriti muBulawayo nhasi kuti achaita chikumbiro chekuti nyaya yaakatarisana nayo iraswe nekuti muchuchisi haana kubudisa humbowo hwekuti Moyo ane mhosva yaakapara.

Kunzwikwa kwenyaya yaMoyo kwapetwa nhasi, mushure mekunge dare ranzwa humbowo kubva kuna VaAcademy Chinhamora vanove mushandi weZimbabwe. Media Commission, avo vange vari mufakazi wechishanu vakasarudzwa nemuchuchisi kuti vape huchapupu hwavo munyaya iyi.

Mukuvhunzurudzwa kwavaitwa naAmai Beatrice Mtetwa, VaChinhamora vabvuma kuti zvinhu zvisiri pamutemo kuti bazi rekufambiswa kwemashoko rive nechekuita nekunyoreswa kwevatapi venhau vanobva kunze kwenyika, sezvo boka reZMC riri boka rakazvimirira rega pasi pebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Asi vati izvi zvinhu zvinogara zvichiitwa nekuti ndiwo mashandiro agara aripo pakati peboka ravo nebazi rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko.

VaChinhamora vabvumawo kuti munhu anenge achida kunyoresa kuboka iri semutapi wenhau kana kubatsira vamwe vanenge vachida kunyoresa, haana zvaangaziva zvakawanda zvine chekuita nemashandiro anoita veboka iri. Kune vafakazi vana vakatopa huchapupu hwavo kudare. Amai Beatrice Mtetwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vange vakatarisira kuti muchuchisi VaAcumen Khupe vachadeedza vamwe vafakazi asi izvi hazvina kuitika. Vati, “Tauya takatarisira kuti pane vamwe vafakazi vatatu vachapa huchapupu vanosanganisira akaferefeta nyaya iyi, nemumwe anoshanda kubazi rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko, pamwe naivo VaChinhamora.” Amai Mtetwa vaenderta mberi vachiti, “Asi VaChinhamora ndivo chete vazopa huchapupu, mushure mezvo muchuchisi achibva ati anga apeta nyaya yake.” Amai Mtetwa vati maonero avo ndeekuti muchuchisi haana kukwanisa kubudisa pachena kuti Moyo akapara mhosva izvo zvavapa kuti vazivise dare kuti vanoda kukwidza chikumbiro chekuti rirase nyaya iyi."


Mutongi wedare VaMark Nzira vati vachapa mutongo wavo musi wa7 Kurume. Moyo akasungwa muna Kubvumbi gore rapera akazobvumidzwa kubhadhara mari yechibatsio mushure mekugara muchitokisi kwemavhiki anopfuura matatu, achinzi akabatsira vatapi venhau vekuAmerica vaviri Christina Goldbaum naJoao Silva, avo vanoshandira bepanhau reNew York Times kuti
vapinde munyika zvisiri pamutemo.

Vaviri ava vakadzingwa munyika vasina kuwana mukana wekumiswa pamberi pedare pamusoro penyaya iyi.  Moyo anonzi akabatsira vaviri ava achishanda pamwe nemumwe mushandi
weZMC, Thabang Manhika uyo ari kupomerwa mhosva imwe chete, asi ari
kutongwa pachake ega.

Kusungwa kwaMoyo kwakashorwa nemasangano akawanda kusanganisira reCommittee to Protect Journalists iro rakati uyu waive muenzaniso wakaipa wekushungurudzwa kuri kuramba kuchiitwa vatapi venhau munyika.

headline: Kuteresa Makambani Ane Minda Munyika Kotambirwa neNyanzvi
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvekurima dzinoti dzinotambira danho rakatorwa nedare remakurukota rekuti makambani makuru ane minda munyika abhadhare mitero. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti makambani aya akanzi anofanirwa kubhadhara madhora gumi pahekita pagore kubvira muna Ndira wegore rino. Danho iri rinozi richabatsira hurumende kuti iunganidze mari yekushandisa mubudiriro pamwe nekubhadhara varimi vechichena vakatorerwa minda. Danho iri rinotevera rimwe rakadai rakaziviswa zvakare nehurumende mwedzi mishoma yadarika rekuti varimi vakagariswa patsva pamwe nevekumaruwa, vanonzi ma A1 ne A2, vabhadharewo mitero. Vekumaruwa vanofanirwa kubhadhara madhora mashanu kuchitiwo vemapurazi madiki vachibhadhara madhora gumi nemashanu pagore. Asi imwe nyanzvimune zvekurima, VaBernard Manyadza, avo vanoshanda vakazvimirira, vanoti zvakakoshawo zvikuru kuti patariswe kuti munhu ari kushandisa ivhu iri ari kuwanawo cheuviri here kubva mariri. VaManyadza vanotiwo havatambiri pfungwa yekuti varimi vatsva kana vekumaruwa vahwandirwe nehurumende mukubvisiswa mari yekubhadhara vachena, avo vakatobuda munyika, vazhinji vacho vachinzi vave kurima vari kuZambia, kunove kwave kutengwa chibage neZimbabwe. Asi mumwe murimi mukuru, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanotiwo havaoni varimi vachiita dambudziko rekukundikana kubhadhara mitero iyi, sezvo iri pasi zvikuru, uye vagara vachiibhadhara. VaChirumhanzu vanoti havaoni hurumende iri iyo ine dambudziko kana hurongwa uhwu hwakasabudirira, sezvo paine zvipangamazano zvinoipa mazano nekunyora zvekuti itevere. Mamwe makambani makuru ari kurima munyika, anosanganisira yeTongaat Hulett, anonzi ane minda mikuru kwazvo, izvo zvinogona kuti azoguma obhadhara mari dzinodarika miriyoni yemadhora pagore. No media source currently available

headline: Huwori, Kusarongeka Zvonzi Ndidzo Honzeri Dzekushaikwa hweHupfu muNyika
text: Dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu munyika rinonzi nevamwe ratodzika midzi, panguva iyo paine kunakurirana nyoka mhenyu pakati pehurumende nevanogaya upfu, avo vari kunzi vari kunzvengesa upfu, zvikuru hweRoller Meal. Hurumende yakabhadhara kare chidimbu chemari inofanirwa kutengeswa nayo rudzi rwehupfu urwu, ivzo zvinozoita kuti vatengi vahuwane nemutengo uri pasi, asi izvi zvinonzi hazvisi kubatsira sezvo hupfu hwacho huri kuramba huchishaikwaq muzvitoro asi huchiwanikwa kumusika mutema, uko kwahuri kuwanikwa nemari iri pamusoro. Vanogaya upfu vari kupomerwawo mhosva yekuwanza upfu hweNgwerewere, uhwo hunodhura, pachinzvimbo chekuti vagaye hweRoller Meal hunokwaniswa kutengwa nevanhu vose nemutengo uri pasi. Ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika rwunonzi rwave kuswera rwuchifudza zvitoro kuri kumirira kuti rwungangosangana nemotokari dzinodhirivhara upfu, pachinzvimbo chekunge rwuchiita zvinopa pundutso kumhuri pamwe nenyika. Mumwe anoti aswera akagarira upfu ndaAmai Rufaro Chakanyuka vekuGreendale muHarare, avo vanoti vazohuwana asi huchitengeswa nemadhora zana nemakumi mashanu patsapo yemakirogiramu gumi, pane mutengo wakatarwa nehurumende wemadhora makumi manomwe pamakirogiramu gumi. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu riri kukonzerwa nekusarongeka kwechirongwa chehurumende chekutsigira vanogaya upfu nemari kuitira kuti vagohutengesa nemari iri pasi. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanotiwo chanyanya kukonzera dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu huwori, uhwo vanoti hwatekeshera munyika. VaChirumhanzu vanoti veruzhinji munyika vari kutarisira kuti hurumende ichakasika kutora matanho ekuparadza midzi yehuwori iyi isati yasunga nekusvina nyika yose. Svondo rapera vanogaya upfu vakapomerwa mhosva yekutengesa hwehupfu hwavanofanirwa kutengesera vanhu munyika kuDemocratic Republic of Congo, uko vanonzi vari kutengesa nemari iri pamusoro. Mukupera kwesvondo mapurisa anonzi akapinda mumabhizimusi evanogaya hupfu, uko anonzi akawana upfu hunosvika matani zviuru zvishanu hwakanga hakachengetedzwa, hunofungidzirwa kuti hwaida kuendeswa pamisika mitema. Asi mutauriri wesangano revanogaya hupfu, reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaGarikai Chaunza vakaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti hapana chinoshamisa kuti vanogaya upfu vawanikwe vaine hupfu, sezvo riri iro basa ravo. VaChaunza vakatiwo vamwe vanogaya hupfu vari kuita dambudziko rekushaya chekutakurisa upfu uhwu kuendesa kune vezvitoro. Sachigaro weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Musarara, vanoti sangano ravo riri kupinza chibage munyika kubva munyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, Mexico, Brazil neThailand. Uganda yakazivisawo kuti ichatengesera Zimbabwe chibage. Asi VaKuchera vanoti panotoda kuti pagadziriswe mitemo yemunyika kuitira kuti zvinhu zvakaita sehupfu zvisashaikwa munyika. Kusvika matambudziko ose, kusanganisira huwori, zvagadziriswa No media source currently available vakawanda vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu munyika richaramba riripo kunyangwe nyika yakapinza chibage chakawanda zvakadii kubva kunze, nekuti pane vanenge vachiwana cheuviri kubva kumutengeswa kwehupfu pamisika mitema.

headline: Zimbabwe Yotsvaga Rubatsiro rwe$188m Ichabatsira Vakawirwa neMatambudziko
text: Zimbabwe iri kutsvaga rubatsiro rwemariu inodarika zana nemakumi masere emamiriyoni emadhora. Mari iyi ndetekubatsira vanhu vakawirwa nedambudziko remafashamu emvura. Izvi zvaziviswa nevakasanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, pamusangano wavaita nevamiriri vedzimwe nyika. Musangano uyu wapindwawo nesangano reUnited Nations Development Program, vemabhangi pamwe nevemakambani akazvimirira VaMphoko vati vamiriri ava nemakambani aya vanoziva dambudziko rakawirwa neZimbabwe uye hurumende yavo iri kuda rubatsiro rwemhando yese. Vatiwo hurumende ichaedza nepainogona napo kuona kuti mari yese ichabviswa ichaenda kunobatsira vanhu vakawirwa nedambudziko iri. VaMphoko vati mari yese iri $188m yavari kutsvaga ichange ichibatwa neveReserve Bank of Zimbabwe uye vese vanenge vabvisa mari yavo vanogona kupihwa humbowo hwekuti mari yavo yakashanda sei. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vati hurumende ichiri kuongorora kuti mari iri kudiwa imarii, asi vati vakawana $188 million, mari iyi inogona kubatsira zvakanyanya. Vatiwo musangano weSouthern Africa Development Community uchangobva mukuitwa wakaratidza kuti mashafamu akaparadza zvinhu zvakawanda muZimbabwe kudarika zvakaitika munyika dziri mudunhu rese. Mukuru weUNDP muZimbabwe, VaBishaw Parajuli, vati vatambira chikumbiro chehurumende uye vari kushanda nehurumende yeZimbabwe mukubatsira vese vakawirwa nedambudziko iri. Vatiwo zvinofadza kuti pane rubatsiro rwave kutopinda munyika. Mumiriri weChina muZimbabwe, VaHuang Ping, vati chikamu cheRed Cross chekunyika kwavo chakabvisa rubatsiro rwezviuru zvishanu zvemadhora uyewo vashandi vemuZimbabwe vanobva kuChina vakabvisa zviuru gumi zvemadhora zvekubatsira vakawirwa nedambudziko remafashamu. Rumwe rubatsirwo rwematende, mishonga nezvimwe zvasvika munyika neMuvhuro kubva kuJapan. Namibia yazivisawo kuti iri kuunza rubatsirwo rwechikafu runosanganisira magaba ehove miriyoni. Mukutanga kwemwedzi kwaKurume, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakati dambudziko remafashamu idambudziko renyika yese izvo zvinoita kuti hurumende ikwanise kutsvaga rubatsiro kunze. Pane vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu vakatofa munyika yese uye nemafashamu, ukuwo mhuri dzinodarika zviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu dzakaparadzirwa misha yadzo, zvikoro, mabhiriji nemakirinika zvikaparadzwawo munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reBill and Melinda Gates Rowanisa Vanhu Dzimba muHarare
text: Rimwe sangano rekuAmerica, reBill and Melinda Gates Foundation, irapedza chirongwa charo chekuvakira vanotambura dzimba muHarare apo ratambidza dzimba zviri pamutemo kumhuri mazana mana nemakumi masere mumusha weDzivaresekwa Extenstion muHarare. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, mumwe mukuru anoona bezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa musangano iri, Amai Melanie Walker, vati chirongwa ichi, icho chine mamiriyoni makumi mashanu emadhora, chabudirira chose. Vati ishuviro yavo kuti kanzuro yeHarar,e ichashanda nemamwe masangano anopa rubatsiro,ichaenderera mberi ichivakira vanoshaya dzimba kuti vagare zvakanaka sezvo sangano ravo rapedza chirongwa charo. Meya veguta reHarare, VaBenard Manyenyeni, vatenda sangano iri uye vati chirongwa ichi chakabudirira chose zvekuti kanzuru yavo yave kutoronga kushandisa chirongwa ichimukugadzirisa dambudziko revanhu vari kugara munzvimbo dzisingakodzeri muguta. Pasi pechirongwa cheBill and Melinda Gates Foundation, kanzuru yakapihwa mari yekugadzira migwagwa, kugadzira pombi dzemvura nesiweji uyewo vanhu vakazopihwa mari dzekuvaka dzimba dzine mipanda miviri miviri. Vazhinji vakawana rubatsiro nedzimba pasi pechirongwa ichi ndevaya vakabviswa munzvimbo dzavaigara apo hurumende yaigadzirira kushanya muZimbabwe kwaMambokadzi wekuEnglanda, Queen Elizabeth, muna 1992 pamwe nevamwe vakaputsirwa dzimba dzavo paOperation Murambatsvina muna 2005. Mumwe wevanhu ava, Amai Grace Tagarisa, vanoti vanofara chose kuti vavewo nepekugara zvichitevera rubatsiro rwakabva kuBill and Melinda Gates Foundations. Vanoti kunze kwemba vakadzidziswa kuita mabasa ekuzvibatsira akaita sekusona. Mumwe wevanhu vakawana rubatsiro kubva kusangano iri, Ambuya Netty Mahachi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofara chose kuti vave nepekugara mushure mekutambura kwenguva yakareba. VaManyenyeni vati zvichitevera kufamba zvakanaka kwechirongwa ichi, kanzura ichabvisa mumhuri zana nemakumi maviri neimwe dziri kugara zviri kunze kwemutemo mumusha weGunhill vodzivakira dzimba kuMabvuku. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kanzuru yavo iri kuedza napose painogona napo kuti munhu wese awane pekugara muHarare zvisinei nekuti murombo here kana kuti kwete Vati kanzuro yavo ine chinangwa chekuvaka dzimba dzinodarika zana rezviuru kusvika mugore ra2018.

headline: Varairidzi Vopika kuti Vachaenderera Mberi neKuramwa Mabasa Panovhurwa Zvikoro
text: Sangano re Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rinoti hurongwa hwekuratidzira nekuramwa mabasa kwevadzidzisi huri kuenderera mberi neChipiri panovhurwa zvikoro, sezvavakazivisa, kunze kwekunge hurumende yauya nezvibvumirano zvinotambirika pamusoro pezvinyunyuto zvevarairidzi. Zvinyunyuto izvi zvinonzi zvinosanganisira kuda kuti vawedzerwe mari, kubvumidzwa kuti vaende pazororo, kubviswa kwezvematongerwo enyika muzvikoro, uye kudzorerwa kwemari dzinopiwa varairidzi kana vachiita mamwe mabasa ari pamusoro pekudzidzisa kwavanoita. Hurumende yakatozivisa kuti ichatora matanho ekudzinga mabasa vose varairidzi vachapinda mukuramwa mabasa kuri kukurudzirwa uku. Asi mutungamiriri wesangano iri, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti havabvumi kuvhundutsirwa nekutyisidzirwa sezvo bumbiro remitemo richivabvumidza kuita izvi. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti ichaita musangano neMuvhuro nevamiriri vesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council, wekuzeya nezvezvichemo zvevashandi vehurumende. Asi mamwe masangano evarairidzi, anosanganisira PTUZ neZIMTA, anoti akabuda muApex Council akaumba sangano reFederation Of Zimbabwe Educators’ Unions (FOZEU), kuitira kuti vazvimirire mukurwira zvichemo zvavo sevarairidzi. Doctor Zhou vanotiwo nguva yareba vadzidzisi vachitambura uye vachiedza kusvitsa zvichemo zvavo kuhurumende asi pasina chinobuda. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru dzeChitungwiza neHarare Dzoenderera Mberi Dzichiputsa Zvivakwa Zvisiri paMutemo
text: Makanzuru eHarare neChitungwiza nhasi aenderera mberi nekupwanyira vanhu midziyo yavo achiti zvivakwa izvi zviri kunze kwemutemo. Panguva yanga ichiitika izvi, dare repamusoro reHigh Court ranga richinzwa chikumbiro chekuti kupwanywa kwezvivakwa izvi kumiswe. Kanzuru yeHarare ichishanda pamwechete nemapurisa nhasi yapwanya zvivakwa zvevanotengesera mumigwagwa pamwe nedzimwe nzvimbo dzinotengeserwa motokari kuMbudzi round-about ukuwo kanzuru yeChitungwiza ichipwanyawo zvimwe zvivakwa zvakadai mudhorobha iri. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotengesera mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzai, vati sangano ravo rarwadziwa zvikuru nedanho ratorwa nekanzuru yeHarare. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio7 kuti kanzuru yavo haisi kuzoramba yakapeta maoko vanhu vachiita madiro aJojina muguta ravo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reChitungwiza Residents Trust, Muzvare Alive Kuveya, vati kanzuru yemudhorobha ravo yakabvira nezuro kupwanyira vanhu midziyo yavo. Muzvare Kuveya vatiwo chiri kuvarwadza ndechekuti vamwe vari kupwayirwa zvivakwa zvavo ivo vachibhadhara mitero kukanzuru vachiti pari zvino havachazive chekubata sevagari. Meya wedhorobha reChitungwiza, VaLovemore Maiko, vati zviri kuitwa izvi hazvisi kuitwa nekanzuru iri yoga vachiti chirongwa ichi chirongwa chiri kuitwa nemapazi ehurumende akawanda. VaWadzai vakurudzira hurumende kuti itange yatarisa raramo yevanhu pakatariswa kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika kwete kuti imhanyire kutorera veruzhinji chingwa chiri pamuromo. Panguva yanga ichipwanya zvivakwa zviri muHarare neChitungwiza, dare repamusoro iro ranga richifanira kunzwa chikumbiro cheChitrest chekuti kupwanywa kuri kuitwa zvivakwa izvi kumbomiswa rati richazonzwa chikumbiro ichi nemusi weChina. VaTafadzwa Muguti, vanove Provincial Development Coordinator wedunhu reHarare vakaburitsa mashoko nezuro vachiti chirongwa chekupwanya zvivakwa zviri kushanda zviri kunzwe kwemutemo chichaitwa muHarare, Chitungwiza neRuwa senzira yekuchenesa dunhu reHarare. Zvichakdai, rimwe sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare, reCombined Harare Residents Association, raburitsa mashoko richikurudzira hurumende kuti isiye makanzuru aite zvisungo zvawo ega kwete kuaudza zvekuita. Pakamboitwa chirongwa chakadai muna 2005 icho chaidaidzwa kuti Operation Murambatsvina, nhume yeUnited Nations, Amai Anna Kajumulo Tibaijuka, vakati chirongwa ichi chakasiya vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana manomwe (700 000) vasina pekugara uye zvekudya. No media source currently available

headline: VaMzembi Vopinda Misangano muWashington DC yeKukwezva Vashanyi
text: Gurukota rezve kushanya nekushanyirwa kwenyika, VaWalter Mzembi, vanoti vari pamusangano we US-Africa Business Summit uyo uri kuitirwa muWashington vachiyedza kukwezva vanoita zvemabhizimusi ekushanyira nyika kuti vaende kuZimbabwe. ​VaMzembi vanoti kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vanoshanyira nyika vachibva kuAmerica hwakawanda kukunda dzimwe nyika, vanoti vanoda kuti hurambe huchikwira. Musangano uyu wakatanga neChipiri uye uchapera neChishanu. VaMzembi vachangobva kukundwa mumakwikwi ekutsvaga munyori mukuru musangano re United Nations World Tourism Organisation akaitwa kuSpain. Asi vanoti izvi hazvisi kuvadzora kumashure sezvo vakadzidza zvikuru kubva kumakwikwi aya. "Tichange tichizeya nedzimwe nyika dzinosanganisira vana muzvina bhisinesi vemu America pamusoro pekuti vangawedzere seyi huwandu hwevanoshanya munyika," VaMzembi vaudza Studio 7. VaMzembi vaenderera mberi vachiti vane zvirongwa zvakawanda zvavari kuda kuti vana muzvinabhisinesi vemuAmerica vaite vakabatana neZimbabwe mukuedza kuvandudza nyaya yekushanya nekushanyirwa. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Inoudza IMF Kuti Igadzirise Hukama Hwayo neZimbabwe
text: Asi VaFanizza vati hapana rubatsiro ruchapihwa Zimbabwe kudzamara yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kuIMF. Nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvebhajeti nekufambiswa kwemari dzaudza chikwata cheInternational Monetary Fund, IMF, chiri kushanya munyika kuti hadzisi kufara nekuti sangano iri harina zvariri kuita mukubatsira nyika nemari kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe iri kuita zvese zvayakanzi iite pasi pechirongwa che Staff Monitored Program Chikwata ichi cheIMF chaita musangano nekomiti iyi apo nhengo dzeparamende dziri mukomiti iyi dzati hadzisi kufara kuti IMF haina zvairi kuita kuona kuti Zimbabwe yatanga kuwana ribatsiro rwemari kubva kuIMF neWorld Bank. Sachigaro vekomiti iyi, VaDavid Chapfika, vaudza chikwata ichi chiri kutungamirirwa naVaDomeninco Fanizza kuti chirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program chakatanga panguva yehurumende yemunatanidzwa muna 2013 uye kusvika pari zvino chiri kungoenderera mberi. Vati munguva pfupi nyika inenge yave kugadzirira sarudzo uye hapana achazenge ave kutarisa nezvechirongwa ichi kana IMF ikasabatsira nekuti munhu wese anenge ave kuita zvesarudzo. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaSamson Mukanduri, vatiwo IMF inofanira kudzora moyo kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kuwana rubatsiro sezviri kuitawo dzimwe nyika dzinotambura. Asi VaFanizza vati hapana rubatsiro ruchapihwa Zimbabwe kudzamara yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kuIMF. Vatiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa hushamwari hwayo nenyika dzayakakwereta mari vachiti nyika idzi inhengo dzeIMF uyewo ndidzo dzinotora danho rekuti Zimbabwe yobatsirwa here kana kuti kwete. Vatiwo nyaya iripo haisi nyaya yechikwereti chete asi kuti dzimwe nyika dzinoda kuti Zimbabwe igadzirise nyaya dzekutorwa kweminda sezvayakatsiidza kuti ichaita mubumbiro remitemo yenyika Vanoti havawoni chingatadzise kuti Zimbabwe ibatsirwe neIMF, World Bank nemamwe masangano kana izvi zvese zvikange zvaitwa. VaMasimba Manyanya avo vakamboshanda mubazi rezvemari vanoti nhengo dzeparamende dzine kodzero yekutsutsumwa neIMF sezvo pasina zvavari kuona zviri kuitika pahupfumi kubva pakatanga chirongwa ichi. Vanotiwo hapana ruzivo rwakanyanya pamusoro pechirongwa ichi uye chinodiwa chete inyaya yekuti nyika igadzirise zvinhu zvayo kuti isapedzesera yave kuenda kumasangano akaita seIMF kuti iwane rubatsiro. Zimbabwe ichekwereti chinodarika mabhiryoni masere kumasangano akaita seIMF, World Bank nedzimwe nyika izvo zvave kuitadzisa kuwana rubatsiro rwemari zvinova zvaita kuti hupfumi hwenyika husasimuke. VaFanizza nechikwati chavo vari kuongorora chirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program pamwe nekunzwa pfungwa dzehurumende, vemabhizimisi nemasangano akasiyana siyana uye vachandotura gwaro ravo kubhodhi yeIMF muna Kubvumbi apo pachatorwa danho rekuti Zimbabwe yobatsirwa here kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoshora Hurumende Iri Kuda Kuomesera Vashandisi veMadandemutande
text: No media source currently available Nyanzvi dzinoti hurumende inogona kuvhara madandemutande kana kushungurudza vanoashandisa sekuvimbisa kwayakaita asi izvi zvinosvibisa chimiro chenyika pamwe nekuti irasikirwe nebhizimisi rakwanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekufambiswa kwemashoko nematongerwo enyika dzinoti veruzhinji vanofanira kutora mashoko ehurumende zvakadzama sezvo hurumende ichikwanisa kuita zvairi kutaura. Mudzidzisi wezvekutapwa kwenhau pachikoro cheChristian College of Southern Africa, VaDonald Mukota, vanoti pane dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica dzakatombovhara madandemutande kana kusunga vanoashandisa, saka zvinogona kuitika muZimbabwe. Asi vanoti izvi handizvo zvingaite kuti vanhu vatadze kushandisa madandemutande. Asi vanotiwo vanhu vanofanira kushandisa madandemutande mune zvakanaka. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vanoti hazvibatsiri kuvhara madandemutande uye kana hurumende yaita izvi, inenge yaratidza pachena kuti haidi hutongo hwejekerere. Doctor Ruhanya vanoti zvekuvhara madandemutande zvinoitwa nehurumende dzine hudzvanyiriri uye dzine zvadzinoda kuvanza. Vanoti zvinoda mari yakawanda chose kuvhara madandemutande uye hurumende dzisina mari dzakaita seyeZimbabwe dzinogona kunetsekana kuita izvi. Asi vanoti Zimbabwe inogona kuwana rubatsiro rwekuita izvi kubva kunyika dzakaita seChina. Muzvare Kholiwe Majama Nyoni vanoti zvinosuwisa kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kuronga kuomesera vanhu vanoshandisa madandemutande iyo iri iyo nzira yave kushandiswa neveruzhinji kufambisa mashoko pamwe nekunzwa nhau kubva mukati nekunze kwenyika. Muzvare Majama Nyoni, avo vachangobva kumusangano we Forum on Internet Freedom in Africa wakaitirwa kuSouth Africa svondo rapfuura, vati zvakabuda pamusangano uyu zvinoratidza kuti nyika inorasikirwa nemari yakawanda chose kana madandemutande akavharwa kana kuvhiringwa. Sangano reCollaboration on International ICT Policy for East and South Africa rinoti kuvharwa kwemadandemutande kwakaita kuti nyika dzeSub Saharan Africa dzirasikirwe nemari inodarika mamiriyoni mazana maviri emadhora.

headline: Vanhu Vorasikirwa neMari Vachiyedza Kunotsvaga Mabasa paMuzinda weSouth-Sudan muHarare
text: Vanhu vazhinji nemusi weChipiri vakafambira dhongi rakaora kumuzinda weSouth-Sudan muZimbabwe kuBelgravia mushure memashoko aifamba pamadandemutande eFacebook neWhatsApp kuti muzinda uyu wange uchizotora vanhu vanoda mabasa kuti vaende kunyika iyi. Nyika yeSouth Sudan haina kugadzikana sezvo muguta guru renyika iyi reJuba muchigara muine hondo. Vari kurwisana muSouth-Sudan ndevanotsigira mutungamiri wenyika iyi VaSalva Kiir nevaimbova mutevedzeri wavo VaRiek Machar. Vakawanda vaenda kumuzinda uyu muHarare vabva vachiridza tsamwa sezvo mashoko ekuti pange pachida kutorwa vanhu kuti vange vachipinda mabasa anzi ndeemanyepo. Asi aka handi kekutanga vanhu vachiita chipata pata chekuenda pamuzinda uyu sezvo vanamukoti vakambonyeperwa kuti kwaita mabasa muna Chikumi vakaendawo kumuzinda uyu. Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vakati kunyangwe hurumende yainge yazivisa kuti iri kushanda neSouth-Sudan kutsvagira vanhu mabasa, kusvika parizvino hapana chibvumirano chati chaitwa. Izvi zvakakonzerwawo nekuti pana vanamukoti vanodarika zviuru zvitatu vasina mabasa. Nyaya yekunyeperwa kwavanamukoti yakatozeyiwa mudare reparamende. Mumwe wevanhu vapumha dova vachienda kumuzinda weSouth Sudan ndiVaSamson Chitema avo vati kunyangwe kuSouth Sudan kusina kugadzikana, kuri nani pane kugara muZimbabwe. Muzvare Miriam Mugodhi avo vange vachiratidza kurwadziwa zvikuru pamwe nekushupikana vati vabva kuBulawayo chaiko. Vati vange vatofunga kuti mudzimu wavaona sezvo vaine magwaro anodiwa. . VaPeter Museve avo vakaita zvidzidzo zveMasters vaudza Studio 7 kuti mamiriro aita zvinhu munyika apa kuti vanhu vaende havo kuSouth-Sudan uko kunogara kuchirira pfuti. Studio 7 yataurawo naVaJames Mukomva avo vati havasisina tarisiro yemabasa pasi pehurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Kunyangwe zvazvo nyika yeSouth-Sudan ichitevedza tsika dzechiMuslim Mukurru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Dr Pedzisai Ruhanya avvanoongorora magariro evanhu pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika vati vana veZimbabwe vazhinji vacho vanotendera muchiKristu havasisina hanya nekwavanowana mabasa. Dr Ruhanya vati kuoma kwehupenyu munyika kuri kuita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvitsvake mabasa chero kwaamuka. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kudzika mitemo inokwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze nekuti nyika yaenda kumawere. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemunyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions VaJaphet Moyo avo vati vashandi vari pamabasa paerizvino havasi kutambiriswa mari dzemihoro uye makambani akawanda ari kuramba achivharwa. Mutungamiri webato rePDP uye vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaTendai Biti vanoti zvakawanda zvinoda kuitwa nehurumende kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vachitsvaga rutsigiro pasarudzo dzemuna 2013, vebato reZanu PF vakavimbisa kuti vachaumba mabasa anosvika mamiriyoni maviri. Asi kusvika pari zvino makambani ari kuramba achivharwa zvichisiya vazhinji kunyangwe vakadzidza vasina chekubata. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanoti nyaya yezvirango ndiyo iri kupa kuti Zimbabwe itadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti VaMugabe ndivo vari kutadza kutungamira zvikuru vachitadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzehuori. Kunyangwe zvazvo Studio 7 isina kukwanisa kutaura nemumiriri wemuzinda weSouth-Sudan muZimbabwe uyo ange asipo, pamukova wemuzinda uyu pange pakanamirwa mapepa ange achizivisa veruzhinji kuti mashoko aishambadzwa ekuti vaitora vanhu vekunoshanda kunyika yavo ange ari emanyepo. Munguva pfupi yapfuura, zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakanyeperwa kuti kwainge kwaita mabasa kuKuwait neSaudi Arabia asi zvikazoguma zvobatwa senhapwa munyika idzi.  No media source currently available

headline: Kambani yeHurumende yeFidelity Printers Ndiyo Ichadhinda "Ballot Papers"
text: Komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yazivisa makambani achadhinda mapepa ekuvhotesa pamusangano wayaita nevemapato ari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, VaQubani Moyo, vati mapepa ekuvhotesa achadhindwa nemakambani maviri emuno anoti Fidelity Printers nePrintflow. Fidelity ndiyo ichadhinda magwaro ekuvhotera mutungamiri wenyika, uye ekuvhotera nhengo dzedare reparamende. Printflow ichadhinda mapepa ekuvhotera makanzura. Makambani maviri aya ndeehurumende. VaMoyo vatiwo mapato achabvumidzwa kuona kudhindwa kunenge kuchiitwa mapepa aya. Mashoko eZec aya atambirwa nevari kumirira MDC Alliance musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaNelson Chamisa, VaJameson Timba. Asi munyori mukuru muMDC-T inoutngamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaNixon Nyikadzino, vati kunyange hazvo Zec yazivisa kuchadhindwa mapepa ekuvhotesa aya, nyaya iyi haiperere ipapa sezvo vachiti pane zvimwe zvinoda kugadziriswa. Mapato aya paapihwa mukana wekubvunza mibvunzo maererano nekomiti yanga ichida kuumbwa neZec pakati pevanhu vari mumapato ari kukwikwidza musarudzo ichange ichitarisa nhuna dzinenge dzichibva mumapato pamberi pesarudzo, ye Multi-party Liason Committee, imwe nhengo yebato reFreedom Movement #1980 Chinhu Chedu, VaFrancis Danha, vakonzera zhowe zhowe vachiti sachigaro weZec, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, nevose vari mukomsheni yavo vanofanira kusiya basa. VaDanha vati Amai Chigumba nevamwe vavo vakatadza kufambisa basa zvakanaka pavakatadza kupa mapato ezvematongerwo gwaro revavhoti pamberi pekugara kwakaita dare raitambira mazita evachakwikwidza musarudzo svondo rapera. VaDanha vati kutadza kuwana gwaro revavhoti kwakakonzera kuti nhengo dzebato ravo zhinji dzitadze kukwikwidza musarudzo vachiti havachavimbi kuti Zec ichakwanisa kufambisa sarudzo munyika. Zvaitwa naVaDanha, avo varambidza VaMoyo nechikwata chavanga vachifamba nacho kuenderera mberi nekutaura kudzamara Amai Chigumba vasiya basa, zvabva zvakaonzera kuti musangano uyu utadze kuenderera mberi uye komiti yanga ichida kuumbwa iyi itadze kuumbwa. Vanga vakamirira Zanu PF pamusangano uyu, VaFortune Chasi, vashora zvaitwa naVaDanha. Asi VaTimba vatiwo zvaitwa naVaDanha zvinoburitsa pachena kurwadziwa kwemapato anopkisa nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa basa neZec Zvichakadai, VaMoyo vati komisheni yavo ichazoshevedzera mumwe musangano kana vagadzirisa nyaya dzekuchengetedzeka kwevanhu nemapurisa kuitira kuti misangano isakanganiswe sezvaitwa naVaDanha. No media source currently available

headline: NSSA Yobatsira Vakuvari, Asi Vari paMudyandigere Votsamwiswa neMari Dzavari Kupihwa
text: Apo vanhu vari kutambira mari yemudyandigere vari kuramba vachichema-chema kuti mari yacho ishoma, gurukota rezvekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, vanoti hurumende iri mushishi kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Vachipindura mibvunzo kubva kuvatapi venhau pamusoro pekuti mari inotambirwa nevanhu vari pamudyandigere ichawedzerwa riinhi, Amai Mupfumira vati bazi reNSSA riri mushishi kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Amai Mupfumira, avo vange vari munyarikani pachiitiko cheOpen Day yeNSSA Workers’ Compensation Rehabilitation Centre, vatiwo hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuti vanhu vanozvishandira pachavo vega vagokwanisa kuvewo vachibhadhara mari kuNSSA kuti vagozokwanisawo kuwana mari yemudyandigere kana vakwegura. Pari zvino vanhu vari pamudyandigere vanotambira madhora makumi mana pamwedzi uye hurumende yaive yati ichawedzera mari iyi kuti isave iri pasi pezana remadhora kubva muna Kurume wegore rino, asi izvi hazvina kuitika. Amai Mupfumira vati kubvira muna Kubvumbi wegore rino NSSA yakatanga hurongwa hwekubatsira nemari pakuviga nhengo dzeNSSA dzinenge dzafa. NSSA Rehabilitation Centre inzvimbo inorapa vanhu vanenge vakuvara vari pamabasa uye nzvimbo iyi ine mimwe michina yechizvino-zvino isingawanikwe kune zvimwe zvipatara. Mukuru weNSSA, Muzvare Liz Chitiga, vabvuma kuti vanhu vakawanda havazive nezvenzvimbo iyi, asi vati kambani yavo ine hurongwa hwekuti veruzhinji vakwanise kurapiwa panzvimbo. Mumwe wevanhu vakarapwa paNSSA Rehabilitation Centre ndiVaZuze Nzerere avo vakakuvara vari mumugodhi mavaishanda. VaNzerere, avo vasisakwanise kufamba vega, vati vakarapwa vakadzidziswawo mabasa ekusona uye vanofara kuti kambani yavaishandira yakavadzorera pabasa. Panguva imwe chete NSSA Rehabilitation Centre inokwanisa kuve nevanhu makumi manomwe vanenge vachirapwa vachigarapo. Nzvimbo iyi, iyo iri pedyo nechipatara chikuru cheMpilo yakavhurwa mugore ra1971. No media source currently available

headline: VaJuly Moyo Votarisirwa Kupa Rekupedzisira Pakuti Harare Yokwereta Here Mari Inodarika Bhiriyoni yemuNyika
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo vave kutarisirwa kupa rekupedzisira pachikumbiro chekanzuru yeHarare chekuti ikwanise kupihwa mukana wekukwereta mari inodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana emunyika. Nyaya iyi yaunza kusawirirana pakati pekanzuru nemasangano anomirira vagari. Vakafanobata chigaro chameya wemuHarare VaStewart Mtizwa vebato reMDC- Alliance vaudza Studio 7 kuti sezvinodiwa pamutemo vakaendesa kuhofisi yaVaMoyo chikumbiro chavo pamwe nezvakataurwa nevagari. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMoyo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. VaMtizwa vaatti kanzuru yavo haikwanise kuita mabasa makuru kana vakasapihwa mvumo yekukwereta mari iyi. Vagari vainge vapihwa kusvika musi wa 7 Kubvumbi kuti vape pfungwa dzavo uye vakawanda vari kutsika madziro. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revagari reHarare Residents Trust vaPrecious Shumba varamba zviri kutaurwa naVaMtizwa. Asi mutauriri weguta reHarare vaMichael Chideme vatiwo zvakakosha kuti kanzuru ikwereteswe mari iyi.nekuti izvi ndizvo zvinoiutwawo nemakanzuru ose pasi rino kana vachida kuita mabasa makuru. Izvi zvapikiswa nevanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mune rimwe sangano rinomiririra vagari reCombined Harare Residents Association VaReuben Akili vati kanzuru haibude pachena kuti yawana marii pazvirongwa zvakafanana nekubhadhariswa kwevanhu mari dzekumbosiya motokari muguta reHarare. Pamutemo, kana kanzuru ichida kukwereta mari inofanira kutanga yagara yobuda nechisungo chinozotambirwa nameya. Kanzuru inozozivisa vanhu kuburikidza nekushambadzira mumapepanhau uye vanhu vane mazuva makumi maviri nerimwe kuti vapindure. Kana izvi zvapera chikumburo uye zvinenge zvataurwa nevanhu zvinozoendeswa kugurukota rezvematunhu kuti rione kuti kanzuru yebvumidzwa here kana kuti kwete kukwereta mari. No media source currently available

headline: IMF Inoti Zimbabwe inofanira Kusunga Dzisimbe neKubhadhara Zvikweti Kuti Igadzirise Hupfumi
text: Bhanga guru rinokweretesa mari nyika dzepasi rino reInternational Monetary Fund, IMF, rinoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuzvipira kuvandudza zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi kana ichida kubuda mumadhaka mairi. IMF inoti nyika inofanira kurwisa huori, kusimbisa dhora remunyika uye kuva nemazano ekuti ingabhadhare sei chikwereti chayo chinodarika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$10 billion kune vekunze chete. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, IMF inotiwo Zimbawe inofanira kuvawo nemazano anokwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze uye kugadzirisa nyaya dzemagariro evanhu nehutano munguva ino yekurwisa denda reCovid-19. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti Zimbabwe iri mugwara zvisinei nezviri kutaurwa neIMF. Vati izvi zviri kuonekwa kuburikidzwa nekuwanikwa kwemari yemunyika mumabhanga, musika wekutenga nekutengserana mari yekunze kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, kugadzirwa kwezvivakwa nezvimwe. Vatiwo hupfumi hwenyika hauchadi vekunze vakawanda sezvo vanhu munyika vachirarama nekuzviitira mabasa avo emaoko anongoda kusimudzirwa. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvepfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vanotiwo IMF yarova nemonemo vachitiwo zviri kutaurwa nebhanga iri ndizvo zvagara zvichitaurwa nevana veZimbabwe kuti huori hunofanira kumiswa uye hurumende haifanire kuramba ichikwereta mari ichikundikana kubhadhara. Zimbabwe ine zvikwereti kuWorld Bank, Paris Club neAfrican Development Bank izvo iri kutatarika kubhadhara zvopa kuti itadze kuwana zvimwe zvikereti. Zvikwereti izvi zviri kupa kuti nyika itadze kukwereteswa imwe mari. Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, mukuru wesangano reCEO Africa Roundtable, VaOswill Binha, vati Zimbabwe inofanira kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kwete kuda kuita kunge chitsuwa. Vatiwo vemabhizimisi vakawanda vekunze vanoteerera zvinotaurwa neIMF nekudaro hurumende haifanire kungoisa zvimiti munzeve ichiita zano ndega. Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vanotiwo vari kutarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchakwira nezvikamu zvinodarika zvinomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 7,4%. Asi IMF inoti inotarisira kuti hukwire nezvikamu zvinoti darikei zvitatu zvishoma kubva muzana kana kuti 3,1%. Mwedzi unouya, IMF inoti iri kuita musangano padandemutande neZimbabwe mukuyedza kuumba hwaro hwekuti patangwe chimwe chirongwa chekubatsira Zimbabwe neruzivo kana kuti Staff Monitored Programme. Chirongwa chakadai chakaitwa kusvika muna Kukadzi gore rapera asi IMF yakati Zimbabwe yainge yatora gwara risiri iro. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeHarareYoronga Kuwanisa Vanhu Mvura Munguva Dzakasiyana
text: Kanzuru yeHarare yazivisa kuti ichatanga kugovera mvura nguva dzakasiyana nekuda kwekuderera kwemvura pamwe nekuwanda kwetsvina munyanza yeLake Chivero. Kanzuru yeHarare inoti yatarisana nematambudziko akawanda munyanza iyi zvekuti ichatanga kugovera vanhu mvura mwedzi uno sezvo isisakwanise kuti mugari wese muguta awane mvura yakachena. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa pachigayo chemvura cheMorton Jaffrey Water Works, VaPaul Chabata, vati mvura iri mudhamu yasviba zvakaipisisa nekuda kwetsvina inobva kuHarare nezvimbo dzakatenderedza guta iri izvo zvave kuita kuti kanzuru ishandise mari yakawanda pakuchenesa mvura iyi. Vatiwo tsvina iyi inokonzerwawo nevanhu vanoredza hove zvisina mvumo mudhamu yave kukanganisa kanzuru pakupomba mvura. Mabharani mukuru wekanzuru, Engineer Hosiah Chisangno, vati vari kukurudzira vagari kuchengetedza mvura uye kanzuru yavo ichatanga kugovera vanhu mvura kutanga mwedzi uno. Vatiwo kunzuru ichavhara chigayo cheMorton Jaffrey mukupera kwesvondo kuitira kuti vabvise tsvina irimo uye izvi zvichawedzera huwandu hwemvura kubva pa 360 mega litres kusvika pa 450 mega litres pazuva. Vagari vemuHarare vanoshandisa 800 mega litres muchando ne1200 mega litres panguva yezhizha pazuva rega rega. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano reCommunity Water Alliance, VaHardlife Mudzingwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti havabvumirani nematanho ari kuda kutorwa nekanzuru ekugovera mvura vachiti zvichaita kuti vagari vabatwe nezvirwere. VaMudzingwa vati kanzuru inofanira kutora mvura kubva kune mamwe madhamu akaita seDarwendale kuti mvura ikwanire munhu wese. Muzvina bhizimisi vashanda padhamu iri kwenguva yakareba, VaGarry Stafford, vaudza Studio7 kuti kuzara kwejecha mudhamu kuri kukonzerwa nekurimwa kuri kuitwa mumatoro nedzimwe nzvimbo muHarare nenzvimbo dzakatenderedza guta uye zvakakosha kuti zvisaitwe kuti dhamu reChivero risaparare. Vati dhamu iri range rakadzika mamita makumi maviri nemasere asi pari zvino rakadzika mamita gumi nemasere chete sezvo razara jecha. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemvura dzinoti tsvina yakawanda iri kupinda muLake Chivero iri kukonzerwa nekanzuru yeHarare iyo iri kutadza kugadzirisa mapombi anotakura tsvina. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti kuendeswa kwetsvina isina kuiswa mishonga inodzora hukasha hwetsvina munzizi dzakaita seMukuvisi neManyame kuri kuwedzerawo kuipa kwemvura yemuLake Chivero. Muna Kurume 2015 kanzuru yeHarare yakawanikwa nematare edzimhosva iine mhosva yekudira siweji muna Mukuvisi isina kucheneswa sezvinodiwa nemutemo ikafaindiswa zviuru zana zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Kanzuru yeHarare yakabatwa nemhosva yekutyora mutemo weEnvironmental Management Act kuburikidza nekudira tsvina munzizi dzinoti Mukuvisi, Marimba, Ruwa neNyatsime, nzizi dzine mvura inopedzisira yapinda muLake Chivero. Nyanzvi mukuvakwa kwemaguta dzinoti guta reHarare rakavakirwa panzvimbo isina kunaka sezvo riri munzvimbo inofamba nemvura inopinda muLake Chivero, izvo zvinoita kuti mvura iyi isvibe zvakanyanya. Pari zvino guta reHarare rinoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni matatu emadhora semari yekutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura pamwedzi wega wega. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari kuChivi Voparura Zvirongwa Zvinosimudzira Dunhu Ravo
text: Nechinangwa chekuendesa mberi chirongwa che Zimbabwe Agenda for Sustainable Socio-Economic Transformation, Zim-Asset mumaruwa mavagere, vagari vedunhu reChivi kuMasvingo vari kuparurawo neMugovera hurongwa hwavo hwakanangana nekusimudzira dunhu ravo. No media source currently available Sachigaro weChivi Rural District Council, uye vari kanzura we Ward 31, VaKiller Zivhu, vanoti vanenge vakaungana pamusha pavo apo vanenge vachiparura zvirongwa zvakawanda. Vati zvirongwa izvi zvinosanganisira chibage chakarimwa chichabatsira vane nzara, mombe dzichapiwa kumadzishe kuti vagozorimira nherera nechirikadzi, pamwewo nehove dzavari kupfuya. VaZivhu vanoti vachatorawo mukana uyu kukurudzira vagari vemunharaunda yavo vari mumaguta kuti vavake kumamisha kwavanobva.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoyambira Kuti 2017 Richava Gore Rakaoma Zimbabwe Ikasavandudza Zvinhu
text: Gore rapera ra2016 igore range rakaomera vazhinji pamwe nehurumende. Munyika makaita dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari zvakapa kuti bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe riparure mari yemabond notes asi asiri kubatsira kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Hurumende yaitadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo mihoro paine nguva uye nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nematongerwo enyika dzinoti vanhu vanofanira kusunga dzisimbe nekuti 2017 igore richange rakaoma kudarika gore rapfuura. Hupfumi wenyika hauna kukura sezvange zvakatarisirwa uyewo mari yaitarisirwa kuwanikwa nehurumende yakadzikira zvakanyaya mugore richangopfura. Hurumende yakashandisa mari yakwanda kudarika mari yaya kawana izvo zvakaita kuti isare iine chikweretti chemadhora anodarika bhiriyoni. Zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nezviviri kubva muzana zvemari yehurumende zviri kuenda kumihoro yevashandi izvo zvopa kuti zvinhu zviomere hurumende. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakadzika mutemo unorambidza kupinda munyika kwezvinhu zvinogadzira muno kana kuti Statutory Instrument 64, nyika iri kuramba ichitenga zvinhu zvakawanda kunze kudarika zvainotengesa nekuda kwekuti maindasitiri haasi kushanda zvakanaka. Izvi ndezvimwe zvinonzi zvakakonzera kushaikwa kwemari munyika zvikazoita kuti Reserva Bank of Zimbabwe iunze mhando yemari yemaBond Notes muna Mbudzi wegore rapera. Mubhajeti ravo regore rino, gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanotarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchakura nechikamu chimwe nechidimbu kubva muzana (1.7percent) Vanonoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti ramangwana reZimbabwe harina kujeka nekuti zvese zvakakanganisika muna 2016 pamwe nevakazvikanganisa vachiripo uye havana shanduko yavari kuita. Vanoti vano bvumirana nemaonero emasangano akaita seInternational Monetary Fund neWorld Bank ekuti hupfumi hwenyika hucharamba huchidzikira mugore rinouya. Vanotiwo kunyange hazvo VaChinamasa vane matanho avakaparura mubhajeti regore rinouuya ekukwezva vekunze kuti vauye kuzosima mari yavo muno pamwe nekusimudzira mabhizimisi havawoni izvi zvichiiitika nekuda kwezvikonzero zvekunetsa kwemari. Vanotiwo zvikwereti zveZimbabwe kumasangano akaita se World Bank, African Developement Bank nedzimwe nyika ndizvowo zviri kutadzisa nyika kuwana mari yekusimudzira maindasitiri ayo. VaKuchera vanoti havaoni vemabhanga, masangano nenyika dzekunze vachisunungura homwe nekuti hurumende yeZimbabwe inoratidza kuti haisati yazvipira kuita zvinodiwa kuti ikwanise kutanga kukwereteswa mari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa, vano bvumirana naVaKuchera vachiti kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kuwana rubatsiro rwemari inofanira kutanga yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo. Vanoti pari zvino Zimbabwe haikwanisi kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvino darika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora nekuti maindasitiri ayo haasi kushanda uyewo n nyaya yehuwori mukutengeswa kwezvicherwa. VaJohwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya yemitemo isina kujeka pamwe nemakakatanwa ari mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF ndizvo zvimwe zviri kuvhiringa hupfumi hwenyika. Mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vanotiwo nyaya dzematongerwo enyika asina kumira zvakanaka munyika zvikuru sei muZanu PF ndidzo dziri kuita vekunze vasauye munyika pamwe nekuti mabhizimisi emuno asashande zvakanaka. Vanoti semaonero avo kurwisana muZanu PF kuchaenderera mberi mubato iri gore rinouuya izvo vati zvichavhiringidza hupfumi zvakanyanya. Kunze kweizvi, munyori anoona nezvehupfumi mubato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai vachimirira Hatfield mudare reparamende, Dr Tapiwa Mashakada, vaudza Studio 7 kuti huwori ndiwo humwewo huri kuvhiringa mabasa ezvehupfumi munyika. Vanoti kana nyaya iyi ikasagadziriswa havawoni chinosanduka munyaya dzehupfumi mugore rinouuya. Asi vanomirira rimwe sangano remabhizimisi reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu vanoti vanoona sekuti gore rinouya rinenge rakanaka nekuda kwemitemo yakadzikwa nehurumende zvikuru sei mutemo wekudzivirira zvimwe zvinogadzirwa kunze westatutory instrument 64 pamwe nekushandiswa kwemaBond Notes. Asi vanoti dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari rinofanira kugadziriswa.  Asi VaJohwa naVaKuchera vanoti maBond Notes haana zvanobatsira uyewo hurumende iri kutadza kutobhadhara vashandi vayo zvisinei nekuti pave kushandiswa maBond Notes. VaMashakada vanoti zvinosuwisa kuti vashandi vazhinji vehurumende vakatamba Kisimusi vasina mari dzavo vachiti kana maBond Notes acho haasikuwanikwa. Asi vanomirira Highfield West mudare reparamende VaPsychology Mazivisa veZanu-PF vanoti zvirango ndizvo zviri kupa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hugwadame. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi nematongerwo enyika dzinotiwo nyaya yesarudzo dzichaitwa muna 2018 ndiyo ichavhirindidza nyaya dzehupfumi uye vanofunga kuti vakunze nevamabhizimisi vanogona kumirira kusvika sarudzo idzi dzaitwa vasati varonga kuti vasime mari yavo munyika. VaChinamasa vanoti hurumende yavo inoda chose kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nenyika dzepasi rese pamwe nemasangano akaita seWorld Bank neIMF uye ndosaka yakaumba hwaro hwekuti ingabhadhare zvikwereti zvayo sei kumasangano aya nedzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Gavhuna weRBZ VaMangudya Vanoti Kushandisa Rand Hakupedze Dambudziko reKushomeka kweMari
text: Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, Doctor John Mangudya vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari riri munyika haripedzwe nekushandisa mari yerand yekuSouth Africa seviri kutaurwa nedzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi. VaMangudya vakataura mashoko aya paUniversity of Zimbabwe muHarare musi weChitaru apo pange pari kuitwa musangano kana kuti symposium wenyanzvi dzezvehupfumi. VaMangudya vati Zimbabwe ichaenderera mberi ichishandisa mari dzakasiyana siyana nekuti kushandisa rand chete handiko kungagadzirisa dambudziko rakomba munyika rekushomeka kwemari. Doctor Mangudya vati mamwe ematanho anofanirwa kutorwa ekugadzirisa mamiriro ehupfumi haasi kuitwa. Vatiwo kuwondomoka kwemakambani ehurumende kan kuti maparastatals ndokumwe kuri kupa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hubve hwaenda kumawere. Gavhuna weRZ atiwo nyika inofanirwawo kugadzirisa zvematongerwo enyika kukwezva vane mari dzekunze. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezveupfumi yataurawo pamusangano uyu VaNyasha Kaseke vati kuti nyika iwane mari yekunze vemakambani neveruzhinji vanofanirwa kunotengesera zvinhu kunze kwenyika. VaKaseke vati vemakambani vanofanirwa kutarisa kuti vogadzira sei zvinhu zvine mutengo wakaderera kuti vakwanise kuwana vatengi kunze kwenyika. Pamusangano uyu, nyanzvi dzezveupfumi dzakurudzirawo kuti kushandiswa kwemacards ekumabhanga pamwe nEcocash zviitwe kunzvimbo dzese munyika kusanganisira kumaruwa. VaMangudya vati kunyangwe zvazvo vanhu vanenge vachiti vane mari kumabhanga nyika haina mari iyi uri musvo izvo zviri kukonzera kuti kushaikwa kwemari kurambe kuchienderera mberi. Vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vafarire kutenga nemacards ekubank nedzimwe nzira dzakadayi seecocash zvisingadi mari chaiyo vakati izvi zvinogona kurerutsa myaya yekushomeka kwemari. Vatiwo kupedza dambudziko rehuori pamwe nekugadzirisa dambudziko rekubudiswa kwemari yekunze zvisiri pamutemo zvinogona kubatsira zvakanyanya dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari. Vamwe vari pamusangano uyu vanosanganisa CZI, ZNCC, veZimbabwe Stock Exchange. No media source currently available

headline: Makurukota eHurumende Osangana neVashandi Kuti Vazeye Nyaya dzeMari yeMihoro Iyo Yonoka Kuuya
text: Makurukota ehurumende anoti rezvehupfumi, rehutano uye revashandi vehurumende vapinda mumusangano muHarare nevesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council kuti vazeye nyaya dzekunonoka kwemari yemihoro. Hurumende yakazivisa svondo rapera kuti ichanonoka kutambirsa vashandi vayo mari izvo zvapa kuti paite ropa rakaipa pakati payo nevashandi ava vamwe vachiti vave kuronga kuratidzira. Nekuda kwekuvharwa kwemakambani akawanda munyika gurukota rezvevashandi Amai Prisca Mupfumira vanoti hurumende yave kuwana mari shoma kubva kumutero zvopa kuti itadze kubhadhara vashandi. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti nyaya yehuori ndiyo yapa kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo munyika. Musangano uyu uri kuenderera mberi parizvino sezvo wanonoka kutanga.

headline: Hurumende Inoti Yave Kumbomira Kupa Vanhu Marezinesi eKutepfenyura
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko nekutepfenyura, Dr Chris Mushowe, vanoti hurumende inogona kumbomira kupa marezenezi ekutepfenyura kumaredhiyo zvichitevera kutadza kuenda pamhepo kwemarhedhiyo matanhatu pamaredhioyo masere akapihwa marezeni muna 2013. VaMushowe vakaudza nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mudare reparamende nemusi weChina kuti zvinhu zvakaoma munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye zviri kubatawo vemaredhiyo uye vanofunga kuti zvingave nane kuzotanga kupa marezenisi kana zvinhu zvagadzikana munyaya dzeehupfumi. VaMushowe vati pane vemaredhiyo masere vakapihwa marezenisi muna 2013, maviri chete anoti Diamond FM yekwaMutare yeZimpapers ne Ya FM yeRay of Hope yekuZvishavane ndidzo dzega dzakakwanisa kuenda pamhepo. Mutemo unosungira kuti redhiyo ienda pamhepo mukati megore nemwedzi misere yapihwa rezenesi. Kana izvi zvikasaitika rezensi rinobva ratorwa. Maredhiyo station anoti Faya FM yekuGweru ne Gogogoi FM yekuMasvingo eAB Communications, Breeze FM yeku Victoria Falls neSkyz Metro FM yekuBulawayo ekambani yeFairtalk Communications pamwe ne Nyaminyami FM yekuKariba neKE100.4E yemuHarare ekambani yeKingston ndiwo asati aenda pamhepo uye VaMushowe vati achatorerwa marezenisi mwedzi miviri inotevera kana akasaenda pamhepo. Vanoona nezvekutepfenyura musangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa Zimbabwe Chapter muzvare Kholiwe Nyoni Majama vanoiti zviri kuda kuitwa nehurumende hazvina kunaka uye uye Zimbabwe Broadcasting Authority ingadai yakaongorora kuti makambani aya ane mari here isati yaapa marezenesi. Vanotiwo mari yakabhadhariswa makambani neveBAZ yemadhora zviuru zvinomwe kuti apihwe marezenisi yakawandisa zvikuru. Mukuru weMediaCentre, VaEnerst Mudzengi vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti izvi zvinoratidza pachena kuti vanhu kana kuti makambani akapihwa marezenisi ange asingakodzeri. Kana nhengo dzeparamende dzatiwo dzakashamiswa kuti kambani yakaita seKingstons ingapihwe rezenesi rekutepfenyura asi iyo ichitoomerwa nebasa rekutengesa mabhuku. Zvichakadai VaMushowe vati hurumende ichapa marezenisi emaredhiyo ekumatunhu kana kuti macommunity radido stations kana chirongwa cheDigitilisation chichinge chapera. Chirongwa ichi chaifanirwa kunge chakapera muna Kurume gore rino uye chakatadza kupera nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemari. Gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaPatrick Chinamasa vakaudzawo komiti iyi kuti hurumende haina mari yekuita chirongwa ichi uye havazivi kuti mari yacho vachaiwana rini. Vati pari zvino hurumende ine chikwereti chemamiriyoni makumi maviri kukambani iri kuita chirongwa ichi uye iri kutsvaga mari yekubhadhara kambani iyi. Muzvare Majama Nyoni vanoti mashoko aVaMushowe anoratidza pachena kuti hurumende haisikuda kupa marezensi enhepfenyuro dzematunhu. Chirongwa cheDigitilisation chinoita kuti nyika ikwanise kuva nhenhepfenyuro dzemaredhiro neterevhizheni dzakawanda. Zimbabwe inoda mamiriyoni mazana maviri emadhora kuita chirongwa ichi asi nyanzvi dzinoti mari yacho ichawedzera kana chirongwa ichi chikasaitwa nekukasika. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yovimbisa Kugadzikana Mune zveMafuta Panguva iyo Magetsi ave Kunetsa muNyika
text: Gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, Doctor Joram Gumbo, vanoti zvinhu zvave kuzogadzikana munyaya dzemafuta edzimotokari zvichitevera kuibva kwemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica yakapiwa makambani anopinza mafuta munyika kana kuti ma 'letters of credit'. Doctor Gumbo vanoti kubva kupera kwesvondo rapera kusvika pari zvino, motokari dzinotakura mafuta dziri mubishi kumhanya nemafuta dzichidira mumagaraji emunyika. Asi vanoti sezvo munyika manga mave negaha nechekare, zvinoda kanguva kakati kuti kuti vakwanise kudzora zvinhu pazvinofanirwa kunge zviri. Ukuwo, vamwe vedzimotokari vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvisati zvave kuratidza shanduko, sezvo mitsetse ichiri kuwanikwa munyika yose. Zvichakadaro, kambani yemagetsi yeZimbabwe Electricity Transmission and Distribution Company yazivisa nezvehurongwa hwekumbodzimwa kwemagetsi pane dzimwe nguva senzira yekuchengetedza magetsi mashoma ari kuwanikwa munyika. Kumbodzimwa kwemagetsi uku kuchaitwa munyika yose panguva dzatarwa nekambani iyi. Kambani yemagetsi iyi inoti yamanikidzwa kutora danho iri nekuda kwekuderera zvakanyanya kwemvura kudhamu rinogaiwa magetsi reKariba, pamwe nekudzikira kwemagetsi ari kugaiwa kugwenya remarasha reHwange Power Station. Kambani iyi yatiwo rimwe dambudziko riri kukonzera kushaikwa kwemagetsi anokwana nderekushomeka kwemagetsi ari kutengwa kubva kunze kwenyika, zvikuru kuMozambique. Magetsi achadzimwa kubva nenguva dzeshanu mangwanani kusvika nenguva dzegumi mangwanani, kuchizotiwo kubva nenguva dzeshanu manheru kusvika nenguva dzegumi usiku. Doctor Gumbo vanoti hurumende iri kugadzirisa dambudziko remagetsi iri kuburikidza nekupa marezinesi kwayakaita kumakambani makumi matatu nemana anoshandisa simba rezuva kuti awanise nyika magetsi, uye kugadziriswa kuri kuitwa magwenya ekuHwange. No media source currently available Asi mukuru werimwe sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti vagari havasi kufara nenyaya yekumbodzimwa kwemagetsi iyi sezvo vanenge vakatobhadhara kare magetsi emwedzi wese. VaShumba vanotiwo nyika haisati yave nezvikwanisiro zvekuti magetsi ezuva ave iwo nhungamiri munyaya dzemhando dzemoto, izvo zvichaita kuti ruzhinji rwuomerwe zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: VaJoram Gumbo Vopomerwa Mhosva yeHuori-ZACC Ichiti Haisati Yasumwa
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaJoram Gumbo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori apo vaive gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti kambani yavo yekusona hembe inonzi JMCD yakapihwa basa nekambani yeZinara uye vachinzi vaitorawo mari kubva kukambani iyi yaive pasi pebazi ravo. Asi vachibvunzwa nebepanhau reHerald, VaGumbo vakaramba kuti vanoita zvehuori vachiti kambani yavo inotengeserawo mbatya kuZanu-PF mauto nemamwe mapazi ehurumende. VaGumbo vanonzi vaipihwawo mari kubva kuZINARA dzekuenda kuMalaysia kunoita basa reAir Zimbabwe risinei nekugadzira migwagwa sezvinoshandiswa homwe iyi. Komishina weZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission VaGoodson Nguni vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vasati vasumwa nezvenyaya iyi nekudaro hapana chavangataure parizvino. Nhengo yedare reparamende inomirira MDC kuKambuzuma VaWillas Madzimure vanove nhengo yeAfrican Parliamentarians Network Against Corruption uye vari mukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemashandiro emapazi ehurumende avo vanoti zvakakosha kuti makurukota nenhengo dzedare reparamende vabude pachena panyaya yehupfumi hwavo vachangotora mhiko. No media source currently available  .

headline: Hurombo Hwopa Kuti Vashandi Vafambe neTsoka kuChinhoyi
text: Vashandi vakawanda vave kufamba netsoka kuenda kumabasa pamwe nekudzokera kumba Vachiti mari yavanotambira ishoma vamwe vachiti vave nemwedzi yakawanda vasati vatambira mari kwavanosevenza. Vashandi vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vanoti zvinhu zvavekuvaomera zvekuti vave kuona kukwira motokari vachienda kumabasa kugarika. Mumwe mushandi anosevenzera kambani yeNational Social Security Authority (NSSA) VaGift Muchemeyi vanoti vanoona zviri nani kufamba netsoka kuenda kubasa mari yacho vozotenga sadza remashereni mashanu . Motokari dzinotakura vanhu kubva kumarukisheni kuenda kumabasa dzakadzikisa mari yekufambisa kusvika pamasendi makumi maviri nemashanu. VaMuchemeyi vanoti zviri nani kufamba mutunhu wemakiromita gumi pazuva ivo vachizokwanisa kudya sadza remutengo wakaderera. Mumwe mushandi anoda kudanwa nezita rekuti Shinga Mushandi anoti avekufamba kuenda kubasa nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari yaanotambira. Mushandi anoti zviri nani kuti mhuri yake irarame nepashoma paanowana iye achifamba zvake kuenda kubasa. Mushandi anoti kufamba kuenda kubasa ndiyo yatovetsika yake kwemakore maviri apera. Mumwe mushandi wekanzuru yeChinhoyi VaCrispen Chitakatira vanoti vave nemwedzi mishanu vasati vatambira uye vanoti kukwira motokari kuenda kubasa zvave kutotorwa sechinhu chinoitwa nevashandi vanotambira mari yakawanda. Mumwe mutyairi wemotokari dzinotakura vanhu kuenda kumabasa VaLameck Mushipe vanoti vavekuwana mari shoma pazuva zvichienzaniswa neyavaimbowana nguva yakare. VaMushipe vanoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nevanhu vavekufamba netsoka kuenda mukati meguta. VaMushipe vanoti nguva yakare vaikwanisa kuwana madhora makumi maviri kusvika pamadhora makumi matatu emadhora pazuva asi mazuva ano vanototenda kana vakawana madhora gumi pazuva. Asi vanoona nezvehutano chiremba Maynard Kuchwa vanoti kunyange vanhu vachitsutsumwa kufamba netsoka kuenda kumabasa vanoti zvakavanakira hutano hwavo sezvo kufamba kunoita kuti muviri ugwinye. Zvichakadaro vanhu vakawanda muChinhoyi havana kuteerera kurudziro yanga iriko nemusi weChitatu yekusaenda kumabasa. Makambani, zvitoro nemabhangi zvanga zvakavhura. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Vofarira Kudzikiswa Kwaitwa Mitengo yeDhata
text: Kukwidzwa kwemitengo uku kwaive kwaitika mushure medanho rakatorwa neboka rePost and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority, kana kuti POTRAZ rekutambira chikumbiro chemakambani enharembozha chekuti mitengo iyi ikwidzwe. Vanhu vakawanda vari kutambira nemufaro danho rakatorwa negurukota rehumhizha hwekufambiswa kwamashoko, VaSupa Mandiwanzira, rekumisa kukwidzwa kwemitengo wekushandisa internet panharembozha kwaive kwaitwa namakambni enharembozha. Kukwidzwa kwemitengo uku kwaive kwaitika mushure medanho rakatorwa neboka rePost and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority, kana kuti POTRAZ rekutambira chikumbiro chemakambani enharembozha chekuti mitengo iyi ikwidzwe. Vanhu vakawanda avo vaive varatidza kusafara kwavo vachishandisa Facebook, Twitter neWhatsapp, vadzokera zvakare painternet vachiratidza kufara kwavo nedanho ratorwa naVaMandiwanzira iri. Vamwe vataura neStudio 7 vatiwo vari kufara vachiti izvi zvinoratidza kuti vanhu vakataura nezwi rimwe chete pane zvinhu zvinenge zvichivanetsa, hurumende inogona kuvateerera. Mumwe mugari wemuBulawayo, Muzvare Nozipho Moyo, vanoti vari kufara nedanho rekumisa kukwidzwa kwemitengo yedhata. Asi Muzvare Moyo vanoti mitengo iyi yange isingafanirwe kuve yakakwidzwa kubvira pekutanga kuchitariswa kuti mitengo yeinternet muZimbabwe yagara iri pamusoro. VaMandiwanzira vakazivisa nezvekumisa kukwidza kwemitengo yedhata uku nemusi weChina mushure mekunge veruzhinji varatidza kusafara kwavo.
