Mumashoko avo, VaMandiwanzira, avo vaive vamboti havaikwanisa kupindira munyaya iyi sezvo vari pazororo, vakazivisa kuti mushure mekutaura nevakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvehumhizha hwekufambiswa kwemashoko, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, pamwe nePotraz, vakaona zvakakodzera kuti kukwidzwa kwemitengo iyi kumbomiswa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna Amai Mupfumira kana kubva kuPotraz. Asi Potraz yaburitsawo mashoko ekuti yamisa danho rekukwidza mitengo yeinternet. Vamwe vanhuwo vakawanda vange vachishora kambani yeEconet iyo inonzi ndiyo yaive yauya nezano rekukwidzwa kwemitengo uku uye inova iyo yaive yakwidza mitengo iyi zvakanyanyisa uye nechimbi-chimbi. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuEconet panyaya iyi asi kambani iyi yazivisawo kuti yave kudzokera kumitemgo yakare. Mumwe anotengesa airtime uyo angoda kuzvidoma nezita rekuti Moyo ati kukwidzwa kwemitengo kwaive kwaitwa uku kwange kwave kukanganisa basa rake nevamwewo vanotengesa airtime saiye. Mutungamiri wekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reAbammeli Human Rights Lawyers Network, VaTineyi Mukwewa, vati danho ratorwa nehurumende rinoratidza masimba evanhu kana vakataura nenzwi rimwe chete. VaNigel Gambanga avo vanoshanda nebepanhau repainternet rinonyora pamusoro pezvehumhizha hwekufambiswa kwemashoko, vanoti ichokwadi kuti makambni enharembozha ari kudurirwa nekuwanisa vanhu internet vachitiwo vanowona mitengo ichizokwidzwa zvekare asi zvisina kunyanya sezvange zvaitwa pari zvino. Gore rakapera Potraz yakakonzerazve mutauro apo yakatora danho rekuti makambani enharembozha asaite zvirongwa zvakasiyana-siyana zvekuderedza mitengo

headline: Vashandi veNRZ neMhuri Dzavo Vorara paMahofisi eKambani Yavo muHarare Vachiratidzira
text: Vashandi vekambani yeNational Railways of Zimbabwe muHarare vari pakuramwa mabasa vanonzi vaungana nemhuri dzavo kumahofisi ekambani iyi ekuLochnivar, kuRugare vachiti havachina kwekugara, vamwe vachiti vakaburitswa mudzimba dzavairoja. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano rinomirira vashandi veNRZ reZimbabwe Amalgamated Railways Workers’ Union, ZARWU, VaKamurai Moyo vanoti madzimai evashandi ava nevana vavo vakabatana nevarume vavo kubva neChishanu chapfuura vachirara pamwe nekuswera panze pemahofisi ekambani iyi. Vanonzi vari kuda kuti NRZ ibhadhare mari dzavo dzemihoro dzemwedzi gumi nemishanu dzavasati varipwa, uyewo dzekubatsirika nekufamba dzavasati varipwa kwemwedzi mishanu. “Vashandi havana zvimwe zvavaikwanisa kuita kunze kwekuenda kunogara pakambani iyi sezvo pari ipo chete pavasingabhadhare rendhi,” vanodaro VaMoyo. Vanoti chimwe chakanyanya kutsamwisa vashandi idanho ravanoti rakatorwa nekambani yavo rekuenda kudare rinoona nezvemabasa ichida kuti vashandi vatsanangure zvikonzero zvavari kuramwira mabasa. “Panzvimbo yekuti vashandi vakwire ivo kumatare, kambani ndiyo yave kumhan’ara, zvakafanana nekuti munhu anenge akurova ndiye futi anomhanya kuno kukwirira kumatare,” VaMoyo vanodaro. Mutauriri weNRZ VaFanuel Masikati vatenda kuti vashandi vari pakuramwa mabasa uye vari kurara pamahofisi ekambani yavo muHarare. VaMasikati vaudza Studio 7 kuti kambani yavo ine chido kwazvo chekuti ibhadhare vashandi vayo asi mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzeupfumi ndiwo ari kuvatadzisa kuzadzisa chido ichi. Vati bhizimusi rekutakura vanhu pamwe nezvinhu iro rinosiraramisa NRZ mazuva ano rakadzikira zvikuru, vakati nhaurirano pakati pevashandi nevashandirwi dziri kuenderera mberi. Vashandi veNRZ muHarare, Mutare, Gweru neBulawayo vari kuramwa mabasa kubva svondo rapera vachida kubhadharwa mari dzavo idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yogunun'una neKurambidzwa Kutengesa Nyanga dzeNzou kuCITES
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa Amai Oppah Muchinguri kashiri vari kushora zvikuru nyika dziri kuda kurambidza Zimbabwe kutengesa nyanga dzenzou dziri mudura maro. Amai Muchinguru-Kashiri vataura mashoko aya kumusangano weConvention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora kana kuti CITES uri kuitirwa kuJohannesburg, South Africa. Nyika dzakaita seKenya, China neAmerica dzinoti nyanga dzenzou hadzifanire kutengeswa sezvo zvichizokonzera kuti vari kuvhima nzou zvisiri pamutemo varambe vachizviita. Kenya mwedzi yapfuura yakapisa nyanga dzenzou dzayo dzose. Mukuru wesangano reU.S. Fish and Wildlife Service VaDan Ashe vanoti kuti nzou dzisapere dzose nyanga hadzifanire kutombotengeswa zvachose. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vanoti Zimbabwe ine nyanga dzenzou dzinopfuura mabhiriyoni mapfumbamwe mudura mayo uye inoda kuti dzitengeswe.

headline: Vakaremara Vanoti Hurumende Ngaishanda neMakambani Kuti Ivabatsire neZvikwanisiro
text: Vamwe vakaremara vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti ishande pamwechete nemakambani nemasangano akazvimirira mukutsvaga nzira yekuti vawane zvekushandisa zvinoita kuti hupenyu hwavo hureruke. Pastor Thomas Muchadenyika, avo vanogara kuNew Marimba muHarare vakaremara makumbo ese uye vanoshandisa madondoro vanoti kushayikwa kwezvikwanisiro kuri kuita kuti vakaremara vakawanda mumadhorobha nekumaruwa vatadze kushanda mabasa avo akasiyana siyana nekuendawo kuzvikoro. “Pane zvekushandisa zvevakaremara hazvisi kutowanikwa munyika muno.” Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Hongu hurumende yakanga yati yabvisa mutero kana kuti duty pane zvinoshandiswa nevakaremara zvakaita semadondoro, ma wheel chair nezvinoshandiswa nematsi kana mahearing aids, asi kuti munhu aende kunze kwenyika kunozvitenga mari yacho anenge asina, nekuti haasi kunopihwa mahara.” Mukuru weZimbabwe Albino Association Mai Mercy Maunganidze Chimanga vanoti nyaya yekushayikwa kwezvekushandisa zvevakaremara yave nenguva yakareba isingagadziriswe, “Nyaya yema assistive technologies yakakoshera vanhu vakaremara muhupenyu hwavo,”vanodaro Amai Chimanga. Vanotiwo, “Kubva tichitanga organisation muna 1996 tanga tichichema nehurumende yeZimbabwe kuti dai ma sunscreen lotion aiswa pa essential drugs list sezvo anoshandiswa zuva nezuva. Taitaura takatarisa vanhu vari HIV positive vanotora ma ARVs. Ma assistive devices aya anodhura uye vazhinji vedu havakwanise kuatenga. Uye zvikashayikwa zvinokoresa disability yemunhu.” Mai Chimanga vanoti hurumende inofanira kupa rutsigiro kumakambani kuti zvikwanisiro zvevakaremara zvigadzirwe muZimbabwe. “Iye zvino mukazvitarisa vanhu vane mental health vane mapiritsi avo anoda kutorwa pamwedzi pega pega, ve epilepsy vanoda mishonga yavo zvekare asi havasi kuzokwanisa kuzviita.” Vaenderera mberi vachiti mamwe matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende akanangana nekurerutsira vakaremara haasi kushanda. VaShingirai Nyakupinda vekuSunningdale muHarare vanova nhengo yeTracy Nyakupinda Albino Foundation vanoti zvikoro zvepamusoro zvinofanira kunge zvichiita ongororo netsvagurudzo pamusoro pezvikwanisiro zvevakaremara. “Hakuna chati chaitwa in terms of research pane zvinhu zvinobatsira vanhu, tichizvigadzirira tega tisingamirire kupihwa nema donors,” vanodaro VaNyakupinda. Vanoenderera mberi vachitiwo, Mahigher educational institutions edu pane ma projects avanoita vanokwanisa kugadzira zvakawanda. Tikatarisa ma hearing aids kana ma white cane, zvinhu zvinokwanisa kugadzirwa muno pasina zvekuzombomira pa waiting list. Saka tanga tichitarisira kuti kupera kwegore rino kana kutanga kwerinouya zvinhu zvichashanduka mu Zimbabwe tikwanise kuve ne progress paku addressa zvinhu zvakadai.” VaNyakupinda vanoti masangano evakaremara ndiwo anofanira kutaurirana nezvikoro zvepamusoro kuti vabatsirane nehurumende kugadzira zvinoshandiswa nevakaremara. VaEvans Tarwirei Chigariro vanodzidzisa mechanical engineering paHarare Polytechnic vanoti vakaremara ndivo vanofanira kutungamirira hurongwa hwekugadzirwa kwezvikwanisiro zvavo muno, asi chekutanga vanofanira kupihwa mukana wekuzviita. VaChigariro vanoti chinhu chinobatsira vakaremara chinofanira kugadzirwa naivo varidzi nekuti ndivo vanoziva zvavanoda. “Asingagone kutaura asi achiona anodzidziswa language yacho iyoyo, zvinoita, asingaone anodzidziswa, asinganzwe anotichwa, “ vanodaro VaChigariro. Vatiwo, “ Tiri mubishi rekunyora mapepa ekuti pamwe President akazviona anozvipasisa zvopindawo muma colleges edu. Zvototanga kushanda mugore ratiri kupinda ra2020. Research yatiri kutaura iyi haiitwi nemunhu ari able-bodied nekuti haana disability maari. Zvinoda kuti tidzidzise ari disabled wacho iyeye topedzisira tave nema leaders anoziva zve disability.” Sangano World Health Organisation rinoti munhu mumwechete pagumi rega rega revanhu vakaremara ari kurarama asina zvikwanisiro nekuda kwekudhura kwazvo pamwe nekutadza kunzwisisa nyaya dzevakaremara nevatungamiri venyika dzose zvadzo. No media source currently available

headline: ZRP Inoti Mari Yayakapihwa muBhajeti naVaNcube Haikwane Kutenga Pfuti, Hutsi Hunokatyidza neZvimwe
text: Mubhajeti risati ratambirwa nedare reparamende kana kuti budget proposal ravakatura vhiki rapera, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakapa mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police kana kuti ZRP mari inosvika mabhiriyoni makumi matanhatu emunyika kana kuti 60 billion dollars ekuita mabasa. Asi vakuru vemapurisa vanoti kuti vakwanise kuita zvavanotarisirwa kuita, vanoda mari inosvika mabhiriyoni mazana mashanu nemakumi masere kana kuti 580 billion yemunyika.  Mumwe mutevedzeri wemukuru wemapurisa achiona nezvevashandi, Deputy Commissioner General (Human Resources) VaElliot Ngirandi, vaudza nhengo dzeparamende kuti ZRP mari yavari kunzi vapihwe kana bhajeti rikatambirwa nedare iri ishoma zvikuru pane zvavange vachitarisira.  Semuenzaniso, vatiwo vaida mari inosvika mabhiriyoni mazana mana nemakumi maviri emadhora kana kuti 420 billion pamabasa akasiyana siyana akafanana nekutenga zvombo, motokari nezvimwe zvikwanisiro asi vakapihwa mabhiriyoni gumi nemaviri emadhora emunyika chete kaba kuti 12, 6 billion. VaNgirandi vati vaida mari inosvika makumi mashanu emabhiriyoni kana kuti 50 billion doallrs kuti vakwanise kuendesa mapurisa kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana siyana. Vati mapurisa anoenda kubasa asina mari yekubatsirikana kana kuti maallowances vakatiwo mapurisa ari kushandisa mbozhanhare dzavo pachinhambo chekushandisa zviovha zvepabasa. VaNgirandi vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti vane vanenge vari muhusungwa kuzvitokisi havawani chekafu. Vatiwo kana zvipatara nemakirinika zveeZRP hazvina mishonga uyewo vaida mabhiriyoni matanhatu ekutenga mishonga asi vakapihwa mabhiriyoni maviri chete pabhajeti regore rinouuya. VaNgirandi vakumbira nhengo dzeparamende kubva kukomiti inoona nezvemukati menyika nekomoti yeSeneti inoona nezverunyararo munyika kuti vataure negurukota rezvemari kuti riwedzere mapurisa mari . Asi munyori mubazi rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, VaAaron Nhepera, vavimbisa nhengo dzeparamende kuti munyika hamusi kuzoita nyonga nyonga nekuda kwekuti ZRP yakapihwa mari shoma vachiti vakatoudza mutungamiriri wenyika nezvenyaya iyi. Vakumbirawo nhengo dzeparamende kuti dzitaure nebazi rezvemari kuti ripeZRP mvumo yekushandisa mari yefaindi nedzimwe dzainowa vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti mmapurisa awane mari yekushandisa yakakwana.  Zvichakadai mukuru mubazi reCivil Registry, Registrar General, VaHenry Machiri, vaudzawo nhengo dzeparamende kuti bazi ravo harina kuwana mari yaraida mubhajeti vachiti vakapihwa mabhiriyoni gumi reimwe kana kuti 1, 1 billion chete asi ivo vaida zana remabhiriyoni emadhora kana kuti 100 billion dollars.  VaMachiri vati vashandi vebazi ravo vakatoresa vanhu zvitupa mumatunhu ese munyika pasi pechirongwa cheNational Mobile Registration gore rino havasti vabhadhra. Varatidzawo kusafara nenyaya yekuti havana kupihwa mari yekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota zvakare kana Zimbabwe Electoral Commission ichinge yapedzeda kutara miganhu yenzvimbo dzekuvhotera gore rinouya kana kuti Delimitation. VaNhepera vatiwo kunyoreswa kwevanhu kwakashosha uye vakumbira nhengo dzeparamende dzione zvadzingaiite kuti mari yekuita izvi iwanike. Sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvekudzvirirwa kwenyika, VaAlbert Nguluvhe pamwe nasachigaro wekomiti inoona nezverunyararo, VaDavid Parirenyatwa vaudza VaNhepera nevamwe kuti vataure zvinhu zvakakosha zvavanoda kuti zviwedzera mari vachiti zviri pachena kuti hapana mari yakawanda yekupa kuzvirongwa zvese zvabazi ravo.  Pari zvino mapazi ese ehurumende ari kusangana nemakomiti eparamende achitaura kuti anoda kuwedzerwa mari yakawanda zvakadii paramende isati yapasa bhajeti re4.5 trilllion rakaturwa svondo rapfuura. Mapazi ehurumende ainge achida mari inosvika matrillion masere nemabhiriyoni manomwe kana kuti 8,7 trillion.

headline: Quantam Global Reseach Inoti Mitemo yeZiimbabwe Yokanganisa Hurongwa hweKukwezva veMabhizimisi veKunze
text: Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reQuantam Global Research Lab iro rinoongorora mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika dzemuAfrica panyaya yekukwezva vekunze vanoda kuzotanga mabhizimisi munyika iri kuratidza kuti Zimbabwe ichiri kutatarika kuti ikwanise kukwezva vekunze ava. Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube chizvarwa cheZimbabwe ndivo chipangamazano sangano reQuantum Global Research Lab iri. Izvi zvakabuda muongororo inonzi Africa Investment Index 2018. Nyika dzinonzi dziri kuita zvinounza budiro dzinosanganisa Morocco, Egypt, Algeria, Botswana neCote d’ivore, South Africa, Ethiopia, Zambia, Kenya neSenegal. Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chechimakumi mana nemashanu panyika makumi mashanu neina dzemuAfrica dziri kutatarika kukwezva vekunze. Dzimwe nyika dzisiri kuita zviri nani dzakafanana neZimbabwe dzinosanganisa Central African Republic, Liberia, Somalia, Eritrea, Equatorial Guinea, Gambia, Sierra Leone, Guinea uye Sao Tome and Principe. Ongororo iyi yakaburitswa kumucheto wemusangano wevakuru wemabhizimisi wakaendwa masvondo apfuura nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Global Quantum yakambobatsirawo VaMnangagwa kusangana nevamwe vakuru vemabhizimisi kubva kuSwitzerland kumucheto wemusangano wekuDavos muna Ndira. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuvandudza mitemo yayo kuti ikwezve vekunze. No media source currently available

headline: Bhanga reCBZ Rinofaindiswa $385m neAmerica
text: Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, Doctor John Mangudya, vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti America ichabvisa mari yezvirango iri kunzi ibhadharwe nebhanga reCBZ iro rinonzi rakatyora mutemo weAmerica une chekuita nezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vehurumende muna 2003 vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Hofisi yeUnited States Treasury’s Office of Foreign Assets Control kana kuti OFAC inoti CBZ yakatyora mutemo sezvo yaibatsira vanhu vebhanga reZB iro rainge rakatemerwa zvirango. OFAC yakatanga yati CBZ ibhadhare mari inosvika mabhiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere zvemadhora asi mari iyi ikazodzikiswa kusvika pamamiriyoni mazana matatu nemakumi masere nemashanu emadhora mushure mekuchema chema kwakaita CBZ. Doctor Mangudya vati vane chivimbo chekuti mari iyi ichabviswa yose asi vashora zvikuru nyaya yekutemerwa zvirango kwevamwe muhurumende pamwe nemakambani anodyidza nehurumende yeZimbabwe vachiti zvinokanganisa nyaya yemabhizimisi. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio7 kuti Zimbabwe haingaudze America zvekuita maererano nekudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi. Vati zviri kuAmerica kuona kuti zvirango zvobviswa here ichionawo nyaya yekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vofarira Hurongwa Hunokweretesa Mari Midziyo Ichiitwa Chibatiso
text: Vemabhizinesi madiki nemamwe achiri kusimukira vanoti vari kufara nechirongwa chebhanga guru renyika chekuti vakwanise kukwereta mari vachishandisa midziyo yavo sechibatiso. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wezuva rimwe chete wapindwa nevamabhizinesi madiki uyo waitirwa kwaMutare. Vachitaura mushure memusangano uyu, mumwe muzvinabhizinesi, VaSondon Mugaradzoko, vati danho riri kutorwa nebhanga guru renyika richishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Association of Micro Finance Institutions, Zamfi, richabatsira zvikuru, sezvo mabhanga mazhinji achiomesera mabhizinesi madiki kana achida kukwereta mari kumabhanga aya. Mumwe apindawo mumusangano uyu, VaPeter Mavhiri, vatiwo kushandiswa kwezvipfuyo kunopa kuti vekumaruwa vakwanise kukwereta sezvo vasina maTitle Deeds pazvivakwa zvavo. Mukuru we Zamfi, Va Godfrey Chitambo, vanoti sangano ravo, iro rine nhengo zana neshanu, rakatanga hurongwa uhu mushure mekunge raona matambudziko ari kusangana nevemabhizinesi madiki ekuti vawane mari yekusimudzira mabasa avo apo vanenge vasina zvibatiso zvinodikanwa. Mumiriri webhanga guru renyika pamusangano uyu, Amai Grace Chiromo, vati kurerutsa kuwanikwa kwezvikwereti kuchapa budiriro munyika. Vatiwo vari mushishi kuti pave nemutemo wekutambira zvibatiso zvitsva izvi kuitira kuti zvicherechedzwe pazvibvumirano zvekukweretesana. Vanhu vangangosvika makumi manomwe vapinda mumusangano uyu, uye mumwe musangano wakadai uchaitwa kuMasvingo neBulawayo svondo rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangoma, VaNcube, VaMakoni neVamwe Voita Mushandirapamwe
text: Mapato mashanu anopikisana nehurumende yeZanu PF nemusi weChipiri akanyorerana chibvumirano chemushandirapamwe pamberi pesarudzo dzichaitwa muna 2018 achiti kubatana kunowoedzera mukana wekubvisa hutungamiri hwaVaRobert Mugabe nebato ravo avo vave nemakore makumi matatu nematanhatu vari muhutongi. Mapato mashanu anopikisa anoti MDC yaVa Welshman Ncube, Mavambo Kusile Dawn kana kuti MKD, Zunde, Dare pamwe ne Renewal Democrats of Zimbabwe kana kuti RDZ anyorerana chibvumirano chekuumba mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa achiti kupinda musarudzo akapatsanurana hakuna zvakunobatsira pakukwikwidzana neZanu PF. Mutungamiri weRDZ, VaElton Mangoma, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara zvikuru nekunyorerana kwavaita chibvumirano ichi nemamamwe mapato. Kunyangwe hazvo mapato mashanu aya anyorerana chibvumirano ichi, MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai pamwe neZimbabwe People First inotungamirwa naAmai Joice Mujuru vanga vasina kumiririrwa asi VaMangoma vati mapato aya angangopinda mumubatanidzwa uyu. Izvi zvatsinhirirwa nemutungamiri weMKD, VaSimba Makoni avo vaimbove gurukota rezvehupfumi. VaTendai Biti, avo vanotungamira bato reProgressive Democratic Party kana kuti PDP, vanga varipowo pakusainwa kwechibvumirano ichi. VaBiti vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachiri kuda kumbonokumbira mvumo yekusaina gwaro iri kukomiti huru yebato ravo. Mutauriri weZapu, VaMjobiza Noko, vatiwo vakamirira kuenda kukongiresi yebato ravo kuti vazive gwara richatorwa nebato ravo panyaya iyi. Mutauriri weMDCT, VaObert Gutu, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havana kunge vakokwa pakusainwa kwechibvumirano asi sebato vanotsigira nyaya yekuti mapato aite mushandirapamwe. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri wePeople First, VaRugare Gumbo vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havanawo kukokwa kumushandirapamwe uyu uye havana kana kumbotaurwa navo nezvenyaya iyi. Zvichakadai, VaMangoma vati mapato anenge asaina chibvumirano chemushandirapamwe ichi achazogara pasi owirirana kuti ndiyani achakwikwidza pachigaro chemutungamiri wenyika akamirira mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa aya paine nguva yekutsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018. Asi vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika munyaya dzenhaurirano idzi vanoti mapato aya amhanyira kuumba mubatanidzwa kuti agokwanisa kuve nemasimba ekuti achatora chigaro chipi ndiyani sezvo variwo vatanga kunyorerana chibvumirano ichi. Zvinonzi nyaya yekuti achataungamira mubatanidzwa uyu ndiyani ndiyo iri kunyanyonetsa kunyangwe zvazvo paine kuwirirana mumapto anopikisa ose kuti panofanira kuve nemubatanidzwa wemapato ose anopikisa uchakwikwidza musarudzo dzemuna 2018. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangudya Votaura Pamusoro peMari Yanetsa Munyika
text: VaMangudya vataura mashoko aya vachitsanangurira nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari kuti dambudziko remari mumabhangi riri kunyanyokukonzerwa nekuti nyika iri kutenga zvinhu zvakawanda kunze kwenyika asi iyo isina zvakawanda zvainotengesa. Gavhuna webhanga guru munyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vaudza nhengo dzepararamende kuti bhanga ravo nemamwe mabhanga akaunza munyika mari inodarika mamiriyoni mazana maviri emadhora kubva muna Ndira kusvika pakutanga kwemwedzi uno, asi izvi zviri kutadza kupedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika. VaMangudya vataura mashoko aya vachitsanangurira nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari kuti dambudziko remari mumabhangi riri kunyanyokukonzerwa nekuti nyika iri kutenga zvinhu zvakawanda kunze kwenyika asi iyo isina zvakawanda zvainotengesa. Vatiwo nyaya yekuti nyika iri kutenga chibage zvichitevera nzara yakakonzerwa neEl Nino pamwe nekuti vanhu havachina chido chekuchengetera mari dzavo mumabhanga sezvo vari kubhadhariswa mari yakawanda pakushandisa mabhangi. Asi vati zvisinei hazvo bhanga ravo nemamwe vari kuronga kuunza imwe mari munyika kuitira kupedza dambudziko iri. Vatiwo mabhanga matanhatu pamabhanga gumi ari munyika ndiwo chete ari kupinza mari munyika. Vatiwo kutanga kwemwaka wekutengeswa kwefodya kuchaunzawo mari yakawanda munyika. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari mumabhanga uye VaMangudya vati mabhanga anofanira kubhadharisa vanhu mari shoma pavanoshandisa mabhanga pamwe nekuona kuti veruzhinji vasina mabhuku ekubhanga kumabhanga vapihwa mukana wekuvhura maakaunzi aya. Mabhanga mazhinji ari kupa vanhu mazana maviri emadhora kana mari iri pasi pazuva nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari. Zvinhu zvakanaka, mabhanga anopa vanhu zviuru zviviri zvemadhora kana kudarika pazuva. Pavabvunzwa kuti sei vasiri kushandisa mari yemuno iyo vanokwanisa kudhinda kana yave shoma mumabhanga, VaMangudya vati nyika haisati yakwanisa kuita zvinodiwa kuti itange kushandisa mari yemuno zvekare. Vati chikuru chichapedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika kugadzira nekutengesa zvinhu zvemuno kunze pamwe nekuumba mitemo inoita kuti vemabhizimisi vekunze vauye kuzotanga mabhizimisi munyika. Zimbabwe iri kushandisa mabhiriyoni manomwe emadhora kutenga zvinhu zvekunze iyo ichitengesa kunze zvinhu zvinokosha mabhiriyoni matatu chete emadhora. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vekuBikita Votambira neMufaro Kupindira kweZACC muKuferefeta Huwori muKanzuru Yavo
text: Vamwe vagari vekuBikita mudunhu reMasvingo vanoti vari kutambira nemufaro mashoko ekuti komisheni inorwisana nehuwori yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, (ZACC), yakatanga kuferefeta nyaya dzehuwori hungadai hwakaitika mukanzuru yavo. Vagari ava vanoti nyaya idzi dzinosanganisira kutengwa kwezvikakarara zvemotokari dzevakuru vakuru apo vagari vasiri kuwana zvakakwana. Vamwe vagari vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vari kufara kuti eZACC yakatopinda mudunhu ravo kuti itarisise nezvehuori uhu honotsoropodzwa nevagari avo vari kuchema-chemawo nekusafambiswa zvakanaka kwemabasa mukanzuru iyi. Mutauriri wesangano revagari reBikita Residents and Rate Payers Association kana kuti Birra, VaMark Mutengani ,vanoti vanotenda nekuuya kweZACC vachiti inofanira kubudisa pachena huori huri kuitwa mukanzuru iyi. ZACC ino uya apo sangano reBIRRA rakanyora gwaro renyunyuto kwairi pamwe nekudare reParamende mwedzi mitatu yapfuura. Mugwaro iri, vagari vainyuyuta kuti kanzuru yakatengera vakakuru vayo zvikakarara zvemotakari dzema GD 6 nhanhatu dzichiita mari inosvika zviuru makumi mana emadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti US$40 000 pamotokari imwechete. Kanzuru inonzi yakatengazve chikarara chemotokari yerudzi rweLand Cruiser yemunyori wekanzuru, VaPeter Chibi, yaiita zviuru zana nemakumi mana zvemadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti US$140 000. Motokari dzese idzi dzinonzi dzakaita zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi masere zvemadhora ekuAmerica $380 000. Mumwe mugari wemuBikita, VaStruggle Nyahunda, vati vanotarisira kuti ZACC ichaita basa rayo nemazvo. Mutauriri weZACC, Commissioner Thandiwe Mlobane, vatenda kuti vakatotanga kuferefeta kanzuru yeBikita asi vati vange vasingakwanisi kutipa zvizere sezvo vange vari parufu. Munyori wekanzuru yeBikita, VaChibi, vatenda kuti ZACC yakauya kubasa kwavo vachiferefeta nyaya iyi vachiti asi ivo hapana huwori hwavakaita sezvo zvose zvakaitwa pamutemo. Vanoongorora nezvekutongwa kwematunhu vakazvimirira muMasvingo, VaArchibold Madida, vanoti ZACC inofanira kupinda mumakanzuru akawanda mudunhu reMasvingo sezvo muine huwori hwakanyanya. Kunze kweZACC, kanzuru yeBikita iri kuferefetwawo negurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, avo vakati zvakaitwa izvi hazvisi pamutemo. Vachitaura nebepanhau reMasvingo Mirror, VaMoyo vakati bazi ravo rakatotanga kuferefetawo nyaya iyi vakavimbisa kuti anenge abatwa nemhosva anosangana nemutongo wake zviri pamutemo. Kanzuru iyi iri kupomwerwawo huwori hwekucheresa zvibhorani zvina nemari inosvika madhora ekuAmerica zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu, kana kuti US$36,000.00. Kanzuru iyi yakacheresa chibhorani chimwe nemari inotangira pazviuru zvitanhatu kusvika pazviuru zvipfumbamwe zvemadhora ekuAmerica US$6 000.00 ne US$9,000.00 apo kucheresa chibhorani chimwe chete chakadzika mamita makumi mana kuchiwanzoita chiuru chimwe chete nemazana maviri emadhora ekuAmarica, kana kuti US$1, 200.00. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vosvika kuBotswana Kunonyorerana Zvibvumirano zveKudyidzana naVaMosisi
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vasvika kuBotswana kumusangano wekudyidzana unoitwa mukati memakore maviri nenyika iyi kana kuti Bi-National Commission. VaMnangagwa vaenda nemakurukota anosanganisira rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko amai monica mutsvangwa uye rezvehutano dr obadiah moyo. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana vati nhaurirano dzakatanga nemusi weChipiri uye mangwana VaMnangagwa nemumwe wavo VaMokgweetsi Masisi vachava zvapupu pakunyoreranwa kwezvibvumirano zvatenderanwa. Zvibvumirano zviri munyaya dzezvekutengeserana, dzidzo uye nyaya dzezvehutano. No media source currently available

headline: ZIBAWU Inoti Standard Bank Haina Chido cheKusimudzira Nyika
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi vemumabhanga, re Zimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, rinoti Standard Bank iri kuvhara mabhanga ayo mumaguta madiki akaita se Hwange, Chiredzi, Chinhoyi nemamwe, nekuti bhanga iri haridi kubatsira Zimbabwe kuti ibudirire. Mashoko aya anotevera mashoko ebhanga iri ekuti riri kuvhara mabhanga aro mumaguta madiki nekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzehupfumi. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti vashandi vavo vakawanda vari kurasikirwa nemabasa nepamusoro pemaitiro ebhanga iri. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reStandard Bank. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzokurudzira Hurumende Kuti Igadzirise Dambudziko reMari Munyika
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira hurumende kuti ikasarovanisa misoro nevashandi nevashandirwi, Zimbabwe ichadzokera kumakore ekuma 2007 uko mitengo yezvinhu yaikwira katatu pazuva. Nemusi weMuvhuro, Zimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats yakazivisa kuti inflation yemunyika yakwira kusvika pazvikamu makumi matatu nechiga chimwe kubva muzana kana kuti 31.01% kubva pazvikamu makumi maviri nezviga makumi masere nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 20,85%. Aka ndekekutanga mitengo yezvinhu ichikwira zvakadai mukati memakore gumi. Zimstats inoti mitengo yezvinhu zvakaita sechingwa, zvinwiwa nehembe ndizvo zvapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu ikwire. Kukwira kwemitengo uku kuri kupesana zvikuru nemashoko egurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, avo vainge vati inflation mukupera kwegore yaizopera iri pazvikamu makumi maviri nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 25%. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi muAmerica ichidzidzisa paJohns Hopkins University, Muzvinafundo Steve Hanke, vanoti inflation yemuZimbabwe yakatodarika zana kare kare uye yananga kumakore ekuma2008 apo vanhu vakaomerwa nehupenyu zvisina mukare akamboona. Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, Doctorr Simba Makoni, vanoti zvainge zviri pachena kuti inflation ichakwira zvakanyanya nenyaya yemashandisirwo ari kuitwa mari munyika zvikuru kuda kuenzanisa dhora rekuAmerica nemari yemaRTGS nemabond. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwao nenyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Godfrey Kanyenze. Munyori mukuru musangano reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti vashandi vakaomerwa zvakanyanya sezvo zvinhu zvaramba zvichiita chamurambamhuru. Ko zviri kunzi naVaNcube vakwanisa kuisa mari parutivi inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe emadhora mukushanda kwavo? Vachipindura, Dr Makoni vati chiri kunetsera hurumende inyaya yekungoita gudziramukanwa. Kugadzirisa dambudziko iri, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vasiyane nemari dzebond notes nemaRTGs uye kumutsiridza nyaya dzekurima kuti nyika isarasikirwe nemari yekunze. Vamwe vari kukurudzirawo kuti hurumende igadzirise hukama hwayo nedzimwe nyika kunyanya America nenyika dziri muEU kuti isabatwe seyakageza negoka munyama. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vashanu Vopora Kubva kuCoronavirus muBulawayo
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muZimbabwe hwasvika pamakumi mashanu nevatanhatu kuti 56. Asi vamwe vanhu vashanu kuBulawayo vapora kubva kuhutachiona uhu zvichireva kuti munyika yose vanhu makumi maviri nevatu vapora. Vanhu vafa vachiri vana. Vanhu vari kurwara makumi maviri nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 29. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzeezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti kushaikwa kwezvikwanisiro zvekuvheneka vanhu vane chirwere ichi kana kuti matest kits kunoreva kuti vanhu vanoona kunge vari kuparadzira chirwere ichi vasingazive nekuti kue vamwe vanhu vanogona kunge vasingakosore kana kupisa muviri asi vachitapurira chirwere. Gurukuta rinoona nezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo vakatenda kuti nyika yave kupererwa nezvekuvheneka vanhu. Vamwe vakabva kunze kwenyika vachimbochengetwa munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana vanoti vave kunzi vabhadhare mari dzinodarika madhora makumi matanhatu nemashanu ekuAmerica kuti vavhenekwe hutachiona uhu. Asi munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti hurumende haibhadharose vanhu kunze kwekunga huri hurongwa hwavo vega. Mukuru musangano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti danho rehurumende rekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba pasina guva yakatarwa harisi kushanda. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zvuru zana kana kuti 100 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica uye vashaya vadarika zvuru zvitatu nemazana maviri anemakumi mana nevatanhatu kana kuti 3.246. Vapora vanodarika zvuru zvina nezviviri kana kuti 42, 000 Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezvuru mazana matatu kana kuti 5, 3 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuamerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezvuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1,6 million. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vave kuda kusvika pazvuru zana kana kuti 100 000. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zvuru mazana matatu 300 000 asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Gumi neVashanu (15) Vofa neCovid-19 neMugovera
text: Vanhu gumi nevashanu kana kuti 15 vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika neMugovera vamwe mazana masere nenakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 839 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave mazana mana nemakumu masere nevatatu kana kuti 483. Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kuparira gore rapera vave zvuru makumi maviri nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 20, 499. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zviuru gumi bezviviri zvine mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 12, 439 zvichitevera kupora kwevanhu mazana maviri nemamakumi mashanu nevashanu nezuro. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vanosvika zvuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi manomwe nevanomwe kana kuti 7, 577. Kunyangwe muHarare nemuBulawayo muri imo mune vanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara, huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi mumatunhu ose hwawedzera zvave kutyisa kana nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano. Mukuru mubazi rezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa Dr Portia Manangazira vanoti svondo rino hurumende iri kutarisira ongororo inobuditsa pachena kuti kufa nekubatwa kwevanhu nechirwere ichi kuri kukonzerwa nekamwe kamhando katsva kechirwere ichi kakabatwa kuSouth Africa neBritain uye kanzoni kanopararira zvakanyanya kana muvana. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu kana kuti 3 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi manomwe nemaviri zvine zana nemakumi maviri nerimwe kana kuti 72,121. Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 2,4 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 1,3 million. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi masere nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 89, 7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zvuru mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nemaviri kana kuti 372, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemaviri kana kuti 22 miillion. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru zvisere kana kuti 49, 8 million.

headline: Musangano weInternational AIDS Conference Wotanga muSouth Africa
text: Musangano wemazuva mashanu weInternational Aids Conference wakatanga muDurban South Africane musi weMuvhuro uye uchapera nemusi weChishanu. Musangano uyu uri kuzeya nyaya dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheHIV/AIDS uye kuti potsvagwa sei mari yekuita izvi. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa ndivo vavhura musangano uyu zviri pamutemo. VaRamaphosa vakurudzira nyika dzepasi rino nemasangano akazvipira kuti vabatane mukurwisa denda iri. Vamwe vanyarikani vari pamusangani uyu vanosanganisa munyori mukuru weUnited Nation VaBan Ki Moon, vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica, muimbi Elton John uye Nevanzi wamambo kana kuti Prince Harry vekuBritain. Musangano uyu wakarongwa nesangano reInternational Aids Society uye unounza pamwe chete nyanzvi dzinosvika zviuru gumi nenomwe kubva kunyika dzose dzepasi rino. Nyanzvi idzi dzinenge dzichiisa misoro pamwe chete kuti dzibatsirane kurwisa denda iri iro rauraya vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu mumakore makumi matatu nemashanu. Vari kutungamira Zimbabwe kumusangano uyu igurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa avo vanoti Zimbabwe iri kuda kuvhara maburi ose angaite kuti vanhu vatsva vatapurirwe chirwere cheHIV. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kumusangano uyu zvinosanganisirawo VaDaniel Molokele vanova mukuru wesangano reAIDS Accountability International avo vanoti Zimbabwe ichabatsirikana nekuve pamusangano uyu. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nasachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Network for Positive Women Amai Martha Tolana vati kunze kwekunzwa zviri kuitwa nevamwe, nyika ichagovawo zvairi kuita. Sangano reUnited Nations rinoti rinoda kupedza mukondombera panosvika gore ra2030 uye panguva imwe cheteyo richiwanirawo vanhu mushonga. Asi UN inoti pachine mutambo sezvo paine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu vari kurarama nehutachiona pasi rose, vakawanda vari muAfrica. Vanhu vakawanda vanonziwo vari kutapurirwa chirwere ichi zvikuru kuNorth Africa, Middle East nekuRussia. KuRussia kunonzi nyaya iri kupa kuti chirwere chipararire kuramba kutambira nyaya dzechingochani. Asi vakawanda vanoita zvechingochani ava vanonzi vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi zvakanyanya. VaMolokele vanoti Zimbabwe inarowo dambudziko rekusada kupinza ngochani muzvirongwa zvayo. Imwe nyaya iri kupa kuti kurwisa chirwere ichi kunetse inyaya yekuti nyika dzemuAfrica nevanobatsira vave kusunga homwe. Muna Kubvumbi 2001 nyika dzemuAfrica dzakatenderana kuAbuja, Nigeria kuti mumabhajeti adzo dziise mari inosvika zvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana kunyaya dzezvehutano. Asi zvinonzi nyika imwe chete chete ndiyo yakwanisa kuzadzikisa zvido zveAbuja Declaration. VaMolokela vanoti izvi zvapa kuti kurwisa denda iri kunetse. Amai Martha Tolana vanotendawo kuti kushaya mari kuri kupa kupa kuti zvinhu zvikone n’anga murapwa achida. Kutapuriranwa kwechirwere muZimbabwe kwakadzika kubva pazvikamu gumi kubva muzana kusvika pazvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana. Asi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka sezvo Zimbabwe isina mari yakakwana yekubatsira vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS. Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chechishanu panyika dziri pamusoro soro muAfrica pachitariswa nyaya dzekupararira kwemukondombera. Vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana vari kurarama nehutachiona muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reSACU Rowanisa Nhengo Dzaro muAmerica Ruzivo Pamusoro peCovid-19
text: Sangano rinomirirra zvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfrica zvinogara munharaunda yeD.C, Maryland neVirginia, reSouthern African Community USA, nemusi weSvondo rakakokera hurukuro padandemutande pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19 senzira yekuti veruzhinji vanzwisise pamusoro pedenda iri uye kuti ringabatwa sei. Nhengo yebhodhi reSACU vachiona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri, Muzvare Omega Tawonezvi, vanoti sangano ravo rakatora danho iri kuitira kuti veruzhinji vawane ruzivo rwuzere pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19, iro rashungurudza pasi rose. Muzvare Tawonezvi vanoti kuti vanhu vanzwisise kukosha kwenzira dzekudzvirira nadzo pamwe nekurapa denda iri, vakakoka nyanzvi mbiri dzinoti chiremba vari nyanzvi yemishonga yechirungu Dr. Bukhosi Dube vanove chizvarwa chekuZimbabwe, pamwe nemumwe godobori wemishonga yechivanhu anobva kuSouth Africa kuti vatsanangurire veruzhinji pamwe nekupindura mibvunzo yaive nevanhu. Vamwe vakataurawo pamusangano uyu vanhu vaakapona kubva kudenda iri avo vakagoverawo kune vamwe nzira dzavakashandisa mukurwisana nedenda reCovid-19. Sangano reSouthern African Community USA rinoshandawo nemakanzuru pamwe nehurumende dzematunhu mukubatsira zvizvarwa zvekuAfrica muzvirongwa zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira zvehutano nezvehupfumi. Muzvare Tawonezi vanoti sangano ravo rine hurongwa hwekuita mimwe misangano nenhaurwa pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19 senzira yekupa ruzivo nedzidziso kunhengo dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voshushikana neKuwanda kweVanhu Vari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Munyika
text:
Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kushushikana zvikuru nekukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanhu vakawanda vataura neStuduio7 kuChiredzi vanoti huwandu huri kubudiswa hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19 kwemazuva mana apfuura huri kuvatyisa sezvo guta iri raramba riri roga rine vanhu vakawanda vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi zvichienzaniswa nemamwe maguta mudunhu rose reMasvingo. Dzimwe nzvimbo mudunhu reMasvingo dziri kubuda dzisina kana munhu
mumwe chete anobatwa nechirwere ichi panoongororwa vanhu zuva nezuva. Musi wechipiri 8 Chikumi pavanhu gumi nemumwe vakawanikwa vaine
chirwere ichi mudunhu rose reMasvingo, vapfumbamwe vaiva vekuChiredzi
vaviri vari vemudhorobha reMasvingo. Musi weChitatu 9 Chikumi, pavanhu gumi nevapfumbamwe vakabatwa neCovid-19 mudunhu rose, vese vaiva vekuChiredzi uye nezuro musi wa 10 Chikumi, vanhu vapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vose ndeve kuChiredzi.

Mumwe mugari wemumusha weTsvovani, VaMalcom Mugodzwa, vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo.

Mumwewo mugari wemumusha wekwa Zava, VaTiyani Chauke, vanofunga kuti guta ravo riri pedyo nemazambuko ekuenda kunyika dze South Africa neMozambique uko vagari vanobira zvisiri pamutemo nekudaro vanogona
kuuya nechirwere ichi.

Izvi zvatsigirwawo naMuzvare Nyasha Sigauke vachiti ivo hurumende
inofanira kuona kuti vanochengetedza mitemo vapinda mumisha
yemudhorobah iri kuitirakuti vanhu vatevedzere zvisungo zvekuti chirwere
ichi chaisapararire.

Hurumende yati iri kushushikanawo nekukwira kuri kuita chirwere ichi
muChiredzi kunyange hazvo kusati kwave nemunhu arasikirwa nehupenyu.

Mukuru webasa mubazi rezvehutano muMasvingo, Dr Amedus Shamu, vanoti hurumende iri kuita tsvakurudzo yekuti ione kuti chi chiri kukonzera kukwira kwechirwere ichi muChiredzi. Asi mutauriri wekomiti yeCovid-19 Task Force muMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimayi, vati kukwira uku kuri kukonzerwa nevanhu vari kubva kwakasiyana siyana vachinotsvaga mabasa ekukohwa nzimbe muminda yeTongaart Hullert nevamwe varimi. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vana vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yese, uye vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere munyika yose vave zviuru makumi matatu
nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu, 39 496. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vava chiuru chimwe chete nemazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu, 1 626. Vanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevaviri vakaibawa nhomba
yekutanga nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevabaiwa nhomba yekutanga pamazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe ezviuru nemazana mana nemakumi mashanu nevavviri 690 452. Vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mapfumbamwe nemamkumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe chete 4 991 vakabaiwa homba yepiri nezuro, izvo zvakasvitsa
vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yepiiri pa zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumambawe nezvipfumamwe nemakumi mashanu nevana, 399 054. Zimbabwe inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, 60%,
zvevanhu vari munyika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere
cheCovid-19. Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe iine chirongwa ichi, nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kuchanetsa sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kutadza kubayiwa nhomba yekutanga munzvimbo dzakawanda, sezvo nhomba idzi dziri kushaikwa mumatunhu akawanda munyika. Zvichakadaro, hurumende yeAmerica yazivisa kuti ichabatsira Zimbabwe nemari yekurwisa denda reCovid-19 inotangira pamamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemashanu emadhora kusvika pazana nemakumi
mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Havasi Kuzoita Basa Kusvika Zvinonetsa Zvagadziriswa
text: Vana chiremba vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara huye havasi kuzodzokera kumabasa kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Vana chiremba vaudza vatori venhau kuti zvinovasuwisa zvakanyanya kuti vasvitsa mazuva gumi nemaviri vasiri kuenda kubasa uku hurumende isiri kumboedza kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, Dr Elias Muzoremba, vati vanoshungurudzika zvikuru vachishanda muzvipatara zvisina zvikwanisiro zvakakwana. Vatiwo muzvipatara zvehurumende hamuna mishonga izvo zvinoita kuti kunyange vakaona varwere, havana zvavanokwanisa kuvabetsera nazvo. VaMuzoremba vatiwo vanachiremba vazhinji havasi pamabasa kunyange hazvo gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vakaudza makurukota ehurumede neChipiri kuti vana chiremba vashoma ndovari kuramwa mabasa. Munyori musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Asssociation, VaMthabisi Anele Bhebhe, vati zvinosuwisa kuti matambudziko avari kuchema nawo vanogarotaura nezvawo gore negore asi hurumende haisi kuagadzirisa. VaBhebhe vati vana chiremba vekumatunhu vabatanawo nana chiremba vanga vari pakuramwa mabasa. VaBhebhe vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwezvekushandisa muzvipatara pamwe nekuona kuti vanachiremba vararamawo hupenyu hwakanaka. Vana chirembawo vari kuti mari dzemihoro dzavari kuwana hadzikwani uye vanoda kuti hurumende ivabhadharewo nemari yekuAmerica. Gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vakaudza vatori venhau nezuro mushure medare remakurukota ehurumende kuti havasi kuzobhadhara vana chiremba nemari yekunze. VaMoyo vakatiwo vakaita hurukuro nana chiremba uye vakati vazhinji vari kumabasa izvo zvarambwa nanachiremba. No media source currently available

headline: Vakapotsa Vafa neCovid-19 Voyambira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba Nguva Ichiripo
text: Vamwe vanhu vakarwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 vasina kubayiwa nhomba vari kukurudzira vari kuzengurira kubayiwa kuti vaite izvi nekuti vakapotsa vaenda kwamupfiganebwe. Vaimbova mupurisa muZimbabwe Republic Police VaMalvern Mudyiwa mumwe akapona nepaburI retsono mushure mekubatwa nechirwere ichi vasina kunge vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. VaMudyiwa vanoti vakatozonoponera kuchipatara cheParktowen uko vakange vopihwa mweya wekufema kwemavhiki matatu sezvo vainge vozarirwa uye vagarawo vaine chirwere cheasthma. VaMudyiwa vaendera mberi vachiti vakashamiswa apo vakapedza kugeza vakatarisa pachiringiro vakaona mufananidzo wavo wairatidza kuti vainge vasara mapfupa chete. Vamwe vakataura neStudio 7 ndiAmai Namatirai Mutemwa vanogara kuZambia vakabatwa neCovid-19 vagara vaine chirwere chemoyo. Vanoti kunyangwe vakaburitswa muchipatara vachiri kunetseka nekufema uye vakanzi nachiremba vavo kana vave nani vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare kuTynwald North VaProvidence Moyo vanoti vakabhadhara mari yakawanda zvikuru kuti varapwe chirwere ichi vari kumba kwavo. Vanoti chirwere chavasiya vasinganyatsogone kumira kwenguva yakareba zvekuti kuti vaende kuri kubayiwa nhomba kune vanhu vakawanda zvinovanetsa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano avo varikuita ongororo yemishonga yeCovid19 Muzvare Miriam Chemhanza vanoti vakabayiwa nhomba vakatapurirwa chirwere ichi havazonyanye kurwara sevasina. Nyanzvi munayay dzezvehutano Dr Tinashe Gede vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vabaiwe nhomba yeCovid 19 uye kuti vasateerera zvinobuda pamadandemutande zvisingabvi kunyanzvi dzehutano pamusoro penhomba dze Covid-19 sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kupedzisira vapinda muna taisireva. Vaendera mberi vachiti panguva ino yeCovid-19, chakakosha kubaiwa nhomba yechirwere ichi nekutevedzera kurudziro yeWorld Health Organisation yekuti vanhu vapfeke mamasiki, vageze mawoko uye vagare vakataramukana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Pane gwaro rakaburitswawo nehurumende rinonzi “Covid 19 Admissions and Community Deaths by Vaccination Status,” riri kutsinhirawo kuti vanhu vari kufa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCovid 19 vanhu vasina kubaiwa nhomba. Gwaro iri rinotiwo vana vadiki vave kunyanya kubatwawo nemhando yeCovid-19 iri kutenderera munyika yeDelta variant. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Voenda Kunobayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Vachibhadhara Mari
text: Vamwe vagari vekuMasvingo vava kuona zviri nani kuenda kunobayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 munzvimbo dzinobhadhariswa mari sezvo vasiri kubatsirwa munzvimbo dzinobayiwa vanhu nhomba pasina muripo. Mumwe mugari wemumusha weRujeko, VaKnowledge Matumba,vati vakandobayiwa nhomba kuchipatara chisiri chehurumende nekuti vakapedza masvondo maviri vachienda kunomira mumutstse asi vachitadza kubayiwa sezvo zvipatara zvehurumende zviri kubaya vanhu vashoma pazuva. VaMatumba vati kuzvipatara zvisiri zvehurumende hakuna mitsetse uye vanhu vanobhadhariswa mari inosvika madhora maviri ekuAmerica iyo yakatarwa nehurumende. Mumwe mugari, VaJohanes Chihwani, avo vati vakabayiwawo kuchipatara chakazvimiririra vati kunyange kuchibhadhriswa, mari yacho ishoma uye haupedzi nguva yakareba wakamirira kubayiwa. Mutauriri weZimbabwe National Family Planning Council muMasvingo, VaHebert Chikosi, vati vanhu vazhinji vari kuuya kuzobaiwa nesangano ravo senzira yekutiza mitsetse kuzvipatara zvehurumende. Chimwe chipatara chakazvimirira cheCIMAS, chiri kubayawo vanhu muMasvingo asi chinobaya nhengo dzacho dziri pachirongwa chekurapiwa chemedical Aid. Mumwe mushandi ataura ne Studio 7 paCIMAS aramba kudomwa nezita rake nekuti haabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau ati nhengo dzavo zhinji dziri kubayiwa nyore dzisingabhadariswi. Muridzi weMakurira Private Hospital, Dr Phenias Makurira, vati zvipatara zvakazvimiririra zviri kubetsera hurumende chaizvo kutapudza huwandu hwevanoda kubayiwa nhomba vachiti chipatara chavo chiri kutangawo kubaya vanhu svondo rinouya. Mutauriri weCovid-19 Taskforce muMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimayi, vati hurumende inotenda kubatsirwa kwairi kuitwa nevezvipatara zvakazvimirira uye inokurudzira vanhu kuti vaende ikoko senzira yekutapudza huwandu kuzvipatara zvehurumende. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuwedzera nzvimbo dzinobayiwa vanhu nhomba pamwe nekutenga nhomba dzakawanda. Nezuro vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri vakafa nechirwe che Covid-19 munyika izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vanhu vafa pazviuru zvina nemazana maviri nemakumi maviri, 4 220. Vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi masere nevatanhatu, 386 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi masere nevasere 122 288. Vanhu vabayiwa nhoba yekutanga munyika vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana maviri nemakumi manonwe nechimwe nemazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, 2 271 729. Vabiawa nhomba yepiri vave miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe nezana nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe, 1 427 159. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa denda reCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Dzidziso Pamusoro peCOVID-19 Kune Vachadzidzisa Veruzhinji Yotambirwa neMufaro
text: Bazi rezvehutano neMuvhuro rakazivisa kuti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakanga hwasvika pazana nemakumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 135, kuchitiwo vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vasvika pazviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu ane vasere kana kuti 5 308. Bazi iri rakati vanhu vakanga vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi kusvika neMuvhuro vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvitatu nemazana masere ane makumi mana nevasere kana kuti 3 848, izvo zvakasiya vanhu chiuru nemazana matatu nemakumi maviri nevashanu kana kuti 1 325 vari ivo vachine chirwere ichi munyika yose. Mukuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi munyika, bazi rezvehutano rakabatana nesangano reUnited Nations Population Fund (UNFPA) riri kupa zvidzidzo kuvanhu vachazonodzidzisawo vamwe pamusoro pemabatirwo anofanirwa kuitwa Covid-19 uye kuti chirwere ichi chingadzivirirwa sei kuti chisapararira. Zvidzidzo izvi zviri kuitirwa kuDomboshawa, uye vari kupinda muzvidzidzo izvi vanozotarisirwa kunodzidzisawo vamwe vari mune zvehutano mumapoka avo, avo vanozodzidzisawo vamwe munharaunda dzavagere. Bazi iri razivisa kuburikidza neTiwtter kuti vapinda muzvidzidzo izvi vanhu vabva kubazi rezvehutano, kumapurisa nemauto, uyewo vamwe vabva kumasangano akazvimirira. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti hurongwa hwekudzidzisa vadzidzisi uhwu hwakakosha zvikuru sezvo huchizobatsira kuti dzidziso pamusoro pechirwere ichi izokwanisa kupararira nenyika yose. VaRusike vakurudzirawo kuti dzidziso pamusoro pechirwere cheCovid-19 iwandire pamwe nekupararira kunzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji pamwe nekumaruwa, uko vanoti veruzhinji vanenge vari kuratidza kuti havasi kuteerera kurudziro dzebazi rezvehutano pamwe neWorld Health Organisation dzekuti vazvivhare miromo nemhino, kugeza maoko, pamwe nekusiya mukaha pakati pavo nevamwe. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuno muAmerica, iyo iri kuongorora chirwere ichi inoti pasi rose vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri neimwe nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe negumi nezvisere, kana kuti 21 918 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi, icho chaurayawo vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nezvina nemazana manomwe, kana kuti 774, 700. America ndiyo ichiri pamusoro pahuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19, avo vadarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi mana nezvina, kana kuti 5, 444, 000 Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi manomwe, kana kuti 170, 000. MuAfrica vanhu vanodarika miriyoni nezviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvisere, kana kuti 1,128 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi, kuchitiwo vashaya vadarika zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu nemazana masere, kana kuti 25, 800. Vanhu vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana masere nemakumi mana nezvitanhatu, kana kuti 846, 000. South Africa ndiyo iri pamusoro muAfrica iine vanhu vanodarika mazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe ezviuru, kana kuti 590, 000 vabatwa nacho. Vanhu vafa nechiwere ichi muSoiuth Africa vadarika zviuru gumi nechimwe nemazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 11, 900.

headline: Kushungurudzwa kweZvizvarwa zveKunze Zvichirambidzwa Kupinda muZvipatara neChikwata cheOperation Dudula muSouth Africa kwoenderera Mberi
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa zvinoti zvinhu hazvichina kumira zvakanaka sezvo nyaya dzekushungurudzwa nezvizvarwa zvenyika iyi dziri kuenderera mberi, kunyange hazvo hurumende dzenyika mbiri idzi dziri kuti dziri kutaurirana. Nhengo dzechikwata cheOperation Dudula, icho chiri kurwisa kuti zvizvarwa zvekunze kweSouth Africa zvibude munyika iyi, dzaenderera mberi nekurambidza vekunze kupinda muzvipatara nemakiriniki zvehurumende zviri muJohannesburg nemuPretoria. Chikwata ichi changa chakamira pamikova yemakiriniki ari muJohannesburg anosanganisira Hillbrow Community Health Centre, uye chinonzi chakatanga kurambidza vekunze kupinda muzvipatara neMuvhuro apo chakavhara mukova wechipatara chikuru cheKalafong Provincial Tertiary Hospital chiri mudunhu re Gauteng. Nhengo dzebato rinopikisa reEconomic FreedomFighters (EFF) dzinonzi dzanga dziri pachipatara ichi neChitatu dzakagarira veOperation Dudula ava kuti vasarambidza varwere kupinda muchipatara ichi. Izvi zviri kuuya mushure mekunge mumwe mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu reLimpopo, Dr. Phophi Ramathuba svondo rapera vanyadzisa chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chairwara chiri mune chimwe chipatara mudunhu iri vachiti vekunze vari kupedzera vemuSouth Africa mishonga nezvikwanisiro. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende kanawo mapurisa panyaya iyi. Asi chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muPretoria muSouth Africa, Mufundisi Richard Moyo, avo vari kutevera zviri kuitika, vanoti nhau iyi inhau inosiririsa uye kurwadza kuona zviri kuitwa vekunze nezvizvarwa zvaSouth Africa, uchiona kuti vari kushungurudzwa ava vanenge vari varwere kana vari kuperekedza varwere. Mufundisi Moyo vanoti kunyange hazvo mapurisa ari kuzama kubatsira, havaoni ari kuita zvinoita kuti kushungurudzwa uku kumiswe, vachiti vanopa mhosva yose iyi kuhurumende yeSouth Africa, iyo vanoti haisi kumisa chikwata cheOperation Dudula. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Anoshanyira South Africa Onyunyuta neKurambidzwa Kupinda neMapiritsi eKuronga Mhuri
text: Madzimai ari kushanya kuSouth Africa haasi kufara nekutorerwa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri kwaari kuitwa nevashandi vanoona nezvekupinda nekubuda kwevashanyi muSouth Africa. Madzimai aya anoti ari kubvumirwa kupinda nepakiti imwechete iyo inenge iyine mapiritsi anokwana mwedzi mumwechete. Madzimai aya anoti izvi zvinoita kuti azopedzesera oshandisa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri ekuSouth Africa ayo vakawanda vanoti anovarwarisa zvinosanganisira kubuda ropa kwenguva yakareba. Amai Getrude Tarumbwa, avo vanodzidzisa kuPretoria, vanoti kurambidzwa mapiritsi akawanda anovakwanira kunozovamanikidza kunwa mapiritsi ekuSouth Africa ayo anovarwarisa, uye kubuda ropa rakawanda. Amai Tarumbwa vanoti munhu anofanirwa kubvumirwa mapiritsi anoenderana nenguva yaanenge abvumirwa kugara muSouth Africa. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naAmai Patricia Zuze, avo vanoenda kunotengesa zvinhu zvakaita semidziyo yemumba yakagadzirwa nemiti kuSouth Africa. Amai Zuze, avo vanogara mwedzi miviri kana mitatu vachitengesa, vanoti kutorerwa mapiritsi kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo uye vanozomanikidzwa kunwa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri ekuSouth Africa avanoti anovarwarisa. Nekuda kwekurambidzwa kwemapiritsi akawanda pabhodha, mamwe madzimai ave kuita bhizinisi rekuenda nemapiritsi achinotengesera zvizvarwa zvemunyika zviri kuSouth Africa. Pakiti rimwe chete, iro rinopihwa pachena munyika rinotengeswa nemari iri pakati pemaRands zana nemakumi mashanu nemazana maviri zvichienderana nekuti munhu ari kuatengesera kunzvimbo ipi muSouth Africa. Amai Roselyne Chitani mumwe wemadzimai anotengesa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri kuSouth Africa. Vatyairi vemabhazi anoenda kuSouth Africa vanoyambirawo vanhu vavanenge vakatakura zvinhu zvisingabvumirwe kupinda munyika iyi kuitira kuti vasazobatwa vachinzi vari kutakura vanhu vanopinda nezvinhu zvisingabvumirwe. Mutyairi webhazi reFirst Class, VaFrank Muguti, vachiyambira vashanyi vechidzimai kuti vasatakure mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri akawanda. Zvinhu zvakaita semufushwa, manhanga, nzimbe muriwo hazvibvumirwe kupinda nazvo pabhodha. Munhu anowanikwa nazvo anotorerwa uye haazobvumirwa kupinda munyika iyi musi waanenge abatwa. Munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Brg Gerald Gwinji, vanoti vachaongorora nyaya iyi vachiti hazvisi pamutemo kuti vanhu varambidzwe kana kuita zvinotadzisa kuti munhu atore mushonga wake sezvinenge zvataura chiremba. Hatina kunzwa divi reSouth Africa panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzokurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vagare Mudzimba Asi Vakawanda Vachiti Havana Chekudya
text: Apo vanhu vari kukurudzirwa kuti vatange kugara mumba kutanga mangwana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti vangwarire kutapurirwa chirwere sezvo parizvino vanhu vari kuvhenekwa vachiri vashoma. Mumiriri wesangano reWorld Health Organization muZimbabwe Dr Alex Gasasira vati vatambira kurudziro yekuti vanhu vambogara mumba nekuti zvinopa kuti vannhu vasatapurirane chirwere. Munyori mukuru wesangano ravanachiremba reSenior Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Aaron Musara vati huwandu hwevanhu varikubatwa nechirwere ichi hunoratidza pachena kuti zvinhu hazvisisina kumira zvakanaka. VaMusara vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vatevedzere kurudziro dzavanachiremba kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Vanhu vanhu vasaende pane magungano, vapfeke mamask zvakanaka vakavhara mhuno nemuromo uyewo kugeza maoko nguva dzose. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode, vatiwo danho rakatorwa nehurumende reLockdown rakakosha zvikuru vachiti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi munyika kunopa kuti ruzhinji rufambe zvakanyanya izvo zvinowedzera kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Amai Labode vati kunyangwe hazvo Lockdown ichikanganisa mararamiro evanhu, kudzivirira kurambopararira kwechirwere kwakakosha vachitiwo kuvhurwa kwemuganhu pakati peSouth Africa neZimbabwe kunogona kuriko kwakonzera kukwira kwehuwandu hwevari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti zviri pachena kuti hurumende yamomoterwa. VaMadzorera vati hurumende haina mari yekuongorora zvakanyanya vakati chakakosha panguva ino kuti munhu wega wega azvigarire kumba kuchengetedza hutano. Asi Muzvare Joylene Nyachuru mumwe mugari weku Glenview vati kuisa nyika mulockdown vanhu vasina chouviri hakuna zvakunobatsira. VaChristopher Gohori mumwezve mugari wemuHarare vatiwo pasina kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura muHarare, vanhu kunyanya kumisha inogara vazhinji vacharamba vachiungana pazvibhorani sezvo vasingakwanisi kugara vasina mvura. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti nekuda kwekukwira kuri kuita chirwere cheCovid-19 No media source currently available , vanhu vanenge vokurudzirwa kugara mumba kana kuti Lockdown kutanga mangwana. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisawo kuti kubva neChipiri, mamwe makambani anenge asingachashandi uyewo rakatorambidza magungano kusara kwevanenge vachienda kurufu asi vasingadarike makumi matatu. Vanhu vanenge vasisabvumidzwe kuenda kune mamwe maguta.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoshushikana Zvichitevera Kufa kweVanhu Vane Covid-19 Zvisingazivikanwe Kuti Vane Chirwere Ichi
text: Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dzinoti hadzikurudzire kuti vanhu vazivikanwe kuti vanga vaine chirwere cheCOVID-19 mushure mekunge munhu afa sezviri kuitika munyika. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti izvi zvinodziviririka chete kana hurumende ikaongorora vanhu vakawanda kusanganisira vese vanenge varwara. Magwaro anobudiswa nebazi rezvehutano pamusoro pechirwere cheCOVID-19 anoratidza kuti kune vanhu vanozozivikanwa kuti vanga vaine hutachiona hwechirwere ichi ivo vanhu vacho vatoshaya. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr. Henry Madzorera, vati kufa kwevanhu vasati vazivikanwa kuti vari kunetsekana neyi zvinhu zvinoisa vashandi vezvehutano panjodzi. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomiririra vakoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vaudza Studio7 kuti sesangano vanogarokurudzira hurumende kuti iise zvikwanisiro muzvipatara zvayo zvinoita kuti vezvehutano vaongorore munhu wese zvake anotsvaka rubatsiro munyaya yezvehutano zvisinei nekuti anoratidza kuti ane chirwere cheCOVID-19 here kana kwete. VaDongo vanoti sevashandi vezvehutano vanonetsekanawo nevanhu vanozobatwa chirwere ichi ivo vatoshaya. VaDongo vanoti kusavapo kwezvinoshandiswa kuti vana mukoti vazvidzivirire kuri kuisa nhengo dzavo dzakawanda panjodzi. Vatiwo sangano ravo riri kushushikana kuti vakoti vari kubatwa nehutachiona vari pabasa vari kuwanda. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo kuongorora vanhu vakawanda kuti vane chirwere here kana kuti kwete ndiyo chete yekuti hurumende idzivirire kufa kwevanhu vakawanda pamwe nekupararira kwehutachiona hweCoronavirusm uhwo hunokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, VaJohn Mangwiro, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanhu ava vanenge vaongororwa vachiri vapenyu asi vanofa vasati vaziva zvinenge zvabuda muongororo dzinenge dzaitwa. VaMangwiro vati izvi zvinoitika sezvo nyika isina michina inobudisa ongororo idzi chiripocho. Vachibvunzwa kuti izvi hazviisi here hutano hwevashandi vehutano panjodzi, VaMangwiro vati vashandi ava vari kutora varwere vese vanouya kuzvipatara sevanhu vane COVID-19 kusvika zvinenge zvabuda muongororo zvazivikanwa nekudaro vanenge vakapfeka zvekudzivirira. Kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti vashandi vanenge vakapfeka zvekuzvidzivirira, vashandi vezvehutano, kusanganisira VaDongo, vanoti izvi hazvisi izvo zviri kuitika muzvipatara zvehurumende sezvo zvikwanisiro zvinodiwa izvi zviri zvishoma zvakanyanya. VaDongo vanoti kushaikwa kwezvikwanisiro imwe yenyaya dziri kupa kuti vashandi vezvehutano varambe kuenda kubasa. Sangano ravana chiremba vakuru reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association rakazivisa hurumende svondo rino kuti inofanirwa kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa muzvipatara, kutadza kwayo vanenge voramwa mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yozeya Mhinduro dzeVashandirwi Vari Kutsigira Kumakidzwa kweVashandi Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo ,vanoti ivo nemagweta avo vatanga kuzeya mhinduro dzemapazi nemakambani ehurumende apindura panyaya yavakakwidza kumatare yekuti vashandi vasamanikidzwa kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 sezvo kuita izvi kuchityora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. No media source currently available Vakaendeswa kumatare ava vanonzi vakati vashandi vasina kubayiwea nhomba vamire kuuuya kubasa. Vakaendeswa kumatare vanosanganisira gurukota rezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavima; gweta guru rehurumende, VaPrince Machaya; makambani anoti ZIMNAT Insurance, Zimbabwe National Road Administration (ZINARA), TelOne, Windmill, SEEDCO Zimbabwe nechikoro cheManicaland State University. Mukupindura zvakaturwa neZCTU kumatare, VaMachaya vati havazivi kuti sei ivo negurukota rezvevashandi vakapinzwa munyaya iyi nekuti handivo vanoudza vashandi kana makambani zvekuita panyaya dzakadai. VaMavima vaudza Studio7 kuti vakamboyedza kuti vataurirane neZCTU asi zvakaramba asi vachiti zvakakosha kuti vashandi vabayiwe nhomba. No media source currently available Kambani yeTelOne inoti nyaya iyi haifanire kunzwikwa nechimbi chimbi ichiti ZCTU yakatora mavhiki matatu kuiendesa kumatare zvinoratidza kuti hayaifunga kuti yakakosha zvekunzwikwa nechimbi chimbi.

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muSouth Africa Zvotaura nezveCoronavirus
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa nemusi weSvondo vakatora matanho akaomarara mukuyedza kurwisa pamwe nekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus chatekeshera pasi rose Vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika iyi. VaRamaphosa vakazivisa kuti South Africa kutanga nemusi weChitatu inenge yave kuvhara mimwe miganhu yayo uyo kurambidza kushanyira kana kutambira vanhu vari kubva kunyika dzabatwa nechirwere ichi dzinosanganisira Italy, Iran, South Korea, Iran, Spain, Germany, US, Britain ne China. Zvikoro zviri kuvharwawo musi uyu uye vanhu vari kurambidzwa kuungana kusanganisirawo kumiswa kwemitambo. MuSouth Africa mune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kubatwa mumambure ezviri kuitwa kudzivirira chirwere ichi. VaOffice Jaka, avo vanobva kuKwekwe, vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti South Africa ichakwanisa kupedza dambudziko iri kunyange hazvo riri basa guru. Asi va Jaka vanoti varikunyanyo shungurudzika zvikuru, nevana vavo vaviri varikuita zvidzidzo zveElectrical Engineering kuChina. VaEmmanuel Mboti vanotiwo kunyangwe hazvo zvaitwa naVaRamaphosa zvakanaka, vichakanganisa hupfumi hwenyika yavo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kumiswa kwemitambo kuchakanganisa kurarama kwevakawanda. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chechidiki, chinogara muSouth Africa, VaMunyaradzi Mukanyiwa, vanoti vanowirirana nemashoko ataurwa naVaMbote. No media source currently available

headline: Chinhoyi University of Technology Inonzi Yave Kumanikidza Vadzidzisi, Vadzidzi neVashandi Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Chikoro chikuru cheChinhoyi University of Technology -CUT- chiri kurambidza vadzidzi nevashandi vanenge vasina kubayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19 kupinda pachikoro. Vadzidzi avo vanga vauya kuzopedza zvidzidzo zvavo pamwe nekunyora bvunzo nemusi weMuvhuro vakashamisika vachinzi vaburitse kadhi rinoratidza kuti vakabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19 kuti vabvumirwe kupinda pachikoro. Mumwe mudzidzi asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti arambidzwa kupinda pachikoro achinzi haana kubayiwa nhomba audza Studio 7 kuti anoti chanyanya kumurwadza ndechekuti havana kunge vayambirwa nezvedanho iri. Munyori anoona nezvemagariro evadzidzi musangano rinomirira vadzidzi pachikoro ichi VaFrancis Nhete vanoti danho ratorwa nechikoro rakanaka sezvo vachiwirirana naro sevatungamiri vevadzidzi. Mutauriri weCUT Dr Tapera Musekiwa vanoti vatora danho iri senzira yekudzivirira vamwe vadzidzi nevashandi. VaTapera vanoti vabva vaisa nhomba pakiriniki yechikoro kuti zvive nyore kune vanenge vasarudza kubayiwa.Zvikoro zvakawanda zvepamusoro zvakatozivisa kuti vadzidzi vanenge vasina kubayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19 havabvumirwe kudzidza kana kunyora bvunzo nevamwe. Asi danho iri riri kupikisawa nesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rinoti kuita izvi kutyora kodzero dzevanhu dziri mubumbiro remitemo. Gore rapera muna Mbudzi, chikoro cheCUT chakambovharwa mushure mekunge vadzidzi makumi mashanu nevanomwe vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa eZRP Anoparura Chirongwa cheKudzivirira Kuraraira kweHIV/Aids
text: Zimbabwe Republic Police neChitatu yakaparura hurongwa hwehwaro hwekuyedza kudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere cheHIV/AIDS kwamutare. Hwaro uhu hwakananganga nekubatsira mapurisa ari pabasa uye vari pamudyandigere. Hurongwa uhu hwave nenguva yakareba huchikwenenzverwa paine chinangwa chekuti panosvika gore ra2020 pange pasisina vanoshaya nekuda kwechirongwa ichi. Vanenge vaine chirwere ichi vanenge vachitarisirwa kuwana mapiritsi zviri nyore. Mukuru wemapurisa mudunhu reManicaland, Assistant Commissioner Dorothy Kupara, avo vakaparura chirongwa ichi, vanoti zvakakosha kuti mapurisa ose aremekedze hwaro hwavapo kuitira kuderedza kuparira kwechirwere ichi. Amai Kupara vanoti hapana chinonyadzisa pakunoongororwa chirwere cheHIV uye pamwechete nekutora mishonga yacho sezvinodiwa. “Chirwere ichi chakangofananawo neshuga, kana zvakubata gadziriswa, so my officer will ensure kuti zvashandiswa sezvinotarisirwa, uye my officer handifungi kuti pane vachange vachiramba kuzotestwa, uye basa richatowanda kune ma medical officers vachitesitwa.” Mukuru wemapurisa uyu anotiwo hwaro huripo uhu hunobudisa pachena kuti vanenge vaine chirwere havaizotadziswa kusimudzirwa pabasa. Hwaro uhu hunotiwo vanenge varwara vanokwanisa kumbonozorora zvavo vachipora vachizongodzokera pabasa kana vave kunzwa zviri nani. Mumashoko avo ekuvhara chiitiko ichi, mumwe mukuru wemapurisa Superintendant Kamanda vanoti hwaro hwavapo uhu huchabatsira mukufambisa basa ravo zvakanaka kunyanya kuvatungamiriri vemakamba kumatunhu ose emunyika. “Ndinoti kumaDispols (District Police Officers) ose kana masangana nechinhu chiri medical chingakunetsai munongoti ko policy inoti chii? Endai munotitoreraiwo ende rinonzi rakatsetseka rinosuppotwa nePolice Act uye ne the current Labour Laws, tinoiti chii zviya, iSimbi yebasa!” Mumwe wechipurisa anorarama nehurwere Sergeant Tawanda Mugeri vachipa huchapupu vanoti zvakakosha kuti munhu wega wega, kunyanya kuchipurisa, ararame achiziva paamire mushure mekuvhenekwa ropa. “Panhau yekuudza vamwe vekubasa, inonzi chii zviya, inonzi disclosure, zviri nani inini ndavakuziva zvandiri zvitori right, ndikaenda kuhospital vave kutondishevedza nefirst name nekuti ndikanzwa parwadza ndotomhanya kuti ndizive kuti chii.” Hwaro hwekubudisa HIV/AIDS Policy hwakaitwa pachidyidzanwa nemasangano akasiyana-siyana anosanganisira reNational Aids Council, NAC, Population Services International, PSI nemamwewo. Mukuru weNational Aids Council muManicaland, VaEvans Makoni, vanoti vari kushanda nemapurisa kuti vazadzikise zviri muhwaro mavo. “Chatiunganidza pano inyaya yeZRP AIDS Policy launch iyi, chirongwa chiripo pakuti National Aids Council yakapuhwa mutoro wekuti irwisane nedenda reHIV. Saka mukuita izvozvo tinoti vanhu vari pamabasa kuti vawanirwe nguva yekuitirwa ma programmes inoita shoma saka kambani ikaita policy yaino implemenda zvinobata vazhinji vanenge vari kumabasa toderedza huwandu hwemari yatinoshandisa pakurapa nekuti vanhu vanenge vadzivirira.” Vakuru vechipurisa havana kuda kuburitsa pachena kuti chirwere ichi chakapararira zvakanyanya seyi muZRP, kunyangwe hazvo ongororo ichitaridza kuti kuchipurisa kumwe kwemamwe mapoka emabasa kwakatekeshera chirwere ichi kusanganisira kuchiuto, nekuvatyairi vedzimotokari dzinofamba mitunhu mirefu. Hwaro hwakaparurwa uhwu hucharamba huchiongororwa nekugadzirisa kuti hukwanise kufambidzana neshanduko inenge iriko uye nenguva. No media source currently available

headline: Dr Mahomva Vokurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19 Apo Vakawanda Vobatwa neChirwere Ichi Zvakare
text: Mukuru anoona nezvekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vari kukurudzira vanhu munyika kuti vabayiwe nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire zvakanyanya munyika. Dr Mahomva vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti ongororo dzose dziri kuitwa munyika nekunze dziri kuratidza kuti vakabayiwa nhomba vane mukana wakakura wekurarama kunyangwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Bazi rezvehutano rakatozivisa kuti mhando yeCovid-19 inopararira zvakanyanya yeomicron yave kutotenderera munyika. Nemusi weSvondo, bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemumwe kana kuti 4, 701. Vanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 523 vabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zana rezviuru nemakumi matatu nepfumbamwe zvine makumi mana nematanhatu kana kuti 139, 046. Vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nemana zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 3 874 694 vakabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga. Vanhu vabayiwa kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi masere nemana zvine makumi mana nemashanu kana kuti 2 884 045. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba mukupefra kwemwedzi uno kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana.

headline: Vanachiremba Vakuru Vanozivisa Kuramwa Mabasa Kana Zvichemo Zvavo Zvisina Kugadziriswa
text: Vanachiremba vakuru vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association, neChitatu vakapa hurumende mazuva gumi nemana ekuti igadzirise matambudziko ari muzvipatara pamwe nenyaya yemihoro yavo, kukundikana kwayo voramwa mabasa. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa zuva rimwero kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere che Covid-19 munyika hwakakwira kusvika pachiuru nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 1 089, zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana matanhatu negumi nevaviri kana kuti 2 612 vakavhenekwa. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi kusvika nezuro vaive mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 395, uye vashaya vachiri makumi maviri. Tsamba yakanyorwa nesangano ravanachiremba vakuru iyi, iyo yakanyorerwa kuboka reHealth Services Board, kumunyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano pamwe nekuvakuru vezvipatara, kana kuti hospital clinical directors, iri kuda kuti hurumende iise mishonga nezvikwanisiro muzvipatara, iwanise vanachiremba zvekuzvidzivirira kubva ku Covid-19, uye kuti mihoro yavo ive iri mumadhora ekuAmerica ichienzaniswa nemari dzavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018. Vanachiremba ava vari kudawo kuti zvichemo zvevamwe vashandi vemuboka rezvehutano vari pakuramwa mabasa pari zvino zvigadziriswe kuitira kuti vabatsirane mabasa, uyewo kuti nhengo dzavo dzinoshanda kuUniversity of Zimbabwe asi iye zvino dziri kushanda muzvipatara munguva ino, dzinge dzichibhadharwa mari dzekushanda uku. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Pasi rose vanhu vabatwa ne Covid-19 vadarika mamiriyoni gumi nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 15.5 million, uye vanhu vafa vadarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi masere nezvina kana kuti 584 000. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachidzidzisa zvehutano pa Nottingham Trent University, ku Britain, Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, vanoti vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti igare pasi navanachiremba ava vakurukure zvichemo zvavo kuti zvinhu zvisaipa kudarika zvazviri pari nhasi muzvipatara. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti chinonyanyorwadza ndechekuti vanachiremba ava vari kuda kuramwa mabasa munguva iyo nyika iri mudambudziko re Covids-19, izvo zvinozoisa varwere vagara vaine zvimwe zvirwere zvinovanetsa munyodzi huru kana vakazobatwa neCovid-19. Vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvinhu muzvipatara nekukasika, umo munonzi hamuna mishonga nezvimwe zvikwanisiro. Doctor Nyashanu vanotiwo kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubata chirwere cheCovid-19 chinhu chinityisa nekuti kana vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vanenge vachida kubatwa zvakanaka, uye kuti vabatwe zvakanaka vanofanirwa kunge vachienda kuzvipatara, uko kunofanirwa kunge kuine vanamukoti navanachiremba. No media source currently available

headline: Zvikoro Zvogadzira Zvikwanisiro Zvekushandisa Kurwisa Kupararira kweCovid-19
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus hwakaburitswa nehurumende neMuvhuro, hwasvika pavanhu vasere, uye munhu ashaya nechirwere ichi achiri munhu mumwe chete. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira chero nguva apo hurumende ichazivisa zvinenge zvaitika. Pavanhu vasere vakabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus, vana vanobva kudunhu reMashonaland East, vatatu kuHarare uye mumwe chete kuVictoria Falls. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West, Dr Wensilus Nyamayaro, vanoti zvave kuziviswa manheru ega ega kana pane zvinenge zvashanduka pahuwandu hwevanhu vanenge vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus. Zimbabwe yakatara mazuva makumi maviri nerimwe ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi, icho chabata vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi mana muZimbabwe, uye vanhu vanosvika mazana masere ezviuru pasi rose. Senzira yekubatsira varwere munyika iyo yakatarisana nekushaikwa kwema ventilators anobatsira kufema vanenge varwarisa zvakanyanya nechirwere ichi, zvimwe zvikoro zvepamusoro zvinoti zviri kushandisa hunyanzvi hwazvo kugadzira ma ventilators, ma sanitisers nemasiki. Chikono chepamusoro cheHarare Institute of Technology chinoti chiri pakati pekugadzira muchina wekufambisa mhepo mudzimba dzinochengeterwa vanhu vanenge vachirwara nechirwere cheCOVID-19. Ukuwo Chinhoyi University of Technology, CUT, inotiwo iri pakati pekugadzira mamasiki apo kune rumwe rutivi iri kutsvaka zvikwanisiro zvekugadzira ma sanitisers sezvo chikoro ichi chine hunyanzvi hwacho. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muChinhoyi, mutauriri weCUT, VaMusekiwa Tapera, vati vari kugadzira mamasiki senzira yakaonekwa nechikoro ichi yekurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus. VaTapera vati vamwe vana muzvinafundo vari mubishi kuita hurongwa hwekugadzira ma sanitisers. Asi mukuru weCUT, Muzvinafundo Jambwa Simbi, vati basa rekugadzira mamasiki riri kudzoserwa kumashure nekushaikwa kwemagetsi nguva dzakawanda. Zvikoro izvi zviri kutora matanho aya sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika munyaya dzehutano panguva iyo hurumende iri kutatarika kuwanira vashandi vemuzvipatara zvipfeko zvekuzvidzivirira zvakakwana pavanenge vachirapa varwere vanofungidzirwa kuti vane Coronavirus. Zimbabwe yapinda muzuva repiri vanhu vachigara kudzimba dzavo senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus, iyo yakatanga kuChina gore rapera, uye kusvika pari zvino, yauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere pasi rose, kusanganisira Zororo Makamba wemuZimbabwe, uyo akashaya svondo rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi yeZvehupfumi Inoti Haione Makambani eMunyika Achikwanisa Kugadzira zveKudzivirira COVID-19 Zvakakwana
text: Imwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi inoti nekuda kwemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezveupfumi munyika, haioni makambani emunyika achikwanisa kugadzira zvikwanisiro zvinodiwa mukudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana hwecoronavirus. Zvinodiwa zvinosanganisira magorovhosi, zvekuvharisa miromo nekumeso (masks), zvekuzora zvinouraya hutachiwana (sanitizers) kanawo mbatya dzinodzivirira (protective suits) izvo zvinodiwa mukudzivirira kutapuriranwa pamwe nekuparadzirwa kwehutachiwana hwe coronavirus. VaMasimba Kuchera, avo vanoshanda vakazvimirira, vanoti makambani akwanda emunyika haasi kushanda zvakakwana, uye vanhu vakawanda vave kuzvishandira izvo zvavanoti zvinoderedza huwandu hwezvinhu zvingagadzirwe munyika nemakambani kana dambudziko rechirwere ichi rakazokura. Nyika dzakawanda dzine dambudziko rechirwere che COVID-19 kusanganisira America, dziri kuchema nekushaya zvekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi zvakakwana zvekuti mamwe makambani anobika doro muAmerica ave kutobatsirawo kuburukidza nekugadzira hand sanitizer. Nyika zhinji kusanganisirawo Zimbabwe, dziri kutowana rubatsiro kubva kunyika yeChina, iyo iri kutumira zvekushandisa izvi asi zvinonzi nevamwe zvinogona kuzononoka kusvika kwazvinenge zvichidiwa nekukasika. Hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kuti yakagadzirira zvakakwana kudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hwecoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende, Vana Chiremba Vanotadza Zvakare Kuwirirana
