text: Vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa vasangano nevamiriri vehurumende kuti vaedze kugadzirisa dambudziko rekuramwa mabasa iro rave nemazuvagumi nemashanu. Sachigaro wesangano rinomirira vanachiremba, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors’ Association, Dr. Edgar Munatsi vanoti musangano uyu, semimwe misangano yanga ichiitwa mumasvondo adarika ose aya, hauna chawaburitsa zvakare. Vanoti hurumende yazivisa kuti haikwanise kuvabhadhara mari yavari kuda pavanoshanda usiku, kana kuti on-call allowances, sezvo isina mari, asi inokwanisa kuvapa iri pasi pane yavari kuda, danho ravanoti varamba kutambira Dr. Munatsi vamboshevedzwawo nevakuru vemapurisa, avo vanoti vanga vachida kunzwisisa nezvekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba navanamukoti uku. Dr. Munatsi vanoti musangano wavo nevakuru vemapurisa uyu wafamba zvakanaka, uye panga pasina kutyisidzirana. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano revagari vekuChitungwiza, reChitungwiza Residents' Trust, rinoti richatora matanho ekuenda kumatare edzimhosva kana hurumende pamwechete neHealth Services Board vakasagadzirisa matambudziko ari muzvipatara nekukasika. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaMarvelous Kumalo vanoti kusagadziriswa kwematambudziko aya kutyora kodzero dzevanhu mukuwaniswa kwavo hutano, sezviri mubumbiro remitemo. No media source currently available

headline: Chirongwa cheNhomba yeCovid-19 Chakapinda muZuva Retatu Panguva Iyo EU Ichiti Ichawanisa Zimbabwe Imwe Nhomba
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neChitatu kuti kusvika nenguva dzeina dzemasikati, vashandi vari pamberi mukurwisana nedenda reCovid-19 vanosvika zviuru zviviri nemazana manomwe nevana, kana kuti 2 074, vakanga vabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 nyika yose. Izvi zvakaitika apo chirongwa chekubaya nyika yose chakapinda muzuva retatu. Bazi iri rakazivisawo kuti vanhu vasere vakafa kana kuti 8, uye vamwe makumi mashanu kana kuti 50, vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu chiuru nemazana masere nevana, kana kuti 1 804, vakavhenekwa. Vanhu zana nemakumi mashanu nevana, kana kuti 154, vakanga vari muchipatara pakupera kwezuva musi weChipiri. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 nyika yose hwakasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhtatu, kana kuti 35 960, kuchitiwo vanhu vafa kubva patanga chirwere ichi nyika yose vakasvika pachiuru nemazana mana ane makumi mashanu nevatanhatu, kana kuti 1 456. Zvichakadaro, sangano reEuropean Union rinoti Zimbabwe munguva pfupi inotevera iri kutarisirwa kuwana nhomba inodarika miriyoni imwe chete kana kuti 1, 152 million, pasi pechirongwa che Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations, kana kuti COVAX. Izvi zvakabuda padandemutande reTwitter reEU. Chirongwa cheCOVAX chinotungamirwa nesangano reWorld Health Organization richibatsirwa nemasangano akasiyanasiyana, kunyanya reEuropean Union, uye chakanangana nekubatsira nyika dzichiri kubudirira. Pari zvino Zimbabwe yakapihwa nhomba zviuru mazana maviri, kana kuti 200 000, kubva kuChina, iyo yakatanga kubayiwa muHarare svondo rapera uye mamwe matunhu kutanga neMuvhuro. China yakazivisa neChitatu kuti ichapa Zimbabwe imwe nhomba zviuru mazana maviri. Zimbabwe inoti yakatenga imwe nhomba zviuru mazana matanhatu kubva kuChina inosvika mukupera kwemwedzi uno. Asi vakuru mubazi rezvehutano vasina kuda kudomwa nemazita vanoti vanhu vari kuuya kuzobayiwa vachiri vashoma. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr. Brighton Chireka vanoti vanotenda bazi rezvehutano nedanho rayakatora rekuti vashandi vezvehutano vave pakati pevanhu vakatanga kubaiwa nhomba munyika yose. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Yatenga Nhomba yeCovid-19 Mamiriyoni Makumi Maviri Asi Vari Kuda Kubayiwa Vashoma
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti richiri nechivimbo chekuti vanhu mamiriyoni gumi vange vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 munyika mukupera kwemwedzi unouya kuti intyatsoshande zvakanaka kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vanoti Zimbabwe yakwanisa kuwana nhomba dzinosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri zvichitreva kuti inokwanisa kubayiwa vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi vari kudiwa nehurumende. Mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika, Dr Agnes Mahomva vanoti havasati vadududza pachinangwa chavo chekuti vabaye vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba mukupera kwemwedzi unouya. Kunyangwe hazvo huwandu hwevari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere ichi munyika huri kudzika, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti chirwere ichi chinogona kudzoka zvine mutsindo kechina kana vanhu vasina kubayiwa nhomba. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti vari kushushikana nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubayiwa nhomba parizvino. Dr Enoch Mayida vakambotungamira chipatara cheChitungwiza vari munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Medical Association mudunhu remashonaland vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba sezvo chirwere ichi chichiramba chichishanduka. MuAfrica, Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chegumi panyayaya yekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19. Pamusoro pane Sychelles ichiteverwa neMauritius neMorroco. Botswana ndiyo iri pamberi kuchamhembe kweAfrica iri pachidanho chechipfumbamwe, South Africa iri pachidanho chegumi nerimwe. Pasi rose vanhu vanodarika mabhiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mamamiriyoni mazana mana kana kuti 7, 4 billion vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. America ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabayiwanhomba yeCovid-19 vanosvika mamiriyoni mazana mana nemakumi mana kana kuti 440 million. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti kuti chirwere chisapararire zvakanyanya muAfrica vanhu zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana vanofanira kubayiwa nhomba, Africa ine vanhu bhiriyoni imwe chete nemamiriyoni zviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 1,3 billion. Asi vanhu vabayiwa nhomba Africa parizvino vadarika zvishoma zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana chete kana kuti 6, 06% zvinoreva kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Vanhu vafa muAfrica vanosvika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nemasere kana kuti 220, 958. Sangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi rose reWorld Health Organization rinoti chirwere ichi chatodzoka zvine mutsindo kana kuti fiurth wave kuEurope zvikuru kunyika dzakaita seGermany, Britain, Russia neFrance. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano munyika idzi dzinoti vasina kubayiwa nhomba ndivo vapa kuti chirwere ichi chitange kuita mutema rege wembada. Sezvo nyaya dzekushanyirana dzatanga, pane mukana wekuti chirwere ichi chinogona kupararira zvakanyanya muAfrica mune vanhu vashoma vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19.

headline: Nyanzvi muNyaya dzeHutano hwePfungwa, Doctor Nzuzu, Vobatsira Vane Matambudziko eZvinodhaka Vari kuZimbabwe
text: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muJacksonville mudunhu reFlorida muAmerica, Doctor Emmanuel Nzuzu, avo vanove nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano hwepfungwa pamwe nezvekubatsira vane dambudziko nezvinodhaka, vanoti vakazvipira kubatsira vane dambudziko rezvinodhaka vari kumusha. Doctor Nzuzu pari vari zvino vari kumusha kuZimbabwe uko vari kushanda nevanhu vane matambudziko ekutadza kusiya zvinodhaka zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira mbanje, mapiritsi nedoro, kuburikidza nekuita misangano. Doctor Nzuzu, avo vave nemakore anodarika gumi nemanomwe vachiita basa rekudzidzisa vane matambudziko nezvinodhaka kuburikidza nekushanda muzvipatara zvakasiyanasiyana pamwe nedandemutande ravo, vanoti vakaenda kuZimbabwe nekuona kukura kwedambudziko nezvinodhaka ravanoti rabata nyika. Vanoti kubva pavasvika kuZimbabwe muna Mbudzi, vaita misangano miviri muHarare, uye vane tarisiro yekuti vachange vachiita mimwe misangano kunze kweHarare. Doctor Nzuzu vanoti kune vanoda kubatsirwa vanokwanisa kuvabata panharembozha yavo yavari kushandisa muZimbabwe inoti + 263 776 505 052, kanawo kutsvaga bhuku ravo rakanangana nekubatsira vanenge vaine matambudziko ekukundikana kusiya zvinodhaka rinonzi, “How to Stay Sober”. Vanoda rubatsiro vanokwanisawo zvakare kuenda padandemutande ravo rinoti https://www.howtostaysober.info, apo vanhu vanogona kuenda vachiwana zvidzidzo zvekuti vangakwanise sei kusiya zvinodhaka. Doctor Nzuzu vakaberekerwa kuChipinge vakazoenda kuAmerica muna 2003. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neKukumbira Rubatsiro Vovhiringwa neCovid-19 muZimbabwe
text: Vamwe vasingaoni vanorarama nekukumbira mari mumabhazi nemumigwagwa kwaRusape vanoti vari panguva yakaoma sezvo hurumende yakambomisa kufamba kwemabhazi aya senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaTymon Rukuni vekwaRusape, vanoti kubva nemusi weSvondo apo vakapedzisira kupemha mubhazi, ndiwo musi wavakapedzisira kudya rinopisa nevana vavo vatanhatu, sezvo vasingawani kwekupemhera nekuti muguta hamuchina vanhu ukuwo kumabhazi havachadiwiko nekuda kwechirwere che-COVID-19. "Tine mhuri nine dzinorarama nekupemha asi nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus hapachina kana chichabuda nekuti mumabhazi hakuchina, chikafu hatichina nekuti kumabhazi hatichadiwi kuti tifambe ikoko. Toita seyiwo nhai," vanodaro VaRukuni. Amai Rejoice Chinembiri vekwaRusape vanoti nekusafamba kwemabhazi panguva ino, hakuna kumwe kwavanotarisira kuwana mari kunze kwekufamba nemabhazi iwaya vachikumbira rubatsiro. 'Tinosipinda mumabhazi tikukumbira, towana tumari totenga tuhupfu tuTsunami nemuriwo todya nevana kumba. Zvino izvezvi mabhazi akamiswa hatina kana pekutangira. Tamboenda kwaMP wedu kuti tibatsirwe tikazoenda kuSocial Welfare asi tangonyorwa mazita hatina kupihwa kana chipunu chehupfu chaicho," Amai Chinembiri vanotsanangura. VaNhamo Makusha vanoti sevanhu vanorara nechavawana musi iwoyo, hapana zvazvichareva kana vachirambidzwa kupemha munzvimbo dzemuguta kana mumadutavanhu sezviri kuitika panguva ino yeLockdown. "PaLockdown apa patidhisiadhivhandeja nekuti sevanhu vanotsvaga mumabhazi, nekuti hatina chatinacho, zvichireva kuti takapedzisira kupemha Sunday apo pakaguma kufamba mabhazi acho uye pari zvino hatichabvumirwi kukwira mabhazi acho, takapedzisira kudya musi iwoyo weSunday," vadaro VaMakusha Mumiriri weMakoni Central mudare reparemende, VaDavid Tekeshe, vanoti vari kuedza nepavanogona napo kuti mhuri dzevasingaoni idzi dziwane rubatsiro asi zviri kutora nguva refu. "Ndatouya nemuriwo izvezvi kwavari ndichiti pamwe vangabatsirikana sezvo vange vakanzi vanokwanisa kubatsirwa kumapurisa asi hapana chabuda ikoko vakanzi vaende kuWelfare asi vangonyorwa mazita chete pasina chabuda. Vanhu ava vanoti vakapedzisira kupemha Sunday apo vakakwanisa kutenga katsaona kekudya musi wacho. Vanhu ava vari pa desperate havana chekudya vanotoda rubatsiro," vanodaro VaTekeshe. Dambudziko rakatarisana nevanhu ava idambudziko rakatarisanawo nevanhu vakawanda munyika yose vanga vachipona nekukumbira rubatsiro mumigwagwa nemumabhazi. Zimbabwe ine vanhu vangangosvika zviuru mazana mashanu vasingaoni, vazhinji vavo vachipona nekukumbira rubatsiro sezvo munyika musina mabasa akawanda nepamusana pekuparara kwaita hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vana veChikoro Mazana Matatanhatu neMakumi Mashanu neVasere (658) Vobatwa neChirwere cheCovid-19 Kubva Zvavhurwa Zvikoro
text: Vana vechikoro mazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevasere vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 mumazuva mapfumbamwe adarika chete. Nemusi weChitatu pavanhu pavanhu mazana matanhatu nevapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, zana nemakumi manomwe nevashanu vacho vana vechikoro. Izvi zvasiya vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vavezviuru mazana maviri zvine makumi matatu nemana nemazana mashanu nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 234 589. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro hakuna munhu akafa zvichireva kuti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira muna 2020 vachiri zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi masere nevasere.

headline: Matare eDzimhosva Ovhiringwa neCovid-19
text: Komisheni inoona nezvekufambiswa kwenyaya dzemumatare, yeJudicial Services Commission, yazivisa nhasi kuti kunyange hazvo matare achange akavhurwa pamazuva eLockdown Level Four, matare achange asingaiti mabasa ese anotarisirwa kuti ave achiitwa semazuva ose. Mutauriri weJudicial Services Commission, Muzvare Rumbidzai Takawira, vati kunyange hazvo matare anenge akavhurwa panguva iyi, haakwanisi kuita mabasa awo sezvinotarisirwa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 nezvimwe zvipingaidzo. Muzvare Takawira vati nekudaro matare achange achingonzwa nyaya dziri kupinda mumatare kekutanga, nyaya dzechimbichimbi pamwe nenyaya dzeavo vanenge vachida kukumbira mukana wekutongwa vachibva kumba chete Muzvare Takawira vati izvi zvinoreva kuti vese vane nyaya dziri mumatare avo vaive vapiwa mazuva ekudzoka ari mumazuva makumi nematatu anotevera, vachazodzokera kumatare mumashure memazuva aya zvichitariswa mitemo inenge yaiswa nehurumende mukuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwedenda reCovid 19. Judicial Services Commission yazivisawo kutiwo vese vachange vachiuya kumatare vanosungirwa kutorwa temperature, kupfeka mamasiki pamwe nekugeza maoko, uye kuona kuti havabatani nevamwe zvakanyanya. Sangano iri ratiwo vanhuwo zvavo vanenge vasingabvumirwi kupinda pamatare mukati memazuva akatarwa eLockdown. Asi rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaObey Shava, vaudza Studio 7 kuti matanho atorwa neJudicial Services Commission aya anotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaShava vati izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vane nyaya mumatare, nyaya dzavo dzichanzwikwa mushure menguva yakareba zvisinei nebumbiro remitemo yenyika iro rinoti nyaya dzinofanirwa kunzwika nechimbichimbi mumatare. VaShava vatiwo zvinoomeserawo avo vasina kupiwa mikana yekutongwa vachibva kumba vachiti nguva yavo yekugara mutirongo inenge yorebeswa kunyange hazvo vasati vabatwa nemhosva. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nerimwezve gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaMartin Kadzere, vachitiwo kunyange matare ati pane nyaya dzaanenge achinzwa, magweta ari kurambidzwa kuenda kumabasa pamaroadblocks. VaKadzere vati nhasi ivo pachavo vadzorerwa kumba. Kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 zvakanyanya kwakaita kuti hurumende ikurudzire veruzhinji kuti vagare kudzimba kutanga nhasi, kwemazuva makumi matatu. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoparura Chirongwa Chekubatsira Vanoshandisa Zvinodhaka Pachena
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzaparura chirongwa chekuongorora pachena zvinodhaka mumiviri memunhu kuyedza kupedza dambudziko ratekeshera munyika rekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka. Chirongwa ichi chinonzi Abused Substances Diagnostics & Manangement Project chichapa vanhu zvikwanisiro kana kuti (test kits) ekuona mhando yezvinodhaka zvinenge zvashandiswa. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, vaFanwell Dzoma vanoshanda kubazi rinoona nezvevashandi uye vataura vakamiririra mushandirapamwe wemapazi ehurumende mukuedza kupedza dambudziko rekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka kana kuti Inter-ministerial Taskforce on Drug and Substance Abuse varumbidza zvikuru chirongwa chaparurwa ichi. VaDzoma vati ongororo yakaitwa munyika irikuratidza kuti zvikamu zvinodarika makumi mashanu nechimwe kubva muzana zvevechidiki chirikushandisa zvinodhaka. Vachange vachitungamirira chirongwa ichi, nyanzvi munezvehutano uye vari mukuru weDepartment of Chemical Pathology paUniversity of Zimbabwe School of Medicine, Muzvinafundo Hilda Matarira vati chakanakira chirongwa ichi ndechekuti munhu anozviongorora ega. VaJacob Shamuyarira, avo vakamboshandisawo zvinodhaka vakazovamba sangano rakazvimiririra rinonzi Pamumvuri rinobatsirawo vanoshandisa zvinodhaka varumbidzawo chirongwa ichi. Muzvare Chengeto Nyanzira vanoshanda nekambani yeFaStep inova kambani ichange ichiwanisa zvekuongoreresa zvinodhaka izvi vati vanhu vachazviongorora vachishandisa weti yavo. Pasi pechirongwa ichi pachaitwawo dzidziso yekukurudzira vanhu kuti vasashandise zvinodhaka izvio zvinozokanganisa hupenyu hwavo vamwe vachifa kana kupenga. Masangano akasiyana siyana abatana muchirongwa ichi anosanganisira hurumende, University of Zimbabwe Health Sciences, Zimbabwe College of Pathology, FaStep, Pamumvuri nemamwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakachengetedzwa kuBulawayo Vachiongororwa Covid-19 Vanoti Hurumende Iri Kuvabata neKuseri kweRuoko
text: Vamwe vevanhu vakachengetedzwa nehurumende kuBulawayo vachiongororwa kuti vane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete, vanoti havasi kufara kuti vari kuramba vakaiswa mu quarantine iwo mazuva avo anobvumirwa nemutemo kunge vakachengetedzwa, akapera. Vanhu vataura neStudio7 vanoti vava nemazuva makumi maviri nematatu vari mu quarantine, asi hurumende haisi kuvaudza kuti vachanzi vaende kudzimba dzavo riini. Vanhu ava vanotiwo vari kushungurudzwa nemapurisa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. MuBulawayo munonzi mune vanhu vari kugara paBulawayo Polytechnic, nepaUnited College of Education vakabva kuBotswana mushure mekunge nyika iyi yadzosera zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kumusha kwazvo pakatanga kunetsa chirwere cheCovid-19. Vamwe vevanhu ava vanoti vakamanikidzwa kubuda muBotswana, vamwe vakasiya midziyo yavo. Pavakabviswa kuBotswana, vanhu ava vakatanga vambogariswa paPlumtree High School, uye vanonzi vaisvika zana nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu. Asi vakazoendeswa kuBulawayo senzira yekudzikisa kumanikidzana kwavanga vakaita kuPlumtree. Mumwe wevanhu vakabva ku Botswana vachiita zvekumanikidzwa musi wa 7 Kubvumbi, uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake, anoti hurumende iri kuvabata nekuseri kweruoko. No media source currently available Asi munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Va Nick Mangwana, vati hurumende yakamirira kuona zvakabuda muongororo yekuti vanhu ava vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. VaMangwana vatiwo vanhu ava vanotarisirwa kuenda kumisha yavo munguva pfupi inotevera kana zvakabuda muongororo zvichiratifdza kuti havana hutachiwona hweCoronavirus. Zimbabwe yava nevanhu makumi mana vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19, uye vanhu vana, vakatoshaya nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoshanyira Glen View Yanetseka neKorera
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vashanyira musha weGlen View uko kwapararira chirwere chekorera panguya iyo hurumende ichiti iri kuda mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora achashandiswa mukurwisa nechirwere ichi. VaMnangagwa vatambirwa nemufaro mukuru nevatsigiri veZanu PF vanga vaungana pachipatara pamwe nevana vechikoro vanga vachibva kuchikoro pavaenda kunoona vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere chekorera mumusha unogara veruzhinji muGlen View. Vachitaura pazvitoro zveTichagarika zviri mumusha weGlen View mushure mekushanyira chipatara cheGlen View Polyclinic uko kuri kurapwa vanhu vakati kuti vari kurwara nechirwere chekorera, VaMnangagwa vati hurumende yavo ichabatsira kanzuru yeHarare mukutakurwa kwemarara, kugadzirwa kwepombi dzinotakura tsvina pamwe nekuwanisa vagari mvura yakachena kuitira kuti chirwere chekorera chipere muHarare uye chisarambe chichipararira kune dzimwe nzvimbo dziri kunze kweHarare. VaMnangagwa vakurudzirawo kuti veruzhinji vagare vakashambidzika pose pavari kuti vasatapurirane chirwere ichi. Meya weguta reHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, avo vanga varipowo pashanywa naVaMnangagwa, vati sekanzuru vari kuedza pose pavanogona napo kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira. VaGomba vati pane zvibhorani zviviri zvavatovhrara zviri muGlen View zvange zvave kukonzera kupararira kwechirwere chekorera. Mugari wekuGlen View, Amai Mascelyn Chibweya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara zvikuru kuti kanzuru iri kugadzira pombi idzo dzanga dzave kusanganisa mvura yekunwa pamwe netsvina kana kuti masuweji. Mumwe mugari wemuGlen View, VaJoe Kadzviti, vati zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvingadai zvakafa dai pasina kumhanyidzana kuri kuitwa nevemasangano akazvimirira, vemabhizimusi, kanzuru pamwe nehurumende mukurwisana nechirwere ichi icho chapfunya chisero muHarare. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vaparura homwe yavari kukumbira kuti izadzwe nemari neveruzhinji yakanangana nekurrwisa chirwere chekorera. VaNcube vati hurumende iri kuda mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhati emadhora ichashandiswa mukurwisa chirwere chekorera. Gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vanoti pane vanhu makumi matatu nevaviri vafa nechirwere chekorera kusvika pari nhasi uye huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi hwave kudzikira. Chirwere chekorera chakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina muna 2008. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuongororwa Ropa Kuti Vazive Pavamire paNyaya yeHIV/AIDS
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti kunyangwe hazvo Zimbabwe yakatora matanho okuti munhu wese awane rubatsiro rwekuwana mushonga wekurapa chirwere cheshuramatongo cheHIV/Aids kune vanhu vakawandisa vasati vave neruzivo maerarano nezvinhu zvinokonzera kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi. Imwe nyanzi munyaya dzehutano Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga vanoti chimwe chezvinhu chinonyanya kukonzera chirwere che HIV, kusangana pabonde pasina kushandisa zvekuzvidzivirira zvakaita semakondomu. Vanotiwo kana munhu akabaiwa netsono yambobaiwa munhu ane hutachiwana hweHIV kana kutemwa nyora nereza yambocheka munhu ane HIV/Aids zvinogona kuti munhu atapurirwe chirwere. Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti chirwere ichi chashungurudza mhuri dzakawanda asi Zimbabwe iri kuyedza kuwanira vanhu mushonga zvapa kuti zvinhu zvive nani. Vaenderera mberi vachitiwo zvinofadza kuti huwandu hwevanhu vari kurwara nechirwere ichi hwadzikira zvikuru kana zvichienzaniswa nezvaiitika mumakore apfuura. VaEmmanuel Gasa vekusangano reAids and Arts Foundation vakatsigira mashoko akataurwa naDr Chiripanyanga vachiti vanhu vazhinji havazive pavamire maererano nezvehutachiwana hweHIV. Muzvare Maria Munzvandi veku Dzivaresekwa vanove mumwe wevakadzi vanorarama nehutachiwana hweHIV vanoti munhu wese, zvikuru vari muwanano vanofanira kuvhenekwa kuti vazive pavamire marerano nezveHIV/Aids. Muzvare Munzvandi vanoti pane zvimwe zvinhu zvisingaburitswe pachena zvinokonzera kutapuriranwa kweHIV zvinova zvinhu zvinofanira kujekesera vanhu zvakanyanyisa. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Dr Fortune Nyasha Nyamande vanoti Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko rehurwere weHIV/Aids kunyangwe hazvo kwave nemishonga inokwanisa kuwedzera makore ekurarama kwevanhu vanorarama nehutachiwana uhwu. Dr Nyamande vanoti kuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba kuri kupa kuti hurongwa hwekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi hunetse. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwawo nemumwe anorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Muzvare Martha Tholana. Musi wa 1 Zvita ndiro zuva rinoyeuchidzwa vanhu nezvechirwere ichi, hurongwa uhu gore rino hwakairtirwa kuMucheke Stadium, Masvingo. Dingindira regore rino rakanangana nekukurudzira vanhu munharaudza dzavo kuti vataure nezvechirwere ichi kana kuti “Communities make the Difference.” No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vaviri Vofa neCovid-19 Kusanganisira Mumwe Mukuru weChikoro kuMasvingo
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu vaviri vafa nechirwere ichi. Munhu mumwe chete akafa kuManicaland neMasvingo. Bepanhau reThe Masvingo Mirror rinoti akashaya mudunhu iri mukuru wechikoro cheMukaro High Amai Pauline Dzapasi avo vakashaya neChishanu vakavigwa neSvondo. Varairidzi vose vapachikoro ichi vanzi vambondogara pavo voga pasina mhuri pachityirwa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Vana vechikoro avo vakavhara neChishanu vanziwo vari kuongororwa. Mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu reMasvingo Dr Amadeu Shamu vakatenda kuti Amai Dzapasi vakashaya mushure mekurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave mazana matatu nemakumi maviri kana kuti 320. Vanhu zana nemakumi manomwe nevana vabatwa nechirwere ichi nemusi weSvondo. Vakawanda vacho vari muHarare uye matunhu ose ane vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro kunze kwekuMashonaland West. Izvi zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga hwave pazvuru gumi nezviri zvine mazana matatu nemakumi maviri nemashanu kana kuti 12, 325. Vanhu pora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zvuru gumi zvine nemakumi maviri nevana kana kuti 10, 024 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu makumi mana vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vave churu chimwe chete chine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 1,981. Asi kunyangwe hazvo vanhu vari kurwara nekufa nechirwere ichi, mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbawe Nurses Association VaEnock Dongo vanoti hurumende haisi kuvapa zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19 zvopa kuti vakawanda vavo varware. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 2,4 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi mashanu nemasere zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri kana kuti 58,762. Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirowo rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nematanmhatu ane zvuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 76,7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu negumi nevanomwe kana kuti 317,000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe nezvuru mazana masere kana kuti 17,8 million. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1,6 million. Asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nematatu kana kuti 43 million.

headline: Madhokotera neVakoti Votanga Kuramwa Mabasa neKushaya Zvekuzvidzivirira kuCoronavirus
text: Vanachiremba navana mukoti munyika vatanga kuramwa mabasa kunyangwe nyika yatarisana nechirwere chouraya vanhu vakawanda pasi rose cheCoronavirus. Vanachiremba navanamukoti ava vanoti hurumende iri kukundikana kuvapa zvekushandisa kuti vazvidzivire kutapurirwa zvirwere zvakaita seCoronavirus. Mutsamba kubazi rezvehutano, iri mumaoko eStudio 7, vanamukoti kuburikidza nesangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association vati vakasuma bazi rezvehutano mazuva maviri apfuura kut vanoda zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCoronavirus, mvura muzvipatara uye mari yekushanda kwavachaita nguva yakareba vachirapa vane chirwere cheCoronavirus. Mutsamba kubazi rezvehutano nevakuru vezvipatara zvehurumende munyika, mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Tawanda Zvakada, vatiwo nhengo dzavo hadzichakwanise kuramba dzichishanda kutanga nhasi sezvo dzisina zvekuzvidzivirira. Vati vakaita musangano nehurumende neMuvhuro nezvenyaya iyi asi kusvika pari zvino hapana chabuda. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, kana munyori mubazi ravo, Dr Agnes Mahomva, sezvo vose vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Kusvika pari zvino hurumende inoti vanhu vatatu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus munyika uye mumwe chete, mutori wenhau, Zororo Makamba, akashaya vakavigwa neChipiri. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vatenda kuti vanoda zvikwanisiro muzvipatara nechimbi chimbi uye vakanda mapadza pasi.. No media source currently available

headline: Korera Inonzi Yauraya Vanhu Makumi Maviri neVasere muHarare Chete
text: Vanhu makumi maviri nevasere vanonzi vafa nechirwere chekorera kusvika pari zvino muguta reHarare chete, sekutaura kwevakafanobata chigaro chemukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Doctor Clemence Duri. Ukuwo bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwava kudarika zviuru zvina munyika yose. “Tiri kugutsikana nemafambiro ari kuita zvinhu nekuti vanhu vese vari kuisa misoro pamwe chete. Tiri kuedza kubata pamwe chete neshamwari dzedu nesuwo veHarare City Council tiri kuedza kuita zvatinogona,” Dr Duri vaudza Studio7. “Hongu, hatingagoni kuzviita zvese asi unonyatsona kuti vanhu vane chido chekuti chirwere ichi chipedzwe zvachose.” Dr Duri vanoti kunyange hazvo vachigutsikana nebasa riri kuitwa mukurwisana nechirwere ichi, vari kukumbira vanhu nemasangano ekunze kuti vabatsire mukurwisa chirwere ichi. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vakati veruzhinji vanofanirwawo kubatsira nemari yekurwisa chirwere ichi. Korera yagara ichinetsa muZimbabwe. Muna 1993 ku muna 2003, korera yakabatwa nevanhu vanodarika zviuru makumo manomwe. Muna 2008 vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina vakafa nechirwere ichi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti Zimbabwe ndiyo chete nyika yawirwa nedambudziko rekorera rakaipisisa kudarika dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji Vokurudzirwa Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vakawanda vabaiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 kuitira kuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nechirwere ichi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano uye vari mutungamiri wesangano reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners of Zimbabwe Association, Dr Johannes Marisa, vaudza Studio7 kuti kana vanhu vakawanda munyika vakabaiwa nhomba yeCovid -19, zvinoderedza njodzi yedenda iri iro ranetsa pasi rose. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vatiwo vanhu vakabaiwa vakawanda zvinoderedza kufamba kwechirwere ichi. VaMadzorera vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumnde izivisewo veruzhinji mashandiro ari kuita nhomba munyika vachiti izvi zvikazivikanwa neveruzhinji zvinobatsirawo mukuwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vanoenda kunobaiwa nhomba idzi. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvehutano sezvo takundikana kubata mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano , Doctor John Mangwiro, pamwe nemutauriri webazi iri, VaDonald Mujiri. Asi hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti Covid-19 yakauraya vanhu makumi maviri nevatanhatu nezuro, uye vanhu mazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vava zviuru zana negumi nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mashanunevasere(119 508), uye vafa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zvinanemakumi manomwe nevatatu, (4 073). Vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika yese vave pamamiriyoni mavirinezvuru gumi nezvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi mana(2 013340). Vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave miriyoni nezvuru zana nemakumi manomwe nezvipfumbamwe nemazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nevanomwe(1 179 687). No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe neDzimwe Nyika Dzozvipira Kuderedza Zvinosvibisa Mweya weKufema
text: Musangano wezvekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze wechimakumi maviri nenhanhatu kana kuti Cope26 wakapinda muzuva retatu nemusi weChitatu vatungamiri venyika dzakanyanya kutarisana nekuchinja kwemamiriro ekunze dzinoti Nigeria, Madagascar neBarbados vachitaura. Musangano unokokerwa neUnited Nations uyu uri kuitirwa kuGlasgow, Scotland. Asi neChipiri vatungamiri venyika zana vari kumusangano uyu kusanganisira VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaJoe Biden vekuAmerica, VaBoris Johnson, Britain vakatsidza kuzvipira kuti nyika dzavo dzidzikisa zvakanyanya zvinosvibisa mweya wekufema zvakaita semethane inobuda pakudhonza mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari, kutema miti nezvimwe. VaBiden vakavimbisa kudzikisa methane iyi nezvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana panosvika gore ra2030. Asi vakashora vatungamiri veChina neRussia nekusaenda kumusangano uyu. Nyanzvi mubazi rezvekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze kana kuti Climate Mitigation Department VaLawrence Mashungu vaudza Studio 7 kuti musangano uyu wakakosha zvikuru sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumiara zvakanaka nekuda kwekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vanodarika Mamiriyoni Matanhatu (6M) Vafa neCovid-19 Pasi Rose
text: Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 pasi rose inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matanhatu kana kuti 6 million vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva zvachatanga kupararira pasi rose muna 2019. MuAmerica chete vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe zvine makumi matanhatu nechimwe kana kuti 961 000 vafa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vasina kubayiwa nhomba vakawanda ndivo vari kunzi vari kufa zvakanyanya. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro vanhu mazana mashanu nemumwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kusanganisira vana vechikoro zana nemakumi matatu nevatanhatu. Vanhu makumi manomwe vanonzi vari kurwara neCovid-19 vari muzvipatara zvakasiyana siyana munyika. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro hakuna munhu akafa nechirwere cheCcovid-19 zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira munyika muna 2020 vachiri zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 5 399.

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vanofa neCOVID-19 paNguva Iyo Huwandu hweVari Kuwanikwa Vaine Denda Hwakwira
text: Bazi rezvehutano razivisa neChipiri mangwanani kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa neMuvhuro neCovid-19, uye huwandu hwevanhu vakawanikwa vaine denda iri Muvhuro wakare hwakakwira zvakanyanya kusvika pazviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu nevashanu, kana kuti 2 555. Izvi zvakasiya vanhu vafa neCovid-19 vave pazviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi matatu, kana kuti 4 713, kuchitiwo vanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 kubva patanga chirwere ichi munyika vakasvika pazviuru zana nemakumi mana nechimwe namazana matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 141 601. Vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi masere nezvitatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevashanu, kana kuti 3,882 255 vakanga vabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira COVID-19 pakupera kwezuva neMuvhuro. Vamwe mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezviviri zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevatanhatu, kana kuti 2,892 366, vakanga vabaiwawo nhomba yepiri sezvinokurudzirwa. Huwandu hwevanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19 uhwu huri kukwira kubva pamazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevatatu, kana kuti 523, vakawanikwa vaine denda iri nemusi weSvondo, kuchitiwo neMugovera vanhu chiuru nemakumi masere nevaviri, kana kuti 1 082, vakawanikwawo vaine Covid-19. Hurumende yakazivisa svondo rapera kuti hutachiwana hweOmicron hwakanga hwawanikwa munyika pavanhu makumi mashanu vakavhenekwa kuMasvingo. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira hutano hwakanaka munharaunda, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti havasi kushamisika nekukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19 mazuvano sezvo paine kuvarairwa kweveruzhinji kwakanyanya. VaRusike vanoti nekupinda munyika kwehutachiwana hweOmicron, veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuramba vachitevedzera nzira dzekudzivirira nadzo kupararira kweCovid-19, dzakaita sekugeza maoko, kupfeka mamasiki, kugara madaranganwa pamwe nekusaenda munzvimbo dzakawanda vanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Voteerera Kurudziro yeHurumende yeKufamba Vakapfeka "maMask"
text: Vanhu vakawanda vateerera kurudziro yemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa yekuti vapfeke zvidziviriro ka kuti mamask asi vamwe vachishora hurumende nekutadza kuvapa zvinhu izvi pachena sezvinoitwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika munguva yesarudzo zvekupa vanhu nhumbi. Amai Sithembile Kawocha avo vanga vakavhara muromo nemhuno yavo nedhuku ravo rakasakara vanoti kupfeka mask chinhu chakanaka mukudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiona hwecoronavirus asi vanoti hurumende ingadai yakapa vanhu vose mamask aya pachena. Amai Kawocha avo vanoita basa rekutenga nekutengesa vanoti havana mari yekutenga chidziviriro chinokurudzirwa navanachiremba sezvo vasiri kuenda kubasa. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi Amai Tafadzwa Karonga. VaMunesu Munesu vanoti zvidziviriro zvinokurudzirwa zviri kudhura nekudaro vakagadzira chavo vega. VaMunesu vanoti vanhu havafanirwe kupfekera mapurisa asi kuchengetedza hutano hwavo. Kurudziro yekuti vanhu vapfeke mamask yakabva yaita kuti mitengo yacho ikwire zvakanyanya. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti mamask ari kutengeswa nemari inobva padhora rimwechete kusvika pamadhora mashanu ekuAmerica. VaJeremiah Maruza vanoti chimwe chiri kunetsa ndechekuti mamaski haasi kuwanikwa uye paanowanikwa anenge achidhurira vakawanda. Vamwe vanhu vanoti mari dzemafaindi kune munhu anowanikwa asina kupfeka mask iyo inobva pamadhora mazana mashanu kusvika pamadhora zvuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu-ZWL$36 000-kana kugara mujeri kwegore kana kuti faindi nekugara mujeri yakawandisa. Mutori wenhau webepa reMirrior VaDennis Kagonye vanoti kupfeka masiki kwakanaka zvikuru asi vanoti mutongo wekusapfeka masiki wakanyanya. Gweta reMISA Zimbabwe Muzvare Nompilo Simanje vanoti mutemo uyu hauna kunyatsojeka uye unogona kuisa vanhu munjodzi. Vanotiwo Zimbabwe inokoshesa zvemitemo inoomesera vanhu kwete kushanda navo kuti vagadzirise matambudziko avanenge vatarisana nawo. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti mutongo wakatarwa nehurumende wakanyanya vachiti hurumende inenge yave kuda kutsvaka mari sezvo dzemitero dzave shoma panguva ino yekuti vanhu vari kunzi vagare mudzimba. Dr Madzorera vanoti mamask anonyanya kushanda kana munhu wese akaapfeka . Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidzawo kuti mapurisa anga asinei nevanhu vanga vasina kupfeka mamasiki mumaguta. Vamwe vezvitoro zvikuru zvakaita seOK, TM, Gain neMetro Peech vanga vasinga bvumire vanhu vanga vasina mamask kupinda muzvitoro zvavo asi change chichishamisa ndechekuti vatengi vange vachizobvisa mamask kana vave mukati vachitenga. Vashandi vemuzvitoro vange vakabvisawo mamask avo. Hurumende yakawedzera mazuva ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba nemasvondo maviri kusvika musi wa17 Chivabvu ichibva yaisa mitemo inosanganisira kupfekwa kwemamask nemunhu wese anenge achifamba paruzhinji. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vashanu Vofa neCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChishanu kuti vanhu vashanu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemumwe kana kuti 1, 501. Vanhu makumi mana nevasere kana kuti 48 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru makumi matatu nematanhatu ane makumi namomwe nemumwe kana kuti 36, 471. Vanhu gumi nevashanu kana kuti 15 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvichireva kuti vapora kubva zvatanga chirwere ichi kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nemana ane gumi nemumwe kana kuti 34 011. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 959. Zvichakadaro, huwandu hwevashandi vemuzvipatara nevamwe vanoita mabasa anopa kuti vasangane neveruzhinji kusanganisira vatori venhau nevanochengetedza majeri vabayiwa nhomba yeSinopharm yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina hwasvika pazviuru makumi matatatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 36, 359. Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vanoti chinangwa chehurumende ndechekuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi vabayiwe nhomba kuti inyatsoshanda. Pasi Rose Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti kuti 532, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 29 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 2,6 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemanomwe zvine zviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 67,5 million. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kufa neKorera Huri Kuramba Huchikwira
text: Hurumende inoti hwuwandu hwevanhu vafa nevari kubatwa nechirwere chekorera huri kuramba huchikwira. Gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vakati vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu vanga vafa nechirwere chekorera. VaMoyo vakatiwo huwandu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pavanhu zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe ane makumi matanhatu nevana. VaMoyo vakataura mashoko aya nezuro apo vakange vachitambira rubatsiro rwekurwisa chirwere chekorera. VaMoyo vakati kunyange hazvo huwandu uhwu huri kukwirira, vane tarisiro yekuti hudzike munguva shoma shoma iri kutevera sezvo hurumende iri kutora matanho akasiyana siyana kupedza chirwere ichi. VaMoyo vakatiwo hurumende iri kumisa kutengeswa kwezvinhu mumigwagwa muguta reHarare rese. Hurumende inoti iri kushanda pamwe chete nemakanzuru kuendesa mvura yakachena kunzvimbo dzine dambudziko rechirwere chekorera. Kambani yenharembozha yeEconet yapa rubatsiro rwemamiriyoni gumi emadhora, ukuwo Lotto pasi pe President’s Fund yapawo rubatsiro rwezana rezviuru zvemadhora. Mari iyi ichashandiswa mukurwisa korera. Kambani yedzimotokari yeQuest yapawo bazi rezveutano rhori yekubatsira mukurwisa chirwere chekorera. No media source currently available

headline: WHO Inoti Haisati Yatambira Nhomba dzeCovid-19 Dziri Kushandiswa muZimbabwe
text: Sangano reWorld Health Organisation, WHO,rinoti nhomba dziri kushandiswa muZimbabwe dzakagadzirwa kuChina hadzisati dzatambirwa nesangano iri zviri [amuteno kuitira kuti dzishandiswe neveruzhinji mukudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19. WHO inoti ichiri kuongorora nhomba mbiri idzi dzeSinovac neSinopharm. Mumiriri weWHO muZimbabwe, Dr Alex Gasasira, vati nhomba dzekuChina dzeSinovac neSinopharm dzave padanho repamusoro soro mukuongororwa, uye vanotarisira kuti panopera mwedzi uno waKubvumbi, WHO inenge yapedza kuongorora nhomba idzi. Mashoko aVaGasasira anoburitsa pachena kuti nhomba dzeSinovac neSinopharm dziri kushandiswa munyika, hadzisati dzapihwa chitambi neWHO kuti dzishandiswe neveruzhinji. Vachipindura mubvunzo weStudio7 wekuti zvinhu zvinotarisirwa here kuti nyika dzishandise nhomba dzisati dzakomekedzwa neWHO, VaGasasira vati sesangano vanokurudzira masangano anotarisa mishonga munyika dzakasiyana siyana kuti aongorore nhomba idzi dzisati dzashandiswa kune veruzhinji. VaGasasira vati sangano rinoongorora nekubvumidza mishonga munyika reMedicine Control Authority of Zimbabwe, MCAZ, rakati rakatarisa nhomba idzi rikagutsikana kuti dzakanakira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. VaGasasira vatiwo Zimbabwe hasi iyo yega nyika iri kushandisa nhomba dzekuChina idzi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuMCAZ kuti yakaita ongororo yayo riini, uye kuti zviyi zvakabuda muongororo iyi. Zimbabwe pari zvino iri kushandisa nhomba mbiri dzekuChina, yeSinovac neSinopharm Nhomba dzekuChina idzi dzinonzi dzaita mitauro kune dzimwe nyika kunyanya nhomba yeSinovac inonzi dziviriro yayo yakaderera pane zvaive zvataurwa neChina. Asi mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira madhokotera anoshanda akazvimiririra, Dr Johannes Marisa, vaudza Studio7 kuti kana nhomba ichidzivirira nezvikamu zvinopfuura makumi mashanu, chinhu chakakosha mukudzivirira ndufu nezvikamu izvozvo. VaMarisa vatiwo kana vanhu vakabaiwa pamwe nekutevedzera zvinokurudzirwa, zvekupfeka mamasiki, kusaungana nekugeza maoko zvinobatsira mukurwisa chirwere ichi. VaMarisa vatiwo mimwe mishonga inodzi ine dziviriro iri pamusoro inonetsa kushandisa nekuda kwezvinodiwa pakuichengetedza. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano uye vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano, VaHenry Madzorera, vati chakanyanyokosha pari zvino kuti Zimbabwe iite tsvagiridzo yayo yekuona kuti nhomba idzi dziri kushanda zvakadii munyika. VaMadzorera vati hapana change chakaipa mukusanobaya vanhu nhomba idzi, vakati vanhu vapiwa nhomba iyi munyika vawanda zvekuti hurumende ine mukana wekuchiongorora kuti iri kushanda zvakanaka here. VaMadzorera vati mashandiro enhomba anosiyana siyana, uye hapana chakaipa mukumira kushandisa nhomba idzi kana zvaonekwa kuti hadzisi kushanda zvakanaka. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kudivi rebazi rezvehutano nezvenyaya yenhomba dzekuChina. Asi vachitaura pakasvika nhomba yekutanga munyika, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, VaJohn Mangwiro, vakati zvimwe zvinotariswa neZimbabwe panhomba, machengeterwo enhomba idzi vakapa muenzaniso wenhomba yeSinopharm iyo vakati iri nyore kuchengeta munyika sezvo zvikwanisiro zvaidiwa zvakagara zviripo munyika. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti Zimbabwe imwe yenyika dzemuSADC dziri pamusoro mukushandisa nhomba dzakagadzirwa kuChina. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vekuMabvuku-Tafara Vochenesa Misha neKutsvaira Marara
text: Nekuona dambudziko remarara aita makomo nemakomo, kanzuru yeguta reHarare isiri kukwanisa kuatakura, vagari vekuMabvuku neTafara vari kutarisirwa kuchenesa musha wavo neChitatu kuburikidza nekutsvaira pamwe nekuchengetedza marara. Mumwe wevari kutungamira hurongwa uhwu, uye vari kanzura weWard 21, VaBarnabas Ndira, vanoti vachabatana nekambani inogadzira simende yeLafarge Cement Zimbabwe Limited, iyo yaizivakanwa kare seCirlce Cement, pamwe nekanzuru yeguta reHarare. VaNdira vanoti vagari vachapa simba ravo, kambani yeLafarge Cement Zimbabwe Limited yopawo zvekushandisa zvakaita sembatya dzinodzivirira tsvina pamwe nemabhini ekuisira marara, kanzuru ichizobatsirawo nemotokari dzekutakurisa marara aya. Kanzuru yeHarare iri kutatarika kuti ikwanise kutakura marara munzvimbo dzakawanda, izvo zvave kupa kuti vagari vaite hurongwa hwekuchenesa nzvimbo dzavo voga. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata vekambani yeLafarge Cement Zimbabwe Limited kanawo kanzuru kuti tinzwewo kubva kwavari. Asi Kanzura Ndira vanoti aka hakasi kekutanga kuti vabatane nevamwe mukushambidza musha wavo. “Mwedzi yapera iyi taibatana nevakaita sevedzichechi pamwe nemasangano evagari anoti reCombined Harare Residents Association neHarare Residents Trust. Mwedzi wapera tabatana neAnglican Church, saka aka hakasi kekutanga uye kupedzisira,” vanodaro VaNdira, vanova munin'ina wamuchakabvu Tonderai Ndira, avo vakapondwa munguva yemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika muna 2008. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yobatana neDzimwe Nyika Kucherechedza Zuva reChirwere cheShuga
text: Zuva reWorld Diabetes Day rakacherechedzwa nemusi weChitatu, vamwe vanhu vanorarama nechirwere ichi –pamwe nezvimwe zvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe- vakatarisana nedambudziko guru rekutadza kuwana mishonga nekuda kwekushaya mari yekunze inodiwa pakutenga mishonga iyi. Susan Mpofu anochengeta mai vake vakura uye vave nenguva vaine chirwere chediabetes anoti mumasvondo mashoma apfuura, amai vake vakambofenda vakazomuka mushure menguva inosvika awa rimwe chete nekuda kwekuti vaive vave nemazuva maviri vasina kumwa mapiritsi avanofanirwa kumwa nekuda kwekuti vaive vashaya mari yemadhora ekuAmerica anodiwa nezvitoro zvinotengesa mishonga. Amai Charity Ndisengei ndemumwewo wevanhu vakawanda munyika vari kurarama nechirwere chediabetes icho vakabatwa mugore ra1995. Amai Ndisengei vanoti mumakore ose apfuura vange vasina dambudziko rekuwana mapirirtsi avanofanirwa kumwa, asi pari zvino ivo nevamwe vakaita saivo vave panjodzi yekurasikirwa nehupenyu nekuda kwekudhurirwa nemishonga. Chirwere chediabetes icho chinoziikanwa nevakawanda chichinzi chirwere cheshuga, chinokonzera kushomeka kana kuwanda kweshuga mumuviri izvo zvinogona kuuraya. Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya vanobvuma kuti nekuda kwemariro ezvinhu munyika, vanhu vane zvirwere zvakaita sediabetes vakatarisana nedambudziko guru sezvo vane zvirwere izvi vachifanirwa kuwana mishonga kwehupenyu hwavo hwose. Dr Ngwenya vanotiwo zuva reWorld Diabetes Day rakakosha nekuti rinobatsira kuti vanhu vawane ruzivo pamusoro pechirwere ichi. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kusangano reZimbabwe Diabetics Association pamusoro pehuwandu hwevanhu vane chirwere chediabetes munyika. Asi gwaro rinonzi World Health Organisation kana kuti WHO Non-communicable Diseases Progress Monitor regore ra2017 rinoratidza kuti vanhu zviuru makumi mana, zvinove zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana, vakafa nekuda kwezvirwere zvisingatapurirranwe kusanganisira diabetes. Gwaro iri rinoratidzawo kuti pamatanho anotarisirwa neWHO kuti atorwe pakudzivirira zvirwere zvisingatapurirane huruemende iri kusarira kumashure pane zvakawanda. Chiremba Dr Rutendo Bonde vanoti hurumende ine mitemo ine matanho akanaka anoratidza zvose zvinofanirwa kuitwa pakudzivirira diabetes nezvimwe zvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe. Asi vati chinonetsa ndechekuti zvinhu izvi hazvizotevedzerwi. Dr Bonde vanotiwo chirwere chediabetes chikasarapwa chinokonzera zvimwe zvirwere zvakawanda vachiti zviri nani kuti vanhu vawane mishonga yakafanira pane kuzoedza kurapa zvimwe zvirwere zvakawanda. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano Dr John Mangwiro avo vaimbova sachigaro weZimbabwe Diabetics Association vari kutora hutungamiri hwechikamu cheAfrica cheInternational Diabetes Association kutanga kwegore rinouya. Dr Mangwiro vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti Zimbabwe iri kusarira kumashure panyaya yekurapwa kwediabetese vachiti hurumende yakapedzisira kuita ongororo yemamiriro echirwere ichi munyika mugore ra2005. Asi vati bazi ravo riri kuita zvose zvakafanira kusanganisira kuita kuti zvive nyore kuti vanhu vawane mishonga yavanofanirwa kuwana. Zuva reWorld Diabetes Day rinocherechedzwa musi waMbudzi 14 gore rega rega pasi pehurongwa hwesangano reInternational Diabetes Association rakabatana neWHO.

headline: Vakawanda Votadza Kutevedzera Mitemo Yakaturwa naVaChiwenga yeKudzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19
text: Nzvimbo dzakawanda munyika dzakapinda muzuva repiri neChipiri dzichitevera mitemo yakadzikwa nehurumende kuyedza kumisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Asi kune mamwe madhorobha akaita seKwekwe, Kariba neKaroi, mitemo iriko yakati omei sezvo kuri kunzi kune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Mitemo mitsva inobata mamwe matunhu ose munyika yakaziviswa kuvatori venhau nemusi weMugovera kuti vave kusimbaradza mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Mitemo yehurumende yekuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 cheCovid-19 iri kutambirwa zvakasiyana munyika. Kunzvimbo dzakaita seKaroi mutauriri wemapurisa Chief Superintendent Helena Mahonde vaudza bepanhau reNew Zimbabwe.com kuti vamwe vagari vemunzvimbo iyi vave kunonwira doro kudzimba vakawanda mumashabhini. Superintendent Mahonde vanoti vanhu vakawanda vakasungwa nekutyora mitemo yeCovid-19. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyath vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti zvinonetsa parizvino kuti vanyatsoziva kuti vanhu vari kutevedzera here kana kuti kwete mitemo mitsva yakaturwa nehurumende vachiti zvinotoda svondo rose. Asi mapurisa akazivisa neMuvhuro kuti achange achifamba famba kuona kuti vanhu havasi kuungana vakawanda. Ongororo yakaitwa neStudio 7 neMuvhuro neChipiri inoratidzawo kuti vanhu vachiri kuramba vakaungana zvikuru panzvimbo dzinokwirirwa mabhazi eZUPCO sezvo achiri mashoma. Mutungamiri wesangano rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Goliati avo vari kuKwekwe vatendawo muhurukuro neStudio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Vati vemabhazi havasi kutevedzera kurudziro yekuti vatakure vanhu vashoma. KuKariba zvinhu hazvinawo kumira zvakanaka sezvo kirinika yeNyamhunga yakambovharwa kuti ifiritwe mushonga mushure mekunge mumwe anorapa vanhu abatwa nechirwere ichi. Mutauriri wesangano reKariba Urban Residents Association VaSamson Coffee vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti kutevedzera mitemo yeCovid-19 kuri kunetsa mudhorobha iri. KuMasvingo hurumende yakazivisa kuti yange isisatendere vanhu kupinda kana kubuda paMorgenster Teachers College pane vari kudzidzira hurairidzi makumi matanhatu nevatatu vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Vamwe vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa vakaita saAmai Amber Zhou vemuHarare vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kutya kuti vachamanikidzwa kugara kumba kana vanhu vakawanda vakaramba vachibatwa nechirwere ichi. Vachitaurawo neStudio 7 mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaDoubt Phiri vachemachema nekudzokawo zvakanyanya kwechirwere cheCovid-19 vachiti zvichakonzera kuti vanhu vatadze zvakare kushandira mhuri dzavo. Mukuru weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, Doctor Tinashe Manzungu vatiwo chirwere cheCovid -19 chiri kuramba chichiomesera vemabhizimisi zvakanyanya. Asiwo vatenda kuti zvakatarwa negurukota rezvehutano vhiki rapera hazvina kunyanyoomera vemabhizimusi sezvo pachine mukana wekuti mabhizimusi anoramba akavhurwa. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira madhokotera anoshanda akazvimiririra, reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners of Zimbabwe Association Dr Johannes Marisa vanoti matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende ekurambidza zvinhu zvakadai semagungano akanaka zvikuru vachiti huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa huri kuramba huchiwedzera. VaMarisa vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende idzivirire kupararira kwechirwere ichi vakati matanho akatorwa aya anodzivirira ndufu nehurwere hwakanyanya. Pamusoro pekurambidza magungano ese kusara kwerufu panofanira kunge paine vanhu makumi matatu, VaChiwenga vakatiwo hurumende ichawedzera kuongororwa kwehutachiona hweCovid-19 kuteverera vavanenge vasangana navo. Vanotengesa zvinhu pamisika yefodya vakanzi vambomira kuita izv. Vose vanopinda nepamiganhu yenyika vachange vachiongororwa zvikuru vanenge vachibva kunyika dzorura chirwere ichi dzakaita seIndia neBrazil.

headline: Danho reHurumende reKumira Kubaya Nhomba yeCovid-19 Yetatau Parizvino Rotambirwa neImwe Nyanzvi
text: Vaimbova mukuru wechipatara cheChitungwiza Dr Enoch Mayida vanoti vanowirira nedanho rehurumende rekuti pari zvino imbosimbaradza hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba dzeCovid-19 mbiri pasati pabayiwa nhomba nhatu sezvave kuitwa kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita seAmerica. Nyika dzakabudirira dziri kubaya nhomba yetatu kune vakwegura nevanoshanda muzvipata sezvo zviri kunzi zvinobatsira masoja emuviri. Dr Mayida vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotenderabna nezvakataurwa panhepfenyuro ino nemukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 Dr Agnes Mahomva kuti vakoshese kubaya vanhu nhomba kaviri parizvino. No media source currently available Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri negumi nevana zvine mazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemanomwe kana kuti 3 214, 477 vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kekutanga. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwea vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemaviri zvine mazana masere nemakumi mashanu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 2, 472, 859. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshande sezvinotarisirwa. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vaviri vakafa neMugovera nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 4, 657. Vanhu makumi mana nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nemaviri zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nematatu kana kuti 132,333.

headline: Zimbabwe Yova Nyika Yekutanga muAfrica Kubaya Vanhu Jekiseni reMushonga weHIV/AIDS
text: Zimbabwe nemusi weChina yakabatana nedzimwe nyika mukucherechedza World Aids Day vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS vachiti pane zvichiri kuda kugadziriswa kuti Zimbabwe izadzise donzvo rekupedza denda iri panozosvika 2030 . Zimbabwe ndiyo nyika yekutanga muAfrica kushandisa mushonga wejekiseni rekudzikisa hukasha hwechirwere cheHIV rinonzi cabotegravir uye nyanzvi dzinoti iri kuita zviri nani kurwisa denda iri kudarika nyika dzakawanda. Dunhu reSADC ndiro rine vanhu vakawanda vane chirwere ichi pasi rose zvikuru muSouth Africa. Vachitaura kumhemberero dzaitwa kuMarondera kuRudhaka Stadium nhasi mukuru weNational Aids Council, Doctor Bernard Madzima vatiwo zvakakosha kuti munhu wese akwanise kuwana rubatsiro kana ane chirwere cheHIV/AIDS vachiti izvi ndizvo zvinobatsira nyika kuti ikwanise kuzadzikisa chiga chekuderedza nekupedza kupararira kwehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Vachitaura neStudio 7 Amai Martha Tholanah vave nemakore makumi maviri nerimwe vachirarama nehutachiona hweHIV/ AIDS vati Zimbabwe inofanirwa kugadzirisa matambudziko akadai sehurombo nemhirizhonga yekushungurudzwa kwevana vadIko pabonde mukuedza kuzadzikisa tarisiro yekupedza kupararira kwehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS. Amai Tholanah vatiwo mapiritsi anoshandiswa nevanorarama neHIV/AIDS anogona kukonzerawo mamwe matambudziko nekudaro zvakakosha kuti nyika iise zvirongwa zvinoita kuti vanorarama nehutachiona vaongororwe pachena nguva nenguva zvinhu zvakadai sechiropa neitsvo . Mumwezve anorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Pastor Maxwell Kapachawo vati kupedza dambudziko rekupararira kwehutachiona zvakakosha kuti nyika igadzirise matambudziko arimunyaya dzezvehutano. Amai Olive Thabeni mukuru werimwe sangano rinoshanda nevanorarama neHIV/AIDS reLife Empowerment Support Organisation vati zvakakosha kuti vanhu vanorarama nechirwere ichi vabatsirwe kudzivirira zvimwe zvirwere zvakadai segomarara rechibereko pachena . Zuva reWorld Aids Day rinocherechedzwa musi wa1Zvita gore negore richishandiswa sezuva rekurangarira avo vakashaya ne kuda kwechirwere cheAIDS pamwe nekuyeuchidzana nezvechirwere ichi. Zuva iri rakatanga kucherechedzwa muna 1988 zvakurudzirwa nesangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation. Dingindira regore rino ririkukurudzira kuti munhu wese anorarama nehutachiona awane kubatsirika zvisinei nechimiro chake. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vobatwa neZvirwere Zvesiki neZvimwe
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nezvirwere zvepabonde hwadzikira nezvikamu makumi matanhatu nezvina kubva muzana, mukati memakore gumi nemashanu apfuura, zvirwere izvi zvichakawanda munyika uye zviri kunyanyobata vanhu vane makore makumi maviri nemashanu kusvika pamakore makumi mana nemapfumbamwe. Vachitaura pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvirwere zvepabonde nerurindi, munyika pamwe nezviri kukonzera zvirwere izvi, kukomimiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, vati munyika mune zvirwere zvapabonde zvakawanda zvakaita seGonorrhea neSyphlis neHIV. Vatiwo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cherurindi hwakadzikiria zvichitevera kudzikira kubatwa kuri kuitwa vanhu nehutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvepaponde mubazi iri, Dr Tsitsi Appolo, vati huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nezvirwere izvi hwakawandira kumatunhu eMidlands neMashonaland West. Vati mumatunhu aya zvirwere izvi zvakawandira munzvimbo dzinoitwa zvekuchera goridhe uko kune vanhu vakawanda. Dr Appollo vanoti humbowo hunoratidza kuti munhu mumwe chete pa vanhu vashanu anenge aine chimwe chirwere chapabonde anenge aine hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS. Vatiwo zvakaonekwa kuti pavanhu gumi vanobatwa nezviwere zvepabonde mumwe chete anenge akambobatwa nechirwere ichi. Vati mekuda kwaizvo vari kuita zvirongwa zvekuona kuti vanhu vanogara munzvimbo dzinobatwa vanhu vakakwanda nechirwre ichi vaongororwa kuti havana zvirwere izvi here, kuvakurudzira kushandisa makondomu pamwe nekushandisa nzira dzepabonde dzisingaparadzire zvirwere. Vazhinji vari kubatwa nezvirwere zvepabonde, vachairi vemotakari hombe kana kumagonyeti, vanorarama nekutengesa bonde, varume vanorara nevamwe varume pamwe nevanofamba muzvimbodzinocherwa goridhe nezvimwe kana kuti maArtisinal miners. Dr Appollo vati pakaita dambudziko pakuendesa makondomu munzvimbo zhinji munyika muna 2018, 2019 pamwe negore rino izvo zvakaitawo kuti vakawanda vabatwe nezvirwere zvepabonde. Vati bazi ravo rine hurongwa hwekurapa zvirwere zvakaita seSyphilis, pamwe nekuti vana vasatapurirwe hutachiwana hweHIV nanamai vavo. Vatiwo munhu wega wega anenge aine chirwere chepadone aakenda kuchipatara kana kirinika anobva aongororwa kuti haana hutachiwana hweHIV here. Asi vati pari zvino nyika haina mishonga yakakwana yekurapa maSTIs uye zvakakosha kuti paramende ione kuti vapihwa mari inokwana kutenga mishonga iyi. Munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvakakosha kuti hurumende ikoshese nyaya dzehutano pamwe nekugadzira hupfumi kuti vanhu vawane mabasa vaswera vachikorokoza. Vatiwo mishonga inofanira kuwanikwa muzvipatara kuitira kuti vange vaine zvirwere varapwe. Dr Mangwiro vati pane mimwe mishonga yave kutadza kurapa maSTIs uye vave kuongorora mishonga iyi kuti vaone kuti inokodzera here kuti varambe vachiishandisa. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa chekuChina Hachina Kufa neCoronavirus:Wilkins Hospital
text: Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare Dr Prosper Chonzi varamba mashoko ekuti munyika mune chizvarwa chekuChina chakafa nechirwere checoronavirus. Dr Chonzi vati ongororo yavakaita yakaratidza kuti chainge chisina chirwere ichi. Chizvarwa chekuChina chechidzimai ichi chakatanga kurwara chiri kwaMutare chichibva chaenda kuna chiremba wacho wekuChina uyo akati chiende kuWest End Clinic. Asi vanachiremba pachipatara apa vakabva varamba kumuona vachibva vati aendeswe kuWilkins Hospital uko akafa ari munzira. Dr Chonzi vanoti kune chimwe chizvarwa chekuItaly chakaendeswa kuchipatara ichi chichiti chairwara asi chakazonzi hachinawo chirwere ichi. Vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu vafa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose uye muAfrica chiri kuSouth Africa, Nigeria, Algeria neEgypt. Vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vanodarika chiuru zana. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Yokumbira Musangano neZEC
text: Mubatanidzwa unopikisa weMDC Alliance wanyora tsamba kuZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC uchikumbira kuita musangano nekomisheni iyi kuti vazeye nyaya dziri kunetsa dzakanangana nesarudzo, idzo dzasarirwa nemazuva makumi maviri nemashanu chete. Mutsamba yanyorwa naVaJameson Timba, avo vari kumiririra vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika vakamirira MDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa kuZEC, mubatanidzwa uyu unoti uri kuda kuona gwaro richashandiswa pakuvhota uye kuti richachengetedzwa kupi. Mumashoko avo, VaTimba vanotiwo vanodawo gwaro revavhoti rine mifananidzo re Biometric Voter Registration. Sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vanoti vakagadzirira kuita musangano nemapato ose ari kukwikwidza musarudzo kuti vazeye zvichemo zvavo. VaChamisa vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vanoti vanyorerarawo kuvatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC neAfrican Union nezvemamiriro akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaMaxwell Saungweme vanoti zvichemo zvine mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance zvakakosha asi hapachina nguva yekuti zvigadziriswe sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. No media source currently available

headline: VaMushowe Vanokundikana Zvakare Kumira Pamberi peKomiti yeParamende
text: Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaChristopher Mushowe, neChina vatadza zvekare kuuya kukomiti yeparamende kuti vazotaura matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende mukugadzirisa mitemo inombunyikidza vatori venhau pamwe nekusunungura masai sai ematerevhizheni. Nhengo dzeparamende kubva kubato rinopikisa pamwe nemasangano anomirira vatori venhau varatidza kutsamwa kukuru nenamaitiro aVaMushowe avo vakatadza kuuya kudare iri svondo rapera mushure mekunge vakokwa nekomiti yeparamende. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, uye vachimirira Mabvuku, VaJames Maridadi veMDC-T, vati kuita kwaVaMushowe kuri kudzorera shure nyaya dzekugadzirisa mitemo inombunyikidza vatapi venhau. Mukuru wesangano rinomiriria nhepfenyuro dzemumatunhu, reZimbabwe Association of Community Radio Stations, Muzvare Vivian Marara, vatiwo zvinoratidza kuti VaMushowe havana chido chekusandura mutemo yekutapwa kwenhau munyika. Muzvare Kholiwe Majama Nyoni veMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe vashorawo kuita kwaVaMushowe. Vatiwo komiti yeparamende iyi haifaniri kurega VaMushowe vachiita madiro aJojina uye inofanira kutora matanho akaoma kuti VaMushowe vauye kudare iri. Vanoona nzvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano Media Alliance of Zimbabwe, VaNigel Nyamutumbu, vati kunyange hazvo vasiri kufara nemaitiro aVaMushowe, vanoonawo sekuti komiti yeparamende iyi haisi kuita basa rayo nemazvo. Pavabvunzwa kuti vachaita sei naVaMushowe, sachigaro wekomiti iyi, VaWilliam Dhewa, vati VaMushowe vabatikana uye vanofanira kupihwa nguva. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMushowe kuti tinzwe kuti sei vari kutadza kuuya kuparamende. Kunyange hazvo mamwe mapazi ehurumende ari kuunza mabhiri kuparamande kuti mitemo iri pasi pawo isaundurwe kuti ifambirane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika, bazi raVaMushowe harina kana bhiri rarakaunza kudare kubva muna 2013 pakagadzwa bumbiro idzva. VaMushowe vange vachitarisirwa kuti taura kuti mitemo yakaita seAccess to Information and Protection of Privacy Act, Broadcasting Services Act nemimwe ichasandurwa riini. VaMushowe vange vachitarisirwawo kutsanangura kuti sei marezenezi eCapitalk neNyaminyami ayo akapihwa kukambani yeKingstons ave kushandiswa nekambani yeZimpapers. Masangano anomiriria vatori venhau azivisa kuti achaita musangano wechimbi chimbi kuti aronge kuti angaite sei naVaMushowe. Zvichakadai, komiti iyi svondo rinouya ichashanyira nhepfenyuro dzose ichiona kuti dziri kushanda sei. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaMwonzora, Votarisirwa Kuita Musangano kuZimbabwe Grounds neVatsigiri Vavo neSvondo
text: Mutungamiri wechimwe chikwata che MDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vari kutarisirwa neSvondo kuita musangano mukuru munhandare yeZimbabwe Grounds mumusha weHighfields wekutsvagira nhengo dzavo rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzema by-election dziri kuitwa mwedzi uno. Mutauriri waVaMwonzora, VaLloyd Damba, vanoti vanotarisira kuti vatsigiri vavo vachabuda nehuwandu hwavo kuenda kumusangano uyu, vachiti havatarisire kuti vangarambidzwa nemapurisa kuunga sezvakamboitika kuEpworth. Panyaya yekuti vanotarisira vanhu vakawanda here misangano yanga ichimboitwa naVaMwonzora yaipindwa nevanhu vashomashoma, vadamba vanoti vanhu havafanirwi kufananidza misangano yaiitirwa mudzimba nemuzvikoro nemusangano mukuru we rally, sezvo zvakatosiyana zvachose. No media source currently available

headline: America Inobudisa Gwaro Rinoshora Kutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu muZimbabwe
text: Bazi re America rionoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, re State Department, rabudisa gwaro pamusoro pekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kwarinoti kuri kuitwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Gwaro iri, kana kuti Zimbabwe 2020 Human Rights Report, rine mapeji makumi mana nemapfumbamwe (49), uye rinobva muongororo yakaitwa muna 2020. Bazi re State Department rinoti hurumende mu Zimbabwe inouraya vanhu pamusoro pezvamatongerwo enyika, inotsakatikisa vanhu, kutocha vanhu nekusabata vasungwa zvakanaka. Gwaro iri rinoshoravo majeri emunyika, pamwe chete nekushora mabatirwo anoitwa ngochani mu Zimbabwe. Tatadza kubata vanoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, uye vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vati hurumende ye Zimbabwe haifanirwi kumirira kunzwa zvinobva kunze kwenyika, vachiti kana hurumende ikaterera pose panochema vana ve Zimbabwe, haizotyori kodzero dzavo nekuti inenge yave kuziva zvisingadiwi nevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeParamende Dzinotora Mhiko Dzichivimbisa Kushandira Zvido zveVanhu
text: Nhengo dzeparamende dzakakunda musarudzo dzegore rino nhasi dzatora mhiko yekutanga basa dzichivimbisa kuti dzichadzika mitemo inosimudzira magariro everuzhinji munyika pamwe nekuvandudza mitemo yese kuitira kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Nhengo zhinji dzeparamende dzaudza Studio7 kuti dzinofara chose nekusarudzwa kupinda mudare reparamende uye dzavimbisa kuti dzichaita zvese zvadzaivimbisa vanhu. Mumiri weMazowe South muNational Assembly, VaFortune Chasi veZanu PF, vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti mitemo yese ivandudzwe kuitira kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo. Mumiri weMt Pleasant, VaSamuel Banda veMDC Alliance, vatiwo nyika inofanira kuva nemitemo inobata vanhu vese zvakaenzana zvisine kuti munhu ndewebato ripi. Mumiri weHarare West vari nhengo yeMDC Alliance, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, vaudza Studio7 kuti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti nhengo dzeparamende kubva kumapato ese, dzishande pamwe mukudzika mitemo nekuita basa rinobatsira mwana wese weZimbabwe. Mumiriri weGokwe-Nembudziya muNational Assembly, VaJustice Mayor Wadyajena veZanu PF, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanoda kushanda vasingatyityidzirwe nemakurukota ehurumende sezvaiitika muparamende yapfuura. Nhengo yeZanu PF, VaJoseph Chinotimba vekuBuhera South, vanoti vachashanda zvakasimbamukusimudzira vanhu vemudunhu ravo uye vatiwo vanoda kuti Studio7 ichitanga kutepfunyura iri muZimbabwe. Mumiri weGutu North, Amai Yeukai SimbanegaviveZanu PF, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachaedza pese pavanongona napo kuti vanhu vemunzvimbo yavo vawane mabasa. Paramende yagara ichionekwa seisina simba uye ichimanikidzwa kuitwa zvese zvese nemutungamiriri wenyika kana makurukota ake. Asi VaSettlement Chikwinyawa veMDC Alliance vachimirira Mbizo vati izvi hazvisi kuzoitika rwendo rwuno. Munyori weparamende, VaKennedy Chokuda, vagadza nhengo dzese mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe dzedare reNational Assembly nenhengo makumi masere dzeseneti. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson MNangagwa, vanotarisirwa kudomwa nhengo shanu kudare reseneti uye svondo rapfuura vakatodoma vatevedzeri vavo vaviri zvinoreva kuti vasarirwa kudoma nhengo nhatu chete. Matare maviri eparamende aya achagara svondo rinouya kuti asarudze mutauriri weNational Assembly pamwe nemutungamiri wedare reSenate. Pane nzvimbo dzinodarika makumi matatu dzeNational Assembly dziri kupikiswa neMDC Alliance mudare reElectoral Court, zvekuti vari kupikisa ava vakabudirira, vamwe vatoreswa mhiko nhasi vanorasikirwa nenzvimbo dzavo mudare iri, vanenge vanzi vakunda vachitoreswa mhiko yekuti vave nhengo dzedare iri. No media source currently available

headline: America Yovimbisa Kudyidzana neAfrican Union Zvine Pundutso Mukati
text: Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha vanoti vatungamiri vemuAfrica vanofanirwa kutambira mashoko aVaJoe Biden zvine mutsindo nerukudzo mukati, uye vafunge zvakadzama kuti vangasimbaradze seyi hukama hwavo nehurumende itsva iri kutonga mu America. Mutungamiri weAmerica, Va Joe Biden, vatumira mashoko avo kuvatungamiri vemu Africa, avo vari kuita musangano wemazuva maviri padandemutande senzira yekuti vanhu vasatapurirane chirwere che Covid-19. VaBiden vaudza musangano weAfrican Union wechimakumi matatu nemana uyu kuti America yakagadzirira kuva sahwira wenyika dzemu Africa mukutsigirana, mukubatana pamwe nekuremekedzana. Vati izvi ndizvo zvinopa America kuti ishanda pamwe nemasangano epasi rose akaita se African Union. Vati pasi rose rinofanirwa kushanda pamwe chete kuitira kuzadzisa "shuviro yeremangwana rakanaka, remangwana rine kukura munyaya dzekutengeserana, kunopa pundutso kunyika dzose." VaBiden, avo vakagadzwa pachigaro chemutungamiri weAmerica mwedzi wapera mushure mekukunda VaDonald Trump veRepublican Party, vati nyika yavo "yakazvipira kuvaka zvakare mushandirapamwe pamwe nekubatsira vanhu vemu Africa pazvinhu zvose zvinosanganisira kurwisa chirwere che Covid-19 uye mukushanda neAfrican Union mukupedza mhirizhonga dziri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda muAfrica yose." Mutungamiri weAmerica atiwo America yakagadzirira kuva sahwira we Africa, uye inodavira zvinoitwa nenyika dzemu Africa. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo paine zvipingaidzo zvihombe, “hapana kupokana kuti nyika dzedu, vanhu vedu, pamwe neAfrican Union, vakazvipira kugadzirisa zvipingaidzo zvose.” No media source currently available Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika pamwe nekufambiswa kwemabhizinesi pasi rose, Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanoti vatungamiri vemuAfrica vanofanirwa kutambira mashoko aVa Biden zvine mutsindo nerukudzo mukati, uye vafunge zvakadzama kuti vangasimbaradze seyi hukama hwavo nehurumende itsva iri kutonga mu America. Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti kuti Zimbabwe idyidzane zvemhando yepamusoro soro munyaya dzemabhizinesi, hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inofanirwa kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu chinova chinhu chakaita kuti vamwe vakuru vakuru vatemerwe zvirango neAmerica. Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti Zimbabwe ikaratidza kuti yava kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu uye mapurisa nemasoja ayo achibata vemuZimbabwe zvine chiremera, Zimbabwe inogona kudyidzana nemabhizinesi ekuAmerica nenzira inoita kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimudzirwe. Asi Zimbabwe inoti iri kuomeserwa nekuti yakatorera varungu mapurazi ichiapa kuvanhu vatema. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Yoyambira Vanoda Kuratidzira
text: Zanu PF inoti inomira nemashoko akataurwa nemutungamiri wayo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamusangano wakaitwa nemusi weChishanu mudare rePolitburo yebato iri. VaMnangagwa, avo vanove zvakare mutungamiri wenyika, vakayambira masangano evashandi, machechi, nemasangano akazvimirira, kuti anangane nemabasa awo ari pamutemo, kwete kupindira mune zvematongerwo enyika. VaMangagwa vakatiwo vanozviziva kuti masangano aya ari kushanda nemapato anopikisa muda kuvhiringidza mashandiro ehurumende yavo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, avo vanoti ichokwadi kuti masangano akazvimirira aya ava kuita zvematongerwo enyika achisiya basa rekuchengetedza kodzero dzevashandi. VaMugwadi vanoti hurumende inozviziva kuti masangano aya ari kuda kuratidzira zvisiri pamutemo, uye mapurisa achange achiita basa rawo nemazvo mukuona kuti hapana anobvumidzwa kutyora mitemo yenyika munguva ino yeCovid-19. VaMugwadi vatiwo sangano guru reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, riri kuita zvematongerwo enyika. Vati mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vakamboyedza kuyananisa vatungamiri veMDC vari kunetsana, izvo zvinoburitsa pachena kuti sangano iri rinodyidzana nemapato anopikisa hurumende. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaMutasa kanawo MDC kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti sevashandi vane kodzero dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika, vanoshushikana zvikuru nemashoko aVaMnangagwa. VaMasaraure vanoti vashandi havasi kuzofa vakanyarara kana hurumende ichitadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzemihoro yavo, uye vacharamba vachitaura zvinyunyuto zvavo. Asi VaMugwadi vati hurumende inonzwisisa zvikuru zvichemo zvevashandi ndosaka yakawedzera mihoro yevashandi vehurumende nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana, pamusoro pezvo, ikavapa zvakare madhora ekuAmerica makumi manomwe nemashanu semari yekubatsirikana munguva yekurwisa Covid-19. No media source currently available

headline: America Inoti Kutadza Kutonga kwaVaMnangagwa Ndiko Kuri Kuvhiringa Hupfumi hweZimbabwe, Kwete Zvirango
text: America inoti zvirango zvayakatemera vakuru vakuru muZimbabwe hazvisirizvo zviri kukonzera kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika ichiti hurumende yeZimbabwe ndiyo iri kutadza kutungamira zvakanaka. Izvi zvinotevera gwaro rakaburitswa nenhumwa yeUnited Nations, Amai Alena Douhan, avo vakati zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nehurumende yeAmerica pamwe nedzimwe nyika dzekumavirira zviri kukanganisa raramo yeveruzhinji munyika. Mumiriri weAmerica kusangano reUnited Nations, Ambassador Linda Thomas Greenfield, vaudza vatori venhau nhasi vari kuNew York kuti kutadza kutungamira zvakanaka kwehurumende yeZimbabwe ndiko kuri kukonzera kutambura kweveruzhinji munyika kwete zvirango zvakaiswa nehurumende yavo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemumiriri wesangano reEuropean Union, VaTimo Olkonnen, kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya yezvirango iyi sezvo pataenda pamhepo vanga vasati vapindura mibunzo yavati tivatumire. Asi EU yakataura munguva pfupi yadarika kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika isati yabvisa zvirango. Muzinda weBritain muZimbabwe wakaburitsa mashoko padandemutande rawo reTwitter mazuva mashomanana adarika uchiti kutengesera pakati peBritain neZimbabwe kuri kufamba zvakanaka zvisinei nezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vari muZanu PF. Gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati togozovafonera sezvo vanga vachiti vakabatikana nemusangano weZanu PF wepagore uri kuitirwa kuBindura. Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZanu PF, VaMike Bimha, vati zvirango zviri kuonesa pfumvu munhu wese munyika zvisinei nekuti munhu anotsigira baro ripi rezvematongerwo enyika. VaBimha vati Zimbabwe iri kuoneswa ndondo nenyika dzekumavirira nepamusana pekutorwa kwakaitwa minda kubva kuvarimi vechichena ichigoverwa kuvanhu vatema. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzevamatongerwo enyika, VaRashweat Mukundu, vati zvirango zviripo hazvisi zvirango zvehupfumi ndokusaka Zimbabwe ichikwanisa kutengeserana nenyika dzacho dzakaisa zvirango izvi uye vati havaone nyika idzi dzichibvisa zvirango izvi kana Zimbabwe isina kugadzirisa zvikonzero zvakaita kuti zvirango izvi zviiswe kubva pakutanga. Kunyange gwaro raAmai Douhan rakakurudzira kuti America irege kushandisa mutemo weZidera kuti irambe yakaisa zvirango izvi vachiti zvirango izvi hazvisi pamutemo sezvo zvisina kubvumidzwa neUnited Nations Security Council, Amai Greenfield vati hurumende yavo haisi kuzodyira huroyi mukunyara vachiti hurumende yavo icharambawo yakatsika madziro panyaya yekuti kodzero dzevanhu dzicherechedzwe muZimbabwe. Amai Douhan, avo vakanga vari munyika kwemazuva gumi adarika vachiongorora nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika uye kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumavirira zviri kukanganisa hupenyu hweveruzhinji zvakadii munyika, vakati ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwuri kunhonga svosve nemuromo pamusana pezvirango izvi. Amai Douhan vakakurudzira Zimbabwe kuti iite nhaurirano dzechokwadi nenyika dzakatemera zvirango nechinangwa chekuti zvirango izvi zvigobviswa vakatiwo hurumende yeZimbabwe pachayo inofanira kuona kuti munyika maitwa nhaurirano dzemandorokwati munyika pamwe nedzimwe nyika dzakaisa zvirango izvi. Nyika dzakatemera Zimbabwe zvirango dzinosanganisira America, Australia, Britain, Canada, Switzerland pamwe nesangano renyika dziri mugungano reEuropean Union. Amai Douhan vakatarisirwa kusvitsa gwaro rezvavakawana muongororo yavo kumusangano weUnited Nations Human Rights Council uchaitwa muna Gunyana wegore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: VaMutasa Vanobvuma Kutongwa neKomiti yeZanu-PF
text: Nyaya yekusawirirana mubato reZanu-PF yatanga zvakare mushure mekudzoka munyika kwemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe. Kudzoka kwavo nesvondo kwava kureva kuti vaive murongi wemabasa mubato, VaDidymus Mutasa, vanenge votongwa nekomiti yakaumbwa iri kutungamirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko. VaMutasa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachaenda kudare iri. No media source currently available Vamwe vari mukomiti iyi vanosanganisira Amai Mugabe semutungamiri weWomens League, vanoona nezvemabasa ematongwerwo enyika mubato, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, munyori wezvemitemo, VaPatrick Chinamasa, munyori wevechidiki, VaPupurai Togarepi, uye nhengo yePolitburo, VaKembo Mohadi. Mutauriri webato, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vakazivisa svondo rapera kuti kutongwa kwaVaMutasa kunotanga chete kana Amai Mugabe vadzoka kubva kunyika dzekumawirira.

headline: MDC T Yoronga Musangano Mukuru weKupeta Gore kuZimbabwe Grounds
text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai mangwana vari kutarisirwa kutungamira nhengo dzavo pamusangano mukuru wekuvhara gore uchaitirwa munhandare ine nhoroondo yekurwira rusununguko rwevatema yeZimbabwe Grounds iri mumusha weHighfield.
