Mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vanoti chinangwa chikuru chemusangano uyu ndechekutarisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika pari zvino, pasvika hurongwa hwemubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa pakatarisanwa nesarudzo dza2018, pamwe nekutendawo vana veZimbabwe nekushinga kunyange vari mukati mematambudziko makukutu. VaGutu vanoti zvimwe zvicha kurukurwawo ndezvakaitwa nebato ravo mukati megore rino, zvinosanganisira kuratidzira mumatunhu akasiyana-siyana enyika. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T Yoshora Mashoko aVaMudarikwa veZanu PF
text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nemashoko anonzi akataurwa nemumiriri weUzumba muparamende, VaSimbaneuta Mudarikwa vebato reZanu PF, ekuti dunhu ravo harina nzvimbo yemapato anopikisa. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti mashoko aVaMudarikwa aya anokonzeresa mhirizhonga sezvo dunhu ravo reUzumba, kusanganisira Mashonaland East yose, ragara richizivikanwa nenyaya dzemhirizhonga. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamabiko ekupemberera kuparurwa kwehurongwa hwemadiridziro kuMudzi, VaMudarikwa vanonzi vakati bato ravo richawana mavhoti zviuru makumi masere mudunhu mavo, vakawedzera vachiti mapato anopikisa achangowana mavhoti ari pasi pemapepa ekuvhotesa akakanganiswa kana kuti ma spoilt ballot papers. Asi VaMudarikwa varamba mashoko avari kupomerwa ekukurudzira mhirizhonga, vachiti bato reMDC-T ndiro rinotori pamberi panyaya dzemhirizhonga. Vanotiwo pahuwandu hwemavhoti achawanikwa neZanu PF, vari kureva kuti vanhu mudunhu ravo vari kuberekana vachiwanda. No media source currently available

headline: Muzvare Nyagomo Vokurudzira Vari Kunze Kunonyoresa Kuvhota
text: Mutungamiri werimwe remapato anopikisa, reProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe, Muzvare Barbara Nyagomo, vanoti bato ravo riri kushanda zvakasimba kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe vari munyika dzakapoteredza nyika vadzokere kumusha kunonyoresa kuti vazokwanisa kuvhota musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Muzvare Nyagomo vanoti vari kuita izvi munyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, Mozambique, Botswana neZambia. "Isusu tiri kunyanya kuisa simba rakawanda muSouth Africa, mune vana veZimbabwe vazhinji vatinoziva kuti vanokwanisa kuenda kumba vachino register kuti vavhote. Saka tiri kuita voters education ne awareness kuti vazive kuti sei vachifanira kuti vano register izvozvi, chero vakanga vaka register kubva muna 1980," Muzvare Nyagomo vanodaro. Muzvare Nyagomo, avo vari kuManchester kuBritain, vanoti hapana imwe nzira yekuti vari kunze kwenyika vakwanise kupinda musarudzo kunze kwekutoenda kumusha kunonyoresa, sezvo Zimbwbwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yakatozivisa kare kuti haina mari yekuti ikwanise kunyoresa vese vari kunze kwenyika vari munyika dzavari kugara. Bato reProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe riri mumubatanidzwa wemapato ari kurwira kuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ivandudzwe, weNational Electoral Reform Agenda, NERA. Mapato ari mumibatanidzwa yeNERA neCODE ari muSouth Africa pari zvino munhaurirano dzinonzi dzakanangana nekuedza kuumba mubatanidzwa pakati pemapoka maviri aya. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Inoramba Gwaro Riri Kuti Sarudzo dzeBy-Election Dzichaitwa Gore Rinouya Muna Kubvumbi
text: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yaramba mashoko ari mugwaro riri kutenderera pamadandemutande ekuti yakatara musi wa 23 Kubvumbi 2022 sezuva ringangoitwa sarudzo dzema by-elections dzeparamende pamwe nemakanzuru. Mukuru anoona nezvesarudzo kana kuti Chief Elections Officer veZEC, Va Utoile Silaigwana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mashoko aya handi echokwadi vakati tibate mutauriri weZEC, Commissioer Kzembe kuti tinzwe zvizhinji, asi takundikana kuvabata. Gwaro riri kutenderera iri rakanyorwa pabepa reZEC, asi harina kuiswa runyoro kana kuti kusainwa kana kudhindwa neboka rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika iri. Asi mamwe masangano pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo vanga vatoratidza mufaro mukuru kwazvo nemashoko ekuti sarudzo idzi dzingangoitwa gore rinouya, vachiti kushaikwa kwevamiriri mumatare eparamende pamwe nemumakanzuru kuri kudzorera shure mabasa ebudiriro mumatunhu asina vamiriri. Mabasa ose ane chekuita nesarudzo akambomiswa muna Kurume 2020 senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Matunhu akawanda akasara asina humiriri zvichitevera kudzingwa kwedzimwe nhengo dzeparamende nekanzuru nebato reMDC-T dzichinzi dzakasiya bato iri dzichienda kuMDC Alliance, uyewo kushaya kwedzimwe nhengo. Zvigaro makumi maviri nezvisere zveparamende hazvina vamiriri kuchitiwo zvimwe zana nezvishanu zvemakanzuru zvisinawo humiriri. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa musangano re Elections Resource Centre, VaSolomon Bobosibunu, vanoti dai gwaro iri ranga raburitswa neZEC zviri pamutemo changa chiri chinhu chakanaka chose kuti sarudzo idzi dzichiitwa sezvo kunonoka kwadzo kuri kutotyora kodzero dzevanhu dzavanopiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Joice Mujuru Vokurudzirwa Kuzvichenura Pane Zvakaitika Vachiri muZanu PF
text: Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Va Edgar Gweshe, vanoti Amai Mujuru vanofanira kuzvichenura panyaya yekubirirwa kunonzi kwakaitwa sarudzo pamwe nekutyora kwekodzero. Veruzhinji vanoti bato idzva reZimbabwe People First iro riri kufanotungamirwa nevaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, rinofanira kushanda zvakasimba kuti rikwanise kubvisa hurumende yeZanu PF iyo yave nemakore makumi matatu nematanhatu iri muhutongi. Veruzhinji vataura neStudio 7 muHarare vanoti Amai Mujuru, avo vakaparura bato ravo re Zimbabwe People First nezuro, vanofanira kusunga dzisimbe kuti vakwanise kukurira Zanu PF musarudzo dzemuna 2018. Mumwe wevanhu ava ndiVa Beven Chihuri avo vanogara mumusha weMabvuku muno muHarare. VaChihuri vanoti Amai Mujuru vane mukana wakakura kwazvo wekutora masimba kubva kuna Va Mugabe. Zvataurwa naVa Chihuri zvatsinhirwa naVa Kudzanai Musenha vanogara kuWestgate. Va Musenha vati Amai Mujuru semunhu anga ari muhurumende kubva pakawana nyika kuzvitonga kuzere muna 1980, vave munhu ane rutsigiro rwakakura kwazvo kune vari muchiuto avo vakabuda pachena kuti havadi kutongwa nemunhu asina kurwa muhondo yerusununguko. Mushure mekuparura kwavakaita bato ravo, mumwe mutsigiri weZimbabwe People First, Amai Patience Madzima, vakati Amai Mujuru ndivo vega munhu anobva kubato rinopikisa anogona kuita kuti munyika muve nerunyararo kana Zanu PF ikakundwa musarudzo. Asi mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Va Edgar Gweshe, vanoti Amai Mujuru vanofanira kuzvichenura panyaya yekubirirwa kunonzi kwakaitwa sarudzo pamwe nekutyora kwekodzero. MDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai inoti sarudzo dzapfuura dzakabirirwa zvemhango yepamusoro-soro asi VaMugabe nebato ravo vanoti sarudzo idzi dzakaitwa zviri pachena. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano reCoalition Against Corruption, Va Terry Mutsvanga, vanoti Amai Mujuru vane dambudziko rekuti vakanga vari muhurumende yeZanu PF yavanoti yashungurudza vanhu kwenguva yakareba. Zvichakadai, mupepeti webepanhau reThe Observer, Va Barnabas Thondlana, vanoti Amai Mujuru vanofanira kubatana nemamwe mapato anopikisa kana vakamira pachokwadi kuti vari kuda kunyurura zvizvarwa kubvamumadhaka azviri. Va Thondlana vanoti Amai Mujuru vakamira vari vega havana mukana wekukunda Zanu PF musarudzo pakatarisirwa mhirizhonga inowanzoitwa munguva dzesarudzo Zanu PF ichishanda pamwechete nevari muchiuto. Nyanzvi munyaya dzevematongerwo enyika dzinoti mapato anopikisa akapinda musarudzo dzemuna 2018 asina kubatana zvinopa Zanu PF mukana wakakura kwazvo wekukunda musarudzo idzi. Nyaznvi idzi dzinotiwo mapato anopikisa anofanira kutanga nhaurirano dzekuwumba mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa pachine nguva yekuti mapato aya agogadzirira sarudzo dzemuna 2018 zvakakwana. Zvichakadai, Va Tsvangirai naAmai Mujuru vakabuda pachena kuti nhaurirano idzi hadzisati dzatanga uye VaTsvangirai vakatoudza vatsigiri vavo kuti vagadzirire kupinda musarudzo dzemuna 2018 vakazvimirira sebato reMDC-T. Kunyange hazvo vemapato ese anopikisa hurumende vachiti vakazvipira kubatana pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018, hapana chinobatika chavati vaita panyaya dzenhaurirano dzekuwumba mubatanidzwa uyu. No media source currently available

headline: VaTomana Voridzirwa Pito Vachinzi Vatadza Basa
text: Judiciary Service Commission, JSC, inoti gweta guru renyika, VaJohannes Tomana, vanofanira kusiya basa nenyaya yekusatevedzera mitongo yematare epamusoro sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo. Judiciary Service Commission, JSC, inoti gweta guru renyika, VaJohannes Tomana, vanofanira kusiya basa nenyaya yekusatevedzera mitongo yematare epamusoro sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo. JSC ina sachigaro uye ari mutongi mukuru wematare, VaGodfrey Chidyausiku, pamwe nedzimwe nhengo dzinosanganisira mutongo mutungamiri wedare repamusoro pamwe nevamwe vatongi vedare iri. JSC inoti VaTomana havachakodzere zvachose kuti vave gweta guru rehurumende uye nyaya yekuti vakatopotsa vaendeswa kujeri panyaya yavairamba kuchuchisa nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Kereke, vari kupomwera mhosva yekubata chibharo, munongedzo wekuti munhu asisafanire kuva muhofisi. Studio7 yange yatoudzwa neMuvhuro nevamwe vakuru muhurumende kuti VaMugabe vave mubishi kuumba komiti yekutanga kuferefeta VaTomana uye vakabatwa nemhosva, vanodzingwa basa. Asi VaTomana vatokwira kudare repamusoro vachiti zviri kuitwa neJSC hazvisi pamutemo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaTomana kanawo gweta ravo, VaThabani Mpofu. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo, uye vachidzidzisa mitemo paKent University kuBritain, Doctor Alex Magaisa, vanoti havaoni VaTomana vachipona munyaya yasimudzwa neJSC. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, Voshanyira Zimbabwe
text: Mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, vasvika munyika umo vari kutarisirwa kupinda mumisangano neChina wekuchanyorerana zvibvumirano nemumwe wavo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Makurokata enyika mbiri idzi anowona nezvekudyidzana kwenyika vaita misangano yavo neChitatu vachigadzirira musangano mukuru wevatungamiri wenyika mbiri idzi uchaitwa neChina. Mashoko aburitswa anoti VaMnangagwa naVaMasisi vachanyorerana chibvumirano chekukweretesa mari makambani emuZimbabwe sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka muZimbabwe. Asi mashoko ari kubva kuBotswana anoti hapana mari ichapihwa Zimbabwe sezvo zvakambenge zvawirirana pakutanga, zvashanduka. Munyori mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaGaeimelwe Goitsemang, vaudza nhepfenyuro ye Yarona FM kuti chibvumirano chakanga chaitwa neZimbabwe nenyika yavo chekuti Botswana ikweretese Zimbabwe mamiriyoni mazana mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica, hachisipo. Mari iyi yaifanirwa kushandiswa mukuvandudza kucherwa kwemangoda kuitira kuti nyika iwane mari kubva mumangoda ayo ari muminda yekwaMarange. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaGodfrey Kanyenze, vanoti misangano yakadai yakakosha mukugadzirisa hukama hweZimbabwe neBotswana. VaKanyenze vanoti zvichabuda mumusangano pakati pevatungamiri vaviri ava zvinokwanisa kujekesa hudzamu hwekudyidzana nekugarisana kweZimbabwe neBotswana sezvo vatungamiri venyika mbiri idzi vachiri vatsva vose. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Grace Mugabe Votuka Zvakare Amai Mujuru neMDC
text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mygabe, vati vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, havazofa vakavigwa pamarinda anovigwa magamba enyika nepamusana pekuti vakapandukira mutungamiri wenyika,Va Robert Mugabe. Vachitaura neChitatu nevatsigiri vebato ravo paChimhanda Secondary School ku Rushinga mudunhu reMashonaland Central, munyori muboka remadzimai reZanu PF reWomen’s League, Amai Grace Mugabe, vashora Amai Mujuru nekuda chigaro chaVa Mugabe vachiti Amai Mujuru havazofi vakavigwa pa Heroes Acre nokuti vakazvidza mutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available Amai Mugabe vati kunze kunotonhora kana munhu achinge asiri mu Zanu PF. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kutaura naAmai Mujuru kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Amai Mugabe vaenderera mberi vachiti mapato anopikisa haafanirwe kubvumidzwa kupinda mudunhu reMashonaland Central vachiti dunhu iri ndere Zanu PF. Amai Mugabe varambawo mashoko ari kubuda mumapepanhau ekuti ndivo vari kutungamira chipoka chemuZanu PF chiri kudaidzwa kuti G40 kana kuti Generation 40 icho chinonzi chakateya kutora masimba kubva kuna Va Mugabe kana vachinge vabva pachigaro. Zvinonzi muZanu PF mune kusawirirana zvakanyanya panyaya yekuti achatora matomhu kubva kuna Va Mugabe ndiyani. Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika atorawo zvakare mukana uyu kutsoropodza vaimbova mutungamiri weBritain, Va Tony Blair, pamwe naVa George Bush vaimbova mutungamiri weAmerica vachiti vaviri ava vanofanirwa kutongwa kudare re International Criminal Court. Va Mugabe vanowanzotukawo America ne Britain pese pavanowana mukana wekutaura paruzhinji sezvaitwa nemudzimai wavo nhasi. Kunyange hazvo mhuri yaVa Mugabe ine mapurazi akawanda, mazhinji acho ari pasi pekambani inonzi Gushungo Holdings, Amai Mugabe vashora vakuru vakuru muhurumende vakatora mapurazi akawanda avasiri kushandisa nemhazvo. Zvichakadai, Amai Mugabe vatorawo mukana uyu kutuka vatori venhau vachiti vanonyora manyepo. Mumwe mutori wenhau ane mukurumbira munyika uye vari mupepeti webepanhau re The Observer, Va Barnabas Thondlana, varatidza kusafara nemashoko aAmai Mugabe aya vachiti vatori venhau vanofanirwa kusiiwa vachiita basa ravo vakasununguk Amai Mugabe vasiya vagovera matarakita, mbatya, shangu, ma computer pamwe nechikafu kuvagari veku Mashonaland Central vachiti havana basa nekuti vemapato anopikisa anoti chii panyaya dzekutenga mavhoti vachiti yatokwana nguva yekuti bato ravo ritsvage rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018. Amai Mugabe vakatarisirwa kuita misangano nevatsigiri vavo mumatunhu ose enyika kwavanoti vachafamba vachigovera zvinhu vachiti zvavari kuita kuzadzikisa zviri muchirongwa chekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika che Zimbabwe Agenda for Sustainable Socio Economic Transformation kana kuti Zimasset.

headline: MDC Inoti Kuratidzira Kwayo Kuri Kuenderera Mberi neMusi weChishanu
text: MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti iri kuenderera mberi nehurongwa hwayo hwekuratidzira nemusi weChishanu, kunyange hazvo isati yanzwa kubva kumapurisa. MDC yakazivisa mapurisa svondo rapera kuti ichapinda mukuratidzira uku sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika. Asi bato iri rinoti kusapindura kwemapurisa hakusi kuzotadzisa hurongwa hwekuratidzira uhu, sezvo bumbiro remitemo yenyika ichiripa kodzero yekuratidzira. MDC inoti iri kuratidzira sezvo isiri kufara nehutongi hwemutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo bato iri rinoti haricherechedzi kusarudzwa kwavakaitwa gore rapera. Sangano rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika, reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, rakazivisa gore rapera kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakanga vakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Asi MDC yakapikisa izvi mudare reConstitutional Court, iro rakapa mutongo waitambira zvakanga zvaziviswa musarudzo dzegore rapera nasachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Priscilla Chigumba. Asi MDC inoti VaMnangagwa vari kutadza kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika, izvo zviri kupa kuti nyika ishaye magetsi, mafuta edzimotokari, uye kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu mazuva ose. Murongi wemisangano muMDC, VaAmos Chibaya, vanoti kuratidzira kwavo kuchaitwa murunyararo sezvo vagara vari bato rinoremekedza mitemo yenyika. VaChibaya vanoti zvisineyi kuti havasati vawana mhinduro kubva kumapurisa, kuratidzira kwavo kuri kuenderera mberi nemusi weChishanu. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi, vanoti MDC inogara yakati ichaita ratidziro murunyararo asi ichizopedzisira yaita mhirizhonga. VaMutodi vanotiwo sebato reZanu PF riri kutonga, vari kuzviziva kuti MDC iri kuratidzira kuitira kuti VaMnangagwa vabviswe pachigaro. “Vakuru vari kuti vachange vari mberi mekuratidzira uku ndinovayambira kuti vasazoyeuka bako vanaiwa,” vadaro VaMutodi. Asi VaChibaya vanoti vari kuzviziva kuti Zanu PF iri kugadzira zvipfeko zveMDC zvichapihwa vanhu kuti vazovhiringa kuratidzira kwakarongwa nebato ravo. Senzira yekuti izvi zvisaitike, VaChibaya vanoti vachange vaine nhengo dzebato ravo dzichachengetedza runyararo, uye pakaita nhubu dzinoda kukonzera mhirizhonga, vachadzibata vachidziisa mumaoko emapurisa. Muna Ndira, sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rakadaidzira kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo kwemazuva matatu. Asi vanhu vakapinda mumigwagwa iyi vachiratidzira. Kuratidzira uku kwakapedzisira kwaita mhirizhonga iyo yakaona vanhu vanosvika makumi maviri vachifa mushure mekupfurwa nemabara epfuti. Sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, rinoti pamhirizhonga yakaitika muna Ndira, pane vanhu makumi matanhatu nevasere vakarapwa maronda akakonzerwa nemabara epfuti, uye vanhu vanodarika zana vaive nemaronda airatidza kuti akakonzerwa nesimbi nezvimwe zvombo zvinocheka. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti mumazuva matatu akadaidzirwa neZCTU kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo, vakaona mapurisa achishandisa zvombo zvehutsi hunokachidza pavanhu vairatidzira vasina zvombo, uye vakaonawo masoja aive nepfuti dzemhando yeAK-47. No media source currently available

headline: Makobvu neMatete Okandiranwa Muparamende neNyaya yaVaDzamara
text: Muparamende makandiranwa makobvu nematete nhengo dzeparamende dzichibvunza gurukota rezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamire hurumende panyaya yekupambwa kwemurwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaItai Dzamara. VaMnangagwa, avo vanova zvakare mutevedzeri wekutanga wemutungamiri wenyika, vati vari kushushukanawo nekushaikwa kwaVaDzamara. VaMnangagwa vati mutemo uchashandiswa zvakadzama pakuranga vakapamba VaDzamara. Mutauriri vemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, vanoti vari kuferefeta nyaya iyi. Pamboita runyerekupe rwekuti VaDzamara vange vari mumaoko emapurisa kuHarare Central Police Station. Asi gweta raVaDzamara, VaCharles Kwaramba, vati mapurisa avaudza kuti vachiri mubishi kutsvaga VaDzamara. VaDzamara vakapambwa neMuvhuro muGlen View nevanhu vaive mumotokari yemhando yeIsuzu. No media source currently available

headline: Dare rePamusoro Soro Rozeya Gakava Pakati paVaChamisa naAmai Khupe
text: Dare repamusoro-soro reSupreme Court nhasi ranzwa chikumbiro chemutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, chekuti mutongo wakaturwa nedare repamusoro reHigh Court wekuti kusarudzwa kwavo semutungamiri webato ravo hakuna kufambiswa zvakanaka usendekwe parutivi. Vachisvitsa chikumbiro chavo kudare, gweta raVaChamisa, Advocate Thabani Mpofu, vati mutongo wedare reHigh Court unofanira kusendekwa parutivi vachiti harisi basa rematare kusarudzira bato rezvematongerwo enyika hutungamiri. VaMpofu vaudza dare kuti komiti yepamusoro-soro muMDC pakati pemakongiresi yeNational Council yakatora danho rekugadza VaChamisa semutungamiri weMDC zvichitevera kufa kwavaimbova mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai. VaMpofu vati komiti iyi ndiyo ine masimba ekuita izvi ndokusaka zvakaitwa uye vati VaChamisa naVaElias Mudzuri vakagadzwa naVaTsvangirai sevatevedzeri kunyangwe zvazvo paiva naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe zvichiitwa VaTsvangirai vachishandisa masimba avaive nawo ari mubumbiro reMDC. Zvataurwa naVaMpofu zvatsinhirwa nemunyori anoona nezvesarudzo muMDC yaVaChamisa, VaJacob Mafume, avo vanga vari mudare. Gweta riri kumiririra Muzvare Khupe panyaya iyi, VaLovemore Madhuku, vaudzawo dare kuti pasi pebumbiro remitemo reMDC hazvikwanisike kuti pave nevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato vaviri kana vatatu sezvo vachiti bumbiro iri riri pachena kuti panofanira kunge paine mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato mumwechete. VaMadhuku vati Muzvare Khupe ndivo vaifanira kufanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weMDC pakamirirwa kuitwa kongiresi yechimbichimbi yekutsvaga mutungamiri webato zvichitevera kufa kwakaita VaTsvangirai. VaMadhuku vaenderera mberi vachiti kudomwa kwaVaChamisa naVaMudzuri kuti vave vatevedzeri vaVaTsvangirai kwaive kunze kwemutemo. Vaenderera mberi kudaidzirwa kwaitwa musangano weNational Council wakagadza VaChamisa semutungamiri webato kwaiva kunze kwemutemo sezvo vachiti bumbiro reMDC riri pachena kuti misangano yechimbichimbi yekomiti iyi inokwanisa kushevedzerwa nemutungamiri webato chete kana mutevedzeri wake. Zvichakadai, dare reSupreme Court iro range riine vatongi vatatu vanoti VaPaddington Garwe, Amai Antonia Guvava naVaBharat Patel, rati richazotura mutongo waro muzuva rarisina kutara. Nyaya iyi isati yapinda mudare, mapurisa anorwisa mhirizhonga ayo anga akapakatira zvombo arambidza vatsigiri veMDC vanga vauya kuzonzwa nyaya iyi kupinda mudare ndokuvadzinga pamatare apa izvo zvashorwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaChamisa, Amai Lynette Karenyi Kore. Nyaya iyi yakaunzwa kumatare neimwe nhengo yeMDC yekuGokwe, VaElias Mashavira, avo vaiti VaChamisa havana kusarudzwa kuti vatungamire bato zviri pachena izvo zvakatambirwa nedare High Court. Asi VaChamisa vakazokwidza nyaya iyi kudare reSuupreme Court vachiti mutongo wedare reHigh Court unofanira kusendekwa parutivi. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinopa Mutongo Unoti Vechidiki Vakatora Muzinda weMorgan Tsvangirai House neSvondo Vabviswe
text: Dare ramejasitiriti muHarare rakatura neChipiri mutongo wekuti bato reMDC-T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe ribvise vechidiki vanonzi ndivo vakabvuta muzinda weMorgan Richard Tsvangirai House uri muHarare neSvondo vachiti vanobuda chete mumuzinda uyu kana vakuru vemapato eMDC-T neMDC Alliance iri kutungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa vatauarirana kuti vashande pamwechete zvakare. Vechidiki ava vanoti vari kutevera mutongo wedare reSupreme Court wekuti vaive nezvigaro muna 2014 vafambise mabasa muMDC-T, vachiti ndivo vaive pazvigaro gore iri. Bato reMDC-T pamwe nemunyori mukuru waro, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vakakwira dare neMuvhuro vachikwirira bato reMDC Alliance, VaChamisa, VaPaul Gorekore, VaHappymore Chidziva, VaDenford Ngadziore pamwe nemukuru wemapurisa mudunhu reHarare. MDC-T yakatora muzinda uyu kubva kuMDC Alliance muna Chikunguru ichibatsirwa nemapurisa. Mutongi wedare akati vashanu vekutanga vakakwirirwa dare vanofanirwa kudzosera muzinda uyu kuMDC-T, uye vaburitse muhutapwa vanhu vanonzi vakavharirwa mumuzinda uyu. Tabata VaMwonzora kuti tinzwe divi rebato ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vanoti vakatoshamiswa nekuona mutongo uyu uchiisawo bato ravo pamwe nemutungamiri wavo VaChamisa mukati sezvo vasineyi nechekuita nezviri kuita pamuzinda weMorgan Richard Tsvangirai House. VaHlatywayo vanoti vakangonzwawo kuti muzinda uyu wakatorwa nevechidi vaiti ndivo vaive pazvigaro muna 2014 pakaitwa kongiresi yebato iri. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vemuMasvingo Vopomera Mauto neMapurisa Mhosva yeKutyora Kodzero dzeVanhu
text: Vamiriri vemapato anopikisa vari kupomera mapurisa nemauto mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Mashoko aya akabuda pamusangano wakakokerwa neNational Transitional Justice Working Group, musi weChishanu paMasvingo Civic Center. Vemasangano akazvimirira vakati mapazi ehurumende ari kutadza basa raanofanira kuita rekuchengetedza runyararo nenyaya yekuti vari kutsigira nekushandiswa nemusangano weZanu PF. Vanokokera mabasa musangano reNational Transitional Justice Working Group VaDzikamai Bere vanoti chinangwa chavo ndechekuunza kupodzwa kwemaronda munyika uye kugadzirira kudzokazve National Peace and Reconciliation Commission iyo yakambomiswa nehurumende ichida kukwenenzverwa. Mutauriri we MDCT muMasvingo VaSimon Mupindu ndemumwe wevanhu vakashoropodza mapazi ehurumende. “Mapazi edu senyika ari kurasika zvakanyanya nenyaya yekuti vanofamba nebato rinotonga pane kuti vaite basa vakazvimirira. Havachagoni kuchengetedza runyararo kuvanhu vavanofanira kuchengetedza saka vari kukanganisa bumbiro remutemo.” Mapazi akanyanya kushorwa anoti, mapurisa, masoja, vasori pamwe chete ne madzishe ayo ari kupomerwa mhosva nyekutyora bumbiro remutemo. Muzvare Hilda Sibanda, mutungamiriri weRenewal Democrats of Zimbabwe vanoti mapurisa eZRP ari pamberi pakukonzera mhirizhonga. “Isu semusangano tinoona sekuti ndiwo anotonyanyokuwedzera mhirizhonga semufananidzo we mapurisa kuNorton aitorova vanhu vari kudivi rerimwe bato iro riri kutonga.” VaJefreson Chitando veZimbabwe People First vakashoropodza mauto vachiti vari kushungurudza vanhu. “Tinoona kuti bumbiro renyika riri kubvorongwa ne masoja ayo ari kufamba achishungurudza vanhu uye varikufamba vachimanikidza vanhu kuti vavhotere musangano we Zanu PF saka isu toona sekuti ndizvo zvakashata.” Vanoongorora zvematongerwe enyika Dr Takavafira Zhou avo vanotungamirawo sangano rePTUZ vakataurawo pamusangano uyu vakati mamwe mapazi ehurumende ari kukundikana ndee matare edzimhosva pamwe nemadzishe. “Vematare kana vaita basa ravo vapa kutonga kwavo vanoshoropodzwa saka vamwe vakutotsigira bato apowo madzishe kumaruzevha vanogova chikafu vachinyima avo vekumapato anopikisa saka izvi zvinoda kudzivirirwa kuti mapazi akadai akurudzire runyararo munyika.” Asi vaimirira Zanu PF pamusangano uyu, VaDaniel Shumba vanova nhengo yeparamende ye Masvingo Urban, vakaramba kuti musangano we Zanu PF unoshandisa mapazi ehurumende kunkonzera mhirizhonga. “Toda kugadzira kuti dai ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika rwaziva chokwadi pane kungoita ruzha pasina ruzivo, mapazi aya anofanira kutsigirwa nehurumende kana yadaro inokanganiswa nevekunze kwenyika vanoda kubvisa hurumende pachigaro chekutonga.” Asi vemasangano akazvimiririra vanoti vatungamiriri ve mauto, mapurisa pamwe nemadzishe vanogara vachitaura kuti vanotsigira mutungamiriri we Zanu PF VaRobert Mugabe nokudaro izvi zvinoita kuti vazotumwa kuita zvakaipa kuvatsigiri vemapato anopikisa. Vakatizve mhirizhonga iri kuitika munyika ichikonzerwa nemapurisa nemauto inoratidza kuti sarudzo dzekusarudza mutungamiriri wenyika muna 2018 dzinogona kuona mhirizhonga yakawanda nekudeuka kweropa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba kanawo vatauriri vemauto.

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa Vonanga kuMaputo kuMusangano weSADC Troika
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kusimuka vakananga kuMaputo kumusangano weSADC Double Troika, uyo uri kutarisirwa kuzeya dambudziko rekusagadzikana kwakatarisana nedunhu rekuchamhembe kweAfrica pamwe nehondo iri mudunhu reCabo Delgado muMozambique. Nhepfenyuro yeZBC inoti VaMnangagwa vachatungamira chikwata cheZimbabwe chichange chichinopinda mumusangano uyu. Mozambique ndiyo ine husachigaro hweSADC Troika pari zvino, uye Malawi ndiyo yave kuzotarisirwa kutora chigaro ichi. SADC iri kutarisirwa kutumira mauto kudunhu reCabo Delgabo kuitira kuti abatsire hurumende yeMozambique kupedza hondo yakakonzerwa nevanopfurikidza mwero, iyo yasiya vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhhatu vatiza misha yavo. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa mavhinga, vanoti zvakakosha kuti VaMnangagwa vabatane nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC kumusangano uyu, asi vatungamiri ava havafanirwe kukanganwawo kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu vavo. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Yozeya Mutemo weSarudzo weElectoral Amendment Bil
text: Dare reNational Assembly riri kuzeya mutemo wesarudzo weElectoral Amendment Bill, uye chibvumirano chemapato ezvematongerwo enyika chekuita sarudzo dzakachena dzisina mhirizhonga, cheElectoral Code of Conduct for Political Parties and Candidates and Other Stakeholders chapinzwawo mubhiri iri kuti chive mumutemo wesarudzo. Bhiri iri rakanangana nekuvanduza mitemo yesarudzo kuti nyika ikwanise kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Zvimwe zviri kudiwa nemapato anopikisa kuti mapato aya avewo nechekuita pamwe nekuongorora kudhindwa kwemagwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot papers. Mapato aya anodawo kuti mitemo yesarudzo usungire mapato kuti ape mukana wakaenzana kuvanhukadzi nevanhurume pazvinzvimbo zvese zvino kwikwidzwa musarudzo. Chibvumirano chemapato chekuita sarudzo dzakachena icho chapinzwa mumitemo yesarudzo, chinorambidza nyaya dzemhirizhonga uye chinosungira kuti vemapato, vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, vanokwikwidza musarudzo vapanane mukana pamwe nekuregawo vamwe vachitaura pfungwa dzavo pamwe nekupinda mumisangano pamadiro. Chibvumirano ichi chinosungurirawo kuti vanhu vapihwe mukana wekuzvishambadza uye chinoti vaye vachazenge vachibvisa kana kubvarurwa zvinyorwa zvevamwe kana kuti maposters, varangwe nemutemo. No media source currently available Chibvumirano ichi chinorambidzawo kutenga vavhoti kana kutyityidzira vanhu kuti vavhotere bato rinenge richida munhu. Chinorambidzawo vemapato kuti vataure zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo zvisati zvaziviswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vati danho rekuisa chibvumirano chemapato mumutemo wesarudzo chakanaka chose. VaMadhuku vati sezvo wave mutemo vanenge vautyora vacharangwa. Vati kana mutemo mutsva wesarudzo ukatevedzwa, nyika inogona kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Chibvumirano ichi chinosungirawo vemapato ezvematongerwe enyika kurega vatapi venhau vachipinda mumisangano yawo yekutsvaga rutsigiro pamwe nekuvachengetedza. Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati vanofara nenyaya yekuti vatapi venhau vachengetedzwe pavenenge vachiita basa ravo. VaMoyo vati vatapi venhau vanogara vachishungurudzwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika zvikuru munguva yesarudzo uye mutemo unofanira kubuda nezvirango zvakaomarara kune vanoshungurudza vatapi venhau. Dare richiri kuzeya bhiri iri uye rinotarisirwa kuripasisa chero nguva

headline: Boka rePlatform of Concerned Citizens, PCC, Roronga Musangano weKuzeya Mamiriro eZVinhu Munyika
text: Vatungamiri vemapato ose ezvematongerwo enyika vari kutarisirwa kusangana nemusi weChina muHarare kumusangano wekuzeya matambudziko ari munyika pamwe nekutsvaga nzira dzingashandiswa kuti paumbwe hurumende ichafanobata matomu, kana kuti National Transitional Authority. Vamwe vari kutarisirwa kupinda musangano uri kukokerwa nePlatform of Concerned Citizens (PCC) uyu vamiriri vemasangano akazvimirira, vadzidzi, vechidiki pamwe nemadzimai. Mumwe wevari kuronga musangano uyu, Doctor Ibbo Mandaza vanoti chinangwa chemusangano wavo ndechekunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pamusoro mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. "Musangano wacho tadaidzira kuti tione kuti maZimbabweans senyika vanoti chiinenyaya ye crisis yatatarisana nayo senyika yeZimbabwe. Ndo main purpose yedu yemusangano wemusi weChina," Doctor Mandaza vanodaro. Vanoti nyaya yekuti ndiani achatora masimba kana VaMugabe vachinge vasiya chigaro iri kunetsa, saka boka ravo riri kuda kudzivirira mhere nekuurayana kuburikidza nekuumbwa kwe National Transitional Authority. "Inenge iri nguva yekuti makore maviri or 18 months,vanhu vagara pasi vaine National Transitional Authority yevanhu vasiri ma politicians asi vanhu vakanangana nekuti nyika ipore." Vanoti kusvika pari zvino vatungamiri vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika vazivisa kuti vachange vari pamusangano uyu vanosanganisira VaTendai Biti vePeople’s Democtratic Party, VaDumiso Dumiso Dabengwa vebato reZapu pamwe naVaSimba Makoni veMavambo/Kusile/Dawn. Asi Doctor Mandaza vanoti havasati vanzwa kubva kumapato anoti MDC T yaVaMorgan Tsvangirai, Zimbabwe People First yaAmai Joice Mujuru, pamwe neZanu PF inotungamirirwa naVaRobert Mugabe. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo harisi kukwanisa kuve pamusangano uyu sezvo pari zvino riri kumbonangana nekurwisa kuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ivandudzwe riri pasi pemubatanidzwa weNERA. Ukuwo mutauriri weZimbabwe People First, VaJealousy Mawarire vatiwo mutungamiri webato ravo Amai Mujuru havakwanisi kunge vari pamusangano uyu nemusi weChina sezvo vachisimuka kuenda kuSouth Africa zuva iroro kumusangano wavari kuronga kuita neMugovera. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kudivi reZanu PF kana VaMugabe vachabudirira kunge varipo pamusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Inoti VaChiwenga Havana Simba reKumisa Sarudzo
text: Danho rehurumende rekumbomisa kuitwa kwesarudzo dzemaby-elections riri kukonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemitemo uye vesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Commission kana kuti ZHRC vachibatana nemamwe masangano vachikurudzira hurumende kuti ione kuti sarudzo idzi dzaitwa sezviri kuitwa kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita seMalawi neTanzania. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga vanovazve gurukota rezvehutano vakadzika mutemo wechimbi chimbi wekumisa kuitwa kwesarudzo kana kuti Statutory Instrument, ( SI 225A /2020 of the Public Health COVID-19 prevention, Containment and Treatment) (Amendment) Regulations 2020, No. 4.). Asi paramende inoti uku kutyora bumbiro remitemo. ZHRC inoti kudzingwa kwemakanzura nenhengo dzeparamende kuri kusiya vanhu vakawanda vasina anovamiririra zvopa kuti vasawane zvavanotarisira kuhurumende nemakanzuru. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaChiwenga neZimbabwe Electoral Commission vakatoendeswa kumatare nevari kuda kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi nemamwe masangano vachinzi vari kutyora mutemo nekusaita sarudzo idzi. VaChiwenga vakati sarudzo dzamiswa nenyaya yekutyira kupararira kweCovid-19. Sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vaudza Studio 7 kuti havachakwanise kutaura sezvo nyaya yave kumatare. Mutauriri webato reNCA VaMaddock Chivasa vati vanotambira danho rekumiswa kwesarudzo. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance VaClifford Hlatywayo vati uku kutyora mutemo. No media source currently available

headline: VaCharamba Vonyomba Vamwe muZanu PF Vari Kurwira Chigaro chaVaMugabe
text: Kunetsana uku kwakabuda zvekare neChina apo gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro soro , VaJonathan Moyo, vakakandirana makobvu nematete nemunyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaGeorge Charamba. Makakatanwa, kukandirana makobvu nematete, uye kunyombana kuri kuenderera mberi muZanu PF apo mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kumusangano weAfrican Union uri kuitirwa kuEthiopia. Mubato iri munonzi mune kunetsana pakati pechikwata chinonzi chiri kutsigira mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangangwa, nechimwe chinonzi Generation 40 icho chinonzi chine nhengo dzakaita saAmai Grace Mugabe, gurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, pamwe nemuzukuru waVaMugabe, Va Patrick Zhuwawo, vanova gurukota rezvevechidiki. No media source currently available VaMugabe vakanzi havo neZanu-PF ndivo vachamirira bato muna 2018 asi nyaya yekuti vari kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri iri kupa kuti vanhu varwire chigaro chavo. Kunetsana uku kwakabuda zvekare neChina apo gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro soro , VaJonathan Moyo, vakakandirana makobvu nematete nemunyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaGeorge Charamba. VaCharamba vakaita hurukuro nenhenpfenyuro yeZiFM vachirova havo imbwa vakaviga mupini vachiti pane vamwe muZanuPF vanoshandisa dande mutande retwitter kurwa hondo yekuda kutsiva VaMugabe vachinyomba vamwe. VaMoyo havana kutora nguva vakabva vaenda patwiter vachinyomba VaCharamba vachiti VaCharamba vainge voshandisa hofisi yavo zvisizvo vachitsigira chimwe chikwata chezvematongerwo enyika mubato reZanu-PF Asi mutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vati havana zvakawanda zvekutaura sezvo dare ravo repolitburo risati ragara, uye vakati havaone havo vachidaidzira musangano wekuzeya nyaya iyi kunze kwekunge mumwe munhu aikwidza kuvakuru vebato. VaKhaya Moyo vanoti vangatotaure havo nezvechirongwa chehurumende chekugadzirisa hupfumi che ZimAsset pane kutaura nezvenyaya yekunetsana mubato ravo panyaya yekuti ndiyani achatsiva VaMugabe kana vachinge vasiya chigaro. Nyanzvi inoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vari mubhodhi resangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Muzvare Gladys Hlatywayo, zvinhu zvanyanyisa kuita manyama amire nerongo muZanu-PF.

headline: Bato Rinopikisa reCCC Roparura Gwaro Raro Rine Zvarinoti Zvigadziriswe Sarudzo Dzisati Dzaitwa
text: Bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change, CCC rinotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, nhasi riri kuparura gwaro raro rinonzi PRE-ELECTION PACT ON ELECTORAL REFORMS, kana kuti PREPARE, iro rine zvinhu zvinomwe zvarinoti zvinofanirwa kutanga zvavandudzwa sarudzo dza 2023 dzisati dzaitwa. s Mutauriri weCCC, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere, vanoti mutungamiri webato ravo, VaNelson Chamisa, vakatara gore rino ra 2022 segore rekuti mitemo inobata sarudzo ivandudzwe kuitira kuti sarudzo dza 2023 dzitambirike nemapoka ose achakwikwidza. Muzvare Mahere vanoti zviri mugwaro ravo zvinomwe zvavanoda kuona zvichivandudzwa zvinoti wese mwana weZimbabwe ari kunze kwenyika kana mujeri apiwe kodzero yake yekuvhota sezviri mubumbiro remitemo, gwaro revavhoti riongororwe, chetatu, zvabuda musarudzo zviziviswe paine nguva. Chechina vanoti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, ishandirwe nevanhu vasina kwavakarerekera, kwete kungozara mauto nenhengo dzeZanu PF chete. Chechishanu Muzvare Mahere vanoti bato ravo riri kuda kuti mashandiro emasangano enhau ari pasi pehurumende avandudzwe kuitira kupa mukana kumapato anopikisa. Chechitanhatu vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kuvhota vakasununguka, uye chechinomwe vachiti vanoda kuti nhengo dzemapato anopikisa dzisangoshungurudzwa misangano yadzo ichivhiringidzwa nekurambidzwa nemapurisa kana nenhengo dzebato riri kutonga. Bato iri rinoti rakoka mapoka ose ane chekuita nesarudzo munyika anosanganisira masangano akazviomirira, venhau, vamiriri veparamende, makanzura, vamiriri vedzimwe nyika pamwe nemapazi ehurumende neZEC kuti vange varipo pakuparurwa kwegwaro ravo iri. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanofanira Kutenda Mauto Akavaisa Panyanga
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti kunyange hazvo VaEmmerson Mnangangwa vaikodzera kuva mutungamiri webato ravo reZanu PF pamwe nehurumende nekuda kwehukuru hwavo, mukana uyu wakanga wapedzwa kutanga kwemwedzi uno apo vakadzingwa zvese muhurumende nemubato. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti VaMnangagwa vanofanira kutenda mauto nekuvadzora pamwe nekuvagadza pachigaro chekutungamiri nyika. Pakadzingwa VaMnangagwa, vamwe vakaona sekuti VaMnangagwa vakange vaparara munyaya dzematongerwe enyika. Zvichitevera kudzingwa muhurumende, VaMnangagwa vakambonopotera kuSouth Africa asi vakanyora tsamba vachiti vaizodzoka munyika mukati menguva pfupi kuzotonga, Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika zvakare vachidzidzisa pachikoro cheSokusi University, VaTinashe Muzamindo, vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti pange pagara paine hurongwa hwekuti VaMnangagwa vatore chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika. Vati kuita kwemauto kunoratidza kuti vanga vakaronga nechakare uye change chasara inguva chete. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaVivid Gwede, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hazvina kuvashamisa kuti mauto akatsigira VaMnangagwa pakurwisana kwaitika mubato reZanu PF. Vati chikwata cheG40 change chisina vanhu vakaenda kuhondo vanga vari pamusoro, nekudaro mauto akaita zvaakataura kare kuti haazotsigira munhu asina kuenda kuhondo kuti atonge Zimbabwe. VaGwede vanoti mauto haana kufara nekudzingwa kwaVaMnangagwa uye zvange zvave pachena kuti Amai Grace Mugabe, kana mumwe wavo muchikwata cheG40, ndiye atozotungamira nyika sezvo VaMugabe vakwegura. Vati izvi ndizvo zvakazoita kuti mauto atange Operation Restore Legacy apo akasunga nhengo dzechikwata cheG40 pamwe nekubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro. Ukuwo bato rakabva radzora VaMnangagwa ndokuvadoma semutungamiri waro pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika. Asi VaGwede naVaMuzamindo vanoti kunyange hazvo veruzhinji vari kufara nekuenda kwaVaMugabe, vanofanira kuziva kuti mauto anogona kutadza kutambiraa zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo kana pakakunda munhu asina kurwa muhondo sekutaura kwawo. VaGwede vanoti zvakakosha kuti vatungamiri venyika vabviswe nesarudzo. Muna 2008, bato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rakakunda musarudzo dzeparamende nemutungamiriri wenyika asi mauto akaramba kuti VaMugabe vabve pachigaro izvo zvakazoita kuti paumbwe hurumende yemubatanidzwa. Vakawanda vanoti vanotyira kuti mauto achapindira zvakare musarudzo kana VaMnangagwa nebato ravo vakakundwa gore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Masimba eParamende eKutonga Nhengo Dzayo Ovandudzwa
text: Hurongwa hwekuwandudza mitemo yenyika kuti ifambirane nebumbiro idzva remitemo hunonzi hwuri kuratidza kufamba negwara zvichitevera kugazetwa kwebhiri reGeneral Laws Amendment Bill svondo rapera. Bhiri iri rinonzi riri kuda kuti mitemo ingangosvika zana nemakumi mashanu, kusanganisira mutemo uchatapudza masimba edare reparamende mukuranga kwaro nhengo dzinenge dzatsautsira, ivandudzwe. Bhiri iri rinonzi riri kuda kuti paramende itorerwe masimba ekuendesa kujeri munhu anenge atsautsira, asi kuti abhadhariswe faindi, kana kuti pane dzimwe mhosva, paramende itsvage rubatsiro rwehofisi yemuchuchisi mukuru wenyika, kwete kuti iyo paramende itonge nhengo iyi. Mukokeri wenhengo dzeMDC T mudare reparamende, VaInnocent Gonese, vanoti kunyange hazvo vasati vaona bhiri iri, vanotsigira pfungwa yekuti matare edzimhosva atore iwo masimba ekuranga nhengo dzinenge dzatsautsira, kwete kuti vadare varangane pachavo. VaGonese vanoti dzimwe nguva vadare muparamende vanotonga mhosva vachitarisa kuti munhu abuda mumba maani kana kuti ane ruvara rwakadii. Nyaya inouya mupfungwa dzevakawanda ndeye vaive mumiriri weChimanimani mudare iri, VaRoy Bennett veMDC-T, avo vakakandwa mujeri mugore ra 2005 vachipomerwa mhosva yekurova vaive gurukota rezvemitemo panguvayo, VaPatrick Chinamasa. Paramende yakakanda VaBennett mujeri kwegore rose, danho rakaonekwa nevakawanda senzira yekupfidzisa vanopikisana nebato reZanu PF. Asi VaGonese vanoti zvanga zvatora nguva yakanyanya kureba pasati pabatanidzwa mitemo iyi, vachiti izvi zvaifanirwa kunge zvakaitika kare pakangotambirwa bumbiro remitemo idzva. Bhiri iri rave kutarisirwa kuverengwa muparamende kekutanga risati razeyiwa nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemitemo. No media source currently available

headline: Munyori Mukuru weUnited Nations Okurudzira Kupera kweHondo muUkraine
text: Munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaAntonio Guterres vaita musangano nemutungamiri wenyika yeUkraine VaVolodymyr Zelenskyy muguta guru renyika iyi reKyiv vakati kurwiswa kwenyika iyi neRussia kuri kupa kuti vanhuwo zvavo varasikirwe nehupenyu. VaGuterres vashanyira nzvimbo dzakaita seBorodianka, Irpin neBucha uko kwakawanikwa mitumba yevanhu vakaurayiwa pakabuda mauto eRussia munzvimbo idzi. Izvi zvakapa kuti vakawanda vati idzi dzitorwe semhosva dzehondo dzinofanira kuongororwa. VaGuterres vakurudzira Russia kuti ishande neInternational Criminal Court mukuongorororwa kwenyaya iyi. Vatiwo vari kuda kuti vanhu vemuUkraine vapihwe chikafu zvinova zvavati vakataurawo nemutungamiri wenyika yeRussia VaVladimir Putin. Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vanotiwo vaendesa kuCongress chikumbiro chekuti vakwanise kutumira zvimwe zvombo nerubatsiro kuUkraine. Vanoongogora nyaya dzezvehupfumi VaMasimba Kuchera vanoti hondo iyi iri kukukonzera matambudziko makukutu kunyika dzakaita seZimbabwe dzi sezvo kunyika iyi kuchitengwa gorosi, chibage nemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. No media source currently available

headline: VaZelenskyy Voshanyira America Nhasi
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeUkraine VaVolodymyr Zelenskyy vari kutarisirwa kushanyira America nhasi vachiita musangano nemutungamiri wenyika iyi VaJoe Biden. VaZelenskyy vari kutarisirwawo kutaura pamberi pematare eSenate neHouse of Representatives akabatana. Aka ndekekutanga Zelenskyy vachibuda munyika mavo kubva muna Kukadzi pakatanga kurwiswa nyika yavo neRussia. VaZelenskyy vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti vari munzira kuenda kuWashington DC. Mumwe mukuru muhurumende yeAmerica ati VaZelenskyy vakakokwa naVaBiden kuti vaite musangano navo, nezvipangamazano zvavo munyaya dzekudzivirirwa kwenyika uye dare remakurukota. Nemusi weChipiri vasati vasimuka kuuya kuAmerica, Zelenskyy vakaenda kuBakhmut iko kunzoni kune kurwisana kunotyisa pakati pemauto avo neRussia. Vakuru muhurumende yeAmerica vanoti VaBiden vari kutarisirwa kuzivisa kuti vachapa Ukraine zvombo zvekuzvidzivirira nemuchadenga kana kuti "Patriot missile batteries." Mutauriri wehurumende yeRussia VaDmitry Peskov vaudza vatori venhau muRussia kuti kupa Ukraine zvombo iyi kuchapa kuti kupedza hondo kunetse.

headline: Dare reHigh Court Rinobvuma Chikumbiro chevana vaMushakabvu Mugabe Chekuti Vapikise Kufukunyurwa kweMutumbi Wavo
text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court nemusi weChina rakabvuma chikumbiro chevana vevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe chekuti vapikise mutongo wekuti mutumbi wababa vavo ufukunyurwe unovigwa kunovigwa magamba enyika kuHeroes Acre. Vachipa mutongo wavo kuburikidza negwaro, vatongi vedare repamusoro vanoti Justice Fatima Maxwell naJustice Amy Tsanga vakawirirana kuti vana vaVaMugabe vanoti Bona Mutsahuni Mugabe, Tinotenda Robert Mugabe Jnr. naBellarmine Chatunga vane kodzero pamutemo kupikisa mutongo waMambo Zvimba wekuti mutumbi wababa vavo ufukunyurwe kwavakavigwa kumusha kwavo kwaZvimba kuti vanovigwa kumarinda anovigwa magamba kuHeroes Acre kuHarare. Vana vaVaMugabe vainge vapikisa mutongo waMambo Zvimba kudare ramejasitiriti muChinhoyi asi mutongi Amai Ruth Moyo vainge varasa chikumbiro ichi vachiti vana ava havakwanise kupikisa mutongo waMambo Zvimba sezvo vainge vasiri ivo vainge vaendeswa kudare raMambo asi Amai vavo Grace Mugabe. Asi dare repamusoro iri rakati vana ava vane kodzero yakazara. Rimwe remagweta evana vaVaMugabe, VaFungai Chimwamurombe vaudza Studio 7 kuti mutongo uyu unopa vana ava kodzero yekupikisa mutongo waMambo. VaChimwamurombe vati vave kutonyorera Mejasitiri Moyo nezvemutongo wedare repamusoro uyu kuti vavape zuva richanzwikwa nyaya iyi. Mutauriri wemhuri yekwaMugabe ari muzukuru waVaMugabe, VaLeo Mugabe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vasati vapirwa nezvemutongo uyu. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Mambo Zvimba kuti tinzwewo divi ravo pamutongo uyu sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isingadairwi. Nyaya yenzvimbo yekuvigwa kwaVaMugabe yakanetsa kubva pavakafa makore maviri apera kusvika nhasi. Vamwe vanoti dai varega mutumbi wevaive mutungamiri wenyika ava wazorora murugare.

headline: VaBiden Vanokunda VaTrump Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weAmerica
text: Vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica zvichitevera kukunda kwavaita mudunhu rePennsylvania.  VaBiden, avo vane makore makumi manomwe nemasere ekuberekwa, vatora zvigaro zvose makumi maviri zve electoral college zvemudunhu rePennsylvania ndokuita zvigaro zvinodarika mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe vachidarika zvigaro zvinodiwa kuti munhu adomwe semunhu akakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaBiden vakunda mutungamiri weAmerica pari zvino, VaDonald Trump, avo vakabuda pachena kuti vari kupikisa mumatare maverengerwo akaitwa mavhoti mumamwe matunhu emuAmerica.  VaBiden vachaitwa mutungamiri weAmerica wechimakumi mana nematanhatu apo vachagadzwa zviri pamutemo muna Ndira gore rinouya. Kukunda kwaVaBiden kunoreva kuti mutevedzeri wavo, Amai Kamala Harris, vari kupinda munhoroondo yekuva mudzimai wekutanga, uye ari mutema, kuva mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika munhoroondo yeAmerica yemakore mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemana.  VaBiden vakashanda vari mutevedzeri waVaBarack Obama kubva muna 2009 kusvika muna Ndira 2017, apo pakatoreswa VaTrump mhiko yekuva mutungamiri wenyika mushure mekukunda Amai Hilary Clinton musarudzo yakaitwa muna Mbudzi 2016. VaBiden vakashandawo senhengo yedare Senate kwemakore makumi matatu nematanhatu. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika uye vari mudzidzisi paDeVry University kuOhio, Professor Elliot Masocha, vanoti zvanga zviri pachena kuti VaBiden vachakunda musarudzo iyi. Asi VaMasocha vanoti VaBiden vane mutoro mukuru wekugadzirisa zvinhu munyika pamwe nekunze kwenyika zvavati zvakavhiringwa naVaTrump. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inonzi Inogona Kuendeswa kuMatare neKuroverera VaMaingehama naVaMadzokere Mhosva Yavasina Kupara
text: Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu Amai Beatrice Mtetwa avo rakamirirawo nhengo dzeMDC dzakatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore makumi maviri VaLast Maingehama naVaTungamirai Madzokere vanoti neMuvhuro vachataura nevatori venhau kuti votora matanho api kuhurumende nekuvakanda mujeri kwemakore vasina mhosva. Amai Mtetwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya yekuti vaende kumatare iri kuna VaMaingehama naVaMadzokere asi vanoti pane mukana mukuru wekuti vachada kuripwa. Vaviri ava vange chipomerwa mhosva yekuponda mupurisa VaPetros Mutedza paGlen View 3 Shopping Centre muna 2011. VaMaingehama, VaMadzokere naMuzvare Yvonne Musarurwa vakazobatwa nemhosva yekuponda nemutongi wedare repamusoro VaChinembiri Bhunu muna 2016 ndokuendeswa kujeri reChikurubi. Asi mutongi wedare repamusoro soro Amai Rita Makarau vakati vaviri ava havana mhosva zvakapa kuti vabve vaburitswa muhusungwa. Muzvare Musarurwa vakaburitswa muhusungwa muna 2018 mushure mekupihwa ruregerero nemutungamiri wenyika pakaburitswa vamwe vasungwa. Asi mumwe ainge anziwo ane mhosva Muzvare Rebecca Mafukeni akashaya ari mutirongo akamirira kutongwa. Vana ava vaive pachikwata chevechidiki veMDC makumi maviri nevapfumbamwe vakasungwa muna 2011 vachipomerwa mhosva yekutema nematombo inspector Mutedza vachibva vashaya. Vazhinji vainge vasungwa ava vakabva vasungunurwa vachinzi Havana mhosva. Gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe vari kugara vachiendeswa kumatare nemhosva dzekutyorwa kunenge kwaitwa mutemo nemapurisa. Mwedzi wapera VaKazembe vakapotsa vakandwa mujeri mushure mekunonoka kubhadhara mari inodarika zviuru zana gumi nemakumi pfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe nemazana mashanu kana kuti RTGS 199, 500 kuna VaSimon Mandoza mumwe mudzidzi wekuGweru vainge varohwa nemapurisa muHarare vakangozvimirira havo. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuna VaKazembe negurukota rezvemitemo vaZiyambi Ziyambi sezvo vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira tisati taenda pamhepo. Asi VaKumbirai Mafunda mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights sangano rakashanda naAmai Mtetwa naVaCharles Kwaramba panyaya yenhengo dzeMDC idzi vanotiwo pane mangwana vanotarisira kuti VaMaingehama naVaMadzokere vajekesere vatori venhau matanho avari kuronga kutora. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoramba Kuti VaNgarivhume Vabuditswe Mujeri reChikurubi Umo Vonyimwa Chikafu
text: Mutongi wedare ramejastiriti muHarare VaTrynos Utahwashe vave kutarisirwa nemusi weChishanu kuti vape mutongo wavo wekuti mutungamiri webato rinopikisa retransform Zimbabwe VaJacob Ngarivhume vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso here kana kuti kwete. Nyaya yaVaNgarivhume yange iri mudare zvekare nhasi gweta ravo VaMoses Nkomo vachikumbira kuti vaburitswe mujeri reChikurubi Maximum Prison sezvo kuratidzira kwavanonzi vaironga musi wa 31 Chikunguru kwakadarika pasina kana mhirizhonga. Dare iri nerepamuso akambormba kupa VaNgarivhume mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso asi VaNkomo vakumbira kuti vabviswe madhora zviuru zvishanu semari yechibatiso pamwe nekuti vagare kumba kwavo kuWaterfalls kwavakasungirwa uye kuti vaende kunozviratidza kamwechete pasvondo kumapurisa. Asi muchuchusi wehurumende VaMichael Reza vapikisa kupiwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso uku vachiti kunyangwe hazvo musi wa31 Chikunguru wakapfuura pane boka rakaumbwa rinonzi July 31 Movement ravanoti rinogona kuda kuramba richikurudzira kuti mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vabviswe pachigaro. VaNkomo vaudza vatori venhau kuti mutongo uchapihwa svondo rino. Vatiwo zvisinei nemutongo wakapiwa nedare svondo rapera wekuti VaNgarivhume vawaniswe zvekudya pamwe nekushanyirwa vari kujeri reChikurubi, izvi hazvisi kuitwa vachiti vekujeri vakati vaNgarivhume ngavaite zvekudya zvekutenga pamadandemutande izvo vati zvinoda mari yakawanda. Rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaMarufu Mandevere vati hazvina kunaka kuti vemajere vasatevedzere zvinenge zvataurwa nedare vachiti kuzvidza dare. VaNgarivhume vakasungwa mwedzi wapera pamwe nemutori wenhau VaHopewell Chin’ono vachipomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuratidzira. Asi vaviri ava vanoti kuratidzira ikodzero iri mubumbiro remitemo.

headline: MDC Alliance Yoronga Kusarudza Mutevedzeri waMeya weChitungwiza
text: Bato reMDC Alliance rinoti richaenderera mberi nekusarudza mutevedzeri wameya weChitungwiza richiti kudomwa kwemutevedzeri wameya kwakaitwa negurukota rematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, hakusi pamutemo. VaMoyo vakadoma nhengo yeZanu PF, VaKiven Mutimbanyoka, semutevedzeri wameya kutanga kwesvondo rino uye meya veChitungwiza, VaLovemore Maiko, vakatozivisa makanzura ese edhorobha iri nezvedanho iri. Asi munyori anoona nezvematunhu muMDC Alliance, VaSesil Zvidzai, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakaitwa naVaMoyo zviri kunze kwemutemo vachiti makanzura ndiwo achagara pasi achisarudza mutevedzeri wameya. Asi VaMoyo vakati kanzuru yeChitungwiza yainge yatadza kusarudza mutevedzeri wameya mukati menguva inotarisirwa kuita izvi ndosaka vakadoma VaMutimbanyoka vachishandisa mitemo yenyika inovapa simba rekuita izvi. Mukuru weChitungwiza Residents Trusts, Muzvare Alice Dian Kuvheya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakashamiswa nzvikuru nemaitiro aVaMoyo. Asi mukuru wesangano reHarare Metropolitan Residents Forum, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vaudza Studio 7kutikanzuru yeChitungwiza yakatadza kuita basa rayo vachiti ingadai yakasarudza mutevedzeri wameya gore rapfuura zvichitevera kudzingwa kwevaive mutevedzeri wameya nemamwe makanzuru. Kunyange hazvo mutevedzeri wameya akadzingwa basa musi wa4 Mbudzi gore rapfuura, munyori weChitungwiza akazivisa kuti chinzvimbo ichi chakange chisisina munhu musi wa18 Nyamavhuvhu nekudaro kanzuru ine mazuva makumi matatu kubva musi uyu kuti isarudze munhu anotora chnzvimbo izvi. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMoyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Pari zvino kanzuru yeChitungiwza ine makanzura makumi maviri, gumi nematanhatu eMDC Alliance nemana eZanu PF. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Votaura paKutoreswa Mhiko kwaVaLungu vekuZambia
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeZambia VaEdgar Lungu vakatoreswa mhiko nemusi weChipiri mushure mesarudzo dzakaitwa mwedzi wapera. VaLungu vakatora mhiko kunhandare yeHeroes Stadium muLusaka. Asi vemapato anopikisa vanoti sarudzo idzi dzakabirirwa uye VaLungu vaishandisa mhirizhonga. Valungu vanoti vari kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ndevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vashoma shoma vakange vari kuZambia. VaMugabe ndivo vakataura vakamirira vamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica. VaMugabe vati nyika dzine hutongo hwejekerere hadzidi vanhu vanoda kushandisa mhirizhonga kutora masimba. Vakatiwo Zambia yainge yabuda pachena kuti sarudzo ndidzo dzinofanira kushandiswa munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kuMulungushi University of Zambia VaShakespeare Hamauswa vanoti mashoko aVaMugabe akatambirwa zvakasiyana muZambia vamwe vachiti vainge vabaya dede nemukanwa asi vamwe vachishora vachiti makudo ndemamwe zvikuru vachitarisa nyaya yemhirizhonga. No media source currently available

headline: Nyaya yeMureza weNyika Yokonzera Mutauro muDare reParamende
text: Mureza weZimbabwe wakaunza kunetsana mudare reNational Assembly nemusi weChitatu mushure mekunge vange vakabata chinzvimbo chemutauriri wedare iri Amai MArble Chinomona vakaedza kudzinga mudare nhengo mbiri dzeMDC T idzo dzakapinda mudare dzakasungira mureza. Nhengo idzi VaTrevor Saruwaka, naVaGodfrey Sithole dzakaramba kubuda uye dzakabva dzatanga kutambidza vamwe vadzo mureza uyu izvo zvakaita kuti basa rimbomiswa mudare iri. Mureza wenyika wave kufarirwa pamwe nekupfekwa nevakawanda munyika zvichitevera chirongwa chamufundisi Evan Mawarire cheHash Tag This Flag icho chinokurudzira mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe kuti vaite zvavakavimbisa musarudzo nyika musarudzo dza2013 zvekupa vanhu mabasa, kumisa huori uye kugadzirisa hupfumi. Muchokoto watangwa nenhengo yedare iri yeZanu PF, VaOliver Mandipaka avo vakabvunza kuti sei VaSaruwaka NaVaSithole vainge vakasungira mireza muhuro asi dare iri rakapa mutongo neChipiri wekuti mureza uyu haufaniri kusungirwa mudare. Amai Chinomona vakabva vati nhengo dzeMDC T idzi dzibvise mureza asi vaviri avo vakaramba. Amai Chinomona vakabva vaudza mupurisa wedare iri kana kuti Segeant at Arms kuti vaburitse vaviri ava asi varamba kubva vatanga kutambidza mureza kune vamwe vavo. Mukuru wenhengo dzeMDC T mudare iri VaInnocent Gonese vati kusungira mureza kunoratidza kuti vanhu vari kufarira nyika yavo uye kuburitsa nhengo idzi mudare kunenge kuri kutyora kodzero dzavo. Asi Amai Chinomona vakaramba vakaomesa musoro. Mireza yakazobviswa mushure mekunge Amai Chinomona vati vaizomisa basa nhengo dzeparamende dzange dzichiramba kutevedza mutongo wavo. Zvichakadaro, makurukota ese ehurumende akatadza kuuya kuzopindura mibvunzo muparamende izvo zvakaita kuti nhengo dzeMDC dzipopote nekukumbira dare kuti rirange makurukota aya. VaGonese vakati yatova tsika yemakurukota aya yekusauuya kuparamende vakakurudzira kuti varangwe. Asi Amai Chinomona vati vange vaudzwa kuti makurukota aya ainge ari mumusangano wedare remakurukota nekudaro vatevedzeri vavo ndivo vange vakavamiririra. Mune imwewo nyaya, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvevashandi, VaTapiwa Matangaidze, vasveveredzwa nenhengo dzeparamende kubva kumapato anopikisa mushure mekunge vataura kuti hurumende ichiri kukwanisa kubhadhara vashandi vayo. Vange vachipindura mubvunzo kubva kuna muzvare Jessie Majome veMDC T wekuti sei hurumende iri kutadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo paine nguva. VaMatangaidze vanoti vanoshamiswa nekuti mapato anopikisa ari kushushikana nemari dzevashandi vehurumende kudarika vashandi vacho pachavo. Asi Muzvare Majome nevamwe vavo vati zvinokonzera kuti vashushikane nekuti vanomirira vashandi ava munzvimbo dzavo. Mwedzi wapfuura hurumende yakatadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo uye vakatozotambira mihoro yemwedzi wapera mwedzi uno. Mwedzi uno, hurumende haisati yabhadhara vashandi uye haisati yataura kuti vachatambira rini. No media source currently available

headline: Nzvimbo yeRujeko Yoshaikwa muBRV kuMasvingo
text: Vagari vazhinji vemumusha weRujeko kuMasvingo vanoti havasi kufara nekushaikwa kwenzvimbo yavanofanirwa kunyoresa mumishina yeBiometric Voter Registration, BVR, izvo zviri kuita kuti vatadze kunyoresa. Vagari ava vanoti vari kuenda kunzvimbo dzakatarwa asi vachikundikana kunyoresa sezvo nzvimbo yavanofanirwa kunyoresa isiri kuwanikiwa mumishina yeBVR. Mumwe mugari wemuRujeko, VaZivanai Muzorodzi, vanoti vakatadza kunyoresa kuti vazovhotera muwadhi yavo sezvo yakanga isiri kuwanikwa mumishina, vakazopedzisira vanyoresa kuti vavhotere kumusha kwavo kumaruwa. Vamwewo vakaita sa VaBrighton Ramusi vanoti vari kushamiswa zvikuru kuti sei mumsha wavo weRujeko usiri muBVR uku Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, iri kuti yakagadzirira zvakakwana. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa kuZEC mudunhu reMasvingo, Amai Getrude Murumbi, avo varamba kurekodhwa mashoko avo,vabvuma kuti kuRujeko kwaita dambudziko uye vatombomisa kunyoresa vanhu veikoko. Vatiwo dambudziko iri riri kugadziriswa nana mazvikokota vavo. Asi vamwe vagari vanoti vave kutyira kuti vangangotadza kuvhota uye ZEC haisi kufambisa mashoko akakwana kuvagari ichivaudza zvinodiwa kuti vanyorese. Nemamiriro akaita zvinhu muRujeko, Muzvare Esther Chimanikire, vanoti vave kutyira kodzero dzevanhu dzekuvhota kuti dzichambunyikidzwa. Zvichakadaro, vamwe vagari vemuMasvingo vanoti vashandi veZEC vari kutora nguva yakareba kunyoresa munhu muwe chete, vachiratidza sekuti havasi kugona basa iri nemazvo kunyange hazvo vakadzidziswa kushandisa michina iyi mitsva. Mumwe mugari wemuMasvingo, VaAnoziva Muguti, vanoti vabudirira kunyoresa nhasiasi havana kufara nenguva yatorwa kuti vapedzerwe. Chirongwa chekunyoresa kuvhota chakaparuwa musi wa 14 Gunyana uye chinopera musi wa 15 Ndira gore rinouya. Asi MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai yakwidza mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ZEC, pamwe negurukota rezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ichiti VaMugabe havana kutevedza zvinodiwa nemutemo pavakatara mazuva aya. MDC-T inotiwo ZEC haina kugadzirira zvakakwana kuitira kuti iite basa iri nemazvo. Nyaya iyi iri kunzwikwa mudare nemusi weChina. Munhu anotairisirwa kunyoresa anofanirwa kunge aine makore gumi nemasere kana kudarika, aine chitupa kana gwaro rekufambisa, gwaro rinoratidza pavanogara muguta, kana kuri kumaruva, tsamba yasabhuku, kanawo affidavit yakasainwa na Commissioner of Oaths, kanawo magweta nevamwe vanhu vanobvumirwa kuita basa iri. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Yotanga Chirongwa Kunyoresa Vanhu Vachavhota Pachishandiswa BVR
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vatara kuti kutanga svondo rinouya nemusi wa14 Gunyana kusvika musi wa15 Ndira 2018, Zimbabwe Elections Commission, ZEC, inofanira kutanga kuumba gwaro idzva revavhoti kana kuti biometric voters roll. VaMugabe vaita izvi kuburikidza negwaro rezvisiviso zvehurumende kana kuti “government gazette”. Izvi ndizvo zvinofanira kuitwa pasi pemutemo wesarudzo kana kuti Electoral Act, gwaro idzva risati raparurwa. Asi vachitaura neStudio7, sachigaro weZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vati hazvireve kuti vanobva vatanga kunyoresa vanhu musi wa14 Gunyana sezvo vachiri vakamirira mimwe michina yekunyoresa vanhu. No media source currently available Mukuru wesangano reElection Resource Centre, VaTawanda Chimhini, vati vari kufara nezvaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika sezvo vakagara vayambira ZEC kuti kuda kutanga kunyoresa vanhu pasina kuteverwa mutemo kwaizokonzera mutauro. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanorumbidza Muchakabvu Mandela kuMusangano weNelson Mandela Peace Summit
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, Va Emerson Mnangagwa, vapinda neMuvhuro mumusangano we Nelson Mandela Peace Summit uyo waitirwa mu New York kumucheto kwemisangano yeUnited Nations Annual General Assembly, UNGA, iri kuitwa muguta iri svondo rino. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, Va Mnangagwa varumbidza mabasa akaitwa naVaMandela mumazuva avo vachiti pasi rose harikanganwi zvakasiya zvaitwa naVaMandela panyika vachiri vapenyu. Va Mnangagwa vati vanhu havafaniri kungotaura mabasa aVaMandela vasingazadzisi nekuita zvido zvavo. VaMnangagwa vati VaMandela, avo vakava mutungamiri weSouth Africa wechitema wekutanga, munhu akagara mujeri kwemakore akawanda achirwira rusununguko rwemunhu wese wemuSouth Africa. Vamwe vanga vari pamusangano uyu vanosanganisira mutungamiri weSouth Africa, Va Cyrl Rhamaphosa, shirikadzi yaVaMandela, Amai Graca Machel. VaMnangagwa vakasanaganawo nemusi weSvondo nezvizvarwa zve Zimbabwe zvinogara mu America ne kuCanada umo vakataura nezvehurongwa hwehurumende yavo uye kukumbira vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika kuti vadzoke kumusha kuzobatsira mukusimudzira nyika vazoisawo ruoko mubudiriro nematongerwo enyika ye Zimbabwe. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwawo kutaura pamberi pemusangano mukuru uchaitwa nemusi weChitatu. Uyu musangano wekutanga waVaMnangagwa vachitaura semutungamiri wenyika. Kwemakore anodarika makumi matatu nemanomwe, vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vaitaura pamusangano wepagore weUNGA. Nguva zhinji VaMugabe vaitora mukana uyu kunyomba America neBritain nemadzisahwira adzo vachiti nyika idzi dzaipindira mumatongerwo enyika muZimbabwe dziine chinangwa chekuvabvisa pachigaro. Asi VaMugabe vakazobviswa pachigaro nemauto avo, achitungamirwa nemunhu wavakagadza pachigaro chemukuro wemauto ose, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakazoitwa mumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaMnangagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Chikumbiro chaHopewell Chin'ono Chinoramba Kutambirwa neDare
text: Dare ramajisitireti rarasa nhasi chikumbiro chemutori wenhau ane mukurumbira munyika, Hopewell Chin’ono, chekuti mhosva yaari kupomerwa iraswe. Dare iri rati mhosva yake achatanga kutongwa musi wa12 kusvika musi 14 Chikunguru. Vachipa mutongo wavo nhasi, mutongi wedare, Amai Vongai Muchuchuti Guwuriro, vati kunyange hazvo nyaya iri kupomerwa Chin’ono isina kujeka, ichajekeswa apo paachatongwa. Rimwe remagweta aChin’ono, VaGift Mtisi, vati dare ichokwadi kuti dare harina kutambira chikumbiro chavo richiti huchapupu hwenyaya huchabuda paichatongwa nyaya iyi. VaMtisi vati vabvumirana nevachuchusi kuti nyaya iyi itongwe muna Chikunguru. Chin’ono, uyo achatongwa achibva kumba kwake mushure mekubhadhara mari yechibatiso, ari kuramba nyaya iyi achiti ikodzero yake semutapi wenhau kufambisa mashoko. Chin’ono anonzi akakurudzira veruzhinji kuratidzira zvine mhirizhonga musi wa31 Chikunguru gore raperaachishandisa dandemutande rake reTwitter. Anonzi akaita izvi pamwe naVaJacob Ngarivhume nevamwe vakaita semumiriri weZengeza West, uye vari mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC Alliance, VaJob Sikhala, avo vari kumatarewo nemhosva imwe cheteyo. Mapurisa arambidza zvakare magweta aChin’ono kutaura nevatori venhau pasina chikonzero. Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa-Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinosuwisa kuti Chin’ono ava kutongwa nekuda kwebasa rake. Zvichakadai, mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Jeffrey Moyo, asungwa nemapurisa uye pari zvino ari mumaoko emapurisa paHarare Central Police Station. Moyo ari kubatsirwa nemagweta, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa naVaDougie Coltart, uye VaColart vaudza Studio7 kuti hazvisati zvajeka kuti Moyo asungirwei. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vati tivabate mangwana panyaya iyi. Zvichakadai VaMoyo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kusiya vatapi venhau vachishanda vakasununguka. Pataenda pamhepo Jeffrey Moyo ange achiri kukamba yemapurisa paHarare Central. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yoramba Kuti Yakatumira Mauto kuMozambique Kunorwisa Vanotsigira ISIS
text: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko vanick mangwana vari kuramba runyerekupe rwekuti Zimbabwe yakatumira mauto kuMozambique kunorwisa vanopfurikidza mwero vachitsigira chikwata cheIslamic State kana kuti ISIS. Vanopfurikidza mwero ava vari mudunhu reCao Delgado pedyo nemuganhu wenyika yeTanzania. Vanhu vanodarika churu chimwe chete vafa muMozambique nekuda kwehondo iyi. Nemusi weChishanu, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanova sachigaro webazi rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika dzemuSADC kana kuti SADC Organ on Politics and Defense vakaenda kunoita hurukuro nemutungamiri weMozambique VaFilipe Nyusi nezvekusagadzikana kwenyika iyi. Asi VaMangwana vari kuramba mashoko ekuti Zimbabwe yakatotumira mauto. ​Vanoti kana Zimbabwe ichida kuita izvi mune remangwana inotoita pasi peSADC. No media source currently available Munyori anoona nezvemutemo mubato rinopikisa reMDC VaInnocent Gonese vanova gweta vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti VaMnangagwa havakwanise kuita zano ndega vachitumira mauto kune imwe nyika vasina kusuma dare reparamende uye kana vakaita fungira mumoyo rwendo rwembwa vanofanira kusuma dare iri nechimbichimbi. No media source currently available

headline: Nyaya yeGukurahundi Yonzwikwa neChina Svondo Rinouya
text: Dare reHigh Court muBulawayo rati nyaya yechikumbiro chechimbi-chimbi chekuti hurumende imire hurongwa hwekuda kuviga vanhu vakauraiwa panguva yeGukurahundi ichanzwikwa svondo rinouya. Mutongi wedare reHigh Court Justice, Martin Makonese, vati vave kuzonzwa chikumbiro ichi musi weChina svondo rinouya mushure mekunge gweta rehurumende, Rejoice Hove, rakumbira kupiwa nguva yekunyatsogadzirira zvizere. Mumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaCharles Thomas, avo vanoti vakatochwa panguva yeGukurahundi, vachishanda pamwe nesangano reIbhetsu Likazulu, vakaendesa chikumbiro chechimbi-chimbi chekuti hurumende imbomira hurongwa hwairi kuda kuita hwekuviga patsva vanhu vakauraiwa panguva iyi. Muchikumbiro ichi VaThomas, avo vari kumiririrwa negweta VaNqobani Sithole, vakadoma mutumgamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe, nasachigaro weNational Peace and Reconciliation VaSelo Nare saivo vanhu vane chekuita nenyaya iyi VaSithole vati nyaya iyi ichinzwikwa svondo rinouya sezvo gweta rehurumende rakumbira nguva, izvo zvatambirwa nedare. Amai Jenni Williams avo vanove mutungamiri wemubatanidzwa wemasangano akazvimirira ega, weMatabeleland Collective, varimowo munyaya iyi vakazvimirira pachavo vega sezvo mubatanidzwa wavo uri iwe wakavamba chirongwa chekutaura nemutungamiri wenyika kuti nyaya yeGukurahundi igadziriswe. Pane mutemo wekuti kuviga vanhu patsva vakauraiwa nenzira seyeGukurahundi chinhu chinofanirwa kuitwa hurumende ichitungamidzwa pamberi. Pane vanhu vanopfuura zviuru makumi maviri vakauraiwa panguva yeGukurahundi pakati pemakore a1983 na1987 mumatunhu eMatabeleland neMidlands nechikwata chemauto chainzi Fifth Brigade. VaMnangagwa vaive gurukota rezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika panguva iyi mushakabvu Robert Mugabe vari mutungamiri wehurumende. Nyaya yeGukuruhandi inogara ichimutsa mutauro munyika nekuti vamwe vanoiwona seine chekuita nekurwisana kwemarudzi. Vamwe vanoti hurumende inifanirwa kubudisa pachena zvakaitika panguva iyi yokumbira ruregerero uye vakauraya vanhu ava votongwa kuitira kuti munyika muve nerunyararo rwechokwdi. Hurumende haisati yakumbira ruregerero panyaya iyi kusvika pari zvino.

headline: VaZuma Votarisirwa muZimbabwe neMusi weChina
text: Hurumende yeSouth Africa nemusi weMuvhuro yakaburitsa mashoko ekuti mutungamiri wenyika iyi VaJacob Zuma vari kutarisirwa kupinda muZimbabwe nemusi weChina kuzoita misangano yekudyidzana nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaZuma vachaenda nemakurukota akawanda anosanganisa gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika amai Maite Nkoana-Mashabane, gurukota rezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika amai Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaRob Davies; gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaMalusi Gigaba, gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvino VaDipuo Peters uye gurukota rezvevashandi Amai Mildred Oliphant. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaMike Bimha vanoti vanofunga kuti musangano uyu uchabatsira nyika mbiri idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Mapato Anopikisa Okurudzira Vanhu Kugara Kumba neMugovera
text: Mapato mana makuru anopikisa akurudzira neChishanu veruzhinji munyika kuti vacherechedze zuva rakawana nyika kuzvitonga neMugovera vari kudzimba dzavo achiti haazi kuzopinda mumhemberero dzakarongwa nehurmende yeZanu PF sezvo bato iri richishandisa mukana uyu kunyomba vamwe. No media source currently available Mapato aya anoti MDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, Mavambo Kusile Dawn, ZAPU neNational Consitutional Assembly anoti zvinosuwisa kuti vammwe vakarwira hondo yerusununguko vave kushungurudza vamwe vavo vechitema. Vachiverenga mashoko emapato ayo pachiitiko chapindwa naVaTsvangirai nemukuru weMKD VaSimba Makoni, munyori kukuru muMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati hapana chekupemberera sesvo vanhu vari kuyaura nenhamo nenzara. Vatiwo mapato avo azvipira kushanda pamwe chete kuti asunungure vanhu kubva kuhutongi hweZanu PF. Vakurudzira vanhu kuti vacherechedza zuva iri mudzvimba dzavo sezvo pasina chikonzero chekuenda kumhemberero dzinorongwa neZanu PF mumatunhu akasisyana siyana munyika. VaTsvangirai vati vaimbosienda kumhemberero idzi apo vaive muhurumende yemubatanidzwa asi vakazowona kuti hazvibatsiri sezvo vainyombwa pamhemberero idzi. Mutauririri weNCA, VaMaddock Chivasa,vati kutambura kuri kuita zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvichenda kunze kwenyika uko zviri kushungurudzwa sezviri kuitika kuSouth Africa pari zvino kunoratidza pachena kuti hurumende haina hanya nezvido zveveruzhinji. Asi bato ReZanu PF rinoti zvinhu zviri kufamba zvakanaka munyika uye richaita mhemberero kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium muHarare apo mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanotarisirwa kutaura. Munyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato iri, VaIgnatius Chombo, vanoti mhemberero idzi dzichaitwa pasi pedingindira rinosimbaradza kubatana, runyararo pamwe nekuzvida seznyika. Makurukota ematunhu anotarisirwawo kutaura mashoka aVaMugabe mumatunhu ese munyika.

headline: Imwe Nhengo yeKomisheni yeSarudzo muKenya Yopondwa Ukuwo VaOdinga Vachiramba Kutambira Zvakabuda Musarudzo
text: Vakakundwa musarudzo dzekuKenya VaRaila Odinga varamba kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo dzakakundwa naVaWilliam Ruto. VaOdinga vaudza vatori venhau kuti havana kufara nekufambiswa kwakaitwa sarudzo nekomisheni yeIndependent Electoral and Boundaries Commission. Nhengo ina panomwe dzekomisheni iyi dzakti sarudzo hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Mapurisa emuKenya ati mumwe komishina VaDaniel Musyoka vakawanikwa vakapondwa mushure mekupambwa nemusi weChina. Sachigaro IEBC iyi VaWafuli Chebukati vati nhengo dzekomisheni yavo dziri kushiungurudzwa zvakanayanya. VaOdinga vane mazuva manomwe ekuti vaende kumatare kunopikisa zvakabuda musarudzo. Asi kunyangwe pachine mutauro pakufambiswa kwesarudzo, mutungamiri wenyikaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakatotumira mashoko ekukorokotedza VaRuto nekukunda musarudzo. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly vari nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitemo Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku vati bumbiro remutemo weKenya rinobvumidza VaOdinga kupikisa zvakabuda musarudzo.

headline: Vaive Varwiri veHondo yeRusununguko Vapfumbamwe Vange Vari Muhusungwa Voregererwa
text: Gweta riri kumirira vaimbove varwiri vehondo yerusununguko vapfumbamwe vange vari muhusungwa, VaPaidamoyo Saurombe, vanoti vsungwa ava vazoregedzwa vahienda kudzimba dzavo nhasi mambakwedza kunyangwe hazvo vange vambonzi vachamiswa pamberi pedare. VaSaurombe vanoti zvinhu zvinokatyamadza kuti vaive varwiri verusununguko vanobatwa nekuseri kweruoko zvakadayi panguva ino yeCovid-19. VaSaurombe vaudza Studio7 kuti zvakanga zvichiitwa nevanhu ava zvakange zviri pamutemo sezvo vakange vachida kunyatsonzwa zvizere pamusoro pemari dzavanopihwa idzo vanoti dzishoma.    Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvoronga Kuratidzira Pamberi peMusangano weUNGA
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kuronga kunoratidzira kuNew York, panguva ichaitwa musangano weUnited Nations General Assembly, UNGA, wechimakumi manomwe nembiri, uyo mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari kutarisirwa kupinda svondo rinouya. Mumwe wevari kutungamira hurongwa uhwu, Muzvare Savanna Madamombe vanoti vane zvakawanda zvavari kunyunyuta nazvo zvinosanganisira kurambidzwa kuvhota kwevari kunze kwenyika uye kuti hurumende haisi kuzvipa mukana wekutaura nhuna dzavo. Muzvare Madamombe vanoti zvimwe zviri kuvashungurudza kushandiswa kwemari kwavanoti kusina kutsarukana munzendo dzaVaMugabe, avo vanonzi vari kutarisirwa kusimuka nechikwata chevanhu vanodarika makumi manomwe. Zvinonzi mumwe nemumwe wevanhu ava, avo vanonzi vanosanganisira mhuri yavo, anonzi achange achipiwa mari inoita chiuru nemazana mashanu emadhora semari yekushandisa pazuva. Gore roga roga zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoungana muNew York zvichiratidzira panoitwa musangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: HATITYE SRI LANKA: GEMS
text: ari kuLIVERPOOL, England naAbel Ndooka ari muHARARE KAPUTENI wechikwata chenyika chenetball chemaGems — Perpetual Siyachitema — anoti vacharwa semvumba uye vanoda kusimudzira mureza weZimbabwe kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup ayo ari kuitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland.   Achitaura neKwayedza, Siyachitema anoti maGems achatamba nemwoyo wose kuti vagohwina mitambo yavo vagopedza vari pakati pezvikwata zvikuru zviri kumakwishu aya.   MaGems ari muboka reGroup A umo achasangana nezvikwata zvinoti Australia — iyo inove shasha ine mukombe wenetball — Sri Lanka neNorthen Ireland.   Mutambo wekutanga wechikwata chenyika ichi uriko musi weChishanu chino apo chichasangana neSri Lanka kunhandare yeM&S Bank Arena kuLiverpool Court Two.   Mushure mezvo, maGems achazosangana neAustralia musi weMugovera ozopedzisira neNorthen Ireland musi weSvondo.   Siyachitema anoti kubva zvavakasvika kuEngland, vange vachiongorora mitambo yeSri Lanka iyo yavachasangana navo mumutambo wekutanga ndokuona kuti vatambi vayo varefu zvikuru kusiyana navo sezvo vakati pfupikei.   “Takaongorora chikwata cheSri Lanka, chine vatambi varefu zvikuru kudarika isu asi murairidzi wedu akatsvaga nzira dzekuti tinogona kuvakunda sei.   “Zvekureba kwavo hatisi kuzozvitarisa uye hazvireve kuti vachatikunda, isu ticharwa semvumba mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Isu senyika pasi rese tiri pechi13 pakutamba netball saka kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup tiri kuda kurwa zvakasimba totamba sechikwata kuti tirpedze tiri mutop 8.”   Achitaura pamusoro perutsigiro rwavakawana kubva kumakambani akasiyana anosanganisira Simbisa Brands, Econet, National Foods nemamwe, Siyachitema anoti zvakavasimudzira morari yavo uye zvave kuvatuma kuti vashande nesimba kumakwishu aya.   “Tinotenda zvikuru makambani ese akatibatsira kuti rwendo rwedu rureruke kuenda kumakwishu aya, zvaisava nyore kudai vasipo saka tinotenda zvikuru.   “Rutsigiro rwatawana rwaunza mufaro kwatiri isu vanasikana veZimbabwe uye zvave kutituma kuti titambe nesimba kumakwishu aya,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Pazvikwata zvese zvemuAfrica, maGems ari kumakwishu aya nezvimwe zvikwata zvinoti South Africa, Uganda neMalawi.   Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Netball Association, Leticia Chipandu, anoti vasikana vemaGems vacharwa vamire mumitambo yavo.   Kubva kare, zvikwata zvizhinji zvaikwikwidza kumakwishu epasi rose akasiyana hazvina kumbobvira zvauya nemukombe izvo zvakapedzisira kuitwa nechikwata chemaGolden Girls icho chakahwina menduru yegoridhe kumaOlympics mugore ra1980.   Asi, Chipandu anoti rwendo rwuno zviri kuzoshanduka.   “Chandinovimbisa ndechekuti hatisi kungoburitswa mumutambo uyu uchangotanga, izvo kwete bodo.   “Vasikana vachatamba kusvika kumagumo uye ndinokuvimbisai kuti tichaunza mufaro mukuru kunyika yedu kubva kumakwishu aya,” anodaro Chipandu.

headline: Hatina chekutaura: Zifa
text: MUTAURIRI weZimbabwe Football Association – Xolisani Gwesela – anoti havana chekutaura zvichitevera kumbomiswa basa kwaitwa vatungamiri veZifa neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) nhasi.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti Zifa inoti kudii nedanho ratorwa neSRC, Gwesela anoti, “Handikwanise kupindura mubvunzo iwoyo, kana muchida kuziva zvakawanda taurai neSRC mubvunze zvose vanokubatsirai.”   Nhasi mangwanani SRC yazivisa nezvekumisa kwayaita basa bhodhi reZifa nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakawanda izvo iri kupomera sangano renhabvu iro rinotungamirirwa naFelton Kamambo.   Zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvamisirwa Zifa basa zvinosanganisira kusashandisa nemazvo mari yeveruzhinji pamwe nekutadza kupa umboo hwekuti mari iyi yakashandiswei, kutumira zvikwata zvenyika kunokwikwidza kumitambo yakasiyana kunze zvisina kupihwa mvumo sezvinodiwa pasi pemutemo wekurwisa denda reCovid-19 uye mashoko ekushungurudzwa kwevaridzi vepembe vechidzimai.   Nyika yamirira kuona kuti sangano reFifa richatora matanho api kuZimbabwe sezvo isingatendere kuti hurumende dzipindire munyaya dzenhabvu.

headline: Highlanders Yopemberera Kusvitsa Makore Makumi Mapfumbamwe
text: Pamusoro pezvo kuchave nemabiko ekupembera kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe kwechikwata cheHighlanders uko mukuru wacho, VaNadumiso Gumede, vakavimbisa mumimhanzi pamwe nenhabvu zvepamusoro soro muBarbourfields Stadium neMugovera. Vatsigiri venhabvu vatarisana nemabiko anofadza mukupera kwesvondo. Kubva kumitambo yemuAfrica kusvika kumakwikwi eZimbabwe National Army Charity Challenge, kuchave nemachikichori enhabvu ayo anga achingotaurwa nezvawo svondo rese. Pamusoro pezvo kuchave nemabiko ekupembera kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe kwechikwata cheHighlanders uko mukuru wacho, VaNadumiso Gumede, vakavimbisa mumimhanzi pamwe nenhabvu zvepamusoro soro muBarbourfields Stadium neMugovera.
