headline: Barcelona yotenga Martial
text: kugadzirira mari inosvika 60 miriyoni paunzi yekutenga mutambi weManchester United, Anthony Martial.   Martial zvinonzi haasi kufara kuOld Trafford uye hurukuro dzekuwedzera imwe kondirakiti yake hadzisi kufamba nekuda kwekushaya mikana yekutamba yakawanda muchikwata chaJose Mourinho. Kondirakiti yake yaanayo parizvino ichapera mugore ra2019, asi ine chimwe chibvumirano chekuti inogona kuwedzerwa rimwe gore pamusoro.   Kubva Alexis Sanchez auya kuchikwata ichi muna Ndira, Martial haasati ambonwisa, angotamba mitambo mina chete inosanganisira uyo vakakundwa neTootenham pamwe neNewcastle uye akazoburitswa angotamba maminitsi 64 chete apo vakasangana neChelsea. Martial anonzi haana kufara paakaudzwa kuti ave kuchinja nzvimbo yekutambira zvichitevera kuuya kwakaita Senchez kuchikwata ichi.   Barcelona yaida kutenga Martial mwaka uno  ndokuzosarudza kutenga Ousmane Dembele kubva kuBorrusia Dortmund, asi inogona kuzodzokera mutambi uyu panopera mwaka uno.   Barcelona ine chivimbo chekuti inogona kutenga mutambi weFrance – Antoine Griezmann – kubva kuAtletci Madrid uye inonzi iri kuongorora Ryan Sessgnon weFulham. – SportsMail Football

headline: McGregor, Nurmagomedoc votatsurana
text: mutambo weMMA, Robin Black, anoti anofunga kuti Conor McGregor achasendeka kukwikwidza mumutambo uyu, asi hunge akakundwa naKhabib Nurmagomedoc kumutambo weUFC 229.   McGregor ari kutarisirwa kuti ndiye achakundwa mutambo uyu sekutaura kwevanobhejesa mitambo.   Mari iri kuiswa panaMcGregor yakawandisa pane iri kubhejwa panaNurmagomedov wekuRussia uyo waachasangana naye kuLas vegas muna Gumiguru.   Black anoti anofunga kuti mutambo uyu uchave mukuru kuvatambi vese nekuti hapana anoda kukundwa.   “Kunyangwe pane zvakawanda zvekuhwina mumutambo uyu, zvakawanda zvavacharuzawo zvakare. Nekuti kana McGregor akakundwa, mumaonero angu, achasendeka kukwikwidza mumutambo uyu. Kana McGregor akakundwa chete, hatichamuone mumutambo uyu zvakare.   “Kana Khabib akakundwa mutambo uyu, haangorase nhorowondo yake yekusakundwa kwete, asi kukundwa nemunhu akaita saMcGregor hakumbomufadze, apo morari yange yakasimudzwa yemutambo uyu. Kukundwa uku hakumbomuitire zvakanaka kunoshandura zvakawanda,” akadaro. – Sportsmail MMA

headline: Hatizi DeMbare: FC Platinum
text: SHASHA yeCastle Premiership FC Platinum inoti vatsigiri venhabvu kana vaongorori vemutambo uyu  ngavasafananidze chikwata chavo neDynamos iyo yakasvika kufainari yemutambo weCAF Champions League mugore ra1998.   Zvikuru zvange zvichitarisirwa kubva kuFC Platinum gore rino apo yakabudirira kupinda mumagroup-stages eCAF Champions League ayo anozivikanwa semini-league, kekutanga munhorowondo yechikwata ichi.   Asi isati yambosvika kure, FC Platinum yakatoburitswa mumumakwishu aya zvichitevera kutadza kwayakaita kuhwina kana mutambo mumwe chete zvawo muboka rayo muGroup B kubva mumitambo mina yayatamba.   Iye zvino FC Platinum yasarirwa nemitambo miviri chete neOrlando Pirates pamwe neEsperance of Tunisia uye kunyangwe ikaihwina hazvichabatsire chinhu.   Munhorowondo yenhabvu yemuno, chikwata cheDynamos ndicho chega chakakwanisa kuita zvinorova mumutambo uyu izvo zvakachiona chichisvika kufainari mugore ra1996 uye ikazombosvika kumasemi-fainari muna 2007.   Zvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira FC Platinum zviri kukundikana kutevera mumatsimba eDeMbare.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, mukushi wemashoko weFC Platinum – Chido Chizondo – anoti zvikwata hazvifanane uye ivo pavakasvika mumakwishu aya vanofara napo nekuti ndipo pavaishuvira kusvika.   “Musatifananidze neDynamos isu, pedu patakasvika ndipo chaipo pataida kusvika. Chikuru chamunofanirwa kuziva ndechekuti isu tave nemakore 11 tapinda muPremier League saka hamungatienzanise nanaDynamos vagara kwemakore akawanda.   “Tichiri kudzidza uye tinovimba kuti patichadzoka tinogona kusvika pane chimwe chinhanho,” anodaro Chizondo.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti anonzwa sei sezvo chikwata chavo chakatadza kuhwinha kana mutambo mumwe chete, Chizondo anoti,  “Patakatosvika zvakatoringana zvakadaro nekuti isu chataingoda chete kusvika kumagroup-stages emutambo uyu, zvimwe zvese zvaizouya ibhonasi.   “Patakahwina tikiti rekukwikwidza mumakwishu aya takazviudza sechikwata kuti chatinoda kupinda mumagroup-stages ayo anozivikanwa semini-league chete. Saka sechikwata takasvika pataida kusvika, zvimwe zvese hazvisisina basa. Kana tikazodzoka mwaka unotevera tinenge tave kutarisa zvimwe zvatinoda kuti zviitike,” anodaro Chizondo.   Zvisinei, shasha yekuongorora nhabvu ari mutsigiri mukuru wemutambo uyu, Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa, anoti FC Platinum ichiri kudzidza nezvemutambo uyu.   “Champions League ave makata, saka sechikwata munofanirwa kugadzirira zvakasimba.   “Mumaonero angu, FC Platinum iri pakudzidza nezvemutambo uyu saka vanoda kupihwa nguva uye ivo ngavagadzirire sechikwata nekuti zvinosuwisa kuti mumitambo yavatamba votadza kunwisa kamwe chete zvako.   “Ivo sechikwata vanofanirwa kuita vachibvunzawo kune zvimwe zvikwata zvakaita seDynamos kuti vakasvika sei kufainari, vonzwa mazano ayo andinoona kuti anogona kuvabatsira,” anodaro Musekiwa.   Mutambo unotevera weFC Platinum mumakwishu aya, ichatamba svondo rinotevera apo iri kunanga kuSouth Africa kunotamba neOrlando Pirates yozopedzisa svondo rinozotevera paichasangana neEsperance muno.

headline: ‘80% yevatambi veZim vanonwa Bronco’
text: MURAIRIDZI weBulawayo City, Philani ‘Beefy’ Ncube, otaura mashoko anokatyamadza zvikuru ekuti chikamu che80 percent chevatambi venhabvu vanotora zvinodhaka zvisingatenderwi mumuviri, kunyanya Broncleer.   Ncube akataura izvi pamutambo wakaona chikwata chake chichisangana neHighlanders apo vakahwina 1-0, achiti  mumwe mutambi wemuchikwata ichi aive akadhakwa, ndokuti, “Ndinoziva kuti ichokwadi anotora zvinodhaka”.   “Regai ndikuudzei, 80 percent yevatambi vemuZimbabwe vanotora zvinodhaka. Handichataure mazita, asi patakatamba neHighlanders, pange pane mutambi mumwe chete wemuchikwata chavo ange akatodhakwa. Aingovata. Saka ndinotoziva kuti anotora zvinodhaka. Ipapo wonzwa vamwe vachiti murairidzi ngaadzingwe basa,” anodaro Ncube uyo anotaura zvaanoda akasununguka uye achizivikanwa kuti haatsengi mazwi ake.   Anoti dambudziko guru nderekuti vamwe vatsigiri ndivo vane mhosva yekutengesa zvinodhaka izvi zvisingatenderwi mumuviri kuvatambi.   Anoti kutorwa kwezvinodhaka kwakazonyanya kuwedzerwa nekuuya kwakaita denda reCovid-19.   “Dambudziko guru nderekuti vamwe vatsigiri ndivo vanotengesera vakomana zvinodhaka izvi. Asi ndivo vanhu vanezenge vave kuti Mandla Mpofu, Joey Antipas kana Beefy ngaaende,” anodaro Ncube.   Anoti matambiro ave kuita chikwata chake mwaka uno, izvo zvaona Amakhosi ichitora zvibodzwa zvina mumitambo miviri yadarika, inyaya yekugadzirisa kutorwa kwezvinodhaka.   “Chandakaudza vakomana ndechekuti vanofanirwa kuzvisunda vega. Ndakavaudza kuti vasiyane nezvinodhaka votanga kuvimba nezvavanoita. Vechidiki ava vari kuzvikanganisa nekutora zvinodhaka. Zvinosiririsa nekuti mangwana varairidzi tisu tozopomerwa mhosva.   “Asi chokwadi vari kutungamira vatambi ava vanofanirwa kugara navo pasi vokurukura nhau dzine chekuita nekutorwa kwezvinodhaka,” anodaro.   Ncube anoenderera mberi achiti, “Mwaka usati watanga, PSL inofanirwa kuunza vanamazvikokota vodzidzisa vakomana kuti kune hupenyu mberi Covid-19 yapera. Iyi inyaya isina kumbobatwa-batwa kusvika nanhasi chaiye.   “Vakomana vange vachitora zvinodhaka senzira yehupenyu hwavo. Nyaya yekutora zvinodhaka iyi ichavakanganisa mwedzi mina inotevera. PSL neFootballers Union of Zimbabwe vanofanirwa kutora matanho nyaya yacho isati yaenderera mberi. Ndokuzivisa kuti vakomana ava vanogona kupasa kuvhenekwa Covid-19 kwete kutariswa zvinodhaka. Chimwe chinorwadza ndechekuti kana kuvatambi vechidiki zvatozara.”   Nyanzvi yezveutano kuZimbabwe Olympic Committee arizve chiremba wemaWarriors, Nick Munyonga, anoti hurongwa huripo hwekurwisa kutorwa kwezvinodhaka, asi kushaikwa kwemari ndiro dambudziko.   “Muchaona kuti senyika tinoita ongororo yekuvheneka vatambi kakawanda kuburikidza nerutsigiro runobva kugurukota rezvemitambo uye neWorld Anti-doping pamitambo yakasiyana kana zvikwata zvichigadzirira kunokwikwidza.   “Takanyorera kuPSL tikavapa mabhajeti kuti pagoitwa zvirongwa zvekuvheneka vatambi. Tinoitisa zvidzidzo munyika yese. Zvirongwa zviripo hazvo asi kwete zvepamusoro nekuda kwenhau yemari.   “Kuvheneka munhu mumwe chete panodiwa US$500, kusanganisira mari yekufambisa. Saka imari yakawanda, asi tinoziva kuti gurukota redu riri kuedza kugadzira bhajeti kuburikidza neZOC,” anodaro Mushonga uyo anove zvekare sachigaro weAfrica Zone V1 Region Anti-doping.

headline: Chelsea yadzinga Tuchel
text: CHIKWATA cheChelsea nhasi mangwanani chadzinga basa murairidzi wacho Thomas Tuchel.   Izvi zvinotevera kusatamba zvinogutsa kuri kuita chikwata ichi mumwaka mutsva wegore rino.   Chelsea yakakundwa neDinamo Zagreb nezuro manheru mumutambo wavo wekutanga weUEFA Champions League.   Chinyorwa chabva kuChelsea chinoti: “Nhasi Chelsea yapesana nemurairidzi wedu Thomas Tuchel.   “Takamirira munhu wose wekuChelsea FC, chikwata chinoda kutenda Thomas nebasa raakabata panguva yaaive nechikwata chedu.   “Apo vatungamiri vatsva vasvitsa mazuva 100 kubva vatenga chikwata chino uye vachiramba vachishanda vachienda mberi, ino ndiyo nguva yekushandura zvakawanda.   “Vamwe varairidzi veChelsea ndivo vachashanda nechikwata takatarisana nemitambo inotevera apo tiri pakati pekutsvaga murairidzi mutsva wekutsiva Tuchel.”

headline: Young Igwe osimudzira maboozer
text: ZVIKWATA zvitanhatu zvenhabvu yemaboozer zvichasangana svondo rino nemusi weMugovera paPrince Edward School, muHarare apo zvichatatsurana pamutambo wePeter Moyo at 29 Tournament.   Mutambo uyu uri kurongwa nemuimbi wemusambo weSungura – Peter ‘Dhewa’ Moyo – uyo anove nerudo nenhabvu zvikuru sezvo akambotambira zvikwata zvakadai seLancashire Steel Juniors nevatambi vanosanganisira Dennis Dauda.   Mutambo uyu uchange uri wekupemberera kusvitsa makore 29 okuberekwa kwaYoung Igwe sezita remadunhurirwa raMoyo pamwe nekusimudzira nhabvu yemaboozer.   “Nhabvu yechiboozer vazhinji vanoiona seyezvidhakwa chete, asi yakakosha zvikuru sezvo ichitibatsira kuvaka nekuchengetedza miviri yedu.   “Kana vanhu vakura, kazhinji nguva yekuvaka muviri tinenge tisina saka ndiri kuda kusimudzira mitambo yemaboozer iyi iite mukurumbira itambwe nezvikwata zvakawanda.   “Hongu, ndinoziva kuti zvikwata zvakawanda zviriko zvinotamba nhabvu yemaboozer zvichikwikwidza asi ini ndiri kuda kuisimudzira iite mukurumbira,” anodaro.   Moyo achatambawo mumutambo uyu sezvo chikwata chake chaanotambira cheLimpopo FC chichange chiri chimwe chezvichakwikwidza.   “Ini ndiri kutambawo musi wacho sezvo chikwata changu Limpopo FC chiri kuzokwikwidzawo. Ndichange ndichirakidzawo tarenda rangu,” anodaro Moyo.   Zvikwata zvichahwina pamutambo uyu zvichawaniswa mibairo yakasiyana-siyana inosanganisira mikombe nemenduru.

headline: Chikwata chakasimba: Mapeza
text: MURAIRIDZI wemaWarriors — Norman Mapeza — anoti chikwata chake chiri kufanirwa kurwa semvumba musi weMugovera apo chiri kusangana neGhana mumutambo wemuGroup G wekurwira kuenda kumakwikwi eQatar 2022 World Cup gore rinotevera.   MaWarriors anotofanirwa kuhwina mutambo uyu kuti arambe ane mukana wekubudirira kuenda kuQatar sezvo kusvika pari zvino angokwanisa kuwana chibodzwa chimwechete kubva mumitambo miviri yaatamba.   Mumutambo wavo wekutanga, Warriors akaita mangange 0-0 neSouth Africa ndokuzokundwa wechipiri neEthopia unove mutambo uyo wakazoona sangano rinotungamira nhabvu reZifa richidzinga basa Zdravko “Loga” Logarusic aive murairidzi wechikwata ichi.   Zvichitevera kugadzwa kwakaitwa Mapeza kuti atsive Loga, Mapeza anoti chiremerera chikuru chaakapihwa kurairidza nyika yake nekudaro zvakakosha kuti varwe vamire. Achitaura nemusi weChipiri vasati vasimuka vakananga kuGhana, Mapeza akati zvakakosha kuti vagowana zvibodzwa zvizere kuAccra.   “Munhabvu, nguva dzose tinotambira kuhwina saka tiri kufanira kubata basa sebasa kuGhana nekuti nyika iri kutarisira zvikuru kubva kwatiri.   “Mutambo uyu wakatikoshera saka tichazama nepatinokwanisa kuunza zvibodzwa zvose nekuti tinoziva kuti hapana asingade kuhwina. Isu tinototamba mitambo yedu tichida kuhwina,” anodaro Mapeza.   Apo maWarriors ari kusangana neGhana kuAccra, achange ane vatambi vanotambira kuEngland vanoti Marvelous Nakamba weAston Villa, Jordan Zemura weAFC Bournemouth naTendayi Darikwa weWigan Athletic avo vakambokundikana kuuya kuzotamba mitambo yeSouth Africa neEthopia nekuda kwekuti Zimbabwe yakaiswa muboka rered list renyika dzinonzi dzine vanhu vakawanda vane chirwere cheCovid-19.   Vatambi ava vachangokwanisa kutamba mutambo wekuGhana chete asi havazokwanise kuzouya kuzotamba wemuno uyo uchasangana maWarriors neThe Black Stars svondo rinotevera musi weChipiri.   “Zvinofadza kuti kuGhana tichange tine chikwata chakasimba, tiine vatambi vedu vose saka tinofanira kubata basa sebasa. Mitambo yadarika, tange tichitamba takashota tisina vamwe vatambi vedu, apa tichange tinavo kuGhana uko tinofanirwa kubva nezvibodzwa.   “Mumutambo wekunoku ndiwo vatambi vekuEngland vasiri kutenderwa kuuya, asi zvakangonakawo nekuti iyo Ghana ine vayo vatambi vanotambira kuEngland vachatadzawo kuuya kuno,” anodaro Mapeza.   Apo maWarriors achatatsurana nemaBlack Stars, achange achishuvira kuti mutambo weSouth Africa neEthopia ugopera ari mangange kuitira kuti mukana wavo wekuenda kuQatar urambe uripo.

headline: ‘UPENYU PAMBERI, BHORA MUSHURE’
text: MUTAMBI weZimbabwe Warriors nechikwata cheStade de Reims chekuFrance, Marshall Munetsi, anoti panguva ino yechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chatekeshera pasi rose, upenyu hwevanhu hunofanirwa kukosheswa kudarika mutambo wenhabvu.   Achitaura svondo rino ari kuFrance uko anotambira achitambira nhabvu yake, Munetsi anoti kumiswa kwakaita mitambo yenhabvu kunyika iyi pamwe nepasi rose kwakakosha sezvo matanho akatorwa aya ari kubatsira kurwisa kupararira kwecoronavirus.   “Ini semutambi wenhabvu, mutambo uyu hauna kunyanya kukosha kukunda upenyu hwevanhu. Ndinotsigira kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yenhabvu sezvo uku kuri kubatsira kurwisa kupararira kwecoronavirus.   Kana chirwere ichi chapera hacho, tochidzokera kunotamba hedu nhabvu.   “Zvose ngatingozviisai mumaoko aMwari, zvichadarika hazvo todzokera kuupenyu hwedu hwemazuva ose,” anodaro.   Munetsi akatanga kutambira chikwata cheStade de Reims mwaka uno achibva kuchikwata cheOrlando Pirates chekuSouth Africa.   Kusvika pazomiswa mitambo yose, Munetsi ange achitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura kuStade de Reims izvo zvakambomuona achimaka shasha Neymar Jnr mune umwe mutambo wechikwata chake necheParis St Germain (PSG) uyo chikwata chaje chakahwina 2-0. Mumutambo uyu, Munetsi akarumbidzwa zvikuru sezvo PSG ichizivikanwa pasi rose nevatambi vanoita “kuruka” bhora vachisanganisira iye Neymar Jnr, Kylian Mbappe, Edinson Cavani asi musi uyu shasha idzi dzakashaiswa mukana.   Munetsi anoti agere zvakanaka kuchikwata chaari kutambira cheReims achiti kana mumwe mukana wekuenda kune chimwe chikwata ukaiuya, achatarisa zvinomunakira.   “Ndiri kugutsikana nepandiri iye zvino, asi ndinoda kusvika kumusoro-soro nenhabvu. Ndichatungamirirwa naMwari murwendo rwangu uye kwose kwandinoenda ndiye anoziva kwandichasvika.   “Ingori nyaya yekuona zuva nezuva kuti zvinenge zvichifamba sei. Kana mukana wauya ndinoushandisa ndofambira mberi nemutambo,” anodaro Munetsi.   Nemusi weChipiri svondo rino, vanhu 18 vange vabatwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 muZimbabwe apo vatatu vacho vakatoshaya.

headline: Vakawanda Votadza Kuona World Cup neKudzimwa kweMagetsi
text: Vanhu vakawanda muZimbabwe vari kutadza kuona makundano avanofanira efifa World Cup nenya yekudzimwa kwemagetsi neZESA Saudi Arabia nhasi yashamisa pasi rose nekurova Argentina 2-1 pamutambo weWorld Cup kuQatar muGroup C. Vakawanda vange vachitarisira kuti Argentina ichasimudza mukombe uyu. Asi muZimbabwe vamwe havana kuona mutambo uyu sezvo kwange kusina magetsi. Nzvimbo zakawanda munyika dzatarisana nedambudziko guru remagetsi ari kuenda mangwanani odzoka pakati pehusiku panguva iyo mitambo ye2022 World Cup inenge yapera. Vanoitawo zvekubheja vatarisana nedambudziko guru sezvo nzvimbo dzavanotambira dziri kuswera dzakavharwa nekushaya magetsi. Muzvinabhizimisi VaInnocent Mutenha avo vane mabhawa muWarren Park nekuKuwadzana vanoti magetsi avakanganisira basa panguva ino yeWorld Cup. Nemhaka yekushaikwa kwemagetsi uku, vakawanda nezuro vakatadza kuona mutambo weWorld Cup wavaishuwira pakati peSenegal neNetherlands uyo Senegal yakarohwa 2-0. Mutambo weSenegal unotevera uriko neChishanu apo iri kusangana neQatar.MMuongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaTinashe Museti vanoti Qatar inofanira kukunda kana kuti huhwandu hwevanhu vemuQatar mudzinhandare kumakundano aya hunodzikira. Zvimwe zvikwata zviri mugungano rine Qatar neSenegal iEcuador pamwe neNetherlands. Brazil iyo veruzhinji varikutarisira kuti ichatora mukombe uyu iri kupinda munhandare neChina apo iri kusangana neSerbia. Vakawanda kusanganisira mukuru weZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association VaJoseph Mutawu vanoti mukombe uri kuenda nemaSamba Boys aya. Asi vaongorori vemutambo uyu vanoti hapana chikwata chiri pamberi vachiti chimwe cheArgentina, Belgium, France, Germany neNetherlands chinokwanisa kutorawo mukombe uyu. Munyori wezvemutambo wenhabvu anogara kuEngland Admire Muhimeke anoti Argentina kana Germany ndidzo dzinogona kutora mukombe uyu. Panyaya yemagetsi, mutauriri weZesa VaGeorge Manyaya vanoti Zesa haikwanise kubuditsa hurongwa hwenguva dzinodzimwa magetsi nekuti dzimwe nguva kudzima uku kunosangana nekufa kwezvinotakurisa moto wacho. Vanoti veruzhinji vanofanira kujairira kudzimwa kwemagetsi kwenguva refu kuri kuitika uku. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vakawanda munyika vachatadza kuona mitambo yakawanda. Makundano eWorld Cup aya ayo akatanga nezuro achapera musi wa 18 Zvita. No media source currently available

headline: Argentina yaMessi yatiza neWorld Cup
text: ARGENTINA ndiyo shasha dzepasi rese zvichitevera kukunda kwayaita France 4-2 kumapena mumutambo we2022 FIFA World Cup uyo watambwa manheru ano kunyika yeQatar.   Mutambo uyu, uyo wange uchinakidza kukunda ngoma kurira, wange wapera uri mangange 3-3.   Uyu ndiwo wangu uri mutambo wekupedzisira waLionel Messi achitambira nyika yake sezvo akati panopera mutambo wefainari ari kubva asendeka shangu dzake dzekutambira Argentina.   Mumutambo wanhasi, Messi anwisa kaviri kuchiti Kylian Mbappe weFrance akanda katatu achidzosa chikwata chake mumutambo uyu.   Mbappe ndiye abva ahwina golden boot kuWorld Cup sezvo anwisa kasere kumitambo iyi.   France, iyo yange iine vatambi vayo vazhinji vane madzinza ekuAfrica, ndiyo yange iine mukombe uyu mushure mekuutora muna2018.

headline: Vogadzirira kudzoka kwenetball
text: SANGANO reRainbow Amateur Netball League (RANL) rinoti ragadzirira kudzoka kwemutambo uyu zvichitevera kuronga kwavakaita mutambo weDry Run svondo radarika uyo wakaona chikwata cheZRP Mambas chichikunda cheGlow Petroleum Queens 27-24 mufainari.   Munyori mukuru weRANL — Moses Gukumure — anoti kugara nguva ndefu vatambi vasingatambe mutambo uyu, zvichikonzereswa nedenda reCovid-19, kwakadzosera kumashure kusimukira kwavo asi vave nemufaro zvichitevera kudzoka kwawakaita.   “Mushure mekunge tapedza nguva ndefu mutambo uyu usiri kutambwa, zvinofadza zvikuru kuti tave kukwanisa kudzokera kuhupenyu hwedu hwekare vasikana vachitamba mutambo uyu unovararamisa. “Mutambo weDry Run wange uri wekuona kuti zvikwata zvave papi mugadziriro yekudzoka kwemutambo uyu. Tazvionera tega kuti zvagadzirira saka isu tagadzirirawo kuti mitambo ichitanga,” anodaro Gukumure.   Zvisinei, anoti vachiri kumbomirira kupihwa mvumo kubva kuZimbabwe Netball Association (ZINA) neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) kuti vachitanga mutambo uyu.   Anoti kusvika pari zvino vanyorera kuZINA kanokwana katanhatu asi havasati vapihwa mhinduro. “Chiri kungotimisa kuti mitambo yedu ichitange kupihwa mvumo uye tinyoreswe neZINA.   Takavanyorera asi havasati vatipindura kusvika pari zvino. Saka tiri kuramba tichigogodza kwavari, tichivanyorera kuti vatipe mvumo titange mitambo yedu,” anodaro.   Zvichitevera kuvambwa kwakaitwawo ligi rePremier Netball League (PNL) nguva yadarika izvo zvakaona zvimwe zvikwata zvichibuda muRANL zvichienda kuPNL, Gukumure anoti maligi akawanda zvinobatsira kukura kwemutambo uyu uye zvichipa vatambi mikana yakasiyana yekukwikwidza. “Tichiri nezvikwata zvedu zvakawanda zvikuru uye isu tinovimba kuti zvapave nemaligi maviri zvichabatsira kukura kwemutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Zvakadaro, chikwata cheZRP icho chakahwina mutambo uyu chakaenda kumba neUS$1 350 kuchiti zvimwe zvakakwikwidza zvinosanganisira Lusumbami, Tenax, Ruwa, Correctional Queens neKhami Prisons.

headline: Tatarisa caf: Mapeza
text: MURAIRIDZI weFC Platinum, Norman Mapeza, anoti pachine basa guru kuti chikwata chake chibudirire kukunda mumutambo weCAF Champions League sezvo izvi zvichida makore akawanda ekutamba nhabvu yepamusoro.   Mashoko aMapeza anotevera kuhwinha kwakaita FC Platinum mukombe weCastle Premiership kechipiri mwaka uno zvichireva kuti kuti chikwata ichi ndicho chichange chichimirira Zimbabwe kuChampions League.   Pure Platinum Play, sezita remadunhurirwa reFC Platinum, iri kudzokera mumutambo uyu mugore rechipiri rakatevedzana asi mumakwishu egore rino haina kunyatsotamba zvakanaka sezvo yakaburitswa kumapreliminary round nePrimero de Agosto yekuAngola.   Nguva pfupi yadarika, mukushi wemashoko wechikwata ichi – Chido Chizondo – akati shuviro yavo kuve chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru muAfrica panyaya dzenhabvu uye kurongeka pazvese zvavanoita.   Mapeza – uyo achiri akagara mudenga rechinomwe zvichitevera kuhwina kwavakaita mukombe weCastle Premiership – anoti, “Dai pasina Mwari zvisina kumbogoneka, tinomutenda nekumutungamira kwaakatiita.”   Muchina wemajuzi, sezita remadunhurirwa raMapeza, anoti shuviro yechikwata chake kuti chihwine mitambo yese yachinokwikwidza muno kuti chigowana mukana wekumisidzana nezvikwata zvikuru zvemuAfrica.   “Isu chatinoda kuti tihwine mikombe yese inokwikwidzwa muno kuti tigowaniswa mukana wekukwikwidza muAfrica nekuti ndimo mune zvese, vatambi vedu vanokwanisa kuonekwa nezvimwe zvikwata uye zvinounza mari kuchikwata chedu,” anodaro Mapeza.   Kunyangwe hazvo Mapeza achiti anofara nekudzokera kwavari kuitwa kumutambo weChampions League, muchinda uyu anoti pachiri nendima refu inoda kusakurwa kuti FC Platinum ikwanise kuzohwinawo mutambo uyu.   “Hazvingoitike nyore, zvinoda makore akawanda muchitamba nhabvu yepamusoro muchivaka kuti mugoverengwa pane zvimwe zvikwata zvikuru zvemuAfrica,” anodaro.   Munhorowondo yake yekurairidza nhabvu, Mapeza akwanisa kuhwina mikombe mitatu yepremiership ari murairidzi – miviri yacho iyo yaahwina neFC Platinum kozoti umwe waakahwina neMonomotapa mugore ra2008.   Pavarairidzi vese vari kurairidza nhabvu muno parizvino, Mapeza ndiye zvakare ane mikombe yakawanda yePremier League achiteverawa naLloyd Chitembwe naJoey Antipas avo vakahwina kamwe chete nezvikwata zvavo zvinoti CAPS United uye neChicken Inn.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti achakwanisa kuita zvakaitwa naKalisto Pasuwa here paakahwinha mukombe wePremier League makore mana akatevedzana apo airairidza Dynamos, Mapeza anoti, “Isu tinongotenda Mwari nekuhwina kwatakaita chete.”

headline: Nyamutsika, Mhandu hutu nemukombe
text: wemarathon – Caniscious Nyamutsika naCaroline Mhandu – ndivo vakahwina mujaho weTanganda Half Marathon wemakiromita 21 uyo wakaitirwa kwaMutare svondo radarika.   Nyamutsika akahwina mujaho wevarume mushure meawa rimwe chete nemaminitsi mashanu achisiya dzimwe shangwiti dzaitarisirwa kuhwina mumakwishu aya idzo   dzinosanganisira Misheck Sithole uyo akatora mukombe gore radarika.   Achitaura neKwayedza achangobva kuhwina mujaho uyu,  Nyamutsika anoti, “Ndakagara mudenga rechinomwe, ndave nemakore akawanda ndichiuya kuzokwikwidza mumujaho uyu zvichiramba asi gore rino ndezvanguwo.   “Makore maviri adarika, ndange ndichipedza ndiri pechitatu, asi kuramba ndichishingirira ndichishanda nesimba kwazondibatsira zvikuru gore rino uye ndazohwinawo pekupedzisira.”   Shasha iyi inoti yave kutarisira kuenda kunokwikwidza kumujaho weVic Falls Marathon uye Tanganda Half Marathon yauya panguva yakanaka nekuti inomubatsira kugadzirira kuenda kune mamwe makwikwi.   “Mujaho weTanganda Half Marathon unouya panguva yakanakisa chaizvo nekuti unondipa mukana wekugadzirira kunokwikwidza kune mimwe mijaho nekudaro ndinotenda vatungamiriri veTanganda nekutipa mukana uyu. Ndave kutarisira kunokwikwidza kuVic Falls Marathon svondo rinotevera uye ndinoshuvira kuti ndichanokunda nekuti morari yangu yasimuka zvichitevera kuhwina kwandaita,” anodaro.   Mhandu – uyo akahwina mujaho wemadzimai – anoti kushanda nesimba kwaange achiita gore rese ndiko kwakamubatsira kuti ahwine mujaho uyu.   “Tanganda tinoiziva kuti iriko gore negore uye tinogara takaimirira nekudaro zvinoda kuti munhu ugare wakagadzirira saka ini ndinogara ndakaimirira. Ndine mufaro mukuru nekuti ndini ndahwina goridhe gore rino,” anodaro.   Zvakadai, kune mamwe makwikwi, Elford Moyo ndiye akahwina mujaho wewiricheya kechinonwe kakatevedzana.   Shasha iyi yakarakidza hunyanzvi hwayo gore rino nekuramba ichihwinha kunyangwe zvazvo mugwagwa wakaitirwa mujaho uyu weMvuma usisina kunaka sezvo wakazara nemakomba.   “Zvinofadza kuramba ndichihwina, asi mugwagwa wacho hauchaite wave nemakomba akawanda nekudaro tinokumbira kuti nzira yacho igadziriswe tigomhanye zvakanaka,” anodaro.

headline: Tuchel otsiura Mbappe
text: Saint-Germain, Thomas Tuchel, akaramba kutaura pamusoro penhau yekuti chikwata chake chinogona kutenga mutambi weChelsea, N’Golo Kante.   Kante – uyo akapembera kuhwina mukombe weWorld Cup neFrance gore rino – ari kunzi ari kudiwa kuzotengwa nechikwata ichi chekuFrance chinove shasha dzeLigue 1 mwaka uno.   Mutambi wePSG, Kylian Mbappe, akabuda pachena kuti akasiya katsamba muhomwe dzaKante achiedza kumukurudzira kuti auye kuzotambira nhabvu yake kuchikwata ichi chekuFrance apo vaive kuWorld Cup kuRussia.   Asi, Tuchel anoti hazvina kunaka kutaura pamusoro pezvevatambi vekune zvimwe zvikwata panyaya yekuda kuvatenga. “Hazvina kunaka uye handizvifarire zvachose, uye handizvifarire kana vamwe varairidzi vachitaura pamusoro pevatambi vari kutambira zvimwe zvikwata,” anodaro Tuchel. Saka hapana nyaya panhau yaKante uye hatisi kufunga nezvazvo mwaka uno.”   Apo Tuchel ari kuramba kutaura nezvevamwe vatambi vari kuuya kuchikwata chake, murairidzi wePSG uyu anoti ane chivimbo chikuru chekuti Edinson Cavani haasi kuzobva achienda kuReal Madrid.   Mutambi uyu – uyo anove chizvarwa chekuUruguay – ari kunzi anodiwa kuti azotsive Cristiano Ronaldo uyo akabva achienda kuJuventus nemari inosvika 100 miriyoni paunzi.   Asi achitaura chikwata chake chichangobva kukunda Atletico Madrid 3-2 mumutambo weInternational Champions Cup, Tuchel anoti, “Ndinofunga kuti acharamba ari kuno, hapana ambotaura chinhu kwandiri nezvenyaya yake saka ndinoziva kuti acharamba aripo.   “Hazvina kumbouya mupfungwa dzedu kuti angangoenda, ndakataura naye uye haana kurakidza kuti anoda kubva.” — SportsMail Football

headline: ‘GEMS TAVE KUMBERI’
text: uyo ange ari kuLIVERPOOL, England naAbel Ndooka ari muHarare SHASHA yemutambo wenetball inotambira chikwata cheZimbabwe chemaGems — Adelaide Thandeka Muskwe — uyo aive kuLiverpool uko aimirira nyika kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup, anoti ave kumberi kwehanzvadzi yake, Admiral, uyo anotambira nhabvu maWarriors.   MaGems akanyora nhoroondo yekuve chikwata chekutanga chenetball chakanokwikwidza kuWorld Cup uye ndokutamba zvinonwisa mvura apo akakunda zvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira Sri Lanka, Barbados neNorthern Ireland.   Adelaide naAdmiral mapatya uye vose vakaberekerwa muno ndokuzoenda kunogara kuEngland uko kwavakakurira.   Mukukura kwavo, Adelaide aitamba netball kozoti Admiral ari mutambi wenhabvu. Admiral iye zvino anotambira Leicester City inove chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru zvenhabvu muEngland.   Muchinda uyu haana kuenda kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations kuEgypt asi akambotamba mumakwikwi eCosafa Castle Cup kuSouth Africa nguva yadarika.   Adelaide anotambirawo chikwata cheSeven Stars kuEngland uye anoti ari kunzwa manyuku-nyuku nekuwaniswa kwaakaita mukana wekumirira nyika kumutambo weVitality World Cup.   Adelaide anoti anogara achitsigira hanzvadzi yake kumitambo yake yenhabvu uye akafara zvikuru kuona Admiral achiuyawo kuzomutsigira apo maGems aikweshana neNew Zealand.   Admiral pamwe nevabereki vavo vaive muchaunga nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rapera pamberi vachitsigira Adelaide pamwe nemaGems apo aitamba neNew Zealand mumutambo uyo akakundwa 36-79.   “Hanzvadzi yangu ndiyo ine mukurumbira asi ndinonzwa mufaro chaizvo kumuona achiuya kuzonditsigira mumitambo yangu.   “Ini kubva kare ndogara ndiri kunhandare dzakasiyana ndichimuona achitamba nhabvu saka tinotsigirana tese mitambo yedu uye vabereki vedu havashaikwe kumitambo yedu, saka ndinonzwa kufara ndichiona kuti rutsigiro tinarwo. Isu maGems tave kumberi nekuti takakwanisa kukwikwidza kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup,” anodaro Adelaide.   Zvakadai, chikwata chemaGems chakapedza makwishu aya chiri pechisere zvichitevera kukundwa kwachakazoitwa mitambo yacho miviri yekupedzisira apo wekutanga chakakundwa 43-59 neMalawi kozoti 58-47 neUganda.

headline: Africa Yose Yotarisira kuMorocco
text: Hupenyu hweAfrica mumakundano e2022 World Cup hwasarira mumaoko eMorocco zvichitevera kubuda mumakundano aya kweSenegal, Tunisiia, Cameroon neGhana. Morocco irikutamba zvinodakadza uyezve yakasimudza chivimbo mairi mushure mekurova Belgium neCroatia mukusvika muRound of 16 umu. Asi Spain iyo yakatora mukombe uyu muna 2010 yakasiyana zvikuru neBelgium iyo isina nhoroondo yakasimba mumakundano aya kana Croatia iyo inongozivikanwa nekupinda kwayakaita mufainari muna 2018 uyezve nemutambi Luca Modric. Asi zvakamira zvakadai, mutsigiri wenhabvu VaChris Gwaze vanoti Morocco yakasimba zvekukwanisa kubudirira mumutambo neSpain uyu. Chimwe chiwata chermuAfrica chakasvika muchikamu chenyika gumi nenhatu cheSenegal chakabuda mumakwikwi aya mushure mekurohwa 3-0 neEngland nezuro. Aimbobatira ZPC Kariba muPSL, Shepard Saizi anoti haasi kushamiswa nekubuda kweSenegal mumakundano aya. Mumwe mutsigiri wenhabvu VaLameck Jekapu vanoti vakarwadziwa nekubuda kweSenegal pamwechete neCameroon, Ghana, neTunisia, asi vane chivimbo kuti Morocco ichaita mashiripiti. Morocco irikutarisira kusvika mukota fainari kekutanga uyezve kuita chikwata chekutanga muAfrica kusvika muma semi fainari emakundano aya. Asi muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaJustice Muzanenhamo vanoti Africa haifanire kuve nechivimbo chakanyanya mumakundano eWorld Cup aya. Morocco iri kutarisira zvakanyanya kubva kunaAchrag Hakimi uyo akaberekerwa kuSpain anotambira PSG naHakim Ziyech. Spain ine vatambi vane mukurmbira vakaita saPedri, Gavi, Torres nevamwe. Asi chikwata chiri kutarisirwa kutora mukombe uyu Brazil iri kupinda munhandare manheru ano na 9pm neSouth Korea. Veruzhinji vanotevera mutambo uyu vanoti South Korea haimire paBrazil iyo ine vatambi vane mukurumbira vakawandisa vakaita seNeymarVinicius Jnr, Casemiro, Richarlison. South Korea iri kutarisira kubva kuna Son Heung-min. Brazil ikakunda inopinda mumakota fainari emakundano aya. Parizvino, Argentina, England, France, neNetherlands, dzatove mukota fainari kare.

headline: ZVICHANGOITIKA . . . Cristiano adzingwa neMan United
text: CHIKWATA cheManchester United chazivisa kuti vasiyana naCristiano Ronaldo mushure mekunge vabvumirana.   Pachinyorwa chabva kuManchester United, yazivisa kuti mutambi uyu abva.   “Cristiano ave kubva kuManchester United izvezvi mushure mekunge tabvumirana naye.   “Tinoda kumutenda nebasa raakaita kaviri kaatambira chikwata chino,” yadaro Manchester United.   Kudzingwa kwaRonaldo kunotevera kushuropodza kwaakaita chikwata ichi svondo radarika pamwe chete nemurairidzi wacho Erik ten Haag uyo waakati haamuremekedze.   “Handina ruremekedzo nemurairidzi wangu nekuti iye haandiremekedzewo. Ukasandiremekedza neniwo handikuremekedze.   “Manchester United iri kusarira kumashure zvikuru, pandakabva pekutanga ndikadzoka hapana chamboshanduka, zvinhu zvingori zvimwe chete.   “Pane vanhu vari muchikwata vasiri kundida kuno, hazvina kutanga nhasi kubva gore radarika chairo,” akadaro Ronaldo.

headline: ZVICHANGOITIKA . . . Pitso aenda kuSaudi Arabia
text: wenhabvu wekuSouth Africa ane mukurumbira, Pitso Mosimane, aziviswa kuti ndiye ava kuzorairidza chikwata chikuru chekuSaudi Arabia, cheAl Ahli Saudi kutanga izvozvi.

headline: Eboue odzoka munhabvu
text: weArsenal, Emaanuel Eboue (35), anogona kudzoka munhabvu achitambira LA Galaxy, makore maviri apedzisira kutamba nhabvu.   Chizvarwa chekuIvory Coast ichi anoshuvira zvikuru kudzoka munhabvu zvichitevera kutemerwa zvirango kwaakaitwa neFIFA kuti asatambire Sunderland mugore ra2019 apo akanzi asatambe kwegore atadza kubhadhara mumiriri wake.   Nyaya dzehutano hwake dzakamutadzisa kuti atengwe nechikwata chekuCyprus, Ocagi Limasol gore radarika.   Mutambi uyu akasiiwa asina kana kobiri zvichitevera kurambana kwaakaita nemudzimai wake izvo zvakamudya chaizvo mupfungwa zvekusvika pakuda kuzviuraya.   Asi chikwata chekuMLS – LA Galaxy – chiri kuedza kuda kumudzora munhabvu, sekutaura kwenhau dziri kubva kuThe Sun.   Chikwata ichi chinoziva kuti ruzivo rwaanarwo rwenhabvu rwakakosha zvikuru.   Eboue ange asiri munhabvu kwemakore maviri, asi nguva yadarika akambotambira chikwata chemaArsenal Legends munaChikumi.   Achitaura neCanal gore rino, akati, “Chandinongoda chete kudzoka munhabvu nekuti ndichiri kukwanisa kutamba.   “Ndinogona kuenda kunzvimbo dzakaita seBaghdad kana Pakistan kuti ndingotamba chete. Handina basa nazvo kuti ndekupi.   “Ndinogara nemabhegi angu akarongedzwa nekuti pane mukana wekuti ndinogona kudzingwa mumba mangu.   “Handina munhu parutivi rwangu ari kundimirira mazuva ano. Ndingori ndega. Ndaimbofara chaizvo nevana vangu nemhuri yangu asi iye zvino ndave ndega.” – SportsMail Football

headline: Tine mukana: Antipas
text: Inn — Joey Antipas — anoti mwaka wemutambo weCastle Premiership uchiri wakavhurika zvikuru uye chikwata chake chicharwisa semvumba zvikwata zviri pamusoro zvinoti FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum kusvika kumagumo chichirwira mukombe uyu.   Mutambo uyu uri kusimudzirwa svondo rino mushure mekunge wambomira panguva yemid-season break kwemasvondo maviri adarika.   Zvikwata zvose zvange zvichigadzirira zvakasimba nekuti mitambo 17 yasara ichange yakaomarara sezvo zvimwe zvichange zvichirwira kuti zvisaburistwe muligi iri kozoti zvimwe zvichirwira mukombe.   Pari zvino FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum ndizvo zvikwata zviri pamusoro uye vatsigiri venhabvu vazhinji vari kuona sekuti pakati pezviviri izvi ndipo pane chichatora mukombe mwaka uno.   Asi, Antipas ari kuramba mafungiro akadai aya achiti chikwata chake chicharwa zvekudambuka makumbo segurwe chichirwirawo mukombe uyu.   “Nhabvu inogona kushanduka pamusingafungire muchiti mukombe waenda asi chandinoziva munozopembera pakupedzisira nekuti kutaura kuno hatizive kuti mukombe uri kuenda kupi.   “Isu sechikwata ticharwa kusvika kumagumo, iye zvino hatizive kuti zvichabuda pakupedzisira ndezvipi,” anodaro.   Svondo rino maGamecocks – sezita remadunhurirwa reChicken Inn – ari kusangana neDynamos ‘DeMbare’ musi weSvondo kunhandare yeRufaro Stadium muHarare.   Antipas anoti mutambo uyu mukuru kuchikwata chake uye vari kuugadzirira semagadziriro avanoita mimwe mitambo yese.   “Semazuva ese isu tinogadzirira mitambo nekuuya kwainenge ichiita, saka hatisi kunyanya kufunga zvekumberi asi zvemutambo weDynamos watakatarisana nawo wesvondo rino,” anodaro.   Murairidzi weCAPS UNITED, Lloyd Chitembwe, akatsinhirawo mashoko aAntipas achiti rwendo rwekurwira mukombe weCastle Premiership rwuchiripo uye chikwata chake chiri kushanda zvakasimba kuti chidzore mukombe uyo wachakahwina mugore ra2016.   “Hatimhanye kufunga zvekuhwina mukombe chete, zvinoda zvakawanda uye zvinoda kushanda nesimba muchigadzirisa zviri kudiwa kuti basa rifambe.   “Nyaya hombe kushanda nesimba sechikwata kuti zvatinenge tichida zvigoitika. Tikaramba tichishanda nesimba ndinoziva kuti tinokunda chete hapana zvinomboramba.   “Mujaho uchiripo hausati wapera, hatizive kuti mune ramangwana zvichafamba sei,” anodaro Chitembwe.   Chikwata chaChitembwe svondo rino chiri kusangana neHarare City musi weMugovera kunhandare yeRufaro Stadium.   Mune mimwe mitambo iriko svondo rino muCastle Premiership, FC Platinum ichange iri pamusha kuMandava apo ichasangana neZPC Kariba.

headline: Vatsigiri vemaWarriors Vofara neGadziriro yeMakwikwi eAfrica Nations Cup
text: Chikwata chemaWarriors chiri kuratiza kuti chiri munzira yakajeka apo chakananga kumakwikwi e2017 Africa Cup of Nations. Chikwata ichi nezuro chakadambura maTaifa Stars ekuTanzania 3-0 mumutambo wekuenzana masimba, izvo zvirikugutsa veruzhinji kuti maWarriors achanokwikwidza zvine mutsindo kuAFCON. Vanhu havana kuuya kunhandare sezvaitarisirwa asi vashoma vacho vaivemo vakanakidzwa nematambiro echikwata chavo icho chakawana zvibodzwa kubva kuna Knowledge Musona, Nyasha Mushekwi pamwe naMathew Rusike. Zvakabuda pamutabo uyu zvakakosha kumaWarriors kwete mugadziriro yavo yeNations Cup chete asi muma Fifa World rankings zvekare sezvo veFifa vanoshandisa mitambo yakadai kugadzira mamiriro ezvikwata muhurongwa hwepasi rese. Mutsigiri weDynamos VaObert Masvotore vanoti zvakaitika neTanzania zvinobatsira kutyisidzira zvikwata zvanga zvichitarisira Zimbabwe pasi kuma Africa Cup of Nations vachiwedzera ivo kuti ikozvino Zimbabwe iri kuenda kuGabon iinechiremera. Aimbotambira maWarriors neCaps United Alois Bunjira anoti kukunda kwemaWarriors zvinhu zvinofadza zvikuru achiti ivo semaonero ake tarenda rakazara muchikwata chenyika ichi. Mutsigiri weCaps United VaShingirai Mthombeni varikudada nemaitiro emaWarriors vachiti ivo dai varamba vakadai kusvikira pachapera maAfrica Cup of Nations finals. Mutambo weTanzania wauya svondo rimwechete maWarriors achangobva kukunda Zambia 1-0. Asi Bunjira anoti pachine zviviri kana zvitatu zvinoda kugadziriswa maWarriors asati ave kurota zvekutora mukombe wemuAfrica. Pamusoro pevatambi vakabva kunze kwenyika, murairidzi wemaWarriors Kalisto Pasuwa akashandisawo vatambi vanotambira zvikwata zvemuno vakaita saHardlife Zvirekwi weCaps United, Teenage Hadebe weChicken Inn pamwe na Tatenda Mukuruva weDynamos, avo arikuongorora kuti angaende navo here kuma fainari. Pasuwa anoti ari kuda mimwe mitambo miviri kana mitatu yekuedzana masimba kuti akwanise kugadzira chikwata chakasimba icho achaenda nacho kuGabon. Mutungamiri weZifa VaPhillip Chiyangwa vakavimbisa mitambo nezvikwata zvine mukurumbira muAfrica zvakaita seEgypt neIvory Coast maWarriors asati asimuka kuenda kumaAfrica Cup of Nations. Asi vatsigiri venhabvu vanoti zveZIFA kutenda maruva wadya chakata.

headline: Zifa yoronga kudzoka kwenhabvu
text: SANGANO rinotungamirira nhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rinoti riri kushanda siku nesikati kuti nhabvu ichidzoswe kutanga kwemwedzi unotevera (Kubvumbi) zvichitevera kunyevenutswa kwakaitwa matanho ekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 neHurumende svondo rino.   Muhurukuro, mutungamiri weZifa — Felton Kamambo — anoti sangano ravo rakatotanga kare gadziriro dzekudzosa mutambo uyu izvo zvange zvichivaona vachiongorora nhandare dzose dzenhabvu dziri munyika.    Anoti chasara pari zvino kuti vachipihwa mvumo neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) yekuti nhabvu ichitanga kutambwa.   “Isu takatotanga kare gadziriro dzekuti mutambo uyu udzoswe nekuongorora nhandare dzose dzenhabvu dziri munyika. Tichiri kuenderera mberi nekuongorora kuti nhandare dzedu dziri munyika dzakamira sei kuitira kuti tigare takagadzirira.   “Saka iye zvino takamirira kupihwa mvumo neSRC kuti tichitange kuronga mitambo ichitambwe,” anodaro Kamambo.   Anoti seZifa, vakanga vaine chivimbo chekuti nhabvu itange muna Kurume asi hazvichakwanisike saka vave kutarisira kuna Kubvumbi.   “Taida chaizvo kuti nhabvu itange mwedzi uno asi hazvichakwanisike, tave kutarisira mwedzi unotevera. Takamirira kunzwa kubva kuSRC kuti toita sei.    “Tiri kupedzisa gadziriro dzose kuitira kuti tikapihwa mvumo yekuti nhabvu ichitanga pasawanikwe chikoneso chinoita kuti isatambwe,” anodaro.   Kamambo anoti sangano ravo rakaudza hutungamiri hwemaligi ose ari muno anosanganisira Premier Soccer League, Division One neTwo kuti vavanyorere vachivazisa zvikwata zvichakwanisa kukwikwidza mumwaka wegore rino.   “Takati kumaligi ose ngavatizivise zvikwata zvichange zvichikwikwidza kuitira kuti patinotanga kuronga mafambiro anoita mitambo yegore rino tinge tichiziva kuti pachange pane zvikwata zvipi uye kuti zvitiitire nyore pakuita hurongwa hwacho,” anodaro Kamambo.   Kutanga mwaka wegore rino kana nhabvu ikatanga kutambwa, Kamambo anoti Zifa ndiyo ichange yave kubhadhara varidzi vepembe izvo zvakasiyana nezvaiitwa kare sezvo vaibhadharwa nezvikwata zvinenge zvichitamba.   “Gore rino tinoda kuti zvikwata zvisanyanyoremerwa saka isu seZifa takazvipira kubhadhara varidzi vepembe kutanga mwaka uno, zvikwata hazvichabhadhare zvega varidzi vepembe,” anodaro Kamambo.

headline: Malawi yapinda mu’Round of 16′
text: APO maWarriors ari kudzoka kumusha mushure mekuburitswa mumutambo weAFCON, zvimwe zvikwata zvainge zviri muboka rimwe chete nechikwata chenyika ichi reGroup B zvinoti Malawi, Guinea neSenegal zvose zvabudirira kuenda muRound of 16 yemakwikwi aya.   Malawi yabudirira kuenda muRound of 16 zvichitevera kukunda kwayakaita Zimbabwe apo yakahwina 2-1 nemusi weChishanu svondo radarika uye nekuita mangange 0-0 neSenegal mumutambo uyo yakapotsa nepadiki yahwina apo yakazonyimwa pena mushure mekupindira kweVideo Assistant Referee (VAR).   CAF yazivisa nezvekubudirira kweMalawi kuenda kuRound of 16 apo yanyora padandemutande rayo reTwitter ichiti, “Nhoroondo. Chikwata cheMalawi chabudirira kuenda ku#TotalEnergiesAFCON knockout stages kekutanga munhoroondo yacho. Izuva rakakosha zvikuru kunyika yose.”   MaWarriors – ayo akapedza ari pasi muboka rawo – ane zvibodzwa zvitatu uye ari kutarisirwa kusvika munyika achibva kuCameroon.

headline: Vakaona maWarriors mahara
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vane chitsama nemusi weChishanu chadarika vakaona bhora remaWarriors neBotswana reAfcon Qualifier kuNational Sports Stadium “mahara’’ sezvo vaingosvetuka mudhuri vachipinda munhandare iyi apo mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police aive akayeva.   Mubhadharo wekupinda munhandare yeNSS waive $20 kubhombera, kugara paBay 15 kusvika ku18 kwaiita $50 kozoti kuVIP kwaita $120.   Asi kune vamwe – vanhurume nevanhukadzi –  vakapinda mahara apo vaisvetuka mudhuri vachipinda mukati menhandare.   Kwayedza yakazvionera vamwe vatsigiri venhabvu vachisvetuka mudhuri vachipinda munhandare iyi uye mamwe mapurisa aitonzwikwa achikurudzira vatsigiri ava achiti, “Svetukai nekuchimbidza”.   Mutauriri wemapurisa munyika Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vanoti imhosva huru kana mapurisa akatyora mutemo nekusaita basa ravo nemazvo zvakadai sekupihwa chiokomuhomwe vachisiya munhu achipara mhosva.   Vanoti pachaferefetwa nyaya yemapurisa ari kupomerwa kuti aisiya vanhu vachisvetuka mudhuri vachipinda munhandare yeNSS nenzira dzechitsotsi.   “Imhosva huru iyoyo uye hatitombozvitendere, kana paine vaizviita tichavatsvaga uye vakabatwa mutongo wavanopihwa wakakura zvekusvika pakudzingwa basa.   “Hatitarisire mapurisa edu kuita izvozvo zvekupinza vanhu munhandare mahara ivo vachifanirwa kuchengetedza kuona kuti vanhu havasi kupinda mahara uye hatitode kunzwa kuti pane vari kutambira chiokomuhomwe kuti vanhu vatyore mutemo. Isu semapurisa, hatidi hunhu ihoho,” vanodaro Asst Comm Nyathi.   Mutauriri wesangano reZifa uyo anovazve competitions manager, Xolisani Gwesela, paakaziviswa nezvenyaya iyi neKwayedza musi watambwa mutambo uyu akangoti anoda kurakidzwa mifananidzo yacho iyo akarakidzwa nemutori wenhau uno asi ndokungoridza tsamwa achirakidza kushamisika nazvo.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakazomutumira mibvunzo paWhatsApp ichibvumunzisisa kuti Zifa yakawana marii kubva pamutambo weZimbabwe neBotswana, Gwesela ndokuti vachiri kumboongorora kuti vakawana marii.   Paakabvunzwa nezvenyaya yemapurisa ayo aisiya vanhu vachipinda munhandare mahara, Gwesela anoti akange asina kuona mifananidzo yacho zvakanaka saka anoda kuti munyori uno amutumire.   “Tichiri kuongorora kuti tione kuti zvakafamba sei.   “Mubvunzo wechipiri, tangai manditumira mifananidzo yacho, handinda kuiona zvakanaka,” anodaro Gwesela.   Mumutambo uyu, Zimbabwe neBotswana zvakaita mangange 0-0 izvo zvakasiya vatsigiri vazhinji vemaWarriors vachigunun’una zvikuru.   Zvakadai, mumutambo wakatambirwa kuLusaka, kuZambia nemusi weChipiri chino, Zimbabwe yakakunda Zambia 2 – 1.   MaWarriors ari muGroup H umo mune zvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira Algeria, Zambia neBotswana.

headline: Tauya muPSL zvachose: Samaita
text: MURAIRIDZI weGreen Fuel FC — Lloyd “Samaita” Mutasa — anoti chikwata chake icho chakapinda muCastle Premiership (PSL) kekutanga mwaka uno, hachina kuuya kuzongozadzikisa chete sezvimwe zvikwata asi vanotoda kurwira mikombe yakawanda.   Green Fuel FC yakapinda muPSL mushure mekunge yahwina mukombe weEastern Region Division One uko yaitamba nhabvu inodakadza.   Samaita anoti kare zvikwata zvaiwanzopinda muPSL zvaitarisirwa kuti zvinopinda zvichingodzokera kuDivision One.   Asi anoti chikwata chake maEthanol Boys, sezita remadunhurirwa reGreen Fuel, chauya zvachose muPSL.   “Tauya zvachose, tasiyana nezvimwe zvikwata zviye zvinoti zvikapinda muPSL zvinodzokera kuDivision One pasina chinguva. Isu tinoda kuramba tiri muPSL togorwira mikombe yakawanda.   “Chikwata chedu chine vatambi vakawanda, vamwe vasati vambotambira muPSL vanoda kugadzira mazita avo saka vatori nehukasha hwekuda kurakidza matarenda avo. Tine chivimbo chekuti vachabata basa sebasa,” anodaro.   Samaita anoti akaumba chikwata chine vatambi vasati vambotambira muPSL pamwe chete nevave nenguva vachitamba muleague iri avo vachabatsira kurakidza gwara kune vechidiki vari kusimukira.   “Ukaenda kana kuEurope chaiko, vatambi madhara anotodiwa anenge arimo muzvikwata zvakasiyana nechinangwa chekusimbisa chikwata pamwechete nekurakidza gwara kune vatambi vechidiki,” anodaro Samaita.   Kupinda kwakaita Green Fuel FC muPSL chakabva chaita chikwata chekutanga kubva kuChisumbanje kutambira nhabvu yacho league iri.   Samaita anoti kuChisumbanje vatsigiri vamirira kutanga kwenhabvu izvo zvichavapawo mukana wekuona zvikwata zvikuru zvenhabvu zvemuno zvakaita seDynamos, Highlanders neCAPS United.   “MuChisumbanje vanhu vari kufara zvikuru, ndekekutanga aka nhabvu yePSL ichiuya uye vamirira kuda kuona chikwata chavo chichitamba nezvikwata zvikuru zvenhabvu munyika.   “Vamwe vacho havasati vamboona Dynamos, Highlanders, CAPS United neFC Platinum dzichitamba saka kwavari chinhu chikuru kuona zvikwata izvi zvichiuya kuzotambira muChisumbanje.   “Kuno kune vanhu vane mabhizimisi vakawanda, ndiri kutoona kuti vari kumhanya-mhanya kugadzirira mabhizimisi avo nekuti vanoziva kuti nhabvu paichatanga vachaita mari apo panenge pachiuya zvikwata zvakawanda kuzotamba nesu,” anodaro Samaita.   Pari zvino, Green Fuel iri musvondo rayo rechipiri yatanga kuita gadziriro dzemwaka wa2023 uyo unotarisirwa kutanga munaKukadzi.   Vazhinji vanoziva Samaita achitamba nhabvu apo akaita mukurumbira achitambira Tanganda FC yekwaMutare ndokuzoenda kuDynamos uko akanohwina mikombe yakawanda zvikuru.   Achiri kuTanganda, Samaita akatamba nhabvu yainwisa mvura izvo zvakaona achishevedzwa kunzi ndiPele wenhabvu wekuTanganda uye kana achifamba muguta reMutare vatsigiri venhabvu vakamuona vanomushevedza kuti Mambo Mutasa wenhabvu.   Samaita anobva muimba yehushe hwekwaMambo Mutasa kuManicaland.   “Tisu taive muchikwata cheTanganda chakatamba muPSL chikahwina mukombe weCastle Cup mugore ra1993. Saka nhasi ndikafamba maMutare ndinenge ndichingoshevedzwa kunzi Mambo Mutasa wenhabvu, rukudzo rwandinopihwa nekuda kwebasa randakabata ndichitambira kuchikwata ichi.   “Kare kwaive nemumwe mutori wenhau akandishevedza kuti ndini Pele weTanganda, saka ndinongotenda kuti ndinoyemurwa nevekwangu kwandakabva,” anodaro.   Vanakomana vaSamaita vaviri, Wisdom naPanashe, vese vakatevera matsimba ake sezvo vanotamba nhabvu.   Wisdom, uyo anotambira Black Rhinos, akambotambira FC Platinum, Dynamos, CAPS United, Motor Action neSenica yekuSlovakia kuchiti Panashe anotambira Manica Diamonds.
